31b4(rgyud): ma yin pas na/ de'i phyir gcig pa'ang ma yin/ tha dad pa'ang ma yin pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu dang po gang yin pa de ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la brten nas rab tu sdang bar 'gyur ro// sku
31b5(rgyud): gnyis pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi sku la brten nas snang bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni yang dag par yod pa ma yin pas rten pa'i gnas ci'ang mi mnga' 'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar chos
31b6(rgyud): gsum po de dag ni rtag pa'i don dang ldan pa'i phyir ni rtag pa zhes bstan la/ mi rtag pa'i don dang ldan pa'i phyir ni mi rtag pa zhes bstan te/ sprul pa'i sku gang yin pa de ni rtag par chos kyi 'khor lo
31b7(rgyud): bskor zhing / de dang de dag tu rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du thabs mkhas pa ston pa la rgyun chad med pa'i phyir/ de lta bas na rtag pa zhes bstan to// rtsa ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang / phun sum tshogs pa'i
32a1(rgyud): mdzad pa chen po sngon du mi 'byung ba'i phyir/ de lta bas na mi rtag pa zhes bstan to// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gang yin pa de ni thog ma med pa'i dus nas rgyun chad pa med par/
32a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa 'dres pa'i chos rnams yongs su sdud cing 'dzin pa'i phyir dang / sems can zad pa med pa bzhin du/ mdzad pa la'ang zad pa mi mnga' ba'i phyir rtag pa zhes bstan to//
32a3(rgyud): ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang / phun sum tshogs pa'i mdzad pa chen po mngon du mi 'byung ba'i phyir mi rtag pa zhes bstan to// chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i chos kyang ma yin la
32a4(rgyud): dad pa'i mtshan nyid mi mnga' zhing rtsa ba yin par gyur pa'i phyir dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir rtag pa zhes bstan to// rigs kyi bu rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes las gud na mchog
32a5(rgyud): tu gyur pa'i ye shes med la/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang mchog tu gyur pa'i spyod yul med pas/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de dang / shes rab kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de'i de
32a6(rgyud): bzhin nyid rnam pa gnyis po gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'ang ma yin/ tha dad pa'ang ma yin te/ de'i phyir chos kyi sku ni shes rab rnam par gyur pa'i phyir dang / 'gog pa rnam par dag par gyur/
32a7(rgyud): pa'i phyir/ gnyis rnam par dag par gyur pa yin pas/ des na chos kyi sku ni rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs par gyur pa yin no// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu sku gsum po dag tu rnam par dbye na tha dad /
32b1(rgyud): pa rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te/ sprul pa'i sku yin la/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ma yin pa'ang yod/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin la/ sprul pa'i sku ma yin pa'ang yod/ sprul pa'i sku yin la//
32b2(rgyud): longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin pa'ang yod/ sprul pa'i sku'ang ma yin la/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ma yin pa'ang yod do// sprul pa'i sku yin la/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ma yin pa gang
32b3(rgyud): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu smon lam la mnga' brnyes pa'i phyir/ rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du phan 'dogs pa gang yin pa de ni sprul pa'i sku
32b4(rgyud): zhes bya'o// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin la/ sprul pa'i sku ma yin pa gang zhe na/ sa'i mdun rol gyi sku gang yin pa'o// sprul pa'i sku'ang yin la/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'ang yin pa
32b5(rgyud): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa'i sku gang yin pa'o// sprul pa'i sku'ang ma yin la/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'ang ma yin pa gang zhe na/
32b6(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ chos kyi sku gang yin pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med pas rab tu phye ba'i phyir ro// gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba'ang gang zhe na/ chos kyi sku de la mtshan nyid/
32b7(rgyud): dang mtshan nyid kyi gnas zhes bya ba gnyis ka med pas yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin/ gcig pa'ang ma yin/ tha dad pa'ang ma yin/ grangs kyang ma yin/ grangs ma yin pa'ang ma
33a1(rgyud): yin/ sdang ba'ang ma yin/ mun pa'ang ma yin te/ de lta bu'i de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes des ni mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid kyi gnas kyang mi gzigs/ yod pa'ang ma yin/ med/
33a2(rgyud): ba'ang ma yin pa'ang mi gzigs/ gcig pa'ang ma yin/ tha dad pa'ang ma yin pa'ang mi gzigs/ grangs kyang ma yin/ grangs ma yin pa'ang mi gzigs/ snang ba'ang ma yin/ mun pa'ang ma yin
33a3(rgyud): ba'ang mi gzigs pas/ de'i phyir spyod yul rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab rnam par dag pa la rnam par brtag tu'ang mi rung la/ bar zhes bya ba med kyang 'gog pa dang lam gyi gzhi byed pa'i
33a4(rgyud): phyir/ chos kyi sku 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa rnam pa sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu sku 'di'i rgyu dang / rkyen dang / spyod yul dang ga gnas dang / 'bras bu
33a5(rgyud): dang rnga rtsa ba dpag par dka' ba'i phyir gang gis khong du chud par gyur na/ sku de ni theg pa chen po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'o// sku 'di nyid la
33a6(rgyud): brten nas dang po bskyed pa'i sems kyang thob par 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor sgom pa'i sems kyang rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog pa'i sems kyang rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro// rtse gcig
33a7(rgyud): gis thogs pa'i sems dang / rdo rje'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems kyang rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gya nom pa tshad med cing mtha' med pa thams
33b1(rgyud): cad kyang rab tu spang bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi sku 'di la brten nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po rnams kyang rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi sku 'di la brten nas ye shes ched po
33b2(rgyud): thams cad rab tu snang bar 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir sku gnyis po ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab la brten nas mngon du snang bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi sku 'di lta bu 'di ni rang gi ngo bo nyid la gnas pas
33b3(rgyud): rtag pa zhes kyang bstan to// nga zhes kyang bstan to// ting nge 'dzin chen po la gnas pa'i phyir skyid pa zhes kyang bstan to// ye shes chen po la gnas pa'i phyir yongs su gtsang ba zhes kyang bstan
33b4(rgyud): te/ de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag par bzhugs pa dang / mnga' dbang brnyes pa dang / bde skyid pa dang / yongs su gtsang bar gyur pa yin no// ting nge 'dzin chen po la brten nas
33b5(rgyud): dpal bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / chos dran pa chen po la sogs pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa thams cad dang / byams pa chen po dang / thugs rje chen
33b6(rgyud): po dang / gzungs thams cad dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad dang / dbang thams cad dang / chos mnyam pa thams cad yang dag par sdud cing // de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
33b7(rgyud): kyang mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ye shes chen po 'di la brten nas stobs bcu dang / bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i chos brgya
34a1(rgyud): mabargya cu dang / ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad kyang rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che la brten
34a2(rgyud): nas rin po che tshad med cing mtha' med pa rnam pa sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ ting nge 'dzin chen po'i rin po che dang shes rab chen po'i rin po che la brten nas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
34a3(rgyud): gya nom pa tshad med cing mtha' med pa sna tshogs mngon sum du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de lta bu'i chos kyi sku'i ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma thams cad las/
34a4(rgyud): yang dag par 'das shing / mtshan ma la mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur bas rnam par brtag tu mi rung la/ rtag pa'ang ma yin la/ chad pa'ang ma yin pas dbu ma'i lam zhes bya'o// rnam
34a5(rgyud): par rtog pa mnga' yang ngo bo nyid la rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' 'o// gsum du bgrang ba yod kyang ngo bo nyid la gsum du 'gyur ba med pas 'phel ba'ang med/ 'grib pa'ong med de/
34a6(rgyud): rmi lam dang sgyu ma lta bur gzung ba med/ 'dzin pa'ang med pas/ chos kyi sku de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par grol ba'i gnas 'chi bdag gi rgyal po'i yul las yang dag par 'das pa
34a7(rgyud): skye shi'i mun pa las mngon par 'phags pa sems can thams cad kyis sgrub par mi nus shing bgrod par mi nus pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzhugs/
34b1(rgyud): pa'i gnas su gyur pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na mi zhig gser 'dod pa de dag tu gser gyi rdo yongs su btsal ba las/ gser gyi rdod rnyeng nas zhib mor btags te snying du/
34b2(rgyud): gang yin pa blangs nas/ so mal du bzhus btul nas/ gser yongs su dag pa rnyed par gyur na yid bzhin du bsgyur te/ gdu bu la sogs pa rgyan gyi rnam pa sna tshogs su byas nas spyod/
34b3(rgyud): pa mang po dang ldan par gyur kyang / gser gyi rang bzhin la ni 'gyur ba ci'ang med do// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis rnam par grol ba'i mchog yongs su/
34b4(rgyud): gnyer ba 'am/ 'jig rten pa'i dge ba mngon par bsgrub pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de'i slob ma'i 'khor mthong nas nye bar bsnyen te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das/
34b5(rgyud): dge ba ni gang lags/ mi dge ba ni gang lags/ yang dag pa'i rnal 'byor bsgoms pas rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa thob par 'gyur ba ni gang lags zhes gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
34b6(rgyud): pa dang slob ma'i 'khor rnams de skad du zhu ba gsol ba gzigs par gyur na/ de'i tshe 'di snyam du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'di ni rnam par dag pa yongs su gnyer ba'i phyir/
34b7(rgyud): yang dag pa'i chos yongs su nyan par 'dod pa yin no snyam du dgongs nas/ de la rnam par phye ste bstan pa nyid kyis go bar mdzad par 'gyur bas/ de thos nas kyang yang dag pa'i dran
35a1(rgyud): bas mi brjed par bzung ste/ rnal 'byor sgom pa'i sems bskyed nas/ brtson 'grus kyi stobs thob nas le lo'i sgrib pa yongs su bsal te/ sgrib pa thams cad
35a2(rgyud): yongs su sbyong bar byed pasabaslab pa'i gnas rnams la ma gus pa spangs nasargod pa dang 'gyod pa'i sems nye bar zhi bar bya ste/ sa dang po la 'jug par 'gyur bas/ sa dang
35a3(rgyud): bo'i sems la brten nas/ sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas/ sa gnyis par 'jug pa thob par 'gyur ro// sa der yang rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i sgrib pa
35a4(rgyud): yongs su bsal nas/ sa gsum par 'jug par 'gyur ro// sa der yang sems mnyen zhing rnam par byang ba'i sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas/ sa bzhi par 'jug par 'gyur ro// sa
35a5(rgyud): der yang thabs mkhas pa'i sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas/ sa lnga par 'jug par 'gyur ro// sa der yang don dam pa dang kun rdzob tu mthong ba'i sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas/ sa drug par
35a6(rgyud): 'jug par 'gyur ro// sa der yang mtshan ma la spyod pa'i mthong ba'i sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas/ sa bdun par 'jug par 'gyur ro// sa der yang mtshan ma nye bar zhi bar mi mthong ba'i
35a7(rgyud): sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas/ sa brgyad par 'jug par 'gyur ro// sa der yang skye ba'i mtshan mar mi mthong ba'i sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas/ sa dgu par 'jug par 'gyur ro//
35b1(rgyud): sa der yang mngon par shes pa drug gi sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas/ sa bcu par 'jug par 'gyur ro// sa der yang shes bya'i sgrib pa dang rtsa ba'i sems yongs su bsal nas/ de bzhin gshen/
35b2(rgyud): pa'i sa la 'jug par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa gsum yongs su dag par gyur pa'i phyir/ shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/ gsum gang zhe
35b3(rgyud): na sa nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa dang / sdug bsngal rnam par dag pa dang / mtshan ma rnam par dag pa gang yin pa'o// 'di lta ste/ gser yang dag par bzhus sbyangs brdungs te/ dri ma
35b4(rgyud): med par bya ba'ang gser gyi rang bzhin gzod ma nyid nas rnam par dag pa gsal bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir/ gser gyi ngo bo nyid yongs su dag pa'i dbang gis gsor med par 'gyur ro zhes bya
35b5(rgyud): bar mi rung ngo // 'di lta ste/ dper na chu rnyog ma can yongs su dang te/ dri ma med par bya ba'ang chu'i rang bzhin gzod ma nyid nas yongs su dag pa gsal bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir/ chu med
35b6(rgyud): bar ra 'gyur ro zhes byar mi rung ba de bzhin du/ chos kyi sku'ang nyon mongs pa dang 'dres par gyur pas/ sdug bsngal ba dang kun 'byung ba yongs su bsal nas/ bag chags lhag ma med par/
35b7(rgyud): bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gzod ma nyid nas rnam par dag par gsal bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir/ ngo bo nyid med par 'gyur ro// zhes bya bar mi rung ngo // 'di lta ste/ dper na nam/
36a1(rgyud): mkha' la du ba dang / sprin dang rdul dang / khug rna rnams kyis bsgribs pa dag las gal te yongs su dang bar gyur na/ nam mkha'i khams yongs su dag par gyur pas/
36a2(rgyud): nam mkha' med par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mi rung ba de bzhin du/ chos kyi sku'ang sdug bsngal mang po thams cad yongs su zad pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa zhes brjod kyang / ngo bo nyid med par/
36a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mi rung ngo // 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu zhig gnyid log pa'i rmi lam na/ chu chen pos khyer ba las rkang lag bskyod de/ lus dang sems le lo ma byas pa'i phyir/
36a4(rgyud): chu bo thad kar bcad de pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin par mthong ba las/ rmi lam sad nas chu bo dang / tshu rol dang / pha rol gyi 'gram tha dad par 'gyur ba mi mthong yang / sems med do zhes bya
36a5(rgyud): bar mi rung ngo // 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor ba'i yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa yongs su zad nas/ blo rnam par dag par gyur kyang / blo med do zhes bya bar mi rung ba de bzhin du
36a6(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings kyang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad mi skye ba'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa zhes brjod kyang / sangs rgyas rnams kyang yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid med ces bya bar mi rung
36a7(rgyud): pogazhan yang rigs kyi bu chos kyi sku gang yin pa de nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag par gyur pas ni/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ston par mdzad do// las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag
36b1(rgyud): par gyur pas ni/ sprul pa'i sku ston par mdzad do// shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir ni/ chos kyi sku ston par mdzad do// 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la brten nas ni glog/
36b2(rgyud): 'byung bklog la brten nas ni 'ong 'byung ba de bzhin du/ chos kyi sku la brten pa'i phyir ni/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ston par mdzad do// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la brten nas ni sprul
36b3(rgyud): pa'i sku ston par mdzad do// rang bzhin yongs su dag par gyur pa'i phyir ni/ chos kyi sku ston par mdzad do// shes rab rnam par dag par gyur pas ni/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ston par
36b4(rgyud): mdzad do// ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag par gyur pas ni/ sprul pa'i sku ston par mdzad do// de gsum rnam par dag par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang tha mi dad do//
36b5(rgyud): de bzhin nyid dang ro gcig pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / rnam par grol ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / mthar thug pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pas/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku la tha dad par gyur
36b6(rgyud): pa med do// rims kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gi ston pa chen po yin no// sa de ltar nges par mngon par yod nas pa'i
36b7(rgyud): zag des ni shin tu dang ba'i bsam pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tha dad pa mi mnga' bar khong du chud bar gyur pas/ rigs kyi bu don de'i phyir spyod yul rnams la yang dag pa ma yin pa'i
37a1(rgyud): yid la byed pa rnams yongs su bsal bar gyur na/ chos de dag la mtshan nyid gnyi su med par khong du chud cing / rtag par rtog pa'ang med par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i/
37a2(rgyud): rnal 'byor sgom pa la/ de bzhin nyid de mtshan nyid gnyis su gyur pa med cing / yang dag par rnal 'byor sgom pa'i phyir/ 'di ltar de bzhin du sgrib pa thams cad yongs su bsal bas nye bar
37a3(rgyud): zhi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin nyid sgrib pa thams cad zhi bar gyur pas/ 'di ltar de bzhin du de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mchog tu rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// de
37a4(rgyud): bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes rnam par dag par gyur pas/ 'di ltar de bzhin du rang dbang du phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang yongs su sdud par 'gyur/
37a5(rgyud): sgrib pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes dang / yang dag
37a6(rgyud): pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o// de ltar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i lta ba zhes bya bas/ de ni yang dag pa nyid du sangs rgyas mthong ba zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag pa
37a7(rgyud): jig pa bzhin du chos kyi de bzhin nyid mthong ba'i phyir/ de lta bas ma de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ma lus par gzigs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyam thos dang rang sangs rgyas
37b1(rgyud): khams gsum las nges par byung nas/ yang dag pa'i spyod yul yongs su 'chol bas kyang khong du mi chud cing mthong bar mi nus pas so// de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i gang zag gang gis kyang mi rig
37b2(rgyud): cing mi mthong bas/ so so'i skye bo thams cad the tsom dang som nyi bskyed nas phyin ci log tu rnam par rtog par byed pas yongs su 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ dper na ri bong rgya mtsho
37b3(rgyud): la rkyal bar byed kyang gdon mi za bar pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyam stobs shin tu chung ba'i phyir ro// byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang de bzhin du chos kyi de bzhin nyid
37b4(rgyud): mngon par ma rtogs so// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rtog pa'i dgongs pa mi mnga' bar chos thams cad la mnga' chen po brnyes shing / shes rab shin tu zab cing rnam par dag pa phun
37b5(rgyud): sum tshogs par gyur pa'i phyir dang / rang gi spyod yul du gyur cing / gzhan dang yang thun mong du ma gyur pa'i phyir/ de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskal pa tshad med grangs med
37b6(rgyud): dpag tu med pa nas/ nyid kyi sku srog la 'phangs mi mnga' bar dka' ba spyad pas/ dpe zla med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig gi spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ rab tu dben
37b7(rgyud): par 'jigs pa rnams dang bral ba'i sku mchog dab pa 'di brnyes pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar chos kyi de bzhin nyid rig ci mthong ba gang yin pa de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba mang po
38a1(rgyud): tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med/ gnyid kyang med/ bkres pa dang skom pa'ang med de/ rtag par ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa/ sems rnam par g.yeng zhing g.yo ba med do//
38a2(rgyud): gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la rtsod pa'i bsam pa bskyed pa des ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni gang ci gsung yang rung ste/ thams cad
38a3(rgyud): la phan 'dogs par 'gyur bas/ gang gis mnyan cing thos pa de dag rnam par mi grol ba'ang med do// gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang / mi ma rungs pa dang / 'dre srin ma rungs pa dag dang /
38a4(rgyud): phrad par mi 'gyur te/ chos thos pa'i dbang gis 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'ang zad par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la lung du ma bstan pa'i dngos po mi mnga' yang
38a5(rgyud): spyod yul thams cad la mkhyen par bya'o snyam pa'i dgongs pa'ang mi mnga'/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa tha dad pa'i 'du shes kyang mi mnga' 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni//
38a6(rgyud): gang ci gsung yang rung ste ma nges pa mi mnga' 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni spyod lam bzhi po thams cad du ye shes kyis yongs su ma bzung ba mi mnga' 'o// chos thams cad
38a7(rgyud): la byams pa dang thugs rjes yongs su ma zin pa mi mnga' bas/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bas phan mi 'dogs pa gang yang med do// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
38b1(rgyud): mo gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di thos nas mngon par yid ches pa gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / mi
38b2(rgyud): ma yin gyi 'gro ba dag tu ltung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rtag par lha dang mi'i nang du skye bar 'gyur bas ma rabs dag tu skye bar yang mi 'gyur la/ rtag par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
38b3(rgyud): la bsnyen bkur dang rim gro byas nas yang dag pa'i chos nyan cing len par 'gyur/ rtag par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos zab
38b4(rgyud): mo 'di thos par gyur pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen cing lung bstan par 'gyur bas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
38b5(rgyud): nub las phyir mi ldog par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ shin tu zab pa'i chos gya nom pa 'di lan cig rna bas thos par gyur na/ gang zag de ni
38b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa dang / yang dag pa'i chos la mi spong pa dang / 'phags pa'i tshogs la mi brnyas pa dang / sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa
38b7(rgyud): ni skyed par byed la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni 'phel zhing yangs pa dang yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can ji snyed pa dag pha rol tu phyin/
39a1(rgyud): ba drug po rnams mngon par sgrub par bskul bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang /
39a2(rgyud): rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i 'khor mang po rnams 'dug pa'i stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas thal mo sbyar te/ gus pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs/
39a3(rgyud): la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang yang rung ba dag tu/ 'di ltar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde shin tu gya nom pa
39a4(rgyud): 'di yang dag par ston par bgyid na/ yul der phan yon rnam pa bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur lags so// bzhi gang zhe na/ dang po ni rgyal po'i dmag tshogs rnams brtsan zhing dar
39a5(rgyud): bas phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra rnams ma mchis pa dang / bro nad dang bral zhing tshe ring ba dang / bkra shis dang ldan zhing bde skyid pa dang / dam pa'i chos dar zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba'o//
39a6(rgyud): gnyis pa ni pho brang nang gi btsun mo dang / sras dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po rnams bzlum zhing rtsod pa ma mchis g.yo sgyu dang phra ma spangs pas/ rgyal pos gnang zhing bkur
39a7(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba'o// gsum pa ni dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / yul gyi mi rnams yang dag pa'i chos spyod pas bro nang ma mchis shing bde skyid pa dang / glo bur du 'gum pa ma
39b1(rgyud): mchis pa dang / bsod nams mang po mngon par sgrub pa'o// bzhi pa ni dus gsum po dag tu 'byung ba chen po dag 'phrod cing rtag par lha rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs nas
39b2(rgyud): yongs su srung bar 'gyur ba dang / byams pa dang snying rje mnyam par gyur pas gnod pa mi bgyid cing rnam par 'tshe ba'i bsam pa ma mchis pa dang / skye bo rnams dkon mchog
39b3(rgyud): gsum la skyabs su mchi zhing thams cad kyis byang chub kyi spyod pa mngon par sgrub par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di dag ni phan yon rnam pa bzhi zhes bgyi ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das
39b4(rgyud): bdag cag kyong rtag par mdo sde 'di rgya cher spel ba'i slad du/ 'di ltar mdo sde yongs su 'dzin pa'i gang zag de'i slad du rjes su 'brang zhing gang na gnas pa'i gnas der sman pa dag bgyin
39b5(rgyud): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ khyed kyis rab tu brtson pa'i sems kyis mdo sde'i rgyal po
39b6(rgyud): shin tu gya nom pa 'di spel ba nyid kyis yang dag pa'i chos yun ring du 'jig rten na gnas par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po las sku gsum
39b7(rgyud): rnam par 'byed pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mngon sum du gya nom pa'i chos thos pas
40a1(rgyud): dga' mgu rangs par gyur te/ sems rtse gcig tu yid la bsams nas/ rang gi gnas su phyin pa dang / mtshan mo nyal ba'i rmi lam na gser gyi rnga bo che 'od ze shin/
40a2(rgyud): tu 'bar ba/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs pa zhig mthong ste/ 'od zer de las phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas tshad med pa rnams rin po che'i shing drung na bai DUR+Ya'i gdan la bzhugs nas te'akho
40a3(rgyud): brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor ba la chos 'chang pa'ang mthong ngo // bram ze zhig gis gser gyi rnga brdungs pa las sgra chen po byung ste/ sgra de las sdig pa bshags pa'i chos kyi tshigs su
40a4(rgyud): bcad pa shin tu gya nom pa dag bstan pa'ang / mdzes pa'i tog gis thos pas thams cad ma lus par yid la bzung ste/ dran pa rtse gcig tu yid la gnas par gyur to// nam langs
40a5(rgyud): pa dang 'khor brgya stong tshad med pa mang pos yongs su bskor te mchod pa'i yo byad rnams thogs nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer nas phyir byung ste/ bya rgod phung po'i ri ga la ba der dong nas/
40a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas/ me tog dang / spos dag bkram ste/ g.yas phyogs su lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs
40a7(rgyud): gcig tu 'khod de/ thal mo sbyar te gus pas bcom ldan 'das zhal du bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi g.yar lam na/ bram ze
40b1(rgyud): zhig gis gser gyi rnga shin tu gya rdob pa brdungs pa las sgra chen po byung ste/ sgra de las sdig pa bshags pa'i chos kyi tshigs su bcad pa shin tu gya nom pa bdag bstan pa bdag gis tharas/
40b2(rgyud): cad yongs su bzung ste dran lags na/ bcom ldan 'das thugs te chen pos bdag gis bshad par gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad do/
40b3(rgyud): gsol pa/ bdag gi mdang gsum g.yar lam na// gser gyi rnga bo chen po dag/ dbyibs ni shin tu khyad par 'phags// kun nas gser 'od khyad par ldan// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs
40b4(rgyud): pas na// snang bas kun tu khyab par bgyis// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang bar mthong // sangs rgyas mang po thams cad kun// rin chen ljon shing drung dag tu// bai DUR+Ya yi gdan bzhugs te/
40b5(rgyud): 'khor ni brgya stong tshad med snyed// gus pas yongs su bskor bar mthong // de nas bram ze zhig gis ni// gser gyi rnga chen brdungs pas ni// rnga chen de yi sgra las ni// tshigs bcad rgya
40b6(rgyud): rom 'di skad smras// gser 'od rnga las gya nom smra byung bas// stong gsum chen po'i 'jig rten kun khyab nas// ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal mi bzang dang // mi yi sdug bsngal mang po
40b7(rgyud): gang yin pa// gser gyi rnga sgra mthu stobs dbang gis ni// nyon mongs sgrib pa thams cad gtan zhi nas// dper na thub dbang bcom ldan ji bzhin du// 'jigs pa bsal nas bde ba nyid du
41a1(rgyud): shog/ bcom ldan 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen por ni// spyod bsags thams cad mkhyen ni bsgrubs pas na// sems can byang chub yan lag ldan mdzad nas// mthar ni yon tan/
41a2(rgyud): rgya mtsho phyogs par mdzad// gser 'od dam pa'i rnga sgra 'di yis ni// thos pa kun ni tshangs dbyangs thob par shog/ bla med byang chub 'bras bu thob gyur nas// chos kyi 'khor lo gya nom rtag skor
41a3(rgyud): shog/ tshe ni bskal pa bsam mi khyab gnas na// ji bzhin thos bshad skye dgu phan byed shog/ nyon mongs sdug bsngal mang po rgyun bcad nas// 'dod chags gti mug la sogs zhi bar shog/ sem
41a4(rgyud): can gang zhig ngan 'gror gnas gyur nas// me chen rab 'bar lus kun khyab pa dag/ rnga sgra dam pa 'di ni thos gyur nas// sdug bsngal bral nas sangs rgyas skyabs 'gro shog/ thams cad sngon
41a5(rgyud): gnas shes pa grub gyur nas// 'das pa'i tshe rabs brgya stong dran par shog/ thub pa'i gtso bo yang dag dran gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs bstan zab mo thos par shog/ gser gyi rnga dbyangs dam pa
41a6(rgyud): thos pa'i dbang // rtag par sangs rgyas rnams ni nyer bsten nas// thams cad sdig pa'i las ni yongs spangs te// rnam dag dge phyogs 'ba' zhig spyod par shog/ lha dang mi yi srog chags thams
41a7(rgyud): cad kun// gus pas smon lam rtse gcig 'debs pa dag/ gser gyi rnga sgra dam pa thos gyur nas// bsam pa rnams ni yongs su rdzogs par gyur// sems can gang zhig mnar med lhung gyur nas/
41b1(rgyud): dmyal ba'i 'bar mes lus ni nyon mongs te// mgon skyabs med cing 'khor bar gang gnas pa// thos par gyur na sdug bsngal zhi bar gyur// lha mi yi dgas dud 'gro'i skye gnas su// sdug bsngal/
41b2(rgyud): gegs mang mngon du myong gyur pa// gser gyi rnga dbyangs dam pa thos gyur na// sdug bsngal spangs nas thar pa thob par shog/ da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na// rtag tu bzhugs pa rkang gnyis/
41b3(rgyud): gtso// gzugs rje chen po'i thugs kyis ni// brtse bas bdag la dgongs su gsol// sems can gang zhig skyabs ma mchis// mgon ni bgyid pa ma mchis pa// de lta bu yi rnam pa la// skyabs can
41b4(rgyud): dag ni bgyid par shog/ bdag gis sngon ni bgyis pa'i sdig/ las ngan shin tu lci ba rnams// deng bdag stobs bcu'i spyan sngar ni// thams cad rtse gcig rab tu bshags// bdag gis sangs rgyas
41b5(rgyud): yid ma ches// bla nye bshes ma gus pa dang // dge ba mang po ma spyad pas// rtag tu las ngan bgyis pa 'am// bdag gis mtho btsun rus rigs dang // longs spyod dag gis snyems pa dang // dar
41b6(rgyud): la bab pas dregs gyur nas// rtag tu las ngan bgyis pa 'am// rtag tu log pa'i bsam bskyed nas// ngag gis tshig ngan smras pa dang // kha na ma tho ma mthong nas// rtag tu las ngan bgyis pa/
41b7(rgyud): 'am rtag tu byis pa'i blo spyad pas// ma rig mun pa'i sems g.yogs dang // mi dge'i grogs po'i rjes 'brangs nas// rag tu las ngan bgyis pa'am// rtsed mo dga' ba rnams kyi rgyus/
42a1(rgyud): mya ngan dag dang ldan 'gyur zhing // 'dod chags zhe sdang dkris pas na// de slad sdig rnams bgyis pa 'am// mi dge grogs po bsten pa dang // phrag dog ser sna bsam pa/
42a2(rgyud): dang / dbul 'phongs gya gyur spyad pas na// de slad sdig rnams bgyis pa'am// sdig mang dag la mi mos kyang // 'jigs skrag dag dang bcas pa 'am// rang dbang dag ni ma mchis pas//
42a3(rgyud): de slad sdig rnams bgyis pa 'am// rnam par g.yeng ba'i bsam pa dang // khong khro khon du 'dzin pa dang // bkres skom dag gis gdungs pa'i rgyus// de slad sdig rnams bgyis pa 'am/
42a4(rgyud): bza' dang btung dang gos dag dang // bud med dag la chags sred pa'i// nyon mongs mes ni bsregs pas na// de slad sdig rnams bgyis pa 'am// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// gus
42a5(rgyud): pa'i sems ni ma skyes pa'i// de 'dra'i sdig mang gang bgyis pa// deng bdag thams cad so sor bshags// rang rgyal byang chub sems dpa' la// gus pa'i sems ni ma mchis pa'i//
42a6(rgyud): de 'dra'i sdig mang gang bgyis pa// deng bdag thams cad so sor bshags// mi shes dam chos skur pa dang // pha ma sri zhu ma bgyis pa'i// de 'dra'i sdig mang gang bgyis pa// deng bdag
42a7(rgyud): thams cad so sor bshags// gti mug dang ni nga rgyal dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang mthu yis ni// de 'dra'i sdig mang gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad so sor bshags// bdag gis/
42b1(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams// sangs rgyas grangs med gang dag mchod// sems can rnams ni rabs drangs nas// sdug bsngal bgegs rnams bral bgyid shog/ sangs can dag ni rbatra/
42b2(rgyud): cad kun// sa bcu la ni gnas gyur te// bsod nams ye shes longs rdzogs nas// sngon sangs skye dgu 'dren par shog/ bdag gis sems can kun gyi slad// bskal pa brgya stong dka'
42b3(rgyud): spyad nas// shes rab chen po'i stobs kyis ni// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mthar bgyid shog/ bdag gis srog chags kun gyi slad// gser 'od mchog tu rnam par rgyal// zab mo'i mdo sde bshad
42b4(rgyud): nas ni// las ngan rnams ni bsal bar shog/ gang zhig bskal pa brgya stong du// sdig lci dag ni bdage bgyis pa rnams// skad cig gcig tsam mthol bshags na// sdig pa mang po ma
42b5(rgyud): lus 'byung // gser 'od dam pa 'di bzhin du// de ltar bshags pa bgyis gyur na// sdug bsngal las mang thams cad kun// 'dri yi dbang gis myur du 'byang // ting 'dzin mchog ni brgya
42b6(rgyud): stong dang // bsam gyi mi khyab gzungs rnams dang // dbang mchog byang chub la ma yan lag/ rtag tu skom yang skyo mi 'gyur// bdag gis rin chen phun tshogs gnas// sa bcu la ni phyin gyur
42b7(rgyud): nas sangs rgyas yon tan yongs rdzogs te// 'khor bar 'bab pa sgrol bar shog/ bdag gis sangs rgyas mtsho las ni// shin tu zab mo yon tan brjod// gya nom ye shes bsam
43a1(rgyud): dka' ba// phun sum tshogs pa thob par shog/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kun// bdag la so sor gzigs dgongs nas// thugs rje chen po'i thugs kyis ni/
43a2(rgyud): bdag gi bshags pa bzhes su gsol// bdag gis bskal pa mang por ni// las ngan mang po bgyis pas na// de yi dbang gis sdug bsngal myong // thugs rjes byang bar mdzad par smon// bdag
43a3(rgyud): gis las ngan mang bgyis pas// rtag tu mya ngan 'jigs sems skyes// spyod lam bzhi po kun tu yang // dga' ba'i 'du shes yod ma mchis// sangs rgyas thugs rje chen po ldan// sems
43a4(rgyud): can 'jigs pa sel mdzad na// bdag gi bshags pa bzhes nas ni// mya ngan sdug bsngal 'bral bar smon// bdag la nyon mongs sgrib pa dang // rnam smin las ni ci mchis pa// thugs rje chen
43a5(rgyud): bo'i chab kyis ni// rab bkrus byang bar mdzad par smon// bdag gis sngon chad sdig pa dang // da ltar las ngan bgyis pa rnams// rtse gcig sems kyis mthol bshags na// thams cad rab tu
43a6(rgyud): byang bar shog/ ma 'ongs pa yi las ngan rnams// bsdams te slong bar yong mi bgyid// gal te 'gal ba mchis na yang // nams kyang 'chab par yongs mi bgyid// lus gsum ngag gi
43a7(rgyud): rnam pa bzhi// yid kyi las ni rnam pa gsum// sems can rnams ni 'ching bgyid pas// thog ma med nas rgyun mi 'chad// spyod pa 'di gsum dbang gis na// mi dge las bcu bgyid gyur
43b1(rgyud): bas 'de 'dra'i nongs pa mang po rnams// de dag thams cad so sor bshags// bdag gis las ngan mang bgyis pas// sdug bsngal rnam smin rang nyid myong // sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan/
43b2(rgyud): sngar ni// bsam pa thag pas so sor bshags// 'dzam bu gling ni 'di dag dang // 'jig rten khams ni gzhan dag tu// dge ba'i las mang ci bgyid pa// deng bdag thams cad yi rang
43b3(rgyud): ngo mi dge las bcu rab spangs nas// dge bcu lam ni sngon bsgrubs te// sa bcu dag la rab tu gnas// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rtag mthong smon// bdag gi lus dang ngag yid kyis//
43b4(rgyud): bsod nams ye shes las bsgrubs pa'i// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yi mthus// bla med ye shes myur grub shog/ deng bdag stobs bcu'i spyan sngar mngon sum du// sdug bsngal bgegs mang sna
43b5(rgyud): tshogs mthol zhing bshags// byis pa srid gsum rmongs pa'i bgrogs dag dang // rtag par las dran lci ba bgyis pa'i bgegaso// bdag gis log pa'i 'dod pa bsags pa
43b6(rgyud): bgegs// rtag tu sred skyed 'khor bar 'gyur ba'i bgegs// 'jig rten 'di la mngon zhen chags pa'i bgegs// byis pa thams cad kun gyi nyon mongs bgegs// sems myos rnam
43b7(rgyud): g.yeng phyin ci log pa'i bgegs// mi dge grogs po dag la rten pa'i bgegs// 'khor ba dag la 'dod chags zhen pa'i bgegs// zhe sdang gti mug glen pas sdig bgyis bgegs//
44a1(rgyud): mi khom brgyad skye mi dge'i grogs po'i bgegs// bsod nams yon tan ma bsags pa yi bgegs/ deng bdag rgyal ba kun gyi spyan sngar ni// sdig pa'i las ni/
44a2(rgyud): mtha' yas bgyis pa bshags// dang bdag bder gshegs kun la skyabs su mchi// bla med yon tan mtsho la bdag phyag 'tshal// gser gyi ri ltar phyogs bcur gsal mdzad pa// byam
44a3(rgyud): dang thugs rjes bdag ni gzung du gsol// sku ni gser mdog rnam dag dri mi mnga'// spyan ni rnam dag bai DUR+Ya dang 'dra// dpal dang gzi brjid grags dang ldan pa'i gtso// thugs rje shes rab/
44a4(rgyud): nyi mas mun sel ba// sangs rgyas nyi mas 'od kyis kun gsal mdzad// shin tu rnam dag dri med rdul dang bral// thub pa'i zla bas gsal mdzad rab bsil ba// sems can nyon mongs gdung /
44a5(rgyud): pa sel bar mdzad// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis rab brgyan cing // dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs// yon tan bsam dka' mtshungs pa ma mchis pas// nyi 'od lta bur 'jig
44a6(rgyud): rten gsal bar mdzad// kha dog bai DUR+Ya 'dra dri mi mnga'// zla ba nya ltar nam mkha' dag la bzhugs// shel mchog dam pa'i dra bas gser sku bsgribs// 'od zer sna tshogs dag gis rab tu/
44a7(rgyud): brgyan// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chu bo'i nang dag tu// rga nang mya ngan chu yis ded pas na// de 'dra'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho bzod dka' ba// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i 'od kyis gtan du bsdams//
44b1(rgyud): deng bdag stong gsum 'jig rten rmad byung gtso// thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyi btud phyag 'tshal lo// 'od zer rab gsal gser mdog 'dra ba'i sku// dpe byad dam pa sna tshogs dag gis brgyan//
44b2(rgyud): ji ltar rgya mtsho chu tshad shes dka' zhing // sa chen rdul ni bgrang du ma mchis dang // ji ltar ri rab srang grangs gzhal dka' zhing // nam mkha' dag la mu mtha' ma mchis ltar// sangs rgyas/
44b3(rgyud): rnams kyi yon tan de bzhin te// sems can thams cad kun gyis rig mi 'gyur// bskal pa tshad med snyed du rab bsams kyang // yon tan rgya mtsho pha mtha' rtogs mi 'gyur/ sa chen 'di
44b4(rgyud): 'dra'i ri brag ji snyed pa// rdul phran bzhin du gsos kyang brtsir rung gi/ rgya mtsho'i chab ni spu rtses gzhal rung yang // sangs rgyas yon tan bgrang bar rngo mi thogs// sems can thams cad ldan
44b5(rgyud): cig 'dus nas ni// bcom ldan grags pa'i yon tan thams cad dang // mtshan bzang rnam dag dkon mchog bsngags brjod kyang // de yi pha mtha' dpag par yong mi 'gyur// bdag gis dge
44b6(rgyud): ba'i las mang ci mchis pas// myur du bla na ma mchis gtso grub nas// yang dag chos bshad skye dgu phan btags te// thams cad sdug bsngal mang las thar bgyid shog/ bdud kyi dpag
44b7(rgyud): tshogs stobs ten rab btul nas// bla med dam chos 'khor lo skor bar shog/ bskal pa grangs med bsam mi khyab gnas nas// bdud rtsi'i ro yis sems can tshim bgyid shog/ 'das
45a1(rgyud): ba'i rgyal ba rnams ni ji lta bzhin// pha rol phyin drug yongs su rdzogs bgyid shog/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi gyur nas// nyon mongs btul te sdug bsngal bas la/
45a2(rgyud): bar shog/ bdag gis rtag tu tshe rabs dran gyur nas// 'das pa'i skye ba brgya stong dran pa dang // rtag par thub pa'i gtso ni dran gyur te// sangs rgyas zab mo'i chos ni thos par shog/ bdag
45a3(rgyud): gi dge ba'i las ni 'di rnams kyis// rgyal ba tshad med dag la bsnyen bkur nas// mi dge ba yi rgyu kun yongs spangs te// yang dag dam chos rtag tu sgrub par shog/ 'jig rten thams cad/
45a4(rgyud): sems can ji snyed pa// sdug bsngal spangs nas bde ba thob par shog/ dbang po ma tshang ji snyed mchis pa dag/ de dag lus kyi mtshan rnams yongs rdzogs shog/ sems can gang zhig nad
45a5(rgyud): kyi sdug bsngal gyis// lus ni nyam chung skyabs bgyid ma mchis pa// thams cad nad kyi sdug bsngal rab zhi nas// dbang po kha dog mthu ni rgyas par shog/ gang gis rgyal chos 'gal gyis/
45a6(rgyud): bsad la thug/ sdug bsngal mang gtses mya ngan rab skyes nas// de yis sdug bsngal mi bzad myong ba'i tshe// mgon skyabs dag ni bgyid pa ma mchis dang // gang dag gzhu rdeg mtshon
45a7(rgyud): chas bcings pa dang // gnod byed yo byad sna tshogs lus nyon mongs// mya ngan brgya stong tshad med myong ba na// lus sems rab gzer bde ba cung zad med// de dag thams cad bcings
45b1(rgyud): gang brdegs pa dang // sdug bsngal nyon mongs dag las thar bar shog/ bsad la thug pa dag ni srog thob nas// sdug bsngal mang po thams cad gtan zang shog/ sems can gang
45b2(rgyud): gis bkres skom gdungs gyur pa// ro mchog dam pa sna tshogs thob par shog/ long bas gzugs mthong 'on pas thos pa dang // 'theng pos 'gro nus lkugs pas sgra nus shog/ dbu
45b3(rgyud): 'phongs sems can rin chen gter thob nas// khang mdzod rab rgyas rgud pa ma mchis te// thams cad bde mchog dam pa rab rnyed nas// sems can sdug bsngal myong ba ma mchis shog/ lha
45b4(rgyud): thams cad mthong bar mos pa yi// byad bzhin dam pa rab mdzes thob gyur nas// bde ba tshad med mngon sum myong gyur te// longs spyod 'byor rgyas bsod nams ldan par shog/ sems can
45b5(rgyud): de dag rol mo bsam pa bzhin// sgra mchog mang ba mngon du 'byung bar shog/ chu 'dod gser gyi me tog steng 'phyo ba// rab bsil rdzing bu mngon du snang bar shog/ sems can de dag ji ltar/
45b6(rgyud): bsams pa bzhin// bza' btung gos dang khri dang stan rnams dang // gser dngul dang ni rin chen bai DUR+Ya// rgyan 'phreng thams cad phun sum tshogs par shog/ sems can mi snyan thos par ma
45b7(rgyud): 'gyur zhing // mi sdug phan tshun mthong bar ma gyur cig/ lus kyi byang bzhin thams cad rab mdzes shing // so sor byams pa'i yid kyis brtse bgyid shog/ 'jig rten bde ba'i yo byad longs
46a1(rgyud): spyod rnams// yid la bsams te thams cad 'byor par shog/ nor rnams rnyed pa 'phongs pa ma mchis pa// bgo bshar bgyis te sems can gtong bar shog/ bdun
46a2(rgyud): spos phye ma dang ni byug spos dang // me tog sna tshogs kha dog gcig min la// nyin re dus gsum shing las lhung gyur nas// yid bzhin longs spyod dga' ba skye bar shog/ sems can thams
46a3(rgyud): cad phyogs bcu'i rgyal gtso dang // theg gsum rnam dag gya nom chos kyi sgo// byang chub sems dpa' dang ni rang rgyal dang // nyan thos dge 'dun mchod pa bgyid par shog/ rtag tu ma rabs dag/
46a4(rgyud): tutu mi skye zhing // mi khom brgyad po dag tu mi ltung dang // dal 'byor mi yi gtso bor skyes gyur te// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rim gro bgyid par shog/ rtag par phyug po dag gi khyim skyes te/
46a5(rgyud): nor dang rin chen bang mdzod rgyas pa dang // byang bzhin grags pa dpe zla ma mchis te// tshe ring bskal pa grangs med gnas par shog/ bud med thams cad kun ni phor gyur nas// dpa' zhing
46a6(rgyud): sems rno blo gros shin tu che// thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i lam spyad nas// pha rol phyin drug sgrub la brtson par shog/ rtag par phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas tshad med snyed// rin chen shing rgyal
46a7(rgyud): drung du gshegs nas ni// bai DUR+Ya yi gdan la rab bzhugs te// chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba mthong bar shog/ gal te 'das pa dang ni da ltar tshe// srid gsum 'khor nas las rnams bgyis pas na/
46b1(rgyud): yid du mi mchi ngan 'gro thob gyur pa// thams cad ma lus gtan du byang bar shog/ sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtshor ni// 'khor ba'i zhags pas dam du bcings pas na// shes rab ral
46b2(rgyud): gri dag gis bcad stsal to// sdug bsngal spangs nas byang chub myur thob shog/ sems can gang gis 'dzam gling 'di dag dang // yang na 'jig rten gzhan dag tu yang rung // bsod nams rgyun
46b3(rgyud): mchog sna tshogs ci bsgrubs pa// de dag thams cad kun la yi rang ngo // bsod nams dngos po dag la yi rang nas// lus dang ngag yid dge ba mang bgyid des// las mchog dam pa 'di dag rtag
46b4(rgyud): 'phel nas// bla med byang chub chen po myur thob smon// phyag bgyis sangs rgyas yon tan bsngags pa dang // bsam pa dang zhing rnyog pa ma mchis pas// sngo zhing smon lam btab pa'i bsod nams
46b5(rgyud): des bskal pa drug cu'i ngan 'gro 'das par smon// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dang // bram ze la sogs rigs mchog dam pa rnams// thal sbyar rtse gcig sangs rgyas bsngags brjod
46b6(rgyud): dang skye ba rtag par kun tu tshe rabs dran// dbang po tshang zhing lus ni yongs rdzogs te// yon tan dam pa thams cad phun tshogs gyur// ma 'ongs pa yi skye ba thams cad du// rtag par lha mi
46b7(rgyud): rnams kyis lta bar shog/ sangs rgyas gcig dang sangs rgyas bcu dag las// dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrubs nas thos pa rin// sangs rgyas brgya stong dge rtsa bskyed pas na// 'gyod tshangs chos 'di thos/
47a1(rgyud): par gyur pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsol pa gsan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la legs so legs so zhes bsngags
47a2(rgyud): pa brjod nas/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ji ltar rmi lam du gser gyi rnga bo che las byung ba'i sgras/ de bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa dang / 'gyod tshangs bya ba'i chos
47a3(rgyud): bstan pa gang la la zhig gis thos par gyur na/ bsod nams shin tu mang po thob par 'gyur zhing / sems can la rgya cher phan 'dogs pa dang / kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur
47a4(rgyud): rokhyod kyi las mchog 'di dag thams cad ni 'das pa'i dus su bsngags pa rjod cing / smon lam btab pa'i sngon gyi bag chags kyi rgyu rkyen dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyis
47a5(rgyud): brlabs pa'i mthus/ rgyu rkyen 'di dag khyod la bstan pa yin par rig par bya'o// de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams de skad ces bka' stsal ba thos nas/ thams cad rab tu dga' zhing mngon par
47a6(rgyud): yid ches nas dga' bzhin du spyod par gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mchog gi rgyal po las/ rmi lam na 'gyod tshangs byed pa mthong ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// /
47a7(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po'i mdo bam po gsum pa// / de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i rnam par rtog pa la
47b1(rgyud): bzhugs te/ shin tu zab cing gya nom pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / sku'i spu'i bu ga nas kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong tshad med pa snyed dang ldan pa'i 'od zer phyogs
47b2(rgyud): bcur bkye bas/ phyogs bcu'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi tshad dang dpe byar med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'od zer gyi nang du snang bar gyur to// snyigs ma lnga'i 'jig rter dag tu 'ong
47b3(rgyud): zer gyis snang bar byas pas/ sems can gang dag mi dge ba bcu'i las dang / mtshams med pa lnga'i kha na ma tho ba dang / dkon mchog gsum la skur pa btab pa dang / bla ma dang nye ba dag
47b4(rgyud): la sri zhu ma byas pa dang / mkhan po dang bram ze dag la brnyas shing nga rgyal byas pas/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su ltung bar 'gyur ba de dag so so nas/ 'od zer gyi
47b5(rgyud): snang ba de dag gi gnas su phyin par gyur pas/ sems can de dag 'od zer de mthong ba dang / 'od zer gyi mthus thams cad kyis bde ba dang / shin tu sdug cing mdzes pa'i mtshan phun sum
47b6(rgyud): tshogs pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyis brgyan nas sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar gyur to// de'i tshe brgya byin dang / lha'i 'khor thams cad dang / gang+gA'i lha mo dang / 'khor mang po
47b7(rgyud): rnams 'od zer rmad du byung ba mthong ba dang / thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te/ g.yas phyogs su lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas brgya
48a1(rgyud): byin lha'i dbang po bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom
48a2(rgyud): ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gri bla na med pa yang dag pa
48a3(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub gnyer zhing theg pa chen po mngon par sgrub pas/ ji ltar phyin ci log tu sems can thams cad yongs su gzung bar bgyi ba lags/ mngon par 'dus bgyis pa'i las kyi sgrib
48a4(rgyud): ba'i kha na ma tho ba ji ltar bshags na yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu deng khyod kyis tshad dpag tu med pa'i
48a5(rgyud): sems can rnams rnal 'byor bsgoms nas/ rnam par dag pa'i rnam par grol ba'i bde ba thob par bya ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad la snying brtse zhing phan par 'dod pa legs so// sems can
48a6(rgyud): gang la la zhig las kyi sgrib pa'i dbang gis sdig pa rnams mngon par 'dus byas pa gang yin pa des nan tan brtson 'grus bskyed de/ nyin mtshan dus drug tu bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/
48a7(rgyud): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas gus pas thal mo sbyar te/ sems rtse gcig tu dran pa nye bar bsdus nas/ ngag gi sgo nas bdag nyid kyis 'di skad du/ phyogs bcu na da ltar bzhus/
48b1(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes nas/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor ba/ chos kyi 'khor lo 'dzin cing gsal bar mdzad pa/
48b2(rgyud): chos kyi char chen po phab pa/ chos kyi rnga chen po brdungs pa/ chos kyi dung chen po bus pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po btsugs pa/ chos kyi sgron ma chen po 'dzin pa/ thams cad sems can rnams la
48b3(rgyud): sman cing bde bar mdzes pa'i slad du/ rtag par chos kyi sbyin pa gtong ba/ skye dgu rnams drangs nas 'bras bu chen po thob pa la bkod de/ rtag tu bde ba mngon sum du mdzad par bzhed pa/ de lta
48b4(rgyud): bu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la skyabs su mchis te mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag yang dag pa'i shes rab dang / yang dag pa'i spyan dang / yang /
48b5(rgyud): dag pa'i mkhyen pa dang / yang dag pa'i mnyam pas sems can gyi dge sdig gi las mkhyen cing gzigs pa thams cad la lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis sems rtse gcig tu spyi bos btud de/
48b6(rgyud): gus par phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus na sdig pa'i rjes su 'brangs te/ sems can rnams dang lhan cig tu las kyi sgrib pa'i kha na ma tho ba bgyis pa dang / 'dod chags
48b7(rgyud): dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis kun tu dkris shing bcings pas/ sangs rgyas ma 'tshal ba'i dus dang / chos ma 'tshal ba'i dus dang / dge 'dun ma 'tshal ba'i dus dang // dge sdig ma/
49a1(rgyud): 'tshal ba'i dbang gis lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi sgo nas mtshams ma mchis pa ngan sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'tshal phyung ba dang / yang dag pa'i
49a2(rgyud): chos la skur pa btab pa dang / dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen bgyis pa dang / dgra bcom pa bkum pa dang / pha ma bkum pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa gsum dang / ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dang / yid
49a3(rgyud): kyi spyod pa rnam pa gsum gyi dbang gis/ mi dge ba bcu'i las bdag nyid kyis bgyis pa dang / gzhan bgyid du stsal ba dang / gzhan bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba dang / dge ba'i gang
49a4(rgyud): zag rnams la nan gyis skur pa btab pa dang / bre srang gis bslus pa dang / yang dag pa ma lags pa la yang dag par bzung ba dang / mi gtsang ba'i bza' ba dang btung ba gzhan dag la/
49a5(rgyud): stsal ba dang 'gro ba drug po de dag tu mchis pa'i pha ma ji snyed pa dag la phan tshun gnod pa bgyis pa dang / mchod rten gyi dkor brkus pa dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor dang
49a6(rgyud): mngon sum gyi dge 'dun gyi dkor rang dbang bgyis te yongs su spyad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos dang 'dul ba la bslab par ma mos pa dang / mkhan po dang bla ma'i
49a7(rgyud): gangam ngag gi rjes su mi 'brang ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / theg pa chen po'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrubs pa dag la smad par dga' bas/ rnal 'byor sgom pa'i gang zag/
49b1(rgyud): rnams 'gyod pa bskyod pa dang / bdag pas khyad par 'phags pa zhig mthong na phrag dog bskyed pa dang chos kyi sbyin pa dang / zang zing gi sbyin pa dag la rtag par ser sna dang 'phangs
49b2(rgyud): pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / ma rig pas bsgrubs shing log par lta bas sems rmongs par gyur pa dang / dge ba'i rgyu ma bskyed pas sdig pas sdig pa 'phel bar gyur pa dang / de bzhin
49b3(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams la spong ba'i bsam pa bskyed pa dang / chos la chos ma lags par bshad pa dang / chos ma lags pa la chos su bshad pa la sogs pa 'di lta bu'i sdig pa mang po
49b4(rgyud): rnams/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i shes rab dang / yang dag pa'i spyan dang / yang dag pa'i mkhyen pa dang / yang dag pa'i mnyam pa'i mnyam pas thams cad mkhyen cing / thams
49b5(rgyud): cad gzigs pa dag la deng bdag srog phyogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar mthol zhing bshags so// thams cad mngon du phyung nas 'chab cing sbed par mi bgyid
49b6(rgyud): sngar ma bgyis pa'i kha na ma tho ba rnams slan chad mi bgyid do// sngar bgyis pa'i kha na ma tho ba rnams deng thams cad mthol zhing bshags so// ngan 'gro'i sems can dmyal ba dang / dud
49b7(rgyud): 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas kyi 'gro ba dang / lha ma yin gyi 'khor dang / mi khom pa brgyad po dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa dang / bdag gis tshe 'di la
50a1(rgyud): bgyis pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zhu byung nas / sdig pa'i rnam par smin pa ci mchis pa ma 'ongs pa na mi myong bar smon to// de ltar 'das pa'i byang chub sems/
50a2(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis spyod pa spyad pa na las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa thams cad mthol zhing bshags pa de bzhin du/ bdag gi las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa'ang mthol
50a3(rgyud): zhing bshags so// thams cad mngon du phyung ste 'chab cing sbed par mi bgyid do// sngar bgyis pa'i sdig pa rnams zhu byang bar smon to// ma 'ongs pa'i sdig pa rnams kyang bgyid pa'i
50a4(rgyud): thugs mi thub bo// ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa ma lus par mthol zhing bshags pa de
50a5(rgyud): bzhin du/ ngag gi las kyi sgrib pa'ang dang mthong zhing bshags so// thams cad mngon du phyung nas 'chab cing sred par mi bgyid do// sngar bgyis pa'i sdig pa rnams zhu byang bar smod na/
50a6(rgyud): ma 'ongs pa'i sdig pa rnams kyang bgyi ba'i thugs mi thub bo// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad pa
50a7(rgyud): na'ang de dag las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa mthol zhing bshags pa de bzhin du/ bdag gi las kyi sgrib pa'ang mthol zhing bshags so// thams cad mngon du phyung nas 'chab cing spang bar/
50b1(rgyud): mi bgyid do// sngar bgyis pa'i sdig pa rnams zhu byang bar smon to// ma 'ongs pa'i sdig pa rnams kyang bgyid pa'i thugs mi thub bo zhes brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu rgyu dang rkyen de/
50b2(rgyud): phyir gang gis sdig pa byas pa zhig yod na/ skad cig tsam du'ang 'chab cing sbar mi rung na/ nyin gcig gam/ mtshan gcig nas/ dus ring po'i bar lta smos kyang ci dgos/ gang
50b3(rgyud): la la zhig gis sdig pa byas nas rnam par dag pa yongs su tshogs par 'dod cing sems la ngo tsha dang bcas pas/ ma 'ongs pa na gdon mi za bar sdig pa'i rnam par smin pa yod
50b4(rgyud): do zhes mngon par yid ches nas/ 'jigs shing skrag pa chen po skyes pa des 'di ltar bshags par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na mi la la zhig mes mgo thod bsregs sam/ gos
50b5(rgyud): bsregs par gyur na/ myur ba kho nar me gsod par byed do// gal te zhi bar ma gyur na sems kyis bde ba thob par mi 'gyur ro// gang gis sdig pa byas na'ang de bzhin du mthol zhing /
50b6(rgyud): bshags nas myur ba kho nar yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// gang la la zhig phyug po'i khyim du skyes nas nor dang rin po che mang po dang ldan par 'dod pa dang / gzhan yang sems bskyed
50b7(rgyud): nas theg pa chen po sgom par 'dod na'ang 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// cho rigs btsun pa'i bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / 'khor los sgyur/
51a1(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po rin po che bdun dang ldan pa'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'dod na'ang 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu gal te/
51a2(rgyud): rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang / 'thab bral gyi lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye
51a3(rgyud): bar 'dod na'ang 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// gal te tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa mdun na 'don dang / tshangs chen gyi lha dang / 'od chung dang gatshad
51a4(rgyud): med 'od dang / 'od gsal gyi lha dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dag dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi
51a5(rgyud): gdung ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / shin tu mthong dang / 'og min gyi lhar skye bar 'dod na'ang 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi slob pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// gal te rgyun du
51a6(rgyud): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / byer mo 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu 'ongs su gnyer bar 'dod na'ang 'gyod tshangs
51a7(rgyud): byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// gal te rig pa gsum dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rang dbang thob pa'i byang chub
51b1(rgyud): yongs su gnyer ba dang / mthar thug pa'i sar phyin nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / yongs su dag pa'i ye shes dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes dpag mi gtso/
51b2(rgyud): ba'i ye shes dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thams cad mkhyen pa yongs su gnyer bar 'dod na'ang 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// de ci'i
51b3(rgyud): phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni rgyu dang rkyen las skye ba de bzhin gshegs pas kyang tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te/ rgyu dang rkyen tha dad pa'i phyir/
51b4(rgyud): ji ltar 'das pa'i chos rnams 'gag cing zad par 'gyur bas/ las kyi sgrib pa ji snyed pa ma lus par 'gyur ba'ang 'du byed kyi chos rnams mngon du ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dag dang /
51b5(rgyud): gdod skye bar 'gyur bas/ ma 'ongs pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'ang ldang bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad stong zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang bdag dang /
51b6(rgyud): gang zag dang / sems can dang / srog med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'du byed kyi chos kyang med do zhes gsungs pas so// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad dza
51b7(rgyud): nyid kyi gzhi la brten pas brjod du'ang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtshan ma thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig/
52a1(rgyud): 'di ltar yang dag pa'i don shin tu gya nom pa la zhugs nas/ mngon par yid ches pas gus pa'i sems skyes par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sems can med cing ngon/
52a2(rgyud): nyid kyi gzhi yod pa zhes bya ste/ don de'i phyir 'gyod tshangs kyis las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gang gis chos rnam pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur na
52a3(rgyud): las kyi sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas gtan du yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ log pa'i bsam pa mi skye zhing yang dag pa'i dran pa phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang / shin
52a4(rgyud): tu zab pa'i don dag la skur pa mi 'debs pa dang / spyod pa dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag thams cad mkhyen pa yin no snyam pa'i bsam pa bskyed pa dang / sems can rnams la
52a5(rgyud): byams pa tshad med pa bskyed pa ste/ 'di dag ni rnam pa bzhi zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ rtse gcig sems kyis theg gsum srung // zang/
52a6(rgyud): mo'i chos la skur mi 'debs// thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'du shes bskyed// byams sems las kyi sgrib pa sbyong // rigs kyi bu shin tu bsal bar dka' ba'i las kyi sgrib pa ni rnam pa bzhi
52a7(rgyud): yod de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa las shin tu lci ba'i kha na ma tho ba byas pa dang / theg pa chen po'i mdo sde la sems kyis skur pa btab pa dang / rang gi dge ba'i
52b1(rgyud): rtsa ba 'phel bar mi byed pa dang / sred pa gsum la mngon par zhen nas nges par 'byung ba'i sems med pa gang yin pa'o// gzhan yang las kyi sgrib pa'i gnyen por 'gyur ba rnam pa bzhi
52b2(rgyud): yod de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsam pa thag pa nas nye bar bsnyen nas kha na ma tho ba thams cad bshags par byed/
52b3(rgyud): ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi ched du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dam pa'i chos zab mo bshad par gsol ba 'debs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams ji snyed pa
52b4(rgyud): dag la rjes su yi rang ba dang / bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba gang yin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das/
52b5(rgyud): la bad+ma byin lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten na skyes pa dang bud med ji snyed mchis pa dag las theg pa chen po spyod pa spyod rngo thogs pa'ang mchis
52b6(rgyud): spyod rngo mo thogs pa'ang mchis na/ ji ltar sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
52b7(rgyud): rigs kyi bu sems can gang la la zhig theg pa chen po sgom par mi nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang nyin mtshan dus drug bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsung
53a1(rgyud): nas gus pas thal mo sbyar te/ sems rtse gcig tu dran pa nye bar gzhag nas rjes su yi rang bar byed na/ bsod nams tshad med pa snyed 'thob par 'gyur bas/ 'di/
53a2(rgyud): skad du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag da ltar sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sems kyi shes rab mngon par sgrub pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la deng bdag
53a3(rgyud): shin tu dang bas rjes su yi rang ngo zhes brjod par gyur na/ de ltar rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams kyi dbang gis gdon mi za bar shin tu btsun zhing khyad par du 'phags pa/ bla na med pa
53a4(rgyud): mtshungs pa med pa/ mchog tu gya nom pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa thams cad la'ang rjes su
53a5(rgyud): yi rang bar bya'o// gzhan yang da ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang po bas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las byung ba'i bsod nams ji snyed pa dag dang / bskal ba chen po brgya 'das nas
53a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams chen po gang yin pa dang / mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob pa nas phyir mi ldog pa dang / tshe gcig gis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ba'i
53a7(rgyud): bar dag las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa de dag thams cad la'ang / 'di ltar bsam pa thag pa nas rjes su yi rang zhing bsngags pa brjod par bya'o// de bzhin du 'das
53b1(rgyud): pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams ji snyed pa dag la'ang rjes su yi rang zhing bsngags pa brjod par bya'o// gzhan yang da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/
53b2(rgyud): yang dag pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa byang chub gya nom pa brnyes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad sems can mtha' yas pa rnams yongs su bzla ba'i phyir/ bla na med ba'i chos kyi/
53b3(rgyud): 'khor lo bskor ba/ thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa btang ba/ chos kyi rnga brdungs pa/ chos kyi dung bus pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan btsugs pa/ chos kyi char phab pa dag gis thugs
53b4(rgyud): brtse bas sems can thams cad bskul zhing yongs su btul bas/ thams cad mngon par yid ches par gyur nas/ chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par mdzad pa'i dbang gis zad mi shes pa'i bde/
53b5(rgyud): ba 'thob pa la bkod pa gang yin pa dang / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis bsod nams bsags pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa dang /
53b6(rgyud): sems can gang gis de 'dra ba'i bsod nams da dung phun sum tshogs par ma gyur pa dag thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag la bdag rjes su yi rang ngo // de bzhin
53b7(rgyud): du 'das pa dang ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsod nams ji snyed pa thams cad la'ang bsam pa thag pa nas rjes su
54a1(rgyud): yi rang ngo zhes brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na rjes su yi rang ba gang yin pa des bsod nams kyi phung po tshang mang ba snyed 'thob par 'gyur ro// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
54a2(rgyud): dang mnyam pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nyon mongs pa spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon par grub par gyur la/ rigs
54a3(rgyud): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig nam 'tsho'i bar du rtag par gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / gsos sman mchog dam pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang
54a4(rgyud): rim gro byas pas 'thob pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa des/ ji ltar snga ma lta bur rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams de dang sbran na/ stong gi cha gcig tsam du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de ci'i
54a5(rgyud): phyir zhe na/ mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de ni grangs dang bcas shing tshad dang bcas pas bsod nams thams cad yongs su sdud par mi 'gyur la/ rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod
54a6(rgyud): nams gang yin pa de la ni tshad med cing grangs med pas dus gsum gyi bsod nams thams cad yongs su sdud par byed pas/ de'i phyir gang la la zhig dge ba'i rtsa ba khyad par can 'phel
54a7(rgyud): bar 'dod pas 'di ltar rjes su yi rang bsod nams mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// bud med gang la la zhig bud med kyi lus yongs su bsgyur nasaskyes pa'i lus yongs su 'grub par
54b1(rgyud): 'dod na'ang rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams mngon par sgrub par byed na/ gdon mi za bar yid la bsams pa bzhin du tshe 'di nyid la skyes pa'i lus mngon par 'grub bar 'gyur ro// nga/
54b2(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das la/ brgya byid lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams gang lags pa ni 'chal bar gyur na/ spang ma'i byang chub
54b3(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur ba dang / da ltar gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par rnal 'byor sgom par 'gyur bar bgyid pa'i slad du bskul ba dang
54b4(rgyud): gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang lags pa bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa
54b5(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer ba gang yin pa des/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / thag pa chen po'i lam sgom par 'dod na/ gang zag des nyin mtshan dus drug
54b6(rgyud): tu snga ma lta bu'i spyod lam gyis sems rtse gcig tu dran pa nye bar gzhag nas/ 'di skad du deng bdag phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
54b7(rgyud): banges par gyur kyang / bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo da dung ma skor ba dang / rnam par smin pa'i sku spangs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par bzhed pa gang lags pa de dag thabs
55a1(rgyud): cad la/ bdag bsam pa thag pa nas spyi bos btud de phyag bgyis nas/ sems can thams cad yongs su bsgral zhing bde bar bgyi ba dang / sngar gong du bstan pa
55a2(rgyud): ltar bas pa ma mchis pa'i bde ba thob par bgyi ba'i slad du/ chos kyi 'khor lo chen po yongs su bskor ba dang / chos kyi char blo dbab pa dang / chos kyi sgron ma chen po sbar ba dang / don gyi
55a3(rgyud): tshul gsal bar mdzad pa dang / thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa btang nas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing / 'jig rten na yun ring du bzhugs par skul zhing gsol ba 'tshal
55a4(rgyud): lo deng bdag gis bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang lags pa 'di dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// ji ltar
55a5(rgyud): 'das pa dang da ltar gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bskul ba dang / gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams de dag la byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du
55a6(rgyud): bdag gis kyang bskul ba dang / gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang lags pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o zhes brjod par bya'o//
55a7(rgyud): rigs kyi bu gal te gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas pa bas/ gang
55b1(rgyud): la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor bar gsol ba btab pas 'thob pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de snga ma bas ches khyad par du 'phags te/ de ci'i
55b2(rgyud): phyir zhe na/ de ni zang zing gi sbyin pa yin la/ 'di chos kyi sbyin pa yin pas so// rigs kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste sbyin pa
55b3(rgyud): btang ba lta re zhig zhog gi/ gal te gang la la zhig gis gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/ sangs
55b4(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la mchod pa byas pa bas/ bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de de bas kyang ches khyad par khyad par 'phags so// chos kyi sbyin
55b5(rgyud): pa ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i phan yon rnam pa lnga dang ldan te/ lnga gang zhe na/ dang po chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs par byed la/ zang zing gi sbyin pa ni de
55b6(rgyud): lha ma yin pas so// gnyis pa chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sems can khams gsum nas 'byin par byed pa yin la/ zang zing gi sbyin pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de ni 'dod pa'i
55b7(rgyud): khams las mi 'da' bas so// gsum po chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi sku yongs su dag par byed pa yin la/ zang zing gi sbyin pas ni gzugs 'ba' zhig 'phel bar byed
56a1(rgyud): pas so// bzhi pa chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni mthar thug pa med pa yin la/ zang zing gi sbyin pa ni zad par 'gyur bas so// lnga pa chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de/
56a2(rgyud): ma rig pa yongs su gcod par byed la/ zang zing gi sbyin pa de ni 'dod pa'i sred pa tsam thul bar 'gyur bas so// de lta bas na rigs kyi bu bskul ba dang gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams
56a3(rgyud): ni tshad med dpag tu med pas dpe byar sla ba ma yin no// nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo chen po yongs su bskor bar bskul
56a4(rgyud): bas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dbang gis de lta bas na deng brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i rgyal po la sogs pas pa la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btab pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi 'khor la
56a5(rgyud): yongs su bskor bar bskul ba ni sems can rnams yongs su sgrol zhing bde bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro// nga sngon byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten na yun
56a6(rgyud): ring du bzhugs shing / yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba btab pas na dge ba'i rtsa ba de la brten nas/ ngas stobs bcu dang / bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba bzhi dang / so so yang dag
56a7(rgyud): par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / thugs rje chen po dang / ma 'dres pa'i chos grangs med pa snyed brnyes par gyur pa yin te/ nga lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su
56b1(rgyud): mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur yang / nga'i yang dag pa'i chos 'jig rten na yun ring bar gnas par 'gyur ba yin no// nga'i chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni rnam par dag cing dpe zla med pas
56b2(rgyud): mtshan mchog dam pa sna tshogs dpa' mkhyen pa tshad med pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa tshad med pa dang ldan zhing sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs
56b3(rgyud): pabapar mdzad pas/ bskal pa bye ba brgya stong skad du brjod kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro// chos kyi skus ni chos thams cad yongs su sdud par mdzad la chos thams cad kyis ni chos kyi
56b4(rgyud): sku yongs su sdud par mi byed do// chos kyi sku rtag par gnas kyang rtag pa'i lta bar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// 'gag par 'gyur yang chad pa'i lta bar 'gyur ba ma yin pas/ sems can gyi
56b5(rgyud): tha dad pa'i lta ba rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par bshig nas sems can gyi yang dag pa'i lta ba rnam pa sna tshogs skyed par mdzad do// sems can thams cad 'ching ba grol bar mdzad kyang /
56b6(rgyud): dgrol bar bya ba ci'ang mi mnga' 'o// sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pas/ yongs su ma smin pa gang yin pa de ni yongs su smin par mdzad la/ yongs su smin pa
56b7(rgyud): gang yin pa de ni rnam par grol bar mdzad kyang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa'ang mi mnga'/ g.yo ba'ang ma mnga' bas/ 'du 'dzi las thag ring du gyur pas/ rab tu dben zhing mdzad
57a1(rgyud): pa mi mnga' bas/ rang dbang du gyur cing bde bar gyur la/ dus gsum las yang dag par 'das kyang dus gsum ston par mdzad pa/ nyan thos dang
57a2(rgyud): rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul las nges par byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang sku tha dad par
57a3(rgyud): gyur pa med pa yin te/ 'di dag thams cad kyang bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs kyis brnyes pa yin pa'i phyir 'di lta bu'i chos skungs de nga brnyes pa
57a4(rgyud): yin te/ de lta bas na gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar 'dod pas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshig gcig gam/ tshigs su
57a5(rgyud): bcad pa gcig tsam gzhan dag la ston par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de'ang tshad med par gyur pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo che
57a6(rgyud): po yongs su bskor bar bskul zhing 'jig rten na yun ring du bzhugs nas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba 'debs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas
57a7(rgyud): ldan 'das la brgya byin lha'i dbang pos yang 'di 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag/
57b1(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer zhing / theg pa gsum gyi lam sgom 'tshal bas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ci mchis pa ji ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su bsngo
57b2(rgyud): bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag byang chub yongs su gnyer zhing theg pa gsum skye
57b3(rgyud): lam sgom pas dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa yongs su bsngo bar 'dod pa des nyin mtshan dus drug tu gus pas sems rtse gcig tu 'di skad ces bdag gis thog ma med pa'i 'khor
57b4(rgyud): banas/ dkon mchog gsum po dag gi thad du rnal 'byor bsgoms nas yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi srog
57b5(rgyud): chags dag la kha zas chang gcig tsam byin pa dang / dge ba'i tshig gis rtsod pa dag gi bsdums byas pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song nas bslab pa'i gnas rnams
57b6(rgyud): yang dag par blangs pa dang / 'gyod tshangs byas pa dang / bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa de dag dang / bdag gis thams cad
57b7(rgyud): gcig tu bsdus te/ 'gyod cing 'phangs pa med par sems can thams cad la yongs su gtang ngo // rnam par grol ba'i phyogs kyis yongs su gzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin
58a1(rgyud): pa de dag kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen cing gzigs pa dpag tu med pa dang / thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par dag pas/ 'di ltar bsod nams
58a2(rgyud): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mtshan ma'i sems la mi gnas shing / mtshan ma'i sems kyang mi spyod par sems can thams cad la yongs su btang ba de bzhin du/ bdag
58a3(rgyud): gis bsod nams las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa de dag thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la yongs su gtong ste/ thams cad kyis yid bzhin gyi lag pa thob nas/ nam
58a4(rgyud): mkha' las rin po che byung ste/ sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su bskang bar gyur cig/ longs spyod zad mi shes pa dang / shes rab mthar thug pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi spobs/
58a5(rgyud): pa thogs pa med pa thob nas/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
58a6(rgyud): 'thob par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di'i rgyus dge ba'i chos tshad med pa bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// gzhan yang 'das pa'i/
58a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams spyad pa spyod pa na bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa dang / da ltar dang ma 'ongs
58b1(rgyud): pa dag gis ji ltar yongs su bsngo ba de bzhin du/ bdag gis bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag
58b2(rgyud): gi dbang gis sems can thams cad dang dus gcig tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sangs rgyas gzhan dag ji lta ba bzhin du/ byang chub kyi
58b3(rgyud): shing drung du byang chub kyi snying po la gnas te/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thog pa med pa'i rnam par dag pa dang / zad mi shes pa'i chos kyi gzungs dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
58b4(rgyud): gnas nas/ bdud sdig can gyi dmag tshogs tshad med pa dag pham par byas te/ mkhyen pa dang gzigs pa mngon par rtogs nas/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad skad cig ma gcig la gsal
58b5(rgyud): bar rtogs te/ nam gyi smad la bdud rtsi'i chos thob nas/ zil mngar gyi don mngon sum du gyur te/ bdag dang sems can thams cad sangs rgyas tshe dpag tu med pa dang / sangs rgyu/
58b6(rgyud): 'phags pa'i 'od dang / sangs rgyas dam pa'i 'od dang / sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa dang / sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa'i 'od dang / sangs rgyas seng ge'i 'od dang / sangs rgyas 'od brgya
58b7(rgyud): pa dang / sangs rgyas dran pa'i 'od dang / sangs rgyas rin chen mtshan dang / sangs rgyas rin chen 'bar dang / sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od dang / sangs rgyas rgyas par 'bar ba'i 'od dang
59a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas bkra shis bla ma'i rgyal po dang / sangs rgyas dam pa'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas bkod pa'i mchog dang / sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / sangs rgya
59a2(rgyud): bla ma 'phags pa'i sku dang / sangs rgyas mngon par dga' ba'i gzugs sku dang / sangs rgyas 'od zer kun tu snang mdzad dang / sangs rgyas tshangs pa rnam dag rgyal po dang / sangs rgyas tha/
59a3(rgyud): ma'i rang bzhin la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du gya nom par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par mkhyen pa de dag 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa
59a4(rgyud): dpa da ltar longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa'i sku bstan te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes nas/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor te/ sems can/
59a5(rgyud): yongs su bzlas pa bzhin du bdag kyang de bzhin du gyur cig ces rgya cher gong du bstan pa bzhin du brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu shin tu dang ba'i dad pa dang ldan pa'i skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang /
59a6(rgyud): la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyong ba'i le'u 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha don du 'don pa
59a7(rgyud): dang dran pas mi brjed par byas te/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston par byed na/ bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med dpag tu med pa snyed 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ dper na sgo
59b1(rgyud): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa thams cad dus gcig tu mi'i lus mngon par grub par gyur la/ mi'i lus thob nas kyang thams cad rang sangs rgyas kyi
59b2(rgyud): lam mngon par 'grub par gyur te/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang la la zhig nam 'tsho'i bar du bkur sti dang bla mar byas te/ yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs bzhi po dag gis mchod par byas te/ rang
59b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas re re la'ang so so nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang mnyam pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/ rang sangs rgyas de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu 'ang rin po/
59b4(rgyud): che las mchod rten brtsigs nas mchod pa byas te/ mchod rten de dag kyang dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam du mtho zhing me tog dang / spos dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang
59b5(rgyud): gdugs mang po dag gis rtag par mchod pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang zag de dag gis thob pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de ni ci mang ba yin snyam mam/ lha'i dbang
59b6(rgyud): pos gsol/ bcom ldan 'das shin tu 'ang mang lags so// rigs kyi bu gal te gang la la zhig gis gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ las kyi sgrib pa
59b7(rgyud): yongs su sbyong ba'i le'u 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang / dran pas mi brjed par byas/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par bstan pas 'thob pa'i bsod//
60a1(rgyud): nams gang yin pa de sngar bstan pa'i mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de dang spun na/ brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ brgya stong dang bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi
60a2(rgyud): 'gro ba nas/ tshad dang / dpe dang / rgyu'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag yang dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas nas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
60a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnams la bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor bar gsol ba 'debs par byed na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rab tu dgyes nas bsngags pa brjod par
60a4(rgyud): 'gyur bas so// rigs kyi bu ngas ji skad bstan pa bzhin du/ sbyin pa thams cad kyi nang na chos kyi sbyin pa ni mchog tu gyur pa yin pas/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa
60a5(rgyud): byas pas kyang dpe byar mi nus so// gsum la skyabs su 'gro zhing bslab pa thams cad srung ba bskul zhing nyams par ma byas pa dang / las gsum stong par ma gyur pas kyang dpe byar mi nus so//
60a6(rgyud): 'jig rten thams cad kyi mthu dang / nus pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum po dag tu byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bskul bas kyang dpe byar mi nus so// dus gsum gyi 'jig rten
60a7(rgyud): gyi khams thams cad na sems can ji snyed yod pa thams cad thogs pa med pa thob nas/ bsod nams tshad med par myur du yongs su rdzogs par gyur pas kyang dpe byar mi nus so// dus
60b1(rgyud): gsum gyi zhing dag na yod pa'i sems can thams cad thogs pa med par byang chub gsum po dag thob par byas pas kyang dpe byar mi nus so// dus gsum gyi zhing dag na yod pa'i sems can/
60b2(rgyud): thams cad myur du ngan 'gro bzhi po'i sdug bsngal las 'byung bar bskul bas kyang dpe byar mi nus so// dus gsum gyi zhing dag na yod pa'i sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrib
60b3(rgyud): pab shin tu lci ba dag yongs su sbyang bar bskul bas kyang dpe byar mi nus so// sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par bya bar bskul bas kyang dpe byar mi nus so// 'jigs shing skrag pa dang /
60b4(rgyud): sdug bsngal gyis gzir cing nyon mongs pa thams cad las grol bar byas pas kyang dpe byar mi nus so// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams
60b5(rgyud): ji snyed dag la rjes su yi rang bar bskul nas/ byang chub kyi smon lam btab pas kyang dpe byar mi nus so// sdig pa'i spyod pa dang gshe zhing spyo ba'i las yongs su bsal bar bskul ba dang /
60b6(rgyud): yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par smon pa dang / skye ba thams cad du dkon mchog gsum po thams cad la mchod pa dang / bla mar bya ba dang / bsngags pa brjod par bskul ba dang //
60b7(rgyud): sems can rnams bsod nams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa mngon par sgrub par bskul nas/ byang chub yongs su rdzogs par byas pas kyang dpe byar mi nus so// de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams
61a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi dkon mchog gsum la bskul zhing gsol ba btab dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya bar bskul pa dang / blan med
