61a2(rgyud): pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor bar bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa dang / bskal pa tshad med pa snyed du 'jig rten na bzhugs nas/ chos mchog dam pa zab mo bshad par bskul zhing
61a3(rgyud): gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de ni shin tu zab pas gang gis kyang dpe byur mi nus par rig par bya'o// de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang / gang+gA'i lha mo dang / tshangs pa'i
61a4(rgyud): rgyal po dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha tshad med pa rnams stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha bas la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas
61a5(rgyud): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di thos pas/
61a6(rgyud): thams cad yongs su bzung ste klog pa dang / g.yar ton du 'don pa dang / kun chub par bgyis te/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par bstan nas chos 'di la brten te rab tu gnas par bgyid
61a7(rgyud): do de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar 'tshal bas/ don 'di mtshan nyid khyad par du 'phags pa'i
61b1(rgyud): rjes su 'brangs nas chos bzhin du spyod pa'i slad du'o// de nas tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pas chos bshad pa'i gnas de nyid du/ me tog man nga ra ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan/
61b2(rgyud): 'das la mngon par gtor bas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa chen po thams cad rab tu g.yos par gyur to// lha'i rnga bo che dang rol mo thams cad kyang ma dkrol bar
61b3(rgyud): rang sgra byung ste/ gser gyi kha dog gi 'od zer bkye nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu khyab par bkang ste sgra dbyangs dam pa byung bar gyur pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ brgya byin lha'i/
61b4(rgyud): dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di dag thams cad ni gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu lags pas/ byams pa dang thugs rje rnam pa sna tshogs
61b5(rgyud): kyikyis yongs su skyob cing phan 'dogs pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel zhing las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongs su sbyong bar mdzad lags so// bcom
61b6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par dran te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i bskal/
61b7(rgyud): pa brgya stong tshad med pa snyed 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i rgyal po 'od chen snang mdzad ces bya ba 'jig
62a1(rgyud): rten du byung ste/ bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya brgyad cu'i bar du 'jig rten na bzhugs so// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rgyal po 'od cher snang mdzad kyis lnga
62a2(rgyud): dang mi dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sems can thams cad yongs su bzlas nas/ bde bar mdzad pa'i phyir 'jig rten du byung ba na/ 'dus pa/
62a3(rgyud): dang po la chos bstan pas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong snyed yongs su bzlas nas/ thams cad kyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob pas/ zag pa rnams zad/
62a4(rgyud): nas rig pa gsum dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / thogs ma med pa'i rang dbang dang ldan par gyur to// 'dus pa gnyis pa'i tshe'ang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag
62a5(rgyud): brgya stong dgu bcu yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ thams cad kyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob nas/ zag pa rnams zad nas rig pa gsum dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang /
62a6(rgyud): thogs pa med pa'i rang dbang dang ldan par gyur to// 'dus pa gsum pa'i tshe'ang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong dgu bcu yongs su bzlas nas/ thams cad kyis
62a7(rgyud): dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob pas zhes bya ba'ang rgyas par gong ma bzhin no// rigs kyi bu nga de'i tshe bud med kyi lus su gyur te/ ming ni bsod nams rin po che'i 'od ces bya'o//
62b1(rgyud): 'dus pa gsum pa'i tshe'ang bcom ldan 'das de la nye bar bsnyen nas/ gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di yongs su bzung ste bklags/ kha ton du bton nas gzhan la rgya cher yang
62b2(rgyud): dag par bstan te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das des pal bu mo bsod nams rin po che'i 'od 'di ma 'ongs pa'i
62b3(rgyud): dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa'i skyes bu kha lo
62b4(rgyud): sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan te/ bud med kyi lus spangs nas/ de tshun chad ngan 'gro bzhi las yang
62b5(rgyud): dag par 'das te/ lha dang mi'i nang du skyes nas bde ba mchog myong bar gyur to// tshe rabs stong phrag bzhi brgya brgyad cu'i bar du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po byas te/ deng yang dag par mngon
62b6(rgyud): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar du'ang grags pa 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu gang zhing rgyas par gyur pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa chen po thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs
62b7(rgyud): pa rin po che'i rgyal po 'od chen snang mdzad bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor nas/ chos mchog dam pa bshad pa mthong bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di/
63a1(rgyud): nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi brgya stong snyed 'das nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin/
63a2(rgyud): po che'i rgyal po 'od chen snang mdzad ces bya ba da ltar de na bzhugs te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas/ chos mchog dam pa bshad nas skye dgu rnams la phan 'dogs par mdzad pas/ khyod
63a3(rgyud): kyis mthong ba ni sangs rgyas de yin no// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rgyal po 'od chen snang mdzad de'i mtshan thos par gyur na/ byang chub
63a4(rgyud): semams dpa'i sa las ldog par mi 'gyur zhing / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro// bud med gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos par gyur na/ 'chi
63a5(rgyud): ka'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de'i thad du gshegs par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i dbang gis nams kyang bud med kyi lus len par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gser 'ong /
63a6(rgyud): dam pa shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde 'di ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyis phan 'dogs shing / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba dang las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongs su/
63a7(rgyud): sbyong bar byed do// rigs kyi bu dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gang na gnas pa'i gnas der/ gser 'od dam pa shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde
63b1(rgyud): 'di gzhan dag la yang dag par ston par byed na/ yul de ni bsod nams kyi phan yon rnam pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ yul de'i rgyal po nang med de bgegs rnams dang bral
63b2(rgyud): ba dang / tshe ring zhing thogs pa med par gyur pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra med cing dmag tshogs dpa' bar 'gyur ba dang / bde ba'i longs spyod rgyas shing yang dag pa'i chos 'phel bar 'gyur
63b3(rgyud): ba gang yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mi'i rgyal po de la brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi 'khor rnams kyis rtag par lhan cig srung bar byed pa'i
63b4(rgyud): phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag dngos po 'di dag bden nam/ de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
63b5(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi 'khor rnams kyis skad mthun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ yul gang dag na mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di yang dag par bshad
63b6(rgyud): pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don par bgyid na/ yul gyi dag po de dag la bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rtag par mchis nas/ yongs su srung bar bgyid par 'chi ba dang
63b7(rgyud): gnas pa na'ang lhan cig gnas par bgyid do// rgyal po de la gdon bgegs dang rgol ba'i dgra zhig mchis na'ang / de dag thams cad bdag cag rgyal po bzhi la sogs pas rab tu zhi bar
64a1(rgyud): bgyid do// mya ngan dang rims nang la sogs pa'ang bsal zhing sos par bgyis nas/ tshe 'phel ba dang / dge ba'i rtags 'byung ba dang / smon pa rnams bsams pa
64a2(rgyud): bzhin 'grub pa dang / rtag tu dga' ba bskyed par bgyi'o// bdag cag gis yul de na dmag tshogs ji snyed mchis pa de dag thams cad dpa' zhing brtsan par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
64a3(rgyud): stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag legs so// khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du khyed kyis mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul gyi bdag po de dag chos bzhin du spyod pa'i dus na
64a4(rgyud): 'bangs thams cad kyang rgyal po'i rjes su mngon par sgrub cing chos bzhin du spyod par byed pas/ khyed la sogs pa'ang gzugs dang / stobs dang / phan yon mchog thob par 'gyur zhing gzhal med
64a5(rgyud): khang 'od dang ldan pa/ 'khor rnams kyang brtsan zhing rgyas par gyur pas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pas/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no zhes gsol to//
64a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas gang du mdo sde dam pa yang dag par ston cing klog pa dang / spel ba'i yul de'i blon po chen po dang / nang blon rnams phan yon rnam pa bzhi 'thob par/
64a7(rgyud): 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dang po ni phan tshun 'dus shing nye bar sems pa dang / bla mar byed cing sdug par sems pa'o// gnyis pa ni rtag par mi'i rgyal po'i snying du sdug cing / bkur ba dang /
64b1(rgyud): dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / yul chen po dang / yul chung ngu'i mi rnams kyis btsun par byed pa'o// gsum pa ni nor la'ang dam par 'dzin cing / chos la btsud par byed pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i
64b2(rgyud): khyi mi tshol bas snyan pa'i sgra kun tu grags nas mang po kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur ba'o// bzhi pa ni tshe ring zhing bde skyid par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di dag ni phan yon rnam pa bzhi zhes bya'o// gal te yul
64b3(rgyud): kyi bdag po gang la la zhig gis mdo sde yang dag par ston par byed na/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams phan yon khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ dang po ni gos/
64b4(rgyud): dang bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman rnams kyis 'phongs pa med pa gang yin pa'o// gnyis pa ni thams cad sems bde bar yid la sems shing klog pa dang kha ton
64b5(rgyud): 'don par 'gyur ro// gsum pa ni ri dang nags tshal dag na gnas pa na/ bde bar gnas pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// bzhi pa ni sems kyis ji ltar smon pa bzhin thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
64b6(rgyud): ba ste/ 'di dag ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i phan yon rnam pa bzhi zhes bya'o// gal te yul la lar mdo sde 'di yang dag par ston par byed na/ mi thams cad dar zhing skyid pa dang / rims nad nam/
64b7(rgyud): med pa dang / tshong pa dang 'gron po phan tshun 'gro ba nor dang rin po che mang du thob pa dang / bsod nams khyad par du 'phags pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ 'di dag ni yon tan gyi phan yon rnam pa sna tshog+sa/
65a1(rgyud): shes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / rgyal chen po bzhi dang / 'khor mang po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
65a2(rgyud): mdo sde don zab mo 'di lta bu mngon du gnas par gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang 'jig rten na gnas shing nub par mi 'gyur la/ nam mdo sde 'di
65a3(rgyud): lta bu nub par gyur pa na yang dag pa'i chos kyang nub par 'gyur bar rig par bgyi legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de lta bas na khyed
65a4(rgyud): kyis gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di las tshig gcig gam/ sde gcig kyang rung ste/ thams cad sems rtse gcig tu yang dag par bklag par bya/ yang dag par kha ton du 'don par bya/ yang dag
65a5(rgyud): par mnyan par bya/ yang dag par gzung bar bya/ yang dag par yid la bsam par bya zhing / yang dag par bsgoms nas sems can mang po'i ched du rgya cher yang dag par bstan te yongs su spel/
65a6(rgyud): bar byed na/ yun ring por bde skyid cing bsod nams kyi phan yon mtha' med do// de nas 'khor mang po rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nasathams cad phan
65a7(rgyud): yon khyad par du 'phags pa thob par gyur pas rab tu dga' zhing mgu bas yang dag par bzung bar gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ las kyi
65b1(rgyud): spring pa rnam par spong ba'i le'u ste lta ba'o// gser 'ong dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyam po mdobs po bzhi pa/ de ras bya/
65b2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' seng ge'i mtshan thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba 'khor bye ba phrag tshad med pa skyed dang lhan cig tu stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ dus mo
65b3(rgyud): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ me tog dang / spos dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /
65b4(rgyud): gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen du zhig gis ni byang chub kyi sems 'thob par 'gyur ba dang
65b5(rgyud): gang byang chub kyi sems zhes bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub gang lags pa de la ni/ da ltar gyi sems kyang dmigs su ma mchis/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems kyang dmigs su ma mchis/
65b6(rgyud): 'das pa'i sems kyang dmigs su ma mchis lags so// byang chub las gud na'ang byang chub kyi sems dmigs su ma mchis lags so// byang chub ces bgyi ba ni tshig gis brjod du ma mchis
65b7(rgyud): pas sems kyang gzugs ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ dngos po dang las ma mchis pa/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma lags pa/ sems can yang dmigs su ma mchis shing / khong
66a1(rgyud): du chud par yang mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos zab mo'i don gang lags par rig par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de/
66a2(rgyud): de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub kyi dngos po dang las ni shin tu gya nom pas/ mngon par 'du bya ba'ang dmigs par mi 'gyur la/ byang chub las gud na'ang byang chub kyi sems dmigs par
66a3(rgyud): mi 'gyur bas/ byang chub ces bya ba ni brjod du med pa/ sems kyang brjod du med pa/ gzugs dang mtshan ma med pa dang / dngos po dang las med pa/ sems can thams cad kyang dmigs su
66a4(rgyud): med da pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub dang sems gnyis ka'ang de bzhin du mtshungs pa'i phyir dang / mngon du byed pa dang / mngon du bya ba mnyam par gyur pa'i phyir te/ 'on kyang chos rnams
66a5(rgyud): sheshes par bya ba med par ni ma yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis de ltar shes par bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ chos rnams mngon par rtogs pa dang / byang
66a6(rgyud): chub dang / byang chub kyi sems legs par bshad pa zhes bya'o// byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin te/ sems kyang //
66a7(rgyud): de bzhin no// sems can yang de bzhin te/ 'di la mtshan nyid gnyis yang dag par dmigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad la skye ba med pa'i phyir ro// byang chub kyang dmigs su
66b1(rgyud): mid/ byang chub kyi ming yang dmigs su med/ sems can dang sems can gyi ming yang dmigs su med/ nyan thos dang nyan thos kyi ming yang dmigs su med/ rang sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas/
66b2(rgyud): kyi ming yang dmigs su med/ byang chub sems dpa' dang byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang dmigs su med/ sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi mtshan yang dmigs su med/ spyod pa dang spyod pa ma
66b3(rgyud): yin pa'ang dmigs su med/ spyod pa dang spyod pa ma yin pa'i ming yang dmigs su med de/ 'di ltar dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rab tu dben pa'i chos thams cad la rab tu gnas po yin te//
66b4(rgyud): 'di'ang bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten nas skye bar 'gyur ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rin po che'i rgyal po ri rab thams cad la phan 'dogs par byed pa de bzhin du/
66b5(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems 'di'ang sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir/ 'di ni dang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sa chen po bzhin du dngos po mang
66b6(rgyud): po yongs su 'dzin par byed pa'i phyir/ 'di ni gnyis pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na seng ge gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pa gcig pu 'gro ba la 'jig
66b7(rgyud): pa med pa de bzhin du/ skrag cing dngang ba dang bral bar gyur pa'i phyir/ 'di ni gsum pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung gi dkyil 'khor stobs po che shugs/
67a1(rgyud): drag cing myur ba de bzhin du/ sems la nur ba med pa'i phyir/ 'di ni bzhi pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na rigs rin po che sna
67a2(rgyud): bdun gyi gzhal med khang brtsegs ma them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ sgo bzhi nas shin tu bsil ba'i rlung gis bus pas shin tu bde ba myong ba de bzhin du/ bsam gtan gyi chos kyi gter yongs su
67a3(rgyud): btsal nas gang zhing rgyas par byed pa'i phyir/ 'di ni lnga pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer rgyas par gyur pa de bzhin du/
67a4(rgyud): sems 'dis kyang myur ba kho nar 'khor ba'i ma rig pa'i mun nag 'joms par byed pa'i phyir/ 'di ni drug pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na chong
67a5(rgyud): dpon gyis thams cad kyi sems la smon pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de bzhin du sems 'dis kyang 'khor ba'i lam nyam nga ba las yongs su 'das nas yon tan gyi rin po che
67a6(rgyud): thob pa'i phyir/ 'di ni bdun pa thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba yongs su dag cing shin tu
67a7(rgyud): rgyas pa la rab rib med pa de bzhin du/ sems 'dis kyang spyod yul thams cad las rnam par dag pa phun sun tshogs par byed pa'i phyir/ 'di ni brgyang pa smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin
67b1(rgyud): pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dmag la dbang ba blon po chen po yid bzhin du dbang byed pa bzhin du/ sems 'dis kyang sangs rgyas kyi
67b2(rgyud): zhing yongs su dag pa shin tu brgyan pa dang / yon tan tshad med pas skye dgu rnams la rgya cher phan 'dogs par byed pa'i phyir/ 'di ni dgu pa stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes
67b3(rgyud): bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du/ sems 'dis kyang spyod yul thams cad la thogs pa med cing gnas thams cad du rang dbang thob
67b4(rgyud): nasadabang bskur ba'i sar phyin par byed pa'i phyir/ 'di ni bcu pa ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya ste/ 'di lta bu'i rgyu bcu la khyed kyis rab tu brtson pas bslab par bya'o// rigs/
67b5(rgyud): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i dbang po dang /
67b6(rgyud): snying rje dang / 'dod pa yongs su 'tshol ba med pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad yongs su sdud pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su 'tshol ba gang yin pa ste/ rigs/
67b7(rgyud): kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam/
68a1(rgyud): ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// lnga gang zhe na/ las rnam pa gsum yongs su dag par gyur pa dang
68a2(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / ngan 'gro'i sgo rnams gcod cing bde 'gro'i sgo 'byed pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las
68a3(rgyud): yang dag par 'das pa dang / bsod nams thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa gang yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol
68a4(rgyud): tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yo/
68a5(rgyud): su rdzogs par byed do// lnga gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gi nyon mongs pa 'dul bar nus pa dang / lus dang srog la 'phangs pa med par bde ba yongs su mi 'tshol zhing 'du shes nye bar
68a6(rgyud): zhi bar byed pa dang / sngon gyi las la bsams nas sdug bsngal dang phrad par gyur na'ang dang du len par nus pa dang / byams pa dang snying rje'i bsam pa bskyed nas sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
68a7(rgyud): rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa zab mo thob par gyur pa gang yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bzod pa'i
68b1(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
68b2(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// lnga gang zhe na/ nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par mi mos pa dang / bsod nams yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur gyi bar du bde ba nyams su len par mi byed//
68b3(rgyud): ba dang / dka' ba sna tshogs spyod pa la yongs su skyo ba'i bsam pa mi skyed pa dang / byams pa dang snying rje chen pos yongs su bsdus nas phan 'dogs pa'i thabs mkhas pas sems can thams//
68b4(rgyud): cad yongs su smin par byed pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongs su gnyer bar smon pa gang yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi
68b5(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
68b6(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// lnga gang zhe na/ dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su bsdus nas rnam par 'thor bar mi byed pa'i phyir dang / rnam par grol bar smon cing mtha' gnyis la mngon par zhen
68b7(rgyud): par byed pa'i phyir dang / mngon par shes pa thob nas sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byed pa smon pa'i phyir dang / chos kyi dbyings yongs su sbyangs nas sems kyi dri ma sel
69a1(rgyud): bar byed pa'i phyir dang / sems can gyi nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba yongs su gcod par byed pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/
69a2(rgyud): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ shes rab kyi pha rog
69a3(rgyud): tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// lnga gang zhe na/ rtag par sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / gsal zhing thabs mkhas pa thams cad la mchod cing nye bar brten nas/ yongs su
69a4(rgyud): skyo ba mi skyed cing rgyab kyis phyogs par mi byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis chos zab mo bshad pa de dag sems kyis rtag tu thos par mos shing yongs su mi skyo ba dang / chog pa'i
69a5(rgyud): bsam med pa dang / don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi shes rab dam pas rab tu rnam par 'byed par mos pa dang / sgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad myur du spong ba dang / 'jig rten
69a6(rgyud): ba'i mkhyud dpyad dang rig pa'i gnas lnga'i chos thams cad mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu
69a7(rgyud): phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod
69b1(rgyud): su rdzogs par byed do// lnga gang zhe na/ sems cadan thams cad kyi mos pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / sems kyi spyod pa'i bye brag thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa dang / chos tshad med pa rnam/
69b2(rgyud): kyi gnyen po'i sgo thams cad sems kyi gsal bar rtogs pa dang / byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin las 'byung zhing 'jug pa dag la rang dbang thob pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams
69b3(rgyud): bsgoms nas yongs su smin cing phun sum tshogs par bya bar mos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ma lus par yongs su bsdus nas mngon par rtogs par smon pa gang yin pa
69b4(rgyud): ste rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa ye shes dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub
69b5(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// lnga gang zhe na/ chos thams cad gzod ma nas mi skye mi 'gag
69b6(rgyud): yod pa ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin pa dag la sems bde bar gnas pa dang / chos thams cad kyi don gyi tshul mchog dam pa dag la dri ma dang bral zhing rnam par dag par so sor brtags nas
69b7(rgyud): sems bde bar gnas pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i sems kyis de bzhin nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med pa spyod pa med pa tha dad ma yin/ mi g.yo ba dag la sems/
70a1(rgyud): bde bar gnas pa dang / sems can rnams la phan gdags par 'dod pa'i phyir/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa dag la sems bde bar gnas pa dang / zhi gnas dang lhag mthong
70a2(rgyud): dus gcig tu mnyam par spyod pa dag la sems bde bar gnas pa gang yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
70a3(rgyud): rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// lnga gang
70a4(rgyud): zhe na rtsa yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang legs nyes rab tu shes pa dang / sems can thams cad shin tu zab cing gya nom pa'i chos la gzung
70a5(rgyud): par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba dag gis las kyi rkyen rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang rang bzhin rnam pa gsum yang
70a6(rgyud): dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis rnam par 'byed cing khong du chud par byed pa dang / sems can rnams la tshul bzhin du yang dag par bstan nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de yongs su smin par byas nas/
70a7(rgyud): ye shes kyi stobs kyis yongs su sgrol ba gang yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes
70b1(rgyud): bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams na chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// la gang zhen/ chos rnams kyi/
70b2(rgyud): logs nyes rab tu rnam par 'byung ba dang / nag po dang dkar po'i chos yongs su mi spong zhing yang dag par spyad par byed pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag la yongs su mi skyo zhing
70b3(rgyud): mngon par mi dga' ba dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi spyod pa dang ldan pas mthar thug pa'i gnas su phyin par gyur pa dang / dbang bskur ba mchog thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
70b4(rgyud): pa la sogs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par gyur pa gang yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
70b5(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu pha rol tu phyin pa'i don gang yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phan 'dogs pa'i mchog mngon par sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don
70b6(rgyud): to shin tu zab pa'i ye shes chen po tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// spyod pa dang spyod pa ma yin pa'i chos dag la sems kyis mngon par/
70b7(rgyud): zhen pa med pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan yang dag par rig cing / yang dag par so sor rtog pa gang yin pa de
71a1(rgyud): ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// gti mug dang ldan pa'i gang zag dang shes rab dang ldan pa'i gang zag thams cad yongs su sdud par byed pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin
71a2(rgyud): ba'i don to// chos kyi rin po che gya nom pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu ston pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// thogs pa med pa'i rnam par grol ba dang shes rab yongs su rdzogs par
71a3(rgyud): gyur pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// chos kyi khams dang sems can gyi khams yang dag par rnam par phye nas shes par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to//
71a4(rgyud): sbyin pa la sogs pa nas ye shes kyi bar dag phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas su phyin par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa gang
71a5(rgyud): yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// mngon par byang chub nas
71a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi stobs bcu dang / bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i chos la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// 'khor ba dang
71a7(rgyud): mya ngan las 'das pa la mtshan nyid gnyisu med par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// thams cad la phan 'dogs shing yongs su zlos pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin
71b1(rgyud): ba'i don to// mu stegs can thams cad nye bar 'ongs nas gal te dri ba dag la legs par rnam par bshad nas 'dul bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// chos kyi 'khor
71b2(rgyud): lo shin tu gya nom pa rnam pa bcu gnyis yongs su bskor ba gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// mngon par zhen pa med cing mthong ba med pa dang skyon dang 'brel ba med pa gang
71b3(rgyud): yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
71b4(rgyud): tshad med dpag tu med pa rnams rin po che'i gter rnam pa sna tshogs kun tu gang ba dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i
71b5(rgyud): sa gnyis pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sa gzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam pa/ kha dog shin tu gya nom pa/ tshad med
71b6(rgyud): pa/ dpag tu med pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / yongs su dag pa rin po che'i rgyan gyi rnam pa dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu
71b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ bdag nyid kyi lus shin tu dpa' ba go chas rab tu brgyan pas phyir rgol ba thams cad pham par byas pa
72a1(rgyud): dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa bzhi pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste
72a2(rgyud): phyogs bzhi nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis me tog dam pa rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par gtor bas/ sa gzhi kun tu khyab par bkram pa dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu
72a3(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i 'phreng ba sna tshogs kyis lus kun tu khyab par brgyan
72a4(rgyud): pamago me tog gi cod pan gyis brgyan pa dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snab
72a5(rgyud): ba 'di lta ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gi rdzing bu them skas kyi lam bzhi dang ldan pa/ gser gyi bye ma kun tu brdal ba/ yongs su dang zhing dri ma med pa/ yon tan brgyad dang ldan
72a6(rgyud): ba'i chus kun tu gang ba/ me tog ut+pa la dang ku mu da dang / pud+d+ha ri kas kun tu bkram pa/ me tog gi rdzing bu'i nang na rnam par rtsen pa dag shin tu bde skyid pa dang / yongs su dag
72a7(rgyud): cing dpa' zla med pa dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste
72b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du sems can rnams sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ba'i rigs pa dag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i mthus lhung bar mi 'gyur la/ sbas pa'ang med/
72b2(rgyud): 'jigs shing skrag pa'ang med par gyur pa dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma
72b3(rgyud): sdang ba 'di lta ste/ bdag nyid kyi lus kyi g.yas g.yon na seng ge'i rgyal pos yongs su bsrungs/ gcon gzan mang po thams cad skrag cing 'jigs par gyur pa dag byang chub sems
72b4(rgyud): dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor 'bum
72b5(rgyud): phrag tshad med pas yongs su bskor nas mchod pa byed pa dang / spyi bo'i gdugs dkar po rin po che sna tshogs tshad med pa dag gis rab tu brgyan pa dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab
72b6(rgyud): tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog kun tu 'phro ba 'od zer
72b7(rgyud): yongs su dag pa tshad med pa thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur pa la/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'bum phrag tshad med pa dag gis/ sku gser gyi kha dog kun tu 'phro ba yongs su bskor nas bkur
73a1(rgyud): sti dang mchod pa byas pas/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu gya nom pa yongs su bskor ba dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs/
73a2(rgyud): kyi bu sa dang po la ci'i phyir rab tu dga' ba zhes bya zhe na/ 'di ltar thog ma kho nar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems mngon ma thob pa dang gdod thob nas/ sgrub pa chen po dag ji ltar smon pa bzhin
73a3(rgyud): du mngon par grub par gyur pas/ rab tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir sa dang po ni rab tu dga' ba zhes bya'o// dri ma shin tu phra mo dang 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi nyes pa thams cad yongs su dag
73a4(rgyud): par gyur pas/ de'i phyir sa gnyis pa ni dri ma med pa zhes bya'o// shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa'i 'od zer snang ba sgrub par mi nus shing thul bar mi 'gyur ba dang ga thos pa 'dzin pa'i
73a5(rgyud): gzungs tsam par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir sa gsum pa ni 'od byed pa'i sa zhes bya'o// shes rab kyi mes nyon mongs pa rnams bsregs nas 'od kyi snang ba 'phel bar byed pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
73a6(rgyud): sgom par byed pas/ de'i phyir sa bzhi pa ni 'od 'phro ba'i sa zhes bya'o// thabs mkhas pas bsgoms pa'i ye shes mchog rang dbang du gyur pa shin tu 'thob par dka' ba'i phyir dang / mthong ba dang /
73a7(rgyud): sgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa gdul bar dka' ba thul bar gyur pa'i phyir/ sa lnga pa ni shin tu rgyal bar dka' zhes bya'o// spyod pa'i chos rgyun chang med par gsal bar mngon sum du gyur/
73b1(rgyud): pa dang / mtshan ma med ba'i yid la byed pa thams cad mngon sum du gyur pas/ de'i phyir sa drug pa ni mngon sum du gyur pa zhes bya'o// zag pa med pa bar chad med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i yid
73b2(rgyud): la byed pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin yun ring po nas bsgoms pa'i phyir dang / sa de rnam par dag cing thogs pa med par gyur pa'i phyir/ sa bdun pa ni ring du song ba zhes bya'o// mtshan ma
73b3(rgyud): med pa yid la bsgoms pas rang dbang du gyur nas/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bsgral bar mi nus pas/ de'i phyir sa brkyang ba ni mi g.yo ba zhes bya'o// tha dad par gyur pa'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs
73b4(rgyud): thams cad bstan pa la rang dbang thob nas/ nyes pa med cing 'brel ba med par shes rab 'phel bar byed pa dang / dbang du gyur cing thogs pa med par gyur pas/ de'i phyir sa dku pa ni legs
73b5(rgyud): pa'i blo gros zhes bya'o// chos kyi sku nam mkha' dang 'dra ba dang shes rab sprin chen po lta bur gyur nas/ thams cad kun tu khyab par g.yogs par byed pa'i phyir/ de lta bas na sa bcu pa ni chos kyi sprin
73b6(rgyud): zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu bdag dang chos la mtshan ma yod par mngon par zhen pa'i ma rig pa dang / 'gro ba'i ngan 'gro la skrag cing 'jigs pa'i ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa dang po la sgrib par byed/
73b7(rgyud): do// bslab pa'i gnas phra mo dag la shes bzhin med pas nyams par byas pa'i ma rig pa dang / las kyi 'du byed rnam pa sna tshogs slong bar byed pa'i ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis
74a1(rgyud): ni sa gnyis pa la sgrib par byed do// ma thob pa thob par 'dod pa la sred cing mngon par zhen pa'i ma rig pa dang / gzungs khyad par du 'phags pa dag la sgrib par byed pa'i
74a2(rgyud): ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa gsum pa la sgrib par byed do// snyoms par 'jug pa'i ro myang ba la mngon par dga' ba'i ma rig pa dang / shin tu gya nom pa'i chos rnam par
74a3(rgyud): dag pa la sred cing mos pa'i ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa bzhi pa la sgrib par byed do// 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i ma rig pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par
74a4(rgyud): gzhol ba'i ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa lnga pa la sgrib par byed do// rnal 'byor mngon du rgyu ba'i ma rig pa dang / mtshan ma rags pa mngon du snang ba'i ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa
74a5(rgyud): 'di gnyis kyis ni sa drug pa la sgrib par byed do// mtshan ma shin tu phra mo rnams la mngon sum du spyod pa'i ma rig pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i yid la byed pa la mngon par dga' ba'i ma rig
74a6(rgyud): pabapa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa bdun pa la sgrib par byed do// mtshan ma med par sgom par mngon par rtsol ba'i ma rig pa dang / mtshan ma la dbang thob pa la mngon par zhen pa'i ma
74a7(rgyud): rig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa brgyad pa la sgrib par byed do// bstan par bya ba'i don tshad med pa dang / ming dang / tshig dang / yi ge tshad med pa gnyis po 'di dag la mi mkhas/
74b1(rgyud): nga'i mchin pa dang / tshig gi spobs pa ying bzhin du ma gyur pa'i ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis nis dgu pa la sgrib par byed do// rdzu 'phrul chen po stor pa la rang dbang mthob da/
74b2(rgyud): ma rig pa dang / shin tu phra ba'i gsang ba'i las kyi dngos po khong du ma chung ba'i ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa bcu ba la sgrib par byed do// spyod yul thams cad la shes bya phra mos
74b3(rgyud): sgribs pa'i ma rig pa dang / nyon mongs pa shin tu phra ba'i gnas ngan len gyi ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sangs rgyas kyi sa la sgrib par byed do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa
74b4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sa dang po la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do// sa gnyis pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do// sa gsum pa la bzod pa'i pha rol
74b5(rgyud): tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do// sa bzhi pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do// sa lnga pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do// sa drug pa la shes rab kyi
74b6(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do// sa bdun pa la thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes mchog gi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do// sa brgyad pa la smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do//
74b7(rgyud): sas dgu pa la stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do// sa bcu pa la ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ sems
75a1(rgyud): bskyed pa dang pos rin chen mchog gi ting nge 'dzin yongs su sdud cing skyeng par byed do// sems bskyed pa gnyis pas yid du 'ong ba'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su sdud cing bskyed par
75a2(rgyud): byed do// sems bskyed pa gsum pas shin tu bskul bar dka' ba'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su sdud cing skyed par byed do// sems bskyed pa bzhi pas phyir mi ldog pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su sdud
75a3(rgyud): cing skyed par byed do// sems bskyed pa lnga pas rin po che'i me tog gi ting nge 'dzin yongs su sdud cing skyed par byed do// sems bskyed pa drug pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer 'bar ba'i ting nge/
75a4(rgyud): 'dzin yongs su sdud cing skyed par byed do// sems bskyed pa bdun pas smon lam thams cad yid bzhin du mngon par 'grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su sdud cing skyed par byed do// sems bskyed pa/
75a5(rgyud): brgyad pas mngon sum du gnas par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su sdud cing skyed par byed do// sems bskyed pa dgu pas ye shes kyi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su sdud cing skyed par byed do//
75a6(rgyud): sems bskyed pa bcu pas dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su sdud cing skyod par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa rnam pa
75a7(rgyud): bcu zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sa dang po las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni yon tan bslabs pa'i stobs zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan/
75b1(rgyud): 'das kyis gzungs sngags smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ bAr+Na ma no ra te do ha do ho/ yA pad sUd+yo/ a ba b+hA sa te/ yA bad tsan+de/ dau dAd+he pad tra rak+Sha mA na/ dan+te ba ri hA ra~M ku ru swA hA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs
75b2(rgyud): 'di ni gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa dang po'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags
75b3(rgyud): 'di kha ton du 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ 'di lta ste/ stag dang / spyang ki dang / seng ge dang / gcan gzan ma rungs pa'i rigs kyi rnam pa dang / yi dgas dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa/
75b4(rgyud): la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sa dang po mi brjed cing
75b5(rgyud): rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa gnyis pa las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni shin tu bde ba'i gnas shes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ ud+ho
75b6(rgyud): li tsi ri tsi ri/ At+to ra/ tor NA ma/ shAn+to shan+te/ ut+to li/ hu ru hu ru swAhA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa
75b7(rgyud): gnyis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yon te/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ gcan gzan ma rung /
76a1(rgyud): pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las
76a2(rgyud): thar par 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sa gnyis pa mi brjed cing rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa gsum pa las thob
76a3(rgyud): pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba'i stobs zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ dan+ta tse ge/ ban thi kaM/ kar thi ko'u ra Shi/ ke yU re/ dAn+ti ri swA hA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung gsum
76a4(rgyud): gyi bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'o sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa gsum pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'don
76a5(rgyud): cing nga yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe
76a6(rgyud): ba'i 'jigs pa las thar bar 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sa gsum pa mi brjed cing rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
76a7(rgyud): sa bzhi pa las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni rgya cher phan 'dogs pa zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ shi ri shi ri/ d+ha mi ni/ d+ha mi ni/ d+ha ri d+ha ri Ni shi ri shi ri Ni/ bi shA la/ bi shA la/ pA sha ka bA
76b1(rgyud): ba ni/ ban+d+ha mi te swAhA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa bzhi pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su srung ba'i phyir gsu/
76b2(rgyud): te gang maM la zhig gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'dzin cing yongs su 'jim par byed na/ gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pas bya
76b3(rgyud): rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa rnams las thar par 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas sa bzhi pa mi brjed cing rjes su dran par 'gyur/
76b4(rgyud): ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa lnga pa las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni yon tan sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA Da ha ri ha ri Ni/ ci
76b5(rgyud): tsi ri Ni/ ka ri ma Ne/ saM ka ri ma Ni/ sa ma shan+ti/ dzam+b+ha ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ mo ha ni/ swa yaM b+hu be swA hA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas
76b6(rgyud): rnams kyis lnga pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rnams yongs su srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gos gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'don cing yongs su 'dzin
76b7(rgyud): par byed na/ gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa las
77a1(rgyud): thar par 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sa lnga pa mi brjed cing rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa drug
77a2(rgyud): ba las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ bi to ri bi to ri/ ma ri Ni ma ri Ni/ ki ri kI ri/ bi to han+su/ ru ru ru ru/ tsu ru tsu ru du ru ba du ru ba
77a3(rgyud): sha sha shas+t+ra/ pa ri sha sid+d+hi/ sarba satwa nAn/ sid d+h+ya~M tu ma ma man+ta pa dA ni swAhA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa drug
77a4(rgyud): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ gcan
77a5(rgyud): gzan ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa'i phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa rnams las thar par
77a6(rgyud): 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sa drug pa mi brjed cing rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sa bdun pa las thob pa'i
77a7(rgyud): gzungs gang yin pa de ni rnam par rgyal ba'i chos kyi spyod pa zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA / dza ha dza ha ru dza ha ru/ bai du ke bai du ke.a mr-i ta/ g+ha ne/ pu ru Sha Ni/ bai ru Sha Ni/ bai du ti ke ba ru bat+te/ bi d+hi
77b1(rgyud): hi ka/ b+hin+da ba ri ni/ a mri ti ge/ ba hu dzu mu swA hA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa bdun pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
77b2(rgyud): rnams yongs su srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'dzin cing yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa/
77b3(rgyud): dang mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa las thar bar 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nasas
77b4(rgyud): bdun pa mi brjed cing rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa brgyad pa las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni mi zad pa'i gter zhes bya'o// tad+ya/
77b5(rgyud): shi ri shi ri/ shi ri Ni/ mi te mi te/ ka ri ka ri/ he ru he ru he ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ban+d+ha ni swAhA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas
77b6(rgyud): rnams kyis sa brgyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'don cing 'dzin par byed na/ gcan
77b7(rgyud): gaban sa rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang / mo ma yin pa la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa rnams las thar
78a1(rgyud): par 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sa brgyang pa mi brjed cing rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
78a2(rgyud): sa dgu pa las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni tshad med pa'i sgo zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ ha ri tsaN+DA li ke/ ku la mA b+ha te/ to ra si pa ta pa ta si/ shi ri shi ri/ ka shi ri ka bi shi raM/
78a3(rgyud): sid+d+hi sarba satwA nAn swAhA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa dgu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams srung ba'i phyir
78a4(rgyud): gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di kha ton du 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang / mi ma yin
78a5(rgyud): ba la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa rnams las thar par 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sa dgu pa
78a6(rgyud): brjed cing rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa bcu pa las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni rdo rje'i ri rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya'o//
78a7(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ sid+d+ha su sid+d+hi/ mo tse ni/ mok+Sha ni/ yabi muk+te/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ nirma le/ mAng+ga l+ye/ hi ra N+ya gad+he / rat+na gar+b+he/ sa man+te/ sarba ar+thA sA d+ha ni/ ma na si/ ma hA ma na saM/ ad
78b1(rgyud): b+hU te/ a t+ya ta b+hu te/ a ts+yu te/ a mri te/ a ra dze/ bi ra She/ bra h+me/ brah+ma swa re pU ra Ni pU ra Ni/ ma nor the swA hA/ rigs kyi bu dbang bskur ba'i bkra shis tshig gi gzungs 'di ni gar+b+haH
78b2(rgyud): klub bcu pa'i grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngag
78b3(rgyud): 'di kha ton du 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs
78b4(rgyud): kyi 'jigs pa rnams las thar par 'gyur zhing / gdug pa'i gdon thams cad yongs su bsal nas rab tu zhi ba dang / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas sa bcu pa mi brjed cing
78b5(rgyud): rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i mtshan thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer 'bar bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzungs 'di dag
78b6(rgyud): bkas bshad pa thos pa dang / stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas pa bcom ldan 'das
78b7(rgyud): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshigs su bcad pa bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa zab mo mtshan ma med pa'i chos// dpe med de la phyag kyang 'tshal/
79a1(rgyud): sems can yang dag shes stong la// bcom ldan nyag gcig sgrol bar mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen gsal spyan// chos gcig mtshan nyid mi gzigs kyang /
79a2(rgyud): yang dag chos kyi spyan gyis ni// thams cad kun gzigs bsam mi khyab// chos gcig bskyed par mi mdzad la// chos gcig 'gog par mi mdzad pas// mnyam gzigs 'di yi dbang
79a3(rgyud): gis na// bla med gnas su byon pa lags// 'khor ba dag kyang mi 'jig la// mya ngan 'das la mi gnas shing // mtha' gnyis dag la ma chags pas// de slad mya ngan 'das pa brnyes/
79a4(rgyud): ngag dang ma dag pa yi phyogs// bcom ldan ro gcig nyid mkhyen nas// rnam par rtog par mi mdzad slad// mchog tu rnam par dag pa brnyes/ bcom ldan mtha' yas sku dag gis// yi ge 'bru
79a5(rgyud): gcig ma gsungs kyang // slob ma mang po kun la ni// chos kyi char gyis tshim par mdzad// bcom ldan sems can thams cad la// mtshan nyid rnam pa med gzigs kyang // sdug bsngal dag
79a6(rgyud): gis gzir ba la// rtag par yongs su skyob par mdzad// sdug bsngal bde dang rtag mi rtag/ bdag dang bdag med la sogs dang // gcig min tha dad min pa dang // skye med 'gag pa med pa yi//
79a7(rgyud): de 'dra'i don ni mang po rnams// bshad phyir bye brag mchis kyang ni// dper na lung stong brag cha ltar// bcom ldan nyag gcig rab tu mkhyen// chos dbyings rtog pa ma mchis pas// theg pa tha dad /
79b1(rgyud): ma mchis kyang // sems can yongs su bsgral ba'i spyad/ rnam par phye nas gsum du gsungs// de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po bra gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ bus so
79b2(rgyud): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la bcugs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
79b3(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni shin tu dkon zhing dpag par dka' ba/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ mtha' mar dge ba/ tshig 'bru dang don yongs
79b4(rgyud): su rdzogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags pas/ gang gis yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa'i gang zag de ni/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi dran bsab par
79b5(rgyud): bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gang gis mdo sde 'di nyan par
79b6(rgyud): byed pa de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dis ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i byang chub sems dpa'i/
79b7(rgyud): khyad par du 'phags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byed cing / chos kyi phyag rgya mchog dang / mdo sde mang po'i rgyal po yin pa'i phyir mnyan par bya/ yongs su gzung bar bya/ bklag par
80a1(rgyud): bya kha ton du gdon par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sems can gang dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa dang / de bzhin
80a2(rgyud): gsheg pa rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas pa de dag thams cad kyis ni shin tu gya nom pa'i chos 'di mnyan par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis mnyan nas/
80a3(rgyud): yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang nas/ mchog tu rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur/ rtag par sangs rgyas mthong zhing / sangs rgyas dang / dge ba'i
80a4(rgyud): bshes gnyen dang / yon tan mchog dang ldan pa'i gang zag rnams dang yongs su 'bral bar mi 'gyur/ rtag par chos gya nom pa thos shing phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur/ gzungs
80a5(rgyud): kyi sgo mchog dam pa zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa/ 'di lta ste/ rgya mtsho'i phyag yon tan mchog 'byung ba'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / sems kyi bsam pa dang sa spyod
80a6(rgyud): pa dang / tshig mngon pa rtogs pa'i gzungs zad pa rnye cing 'thos pa meng bdong / sa 'i dkyis 'khor gyim mang ba'i can nyid kyi'ang med kyi gzungs thang pa med ci 'thob pa sa
80a7(rgyud): dang rngazla ba yongs su rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od zer gyi gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / rmongs pa rnams yongs su brtul nas/ yon tan gyi sku yang dag par ston pa'i gzung
80b1(rgyud): zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / rdo rje'i rirnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / brjod du med pa'i don gyi rgyu dang rkyen gyi mdzod yang dag par sto pa'i gzungs
80b2(rgyud): zad pa med cing 'grub pa sad pa dang / yang dag pa'i bden pa'i tshig gi cho ga'i sgra dbyangs mngon par rtogs pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa mang ba dang / nam mkha' lter dri ma med pa'i
80b3(rgyud): sems kyi spyod pa'i phyag rgya'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' med pa rnams yang dag par ston pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa de lta bu
80b4(rgyud): thams cad kyang rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de lta bu la sogs pa zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
80b5(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sku mngon par sprul nas/ yang dag pa'i chos bla na med pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed kyang chos kyi de/
80b6(rgyud): bzhin nyid las g.yo ba'ang med/ gnas pa'ang med/ 'ong ba'ang med/ 'gro ba'ang med do// sems cad thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba legs par yongs su smin par byas kyang / yongs su smin
80b7(rgyud): par byas pa'i sems can gcig tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // chos rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston par byed kyang / tshig las g.yos pa'ang med/ gnas pa'ang med
81a1(rgyud): 'gro ba'ang med/ 'ong ba'ang med/ skye 'gag med cing mngon du byed par 'gyur ro// rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir 'du byed kyi chos rnams la 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med par bstan ce/
81a2(rgyud): nachos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid tha dad med pa'i phyir ro// chos 'di bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'bum phrag sum khri ni mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par gyur to//
81a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa snyed ni byang chub kyi sa las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// dge slong dang dge slong ma tshad med dpag tu med pa snyed ni chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob par gyur to//
81a4(rgyud): srog chags tshad med pa snyed ni byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ mos mchog 'khor ba'i rgyun las zlog mdzad pa/
81a5(rgyud): shin tu zab cing gya nom mthong bar dka'// sems can dmus long 'dod pas rab g.yogs nas// ma mthong phyir ni sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong // de nas 'khor mang po rnams cig car stan las
81a6(rgyud): langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gang du gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba/
81a7(rgyud): mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di klog cing 'don pa'i gnas der bdag cag 'khor mang po rnams der mchis te/ nyan pa'i 'khor bgyis nas/ 'di ston pa'i mkhan po de la sman pa dang / bde ba dang / sgrib
81b1(rgyud): bam nas shing lus dang sems pag yongs su 'gyur ba 'thob par babyed do// bdag can bsam pa zag pa nas mchod cing rim tho bgyid do// nyan pa'i 'khor rnams kyang rab tu bde zhing spyod
81b2(rgyud): bar bgyid do// de dag gnas pa'i yul der yang phyir rgol ba'i dgra dang / 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / gdon bgegs dang / mu ge'i sdug bsngal rnams ma mchis par bgyis nas/ mi rnamos
81b3(rgyud): rab tu ngang shing rgyas par bgyid do// chos 'di ston pa'i dkyil 'khor der lha dang / mi dang / mi ma lags pa la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyis bcog par mi bgyid cing / mi gtsang bas
81b4(rgyud): sngags par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos bshad pa'i gnas gang lags pa de ni mchod rten lags pas/ rtag par me tog dang / spos dang / lnga ldi dang / ba dan dang / gdugs rnams
81b5(rgyud): kyis mchod pa bgyis na/ bdag cag rnams kyang rtag par yongs su srung zhing / rgung pa rnams yongs su spong bar bgyis te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa
81b6(rgyud): rigs kyi bu khyed kyi nan tan brtson 'grus kyis mdo sde dam pa 'di la yongs su sgom par byed na/ de nyid yang dag pa'i chos 'jig rten du sun ring du gnas par gyur pa yin no// gser 'od dam
81b7(rgyud): pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ mchog tu rnam par dag pa'i sa'i gzungs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// / gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam
82a1(rgyud): par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po'i mdo bam po lnga pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyisabyang chub kyi shing gi lha mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rig
82a2(rgyud): kyi lha mo khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par bya ste/ mdzes pa'i tog gi mtshan mo rmi lam na/ gser gyi rnga dam pa las de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa dang / 'gyod tshangs
82a3(rgyud): kyi chos bstan pa'i sgra chen po byung ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gang yin pa de dag ngas khyod la rgya cher yang dag par bshad kyis/ sems rtse gcig tu legs par yid la zung zhig/ 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe
82a4(rgyud): rgyal po gser gyi klu'i bdag po zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ rtag par pad+ma'i dpes phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la mngon par bstod cing bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// de nas
82a5(rgyud): 'khor mang po rnams la des mngon par bstod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gang yin pa bka' sprul pa/ 'das dang ma byon da ltar bzhugs sangs rgyas// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag na bzhugs pa la//
82a6(rgyud): deng bdag rtse gcig spyi btud phyag bgyis te// rgyal ba rnams la rtse gcig bsngags par bgyi// bla med rnam par dag pa thub pa'i gtso// sku yi 'od kyis gsal mdzad gser mdog 'dra//
82a7(rgyud): sgra kun nang na mchog tu gyur pas na// tshangs chen dbyangs ltar 'brug sgra sgrogs par mdzad// dbu skra bung ba'i rgyab ltar rab gnag cing // g.yas su 'khyil ba'i ri mo sngon por gnas// tshams/
82b1(rgyud): dkar gtams pa kha dog dung 'dra zhing // rab mnyam kun gsal 'od zer dag dang ldan// rnam dag dri med rab tu mdzes pa'i spyan// ut+pal sngon po 'dab ma yangs pa 'dra// ljags kyi mtshan ni yarba/
82b2(rgyud): shing shin tu mnyen// dper na pad+ma le brgan chab chung 'dra// smin mtshams rtag par 'od ni dkar po mnga'// g.yas su 'khyil ba chu shel kha dog mtshungs// shangs kyi dbyibs mtho gser gyi
82b3(rgyud): gar bu 'dra// 'od mnyen rnam dag mtshan nyid nyams mi mnga'// 'jig rten dri mchog dam pa thams cad kun// sngon tshe gar gnas thams cad rab tu mkhyen// bcom ldan sku mchog gser gyi kha
82b4(rgyud): dog 'dra// spu rtse re re mtshan ni rab mtshungs shing // sngo la rab gnyen g.yas su 'khyil bas na// kha dog rab mnyen dpe bgyir shin tu dka'// bltams ma thag tu 'od mchog mnga' bas
82b5(rgyud): na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad gsal mdzad cing // srid gsum sems can sdug bsngal zhi mdzad pas// de dag thams cad bde ba 'thob par mdzad// sems can dud 'gro yi dgas
82b6(rgyud): 'gro ba dang // lha ma yin dang mi yi 'gro ba kun// de dag sdug bsngal mang po zhi mdzad pas// rtag tu rang byung bde ba myong bar 'gyur// sku yi 'od kyis rtag tu gsal mdzad pas// rab
82b7(rgyud): sbyangs gser 'dra gya nom bla ma mchis// zhal mdog rgyas gsal zla ba nya ba 'dra// spos dmar mdog mdzes bung ba'i 'bras bu mtshungs// gshegs stobs spyod lam seng ge rgyal po bzhin
83a1(rgyud): sku mdog rab gsal gdugs ni 'char ba 'dra// phyag ngar ring ba pus mo 'das pas ni// dbyibs ni sA la'i lcug ma 'phyang dang mtshungs// 'od ni 'dom gang mtha' yas/
83a2(rgyud): gsal mdzad pas// rab gsal gdugs ni brgya stong ji lta bzhin// sangs rgyas zhing ni kun tu khyab pas na// rkyen ni ji bzhin skye dgu sad par mdzad// rnam dag 'od zer dra ba zla ma mchis//
83a3(rgyud): 'od kyis 'jig rten brgya stong rgyas mdzad pas// phyogs bcu kun gsal mdzad la thogs mi mnga'// mun nag thams cad rab tu sel mdzad pa// bde gshegs byams 'od bde ba rab stsol
83a4(rgyud): bas rbad kha dog gya nom gser gyi ri bo 'dra// 'od kyis zhing ni brgya stong khyab mdzad pas// sems can gang reg thams cad nges par 'byung // bcom ldan sku ni bsod nams tshad med ldan//
83a5(rgyud): yon tan thams cad kun gyis rab tu brgyan// khams gsum ldan pas nyag gcig gtsor gsungs pas// 'jig rten khyad 'phags dpe zla yong ma mchis// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad/
83a6(rgyud): ji snyed pa// grangs ni sa chen rdul phran dag dang mtshungs// ma byon da ltar phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i gtso// sa chen rdul phran ji bzhin mang po la// bdag ni rtse gcig lus dang ngag yid kyis/
83a7(rgyud): dus gsum sangs rgyas spyi btung skyabs su mchis// yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas rab bsngags nas// spos dang me tog sna tshogs kun gyis mchod// bdag gi lce ni brgya stong mchis 'gyur te/
83b1(rgyud): bskal pa tshad med rab tu bsngags brjod kyang // bcom ldan yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab cing // mchog tu zab pas shin tu brjod par dka'// bdag gi lce ni bcu stong mchis pa yis/
83b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas gcig gi yon tan kun bsngags kyang // de la cha shas tsam yang rtogs dka' na// sangs rgyas mtha' dag yon tan smos ci 'tshal// gal te sa chen dang ni lha rnams nas// srid rtse'i//
83b3(rgyud): bar dag rgya mtsho'i chab gyur kyang // spu yi rtse mos grangs ni rtogs rung gi/ sangs rgyas yon tan thams cad gzhal bar dka'// bdag gis lus dang ngag yid rtse gcig tu// sangs rgyas yon
83b4(rgyud): tan mtha' yas bsdigs brjod pa'i/ bsod nams 'bras bu bsam dka' ci mchis pa// sems can yongs bsngo sangs rgyas myur 'grub smon// rgyal po de yis sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas
83b5(rgyud): gzhan yang rang sems smon lam cher btab pa// bdag ni ma 'ongs pa yi dus kyi tshe// tshe rabs bskal pa tshad med grangs med snyed// rmi lam rtag par gser rnga cher mthong nas// 'gyod tshangs bstan/
83b6(rgyud): pa'i sgra ni thos par shog/ sangs rgyas yon tan pad+ma'i dpes bsngags pas// skye med rtogs nas yang dag sangs rgyas shog/ sangs rgyas brgya lam lan cig 'jig rten 'byung // bskal pa brgya
83b7(rgyud): stong shin tu phrad par dka'// rmi lam rtag par gser rnga sgra mchog thob// nyin mtshan ci rigs 'gyod tshangs bgyid par shog/ bdag gis pha rol phyin drug tshogs bsgoms nas// sems can sdug
84a1(rgyud): bsngal mtsho las rab drangs te// de 'og bla med mngon par sangs rgyas nas// zhing ni rnam dag bsam gyis mi khyab shog/ gser gyi rnga mchog sangs rgyas phul ba dang /
84a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas yang dag yon tan bsngags pa'i rgyus// bcom ldan shAkya thub pa mthong gyur nas// bdag la mi mchog 'gyur bar lung bstan shog/ bdag gi bu ni gser klu gser gyi 'od// 'das
84a3(rgyud): pa'i dus tshe dge ba shes bgyis pas na// tshe rabs kun tu bdag gi khyim skyes te// lhan cig bla med byang chub lung nor shog/ sems can gang zhig mgon dang skyabs ma mchis// yun ring 'khor ba
84a4(rgyud): sdug bsngal mang myong ba// bdag gis ma 'ongs mgon dang skyabs bgyis nas// de dag rtag tu bde ba thob par shog/ srid gsum sdug bsngal mang po nyer zhi nas// thams cad yid bzhin bde
84a5(rgyud): gnas thob gyur te// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni ji lta bzhin// ma 'ongs byang chub mngon par sgrub par shog/ gser 'od 'gyod tshangs bgyis pa'i bsod nams 'dis// sdug bsngal rgya
84a6(rgyud): mtsho gtan bskams sdig bral nas// las kyi sgrib dang nyon mongs nyer zhi ste// bdag gis rnam dag 'bras bu myur thob shog/ bsod nams ye shes rgya mtsho tshad med cing // rnam dag dri
84a7(rgyud): bral zab pas gting ma mchis// bdag gis yon tan rgya mtsho 'di thob nas// bla med byang chub chen po myur 'grub shog/ gser 'od 'gyod tshangs bgyis pa 'di yi mthus// bsod nams
84b1(rgyud): rnam dag 'ong zer 'thob par shog/ rnam dag 'od zer dam pa thob nas kyang // shes rab 'od kyis thams cad gsal bgyid shog/ bdag gi lus 'ongasangs nas brdungs 'byung zhing /
84b2(rgyud): bsod nams ye shes dag kyang de bzhin shog/ 'jig rten kun tu gcig pu gtsor rjod cing // gzi brjid mthu stobs rang dbang bla med shog/ zag bcas sdug bsngal rgya tsho 'das par 'on/
84b3(rgyud): 'dus ma byas kyi bde mtsho rtag bgrod shog/ da ltar bsod nams mtsho ni rtag 'phel shog/ ma 'ongs ye shes rgya mtsho yongs rdzogs shog/ bdag gi zhing na khams gsum yongs 'das
84b4(rgyud): nas// khyad 'phags yon tan tshad med mtha' med shog/ rkyen dang ldan rnams lhan cig skyes gyur nas// thams cad rnam dag ye shes myur grub shog/ mdzes pa'i tog khyod shes par
84b5(rgyud): byos// rgyal po gser klu bdag po yis// smon lam de 'dra gang btab pa// de ni khyod bdag nyid yin no// gser klu gser 'od ces bya ba// sngon gyi khye'u gnyis po ni// dngul tog dngul
84b6(rgyud): mtshan nyid yin te// nga las lung bstan thob pa yin// 'khor mang de skad thos pa na// thams cad byang chub sems bskyed de// da ltar ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe// 'gyod tshangs 'di spyod smon lam
84b7(rgyud): btab// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ pad+ma lta bu'i dpes bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom
85a1(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i nang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab gnas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu gser rgyal zhes bya ba'i
85a2(rgyud): gzungs yod de/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mngon sum du mthong zhing / bkur sti dang
85a3(rgyud): mchod pa byed 'dod pas gzungs 'di yongs su gzung bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs 'di ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum yin/
85a4(rgyud): pas so// de lta bas na gzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni bsod nams chen po dang ldan zhing / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
85a5(rgyud): pa yin pas/ deng yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba yin no// tshul khrims yongs su dag pa mi zhig mi nyams shing thogs pa med pa dang / gdon mi za bar chos zab mo'i sgor 'jug
85a6(rgyud): par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags sgrub pa'i cho ga bka' stsal pa/ sngar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod de/ sems su
85a7(rgyud): gcig tu gus pas phyag byas nas/ de'i 'og tu sngags 'don par bya'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
85b1(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mi 'khrus
85b2(rgyud): ba la phyag 'tshal lo// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin po che'i tog lnga phyag 'tshal lo// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas lnga'i rdzam+b+ha
85b3(rgyud): rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// steng phyogs kyi sangs rgyas yangs pa'i yon tan mang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'og phyogs kyi sangs rgyas yon tan snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin
85b4(rgyud): chen snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kun tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas spos brtsegs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs
85b5(rgyud): rgyas rnam par rgyal ba'i pad+ma la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas mnyam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug pud la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin chen bla ma la
85b6(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin chen 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas spobs rab dgongs la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas
85b7(rgyud): rnam dag zla ba'i 'od zer mtshan grags rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas me tog bkod pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas sdang ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas
86a1(rgyud): legs 'od dri med grags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rtog pa 'jigs med dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba'i thag+h+ra/
86a2(rgyud): pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo//
86a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems
86a4(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu
86a5(rgyud): bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa la phyag 'tshal
86a6(rgyud): lo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// gzungs ni 'di lta
86a7(rgyud): sten mo rat+na tra yA ya/ tad+ya thA/ kur+b+he kut+te/ ku tsa le ku tsa le/ id+hi mi tre swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rab gnas la bka' stsal pa/ gzungs 'di ni dus gsum/
86b1(rgyud): gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum yin pas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med dpag tu med pa
86b2(rgyud): rab tu skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di nyid sangs rgyas grangs med pa snyed la mchod cing rim gro byed pa dang / gus pas bla mar byed pa dang / bsngags pa rjod par byed pa yin pas/ 'di ltar sangs
86b3(rgyud): rgyas mang po rnams kyis kyang gang zag de la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro// rab gnas gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed
86b4(rgyud): nang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du gos dang / zas dang / nor dang / rin po che dang / mang du thos pa dang / shes rab rno ba dang / nad med cing tshe ring ba dang / bsod nams mang po 'thob par 'gyur
86b5(rgyud): bas ji ltar mos pa rnams yid bzhin du mi 'grub pa gang yang med par 'gyur ro// rab gnas gzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ bla na med pa'i byang chub ma thob kyi bar
86b6(rgyud): du rtag par byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi grong khyer gyi ri dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang //
86b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ma ha bing ga la sogs pa dang lhan cig gnas par 'gyur bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su srung zhing yongs su
87a1(rgyud): srung bar 'gyur ro// rab gnas 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ sngags 'di yongs su 'dzin pa'i tshe/ cho ga 'di ltar bsgrub par bya'o// sngags lan khri rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas te
87a2(rgyud): bsnyen pa'i cho ga bya'o// de nas khang pa dben pa'i nang du dkyil 'khor brgyan nas/ zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes gcig la khrus yongs su dag par byas te/ gos gsar pa bgos nas spos bsregs me
87a3(rgyud): tog gtor te/ bza' ba dang btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs te/ thog ma kho nar sngar gong du bstan pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnam/
87a4(rgyud): kyi mtshan nas brjod de/ sems rtse gcig tu gus pas phyag byas nas sngar byas pa'i sdig pa rnams bshags te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas sngar bstan pa'i gzungs sngags/
87a5(rgyud): lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ lus drang por bsrang nas yid la bya zhing smon lam rjes su dran par bya'o// nyi ma ma shar bar dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zas gtsang ma nag po bza' bar bya zhing nyin gcig la
87a6(rgyud): zas gcig bza' bar bya'o// zhag bco lnga tshang nas dkyil 'khor nas 'byung bar byed na/ gang zag de bsod nams dang gzi byin mthu stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur bas/
87a7(rgyud): rang ci smon pa mi 'grub pa gang yang med par 'gyur ro// gal te yid bzhin du 'grub par ma gyur na/ yang dkyil 'khor gyi nang du 'jug par bya zhing / bsam pa bzhin du 'grub nas kyang rtag par/
87b1(rgyud): ming la bya zhing brjed par mi bya'o// gser 'ong dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ gser rgyal gyi gzungs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom
87b2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags de bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / lha dang / mi dang / 'khor mang po rnams la phan gdags shing / de kho na nyid kyi ngo/
87b3(rgyud): dam pa shin tu zab pa khong du chung bar mdzad par bzhed pa'i phyir/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yang bstan pa'i ched du migs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nga yis mdo sde zab mo gzhan dag las/ yang /
87b4(rgyud): ngag stong pa nyid dam chos bshad kyang // deng 'dir mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di las kyang // stong nyid bsam gyis mi khyab mdo tsam bshad// zab mo'i chos ni rgya cher mang po le// sems can shes med
87b5(rgyud): rig par mi nus pas// de'i phyir ngas 'dir bzlas te bstan pas na// stong pa'i chos ni rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// thugs rje chen pos sems can brtse ba'i phyir// shin tu thabs mkhas rgyu rkyen
87b6(rgyud): mchog dag gis// ngas de pa 'khor 'dus chen po 'di nang du// bstan pas de dag stong don gsal rtogs 'gyur// lus 'di grong stong 'dra bar shes bya te// rkun po drug gnas phan tshun yod mi shes
87b7(rgyud): yul drug rkun po tha dad dbang po gnas// so sor phan tshun ma shes de bzhin no// mig gi dbang po rtag par gzugs la lha// rna ba'i dbang po sgra nyan rgyun mi 'chad// sna yi dbang pos rgyun du dri yul
88a1(rgyud): sdom// lde yi dbang pos rtag par ro zhim myong // lus kyi dbang pos yang 'jam reg bya len// yid kyi dbang pos chos rig skyon mi shes// dbang po 'di drug dngos po'i rjes
88a2(rgyud): 'brang bas// so so'i rang yul dag la rtog pa skyed// rnam shes sgyu sprul 'dra bas yang dag min// dbang pos gnas nas mi dben 'dod pas 'tshol// dper na mi zhig grong stong rgyug pa ltar//
88a3(rgyud): rnam shes drug po dbang gnas de bzhin no// sems ni kun 'tsho la gnas kyi rjes su 'jug/ dbang rten yul dmigs dngos pos rnam rig pa// rtag par gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sred// chos la/
88a4(rgyud): spyod pas skad cig tsam mi gnas// rkyen ni ji bzhin dbang drug kun rgyug pas// mkha' la bya 'phur thogs pa med pa 'dra// dbang po rten byed de la bltos nas ni// phyi rol yul ni rnam par rig par
88a5(rgyud): nus// lus 'di shes med byed pa po yang med// rang bzhin me rten rkyen la bltos nas grub// yang dag ma yin rnam rtog las skyes pas// 'khrul 'khor bzhin du las kyi dbang gis 'jugs chu me
88a6(rgyud): rlung lhan cig lus bsgrubs pas// rgyu rkyen ji bzhin tha dad 'bras bu 'thob// lhan cig gnas kyang phan tshun gnod byed pas// sbrul gdug bzhi po gzeb gcig gnas pa 'dra// 'byung chen sbrul bzhi//
88a7(rgyud): rang bzhin tha dad pas// lhan cig gnas kyang mtho dang dma' ba yod// steng 'og 'gro zhing lus ni kun tu khyab// 'di dag mthar ni zad pa'i chos su 'gro// sbrul gdug rnam pa bzhi po de dag las/
88b1(rgyud): sa chu sbrul gnyis phal cher thur du 'bying // me rlung sbrul gnyis rang bzhin yang bas na// mi mthun 'di dbang nang mang skye bar 'gyur// sems dang rnam shes lus 'di gnas nas ni// dge sdig
88b2(rgyud): las ni sna tshogs byed pas na// lha mi ngan 'gro gsum du song nas ni// lus stobs ji bzhin lus ni len par byed// nang dang phrad nas lus ni shi ba'i 'og/ bshang gci mi gtsang thams cad kun tu
88b3(rgyud): sna / rul rgyags 'bras brtsegs blta bar yong mi mos// kadur khrod bor nas shing rul 'dra bar 'gyur// khyod kyis chos rnams de ltar lta bar byos// ci phyir bdag dang sems can yod par 'dzin/
88b4(rgyud): chos rnams thams cad zad par mi rtag ste// thams cad ma rig rkyen gyi mthu las byung // 'byung chen de dag yang dag min pas na// yang dag yod min rang bzhin skye med pas// de phyir 'byung chen
88b5(rgyud): ngo bo stong par bshad// 'di dag stong zhing yang dag min rig byos// ma rig rang bzhin bzod pa nyid kyis med// rkyen mang mthu ltos tshogs las yod pa min// dus rnams kun tu yang dag blos
88b6(rgyud): stong pas// de phyir nga yis ma rig yin par bshad// 'du byed rnam shes rkyen byas ming gzugs yod// skye mched drug dang reg tshor rjes su skye// sred len sring skye rga shi bskyed pas na// mya ngan skye
88b7(rgyud): sngags 'khrug pa rjes su 'brang // sdug bsngal sna tshogs las ngan rtag dkris gzir// 'khor bar 'khor ba dag la tshad dus med// rang bzhin yod min ngo bo nyid stong yang // tshul bzhin ma yin rnam
89a1(rgyud): par rtog pa bskyed// pa yis nyon mongs thams cad rab spangs nas// rtag par yang dag ye shes mngon rgyu bas// lnga phung khang khyim thams cad stong rtogs nas// byang chub
89a2(rgyud): yang dag gnas ni btsal ba yin// nga yis bdud rtsi grong chen sgo phye nas// gya nom bdud rtsi snod ni bstan pa yin// yang dag bdud rtsi ro ni brnyes nas kyang // rtag par bdud rtsi skye dgu sbyin pa btang //
89a3(rgyud): nga ni chos kyi rnga chen dam pa brdungs// ngas ni chos kyi dung chen mchog kyang bus// ngas ni chos kyi sgron chen rab kyang spar// ngas ni chos kyi char chen dam pa phab// nyon mongs dgra rnams rab tu pham
89a4(rgyud): byas te// bla med chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng // 'khor ba'i mtsho las skye dgu rmongs pa bzlas// nga yis ngan 'gro gsum gyi sgo yang bcad// nyon mongs 'bar mes sems can rab bsregs te//
89a5(rgyud): mgon dang skyabs byed med pa dag la ni// rab bsil bdud rtsis de dag tshim byas nas// lus dang sems kyi gdung ba zhi bar byas// de nas ngas ni bskal pa tshad med snyed// de bzhin gshegs
89a6(rgyud): rnams la gus mchod byas// tshul khrims rab bsrungs byang chub gzhol nas ni// chos sku bde ba'i gnas ni btsal ba yin// gzhan la mig dang rkang lag rna ba dang // bu dang chung ma bran ba tag
89a7(rgyud): 'phangs pa med// nor dang rin chen bdun gyi rgyan 'phreng dag/ slong ba dag la thams cad yongs su btang // bzod sogs pha rol phyin pa kun bsgoms pas// sa bcu yongs rdzogs yang dag
89b1(rgyud): mngon sangs rgyas// de phyir nga ni thams cad mkhyen brjod kyang // sems can gang yang gzhal bar nus pa med// gal te stong gsum stong chen 'jig rten khams// sa chen 'di las skyes pa'i/
89b2(rgyud): dngos rnams dang // nags tshal ljon shing sA lu til rnams dang // 'od ma la sogs yal ga dzaM snyed pa// 'di la sogs pa'i dngos po bcad gtungs te// thams cad rdul phran phye mar byas pa
89b3(rgyud): dang gang nas bsdus spungs tshad ni shes dka' dang // de bzhin nam mkha'i khams ni gang ba yi// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams dag ni thams cad ni// stong gsum stong chen 'jig rten ji snyed pa'i// sa
