118a1(rgyud): spel bar 'gyur// stong chen 'jig rten khams ni 'di dag tu// sems can rnam pa thams cad ji snyed pa// yi dgas dud 'gro sems can dmyal ba yi// sdug bsngam/
118a2(rgyud): 'gro ba de kun sel bar byed// 'dzam gling 'di gnas pa yi rgyal po dang // gzhan yang sems can rnam pa thams cad kun// mdo sde mthu yis rtag tu rab dga' zhing // nad med sdug bsngal
118a3(rgyud): bsal bas chom rkun med// yul der mdo sde rgya cher spel ba'i phyir// rab bde lo legs mi mthun gnod pa med// gang zhig mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di mnyan nas// cho rigs btsun zhing nor na gnyer ba
118a4(rgyud): dang / yul na lo legs rtsod pa med 'dod na// sems la bsams bzhin thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// pha rol dgra rnams phyir ni zlog byed cing // rang gi yul khams rtag tu bde bar 'gyur// mdo
118a5(rgyud): sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di yi mthus// sdug bsngal mang po mya ngan 'jigs med// rin chen shing rgyal khyim na gang gnas pa// bde ba'i yo byad thams cad skyed pa ltar// mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa'ang
118a6(rgyud): de bzhin te// mi'i rgyal po dag la yon tan mchog sbyin byed// dper na rab dang chu ni grang mo yis// skosgom pa'i gdung ba rnams ni sel ba ltar// mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa'ang de bzhin te// bsod nam/
118a7(rgyud): mos pa'i sems ni yongs rdzogs byed// mi zhig gya nom rin chen gzeb bdog na// longs spyod sems la bsams bzhin 'byor pa ltar// mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa'ang de bzhin te// bsod nams bsam
118b1(rgyud): bzhin 'grub pas rgud pa med// lha yi bdag po khyod dang lha tshogs kyis// mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di la mchod par gyis// gal te bstan bzhin mdo sde 'dzin byed na// shes rab gzi byin phun sum tshogs
118b2(rgyud): par 'gyur// da ltar phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun// mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni srung dgongs pa// klog 'dod 'dzin pa dag ni gzigs gyur na// legs so ngo mtshar me zhes bsngags par
118b3(rgyud): gyur// gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni nyan byed na// lus dang sems ni dga' rangs mgu ba skye// rtag par gnod sbyin brgya phrag mang po yis// gang du gnas pa der ni der srung byed// 'jig rten khams 'di'i lha
118b4(rgyud): ni mang po rnams// de yi grangs ni tshad med bsam mi khyab// thams cad mdo sde'i dbang po 'di mnyan pas// rab dga' srung byed nur ba ci yang med// gang zhig mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di mnyan na// mthu che
118b5(rgyud): rab dpa' rtag par dbang dang ldan// mi yi 'khor mang thams cad phan 'dogs pas// gnod pa rab spong snang ba 'phel bar byed// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis tshogs su gcad pa 'di dag
118b6(rgyud): thos nas dga' mgu rangs par gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni// sngon chad nam yang mdo sde zab mo shin tu gya nom pa 'di lta bu ma thos/
118b7(rgyud): so zhes rab tu dga' ba'i shugs kyis mchi ma blags te ngus nas/ lus kyi yan lag 'dar zhing g.yo bar gyur te/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po bsam gyis mi khyab pa mngon du gyur pas/ lha'i
119a1(rgyud): me tog man da ra ba dang man da ra ba chen po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i mchod pa byas nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
119a2(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi la so so nas/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya mchis pas/ rtag par gnas de dang de dag tu mdo sde 'di dang / chos smra ba de dag yod/
119a3(rgyud): su bsrung zhing yongs su skyob par byed pas/ ye shes kyi snang bas yongs su skyob par bgyid do// gal te mdo sde 'di'i tshig dang don bskyud pa zhig mchis na'ang bdag cag gis de dag rjes su dran zhing mi
119a4(rgyud): bskyed par bgyid pa'i slad du/ gzungs kyi sgo shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa sprul nas yongs su rtogs par bgyid do// gzhan yang mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di gang du gnas pa der sems can rnams
119a5(rgyud): la rgya cher 'phel zhing myur du nub par mi 'gyur bar bgyid lags so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i nang du chos 'di bstan pa na/ sems can tshad med pa snyed shes rab chen po'i spobs
119a6(rgyud): pa thob nas/ bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa snyed yongs su bsdus te/ mya ngan gyi gnod pa dang bral nas/ rab tu dga' ba'i sems thob par gyur pas/ bstan bcos sna tshogs la rab tu mkhas pa
119a7(rgyud): dngad/ nges par 'byung ba'i lam thob nas/ phyir mi ldog par gyur pas myur du byang chub mngon par rtogs par gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po chen ma
119b1(rgyud): bzhi po dag gis yul srung ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po'i mdo bam po bdun pa/
119b2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu chos kyi rnam grangs mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
119b3(rgyud): kyis mngon par 'grub par bya ba'i chos 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mar gyur pa yin no zhes bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan
119b4(rgyud): 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs zhes bgyi ba gang gi tshig dang don gang zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs zhes bgyi ba ni phyogs dang gnas
119b5(rgyud): ma lags pa/ phyogs dang gnas ma lags pa'ang ma lags so zhes de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod theg pa chen po la
119b6(rgyud): yang dag par gzhol zhing / theg pa chen po la mngon par yid ches nas/ theg pa chen po la bla mar byas pa legs so legs so// khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin du gzungs zhes bya ba ni phyogs dang gnas
119b7(rgyud): yod pa'ang ma yin/ phyogs dang gnas med pa'ang ma yin/ chos kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa'ang ma yin/ 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin/ dngos po'ang ma yin/
120a1(rgyud): dngos po ma yin pa'ang ma yin/ rkyen yang ma yin/ rkyen ma yin pa'ang ma yin/ 'du byed kyang ma yin/ 'du byed ma yin pa'ang ma yin/ chos skye bar 'gyur ba'ang med/ chos
120a2(rgyud): 'gag par 'gyur ba'ang med mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdags pa'i phyir de skad du bstan pa yin te/ gzungs 'di'i yon tan gyi nus pa dang / yang dag par lam gyi tshul
120a3(rgyud): dang / mthu stobs rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi bslab pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi gas
120a4(rgyud): ba'i dgongs pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba'i 'byung gnas yin pa'i phyir/ mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs mchog gya nom pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs shes par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa
120a5(rgyud): dang bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pas bdag la gzungs 'di'i cho ga gang lags pa bkas bshad du gsol/
120a6(rgyud): gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di la gnas par gyur na/ bla na ma mchis pa'i byang chub las ldog par mi 'gyur zhing / yang dag pa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs nas gnas pa ma mchis pa dang /
120a7(rgyud): rang bzhin gyis spobs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po thob nas/ 'phags pa'i lam la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di dag thams cad kyang gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ba'i slad
120b1(rgyud): du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu legs so legs so// de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis gzungs 'dzi
120b2(rgyud): thos par gyur na/ gang zag de ni sangs rgyas dang tha dad pa med par rig par bya'o// gang la la zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' de la mchod cing bkur sti byed pa dang / bla mar byed cing yo byad sbyin par byed/
120b3(rgyud): naHde ni sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa byas pa yin par rig par bya'o// shA ri'i bu gang zag gang la la zhig gzungs 'di thos nas len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang /
120b4(rgyud): mngon par yid ches par bgyid pa de la 'di ltar sangs rgyas dang tha dad pa med par bkur sti byas nas/ mchod cing rim gro byas nas rgyu dang rkyen des bla na med pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom
120b5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags bka' stsal pa/ tad+ya thA/ san d+hA ra Ni/ a ba d+hA ra NI/ su saM pra tiSh+Thi te/ su nA ma/ su pra tiSh+Thi ta/ bi dza ya ba la/ sa t+ya pra ti dzA/ pa ri ti shiny+dza/ su a ro ha/ dz+nyA ra/
120b6(rgyud): pra ti/ u ba d+hA ne/ a ba nA ma Ni/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa ni/ a b+hi byA ha re/ shu b+ha ba ti/ su ni shr-i ta ba hu/ gr-i b+ha/ a d+hi bA da swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu mngon par zhen pa med/
120b7(rgyud): pa'i gzungs kyi tshig 'di la/ byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig rab tu gnas nas yang dag par 'dzin par byed na/ gang zag de ni bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam
121a1(rgyud): bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du yang dag pa'i smon lam bskyed pa mthar thug pa med cing / ral gri dang / dbyig pa dang / dug dang / chu dang / me dang / gcan gzan ma rungs pa
121a2(rgyud): rnams kyis de'i lus la gnod pa byed mi nus par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi lum dang / da ltar bzhugs
121a3(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum yin pas so// shA ri'i bu gang la la zhig gis grangs med pa bcu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/ de
121a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phul nas/ bskal pa grangs med pa'i bar du na bza' dang zhal zas mchog dam pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byed pa bas/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di
121a5(rgyud): la ni tha na tshig gcig tsam yang dag par bzung ba las byung ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa de ches mang du mang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs shin tu zab pa'i
121a6(rgyud): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yum yin pa'i phyir ro// de'i tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / 'khor mang po rnams de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nas/ thams cad rab tu
121a7(rgyud): dga' bar gyur pas/ thams cad kyis yongs su 'dzin par gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs kyi le'u ste bcu
121b1(rgyud): gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i nang du/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par bya ste/ yid
121b2(rgyud): bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che zhes bya ba'i gzungs gnod pa thams cad ring du spong ba/ 'brug dang glog ma rungs pa thams cad 'gog cing 'jil bar byed pa yod de/ de ni 'das pa'i de bzhin gshes
121b3(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gzungs pa yin pas/ ngas kyang deng mdo sde 'dir lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang / 'jig rten la brtse ba dang / thams cad/
121b4(rgyud): yongs su bsrungs nas bde ba 'thob par bya ba'i phyir 'khor mang po khyed la yang dag par bstan par bya'o// de nas 'khor mang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
121b5(rgyud): sprul pa thos pa dang / so so nas sems rtse gcig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas rigs sngags mnyan par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed cag legs
121b6(rgyud): par nyon cig/ 'di nas shar phyogs na glog 'od snang ba'i rgyal po a ga ta zhes bya ba dang / lho phyogs na glog 'od snang ba'i rgyal po sha te ru zhes bya ba dang / nub phyogs na glog 'od snang
121b7(rgyud): ba'i rgyal po tsu ta kwang zhes bya ba dang / byang phyogs na glog 'od snang ba'i rgyal po su ta mi ni zhes bya ba so so nas yod de/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis glog gi rgyal
122a1(rgyud): po 'di das gi ming thos gang phyogs shes par gyur/ klung shA 'jigs gleng sgrub pa dngos po thams cad dang bral bar 'gyu 'd-i/ gzung bya dang pa
122a2(rgyud): cad rab tu'i bar 'gyur ro// gal te gang du gnas pa'i gnas der phyogs bzhi'i glog gi rgyal po 'di dag gi ming yi ger bris par gyur na/ gang du gnas pa'i gnas de dag tu 'brug dang
122a3(rgyud): thog gi 'jigs pa med cing / gdon bgegs dang gnod pa'i sgrib pa med par 'gyur/ dus ma yin par blo bur du 'chi ba thams cad thag ring du spong bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcod ldan
122a4(rgyud): 'das kyis gzungs sngags bka' stsal pa/ tad+ya thA/ ni mi ni mi ni mi/ ni mi wen dra trai lo kya/ lo ki sha ni ro sha la ni/ ha rak+Sha ha rak+Sha/ bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba'i gnas 'dir 'jig
122a5(rgyud): shing skrag pa thams cad dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba dang / 'brug dang / glog dang / thog 'bab pa dang / glo bur du 'chi bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig smra
122a6(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug 'khor mang po'i nang du 'dug pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ dus ma
122a7(rgyud): gtsugs nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dang lha dang mi rnams la sman par bgyi ba dang / 'jig rten la brtse ba dang / thams
122b1(rgyud): cad yongs su bsrungs nas bde ba 'thob par bgyi ba dang / mthu chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'i smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyi ba'i ched du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yid
122b2(rgyud): bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gzungs gang lags pa mdo tsam zhig bstan par bgyi'o// de nas gzungs sngags smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ ka Te/ be ka Te/ ni ka Te/ prA t+yad+h+wi ke/ pra ti ma~M tI/ shud+d+ha
122b3(rgyud): muk+She bi ma le/ pra b+hU swa re/ ar+d+ha ri/ paN+Da ri/ shwe te/ partA ra/ bA si ni/ ha ri/ kar+d+hA ri/ ka pi ri/ ping ga la ak+Shau/ da d+hi mu khi/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gnas
122b4(rgyud): 'dir 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad dang sdug bsngal gyi 'tshe ba nas/ glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ bdag gis sdig pa'i dngos po ngan pa thams cad mi mthong/
122b5(rgyud): zhing rtag par byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs rje chen pos byin gyi rlabs kyis dgongs shing yongs su srung bar gyur cig swA hA/ de nas byang chub sems
122b6(rgyud): dpa' lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag po stan las langs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dang lha dang mi rnams la sman
122b7(rgyud): pa cher bgyi ba dang / 'jig rten la brtse ba dang / thams cad yongs su bsrungs nas gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pa dang / smon pa rnams yid bzhin 'grub par bgyi ba'i slad du mi 'pham pa
123a1(rgyud): zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad par bgyi'o// de nas gzungs sngags smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ mu ni mu ni mu ni na/ d+ha re/ ma ti ma ti/ su ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ ha ha ha ha/ many+dzu
123a2(rgyud): na ti ti pA pa/ badz+ra pA Ni/ a haM tsi ri tsa swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gzungs sngags 'di ni mi 'pham par srung ba zhes bgyi ste/ skyes pa 'am bud med gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig/
123a3(rgyud): tu yang dag par gzung ste yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / mi bskyud cing rjes su dran par bgyid na/ bdag gdugs mtshan du de la yongs su srung bar bgyid pas/ 'jig
123a4(rgyud): shing skrag pa thams cad nas/ glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar thams cad thag ring du spong bar 'gyur lags so// de nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po stan las
123a5(rgyud): langs te gus pas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la'ang shin tu gya nom pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi gzungs lha dang mi rnams
123a6(rgyud): la rgya cher phan 'dogs pa 'jig rten la rab tu brtse ba/ thams cad yongs su srung bar bgyid pa dang / gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pa/ smon pa yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyid pa
123a7(rgyud): mchis te/ gzungs sngags de bshad par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ d+hi li swAhA/ bra h+ma pu re swA hA/ brah+ma swa ra swA hA/ brah+ma b+hi su garbe/ puSh+pa sad sid d+ha re swA hA/ bcom ldan
123b1(rgyud): 'das bdag gi gzungs sngags 'di ni tshangs pa'i chad pas bcad pa zhes bgyi ste/ gzungs 'di 'dzin pa dag la yongs su srung bar bgyid pas/ mya ngan gyi gnod pa dang sdig pa'i
123b2(rgyud): las rnams thag ring du spong zhing / glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar chad thams cad kyang yongs su spong bar bgyid do// de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po stan las langs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/
123b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la'ang badz+ra sha ni zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs rigs sngags chen mo 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / gdon bgegs thams cad rab/
123b4(rgyud): tu sel ba dang / blo bur du 'chi ba'i bar chad thams cad thag ring du spong ba/ sdug bsngal dang bral nas bde ba stsol ba dang mi rnams la sman par bgyid pa mchis te/ gzungs de bshad par
123b5(rgyud): bya'o// tad+ya thA/ bi ni ba ra Ni ban d+ham daN De/ ma Ni ne ti ni gau ri/ gan d+ha ri/ tsaN+Da li/ ma tang gi/ puk+ka si/ sa ra pra b+he/ hi ni ma t+yota ta ma/ uta ta ra Ni/ mo ha ra Ni/ d+hA ra Ni ge/
123b6(rgyud): tsakra bA keka sha ba ri sha ba ri/ swA hA/ de nas lha'i rgyal po rnam thos dang / lha'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung dang / lha'i rgyal po 'phags skyes po dang / lha'i rgyal po mig mi bza
123b7(rgyud): cig car stan las langs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la'ang sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs
124a1(rgyud): pa sbyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs/ sdug bsngal gyi nyon mongs pa las rtag par yongs su bskyabs nas bde ba thob par bgyid bya/ tshe 'phel bar bgyid cing nad kyi
124a2(rgyud): sdug bsngal ma mchis par bgyid pa/ glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar chad thams cad thag ring du spong bar bgyid pa mchis te/ gzungs sngags de brjod par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ puSh+pe/ su puSh+pe/ du
124a3(rgyud): bai ri ha re/ Ar+ya ba'i sha sid+d+he/ shwan+te/ nir mun+te/ maM ga l+ye/ hi rid+h+ya gar+Ne/ su ru te/ sid d+ha bi te swA hA/ de nas yang klu'i rgyal po chen po mang po 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po rA ga si dang /
124a4(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po klogs 'og dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dris pa dang / klu'i rgyal po glog lce dang / klu'i rgyal po gya nom 'od la sogs pa stan las langs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan
124a5(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la'ang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs/ glog ma rungs pa 'gog par bgyid pa/ 'jigs shing skrag pa/
124a6(rgyud): rnams rab tu sel ba/ lha dang mi rnams la rgya cher phan 'dogs pa/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa/ gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pa/ smon pa rnams yid bzhin du
124a7(rgyud): 'grub pa/ glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar thams cad thag ring du spong ba/ dug thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ byang snyems dang / sngags dang / bkra mi shes pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su sel/
124b1(rgyud): bar bgyid pa mchis te/ bdag cag gzungs sngags 'di bcom ldan 'das la 'bul na/ thugs rjes thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ bdag cag klu'i 'gro ba 'di dang bral nas/ ser sna'i 'dod pa
124b2(rgyud): gtan du spang ba'i slad du bzhes su gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ser sna'i 'dod pa 'di'i dbang gis 'khor ba na sdug bsngal mang po myong bar gyur pas/ bdag cag ser sna'i 'dod pa'i sa bon
124b3(rgyud): yongs su bcad par 'tshal lags so// de nas gzungs sngags spras pa/ tad+ya thA/ a tsA le/ a ma le/ a mr-i te/ a k+Sha ye/ a b+ha ye/ puN+ya bi d+ya ba te/ sarba pA pa/ pra sha ma Na ye swA hA/
124b4(rgyud): a li ye/ ban du/ su bar+t+ti ye swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rigs sngags 'di g.yar kha nas brjod par bgyid dam/ yi ger bris te glegs bam
124b5(rgyud): du bgyis nas 'chang zhing 'dzin par bgyid dam/ klog cing 'don par bgyid dam/ gus pas mchod par bgyid na/ 'brug dang / glog dang / thog thog mi 'bab cing / skrag pa dang / 'jigs
124b6(rgyud): pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs pa dang / mya ngan dang / nad dang / blo bur du 'chi ba'i bar thams cad thag ring du spong bar 'gyur/ byang stems dang / mi la gnod pa bgyid pa'i stag dang
124b7(rgyud): seng ge dang / sbyang ki dang / sbrul gdug pa rnams dang / sbrang ma dang / sbrang ma mchu rings la sogs pas kyang gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor
125a1(rgyud): mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so// gzungs sngags 'di dag thams cad mthu chen po dang ldan pas sems can gyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du se/
125a2(rgyud): la bsams pa'i dngos po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed/ rgya cher phan 'dogs par byed do// sems rtse gcig tu ma byas pa ni ma gtogs te/ khyed cag the tshom ma za zhig/ de nas 'khor
125a3(rgyud): mang po rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' sprul pa thos pa dang / rab tu dga' bas mngon par yid ches par gyur nas/ bka' yang dag par gzung bar gyur to// gser 'ong
125a4(rgyud): dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gzungs kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mo
125a5(rgyud): 'khor mang po stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba'i mkhan po gapal
125a6(rgyud): la zhig/ gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di yang dag par ston par bgyid na/ bdag gis shes rab 'phel bar bgyis nas/ rgyan dang ldan pa'i tshig gi spobs pa
125a7(rgyud): phun sum tshogs par bgyid do// gal te chos smra ba'i mkhan po de mdo sde 'di las tshig 'bru dang / yi ge dang / tshig gi don bskyud pa bzhin mchis na'ang / thams cad dran bzhin legs par khong
125b1(rgyud): du rung bar bgyis nas/ gzungs kyi kun 'dzin thogs pa ma mchis pa stsal bar bgyid do// gzhan yang gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di sems can gang dag sangs
125b2(rgyud): rgyas brgya stong dus las dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed nas/ yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa de dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher spel nas/ byung du nub par mi 'gyur zhi / sems can tshad ma mchis paskyed
125b3(rgyud): mdo sde 'di thos pa'i dbang gis thams cad shin tu myur ba'i spobs pa dang / bsam pa ma mchis pa'i shes rab chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob nas/ bstan bcos sna tshogs sku rtsa rnams la rab tu
125b4(rgyud): mkhas pa dang / 'khor ba las myur du nges par byung nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyid do// tshe 'di nyid la'ang tshe 'phel zhing 'tsho ba'i yo
125b5(rgyud): byad rnams phun sum tshogs par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mdo sde 'dzin pa'i chos kyi mkhan po de dag dang / sems can gzhan yang mdo sde 'di mnyan par mos pa de dag gi ched du sman
125b6(rgyud): rnams sngags kyis btab nas khrus bgyi ba'i cho ga bshad par 'tshal te/ des de dag la gza' ma rungs pa ltas ngan ston pa ci mchis pa dang / dang po btsas pa'i skar ma dang / phan tshun mi mthun
125b7(rgyud): par gyur pa dang / nad kyi sdug bsngal dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / gdon bgegs dang / byang stems dang / dug dang / ngan du bgyis pa dang //
126a1(rgyud): sngags dang / ro langs dang / 'di la bu la sogs pa'i sdig pa rnams kyi sgrib pa dang / bgegs bgyid pa thams cad yongs su bsal nas/ rab tu zhi bar bgying bas blo dang /
126a2(rgyud): ldan pa rnams kyis khrus kyi cho ga 'di ltar bgyi ste/ des sman spos kyi ro dang ldan pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di lta ste/ shu dag gi wang dang ni spri ka spos// gla rtsib bla dag dang shi ri sha/ in+d+ra haH
126a3(rgyud): sha ma ka sha mi// thang chu dang ni shing tshagla sgang dang // a ka ru dang tsan dan ta ka ra// sa la ki dang gur kum ha la las// na tra smig bcud su kaM me wa dang // thang shing pa tra dang ni on shi la/
126a4(rgyud): sa la kye dang phra ba shu kul dang // yungs kar go stong na ga ge sa ra// sar tsa ra sa ru rta cha mnyam bgyi// skar ma rgyal la gcig tu btags nas ni// spos kyi phye ma de dag rab blangs te// sngags
126a5(rgyud): 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad gdub par bgyi// sngags ni 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ su tI tre/ kr-i ke kA mA ta le/ dza na ka ra te/ u kA ra te in+d+ra dz+wa li ni/ shaM ka ran te/ bA shi tsa li/ a brta kA/ kA si
126a6(rgyud): ke naHku du ku du/ khA ka bIr+ye/ kha ka bi le/ ka ba le/ ka bi la ma te/ shI la ma ti san d+hi du ra ma tre/ ba bad ka/ b+hi tsa li/ shi ri shi le sa t+ya s+thi te swA hA/ gal te chos bzhin khrus ni bgyid
126a7(rgyud): 'tshal na// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi khru brgyad pa bgyid nas// rab tu dben zhing bde ba'i gnas dag tu// don gang sgrub pa sems la dran par bgyi// ba lang lji bas dkyil 'khor byugs nas ni// steng du/
126b1(rgyud): me tog kun tu dgram par bgyid// gser dngul sdod ni shin tu gtsang ma dag/ ro mchog 'o ma sbrang rtsis dgang bar bgyi// dkyil 'khor de yi sgo bzhi dag tu yang // skyes bu bzhi zhig chos bzhin srung
126b2(rgyud): du stsal// gzhon nu bzhi zhig lus ni rab brgyan nas// so sor grwa rer chab kyi bum pa thogs// der ni rtag par gu gul bsregs nas ni// dbyangs lnga'i rol mo rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi// dkyil 'khor/
126b3(rgyud): de yi ngos bzhi dag tu yang // ba dan gdugs dang lnga ldi mdzes par bgyi// dkyil 'khor nang du me long gsal ba dang // ral gri rnon po mnga' bzhi gzhag par bgyi// dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhong
126b4(rgyud): kung ches stsal nas// 'dzeg pa'i shing leb 'di yi steng du gzhag/ snga ma'i phye ma chab dang sbyar nas ni// dkyil 'khor de yi nang du gzhag par bgyi// de ltar bkram zhing rnam par gzhag nas ni//
126b5(rgyud): de nas sngags bzlas dkyil 'khor mtshams gcad bgyi// mtshams bcad pa'i sngags ni 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ a na ra ke na ya ni/ hi li mi li/ khi khi le swA hA/ de ltar mtshams ni rab bcad nas
126b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor nang du zhugs nas ni// nyi shu rtsa gcig chab sngags te// phyogs bzhi dag tu gtor bar bgyi// de nas spos chab dag la ni// brgya rtsa brgyad tshang sngags btab ste// ngos bzhir yol bas
126b7(rgyud): bskor nas ni// de 'og lus ni bkru bar bgyi// chab dang spos chab la gdab pa'i sngags ni/ 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ sa ga tsi bi ga tsi/ bi ga tsa ba de swA hA/ khrus bgyis lags nas/ khrus bgyis pa'i
127a1(rgyud): chab dang / dkyil 'khor gyi nang du mchod pa bgyis pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba ci mchis pa rtsang po 'am/ rdzing gi nang du dor bar bgyi zhing / gzhan ni bsdu bar bgyi'o// de ltar
127a2(rgyud): khrus bgyis lags nas/ gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dkyil 'khor nas phyir byung nas khang pa gtsang ma'i nang du zhugs te/ sngags mkhan gyis de dag yi dam rgya chen po slad du stsal nas/ sdig pa sna tshogs
127a3(rgyud): gtan du bcad cing / dge ba sna tshogs rtag par spyad nas/ sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed par bgyi ste/ rgyu dang rkyen des na yid bzhin gyi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa tshad ma mchis pa
127a4(rgyud): snyed thob par 'gyur lags so// yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ sems can gang zhig nad kyi sdug bsngal nyen// sman dpyad sna tshogs gsos kyang ma sos pa// khrus kyi go cha 'di bzhin khrus bgyis te/
127a5(rgyud): gzhan yang mdo sde 'di ni klog bton nas// gdugs mtshan rtag par sems ni mi g.yeng bar// rtse gcig gus pas dang sems bskyed bgyis nas// nad kyi sdug bsngal bas par zhi bar 'gyur// dbul
127a6(rgyud): 'phongs nor dang ldan par 'gyur// phyogs bzhi'i gza' skar nyi zla'i lha// mthu yis rab bsrungs tshe ni ring bar 'gyur// bkra shis rab bde bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur// ltas ngan gdon bgegs
127a7(rgyud): thams cad sel bar bgyi// de'i 'og tu lus srung ba'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla bar bgyi'o// sngags ni 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ sa me bi sa me/ swA hA/ sa ga te/ bi ba te swA hA/ bi ga tsa ba te
127b1(rgyud): 9/ sakar/ babu d+hAs swAH/ thAs d+ha mA trA ya sad+ha/ dri la kaN+Da sa swAH/ u ba radziH/ birgya sa swAt+ma/ hi ma pa d+has swAt+ma/ an mi la bag d+hA la swAH/ na rdzag / thaH
127b2(rgyud): na ma sa ra swA spyo/ ma hA da byaM swA hA/ sid d+h+yan+tu mAM/ man+ta pA da swA hA/ d+ha ra to/ bi tsi taM bra hA nu ma no ra/ bi to swA hA/ de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mo khrus kyi cho ga dang dkyil 'khor gyi sngags bsha
127b3(rgyud): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig
127b4(rgyud): mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang / yi ger bris nas spel ba dang / ji skad bstan pa bzhin du spyod par bgyid na/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/
127b5(rgyud): 'brog dgon pa 'am/ ri 'am/ nags tshal lam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'i gnas gang yang rung ba dag tu gnas kyang rung ste/ bdag de'i ched du 'khor rnams dang lhan cig lha'i rol mo bgyis
127b6(rgyud): nas/ de'i thad du mchis te yongs su skyob pa dang srung bar bgyis nas/ nad kyi sdug bsngal dang / skar mda' ltung ba dang / lhas ngan dang / rims nang dang / 'thab cing rtsod pa rnams sel bar bgyid//
127b7(rgyud): rgyal po'i khrims kyis bzung ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / 'dre srin ma rungs pas gnod pa dang / byang stems thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyis nas/ mdo sde 'dzin pa'i gang zag dge slong la sogs
128a1(rgyud): ga pa'i 'khor dang / nyan pa'i 'khor rnams myur du 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po las yongs su bzlas nas/ byang nuchub las bzlog par mi 'gyur bar phan 'dogs par bgyid do//
128a2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsol pa gsan pa dang / lha mo spobs pa chen mo la/ lha mo khyod kyis sems can tshad med cing mtha' med pa dag la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir ched/
128a3(rgyud): du rig sngags de dag dang / spos nus khrus bya ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yang dag par bshad pa legs so legs so zhes
128a4(rgyud): bsngags pa brjod nas/ khyod kyis mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di bsrungs nas/ myur du nub par mi 'gyur zhing / rtag par rgya cher gnas par 'gyur bar byos shig/ de nas lha mo spobs pa
128a5(rgyud): chen mos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas rang gi stan la 'dug par gyur to// de nas bram ze ko'u di n+ya chos kyi slob dpon gyis lung bstan pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi
128a6(rgyud): mthus/ 'khor mang po'i mdun du lha mo spobs pa chen mo la mngon par bstod pa/ shes gsal rab dpa' spobs pa'i lha mo khyod// lha mi'i mchod pa dag gis mchod par 'os// grags pas
128a7(rgyud): 'jig rten kun tu rgyas pas na// sems can thams cad re ba rdzogs par byed// ri rtse mthon po gnas mchog dag tu ni// rtsa bsdus khyim byas des na rab tu gnas// rgyun du rtsa 'jam 'dud nas gos/
128b1(rgyud): byas te// rtag par rkang ba la gcig bkug ste 'greng // lha 'khor mang po thams cad 'dus lpags nas// thams cad rtse gcig sems kyis khyod la bsngags// shes rab spobs pa sngar pa'i lha mo khyod/
128b2(rgyud): tshig snyan gya nom thams cad sbyin par gyis// de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mo des gsol ba btab pa mnyan nas gzungs sngags smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ ma r-I ts+yai re/ a ba dze a ba dza ba ti/ hing gu le/
128b3(rgyud): ming gu la~M/ bing ga la ba ta~M/ a ku she/ mA r-i ts+yai/ sa ma ti/ da sha ma ti/ a pra ti/ ma gri ta ra tsi/ ta ra tsa pa ta~M/ tsi r-i tsi r-i/ shi mi rau/ ma nanA d+hi/ dam khi/ mA ra~M ts+yai/ prA Na hrIr+ya/ lo
128b4(rgyud): lo ka sheSh+To/ lo ka bI re/ sid d+ha ba ra te/ b+hI ma mu khi/ shu tsi tsa ri/ a pra ti ha te/ a pra ti ha ta bud d+hi/ na mu tsi ma hA na mu tsi/ ma hA de bya/ pra ti gri ha/ na ma skA raM/ bdag gi ming brjod/ ma ma
128b5(rgyud): bud d+hi/ dra shi hi bud d+hi/ a pra ti ha ta/ b+ha ba tu/ si b+ha me/ bi shud d+ha tsi to/ shash+ma sh+lo ka/ man tra/ bi d+ya ka ka pi ya daM sho/ tad+ya thA/ ma hA pra b+ha be/ hi li mi li/ hi ma hi/ bi tsa to/ bi bud d+hi/
128b6(rgyud): bdag gi ming brjod/ ma ma bud d+hi bi shud d+hi/ b+ha ga ba t+yai ma/ de be yam/ sa ra swa sti/ kA ra ri/ kai yU ra ma ti/ hi mi li mi li/ a b+ha ya mi/ ma hA de be/ bud d+ha sa t+ye na/ d+harma sa t+ye na/ sa g+ha sa t+ye na/
128b7(rgyud): in+d+ra sa t+ye na/ ba ru Na sa t+ye na/ ye lo kye/ sa t+ya sa t+ye na/ de shaM sa t+ye na/ sad d+he bA di tsi na na/ a b+ha ha ma mi/ ma hA de bi/ hi li mi li bi tsa ra to/ bdag gi ming brjod/ ma ma bud d+he/ na mo b+ha ga ba ti
129a1(rgyud): ma hA dben sa ra sA t+ya/ sid+d+har+m+ma man+t+ra pa daM swAhA/ de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mos gzungs sngags 'di bstan nas/ bram ze de la 'di skad ces kye skyes bu chen po sems can
129a2(rgyud): rnams kyi ched du spobs pa gya nom pa dang / rin po che dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / shes rab yongs su gnyer nas/ thams cad la rgya cher phan btags te/ myur du byang chub mngon du byed par 'dod pa legs
129a3(rgyud): so legs so de ltar shes par byas nas cho ga 'di gzung bar bya'o zhes smras nas/ yang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ thog ma kho nar gzungs 'di kha ton du// byang zhing nor ba med par bklags nas ni/
129a4(rgyud): byin gyis rlob cing smon pa rdzogs bya'i phyir// dkon mchog gsum dang lha rnams skyabs 'gro zhing // sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang // rang rgyal nyan thos tshogs la gus phyag bya// de
129a5(rgyud): 'og tshangs dang brgya byin dang // 'jig rten skyong dang rgyal po chen po bzhi// rtag par tshangs par spyod pa thams cad la// rtse gcig gus pas gus par phyag byas nas// dgon pa rab tu dben pa'i gnas dag
129a6(rgyud): tu skad cher snga ma'i sngags dang cho ga 'don// sangs rgyas sku gzugs lha klu'i mdun dag tu// ji tsam 'byor pas mchod pa bsgrub par bya// sems can rnam pa de dag thams cad la// byams dang snying
129a7(rgyud): rjes brtse ba'i sems kyang bskyed// bcom ldan gser sku shin tu gya nom mtshan// g.yeng ba med sems rtse gcig dran par bya// bcom ldan yang dag chos don dgongs mdzad pas// dbang po ji bzhin
129b1(rgyud): ting 'dzin sgom la 'god// de yi tshig gi don ni legs soms la// stong pa nyid bstan rab tu sgom par gyis// bcom ldan sku gzugs dag gi spyan sngar ni// rtse gcig yang dag dran pas gnas byed na/
129b2(rgyud): gya nom ye shes ting nge 'dzin dag dang // gzungs mchog dam pa dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan gser zhal yang dag chos bstan nas// gya nom dbyangs kyis lha mi 'dul bar mdzad//
129b3(rgyud): ljags mtshan rkyen bzhin ngo mtshar rab ston pas// yangs ring stong gsum 'jig rten khyab par mdzad// bcom ldan gsung dbyangs gya nom de 'dra ba// rtse gcig dran na sems la 'jigs med
129b4(rgyud): 'thob// bcom ldan smon lam rgya chen btab pa'i dbang // ljags mtshan bsam gyis mi khyab 'di brnyes nas// chos rnams yod pa ma yin gsungs mdzad pas// dper na nam mkha'
129b5(rgyud): chags pa med pa 'dra// bcom ldan gsung dbyangs dag dang ljags mtshan rnams// dran pa nyer gzhag gzhan med smon rdzogs 'gyur// gal te lha mo spobs chen mchod mthong ngam// slob
129b6(rgyud): mas slob dpon rjes slob mthong nas ni// gsang ba'i cho ga 'di blangs sgom byed dam// bla mar byed na sems la bsam pa 'grub// gang zhig ye shes dam pa mchog 'dod na// rtse gcig sems
129b7(rgyud): kyis chos 'di gzung bar bya// bsod nams ye shes yon tan 'phel byed pas// nges par 'grub 'gyur the tshom yongs ma skyed// nor 'tshol dag ni nor mang rnyed par 'gyur// grags pa gnyer ba
130a1(rgyud): grags chen thob par 'gyur// nges 'byung 'tshol ba rnam par grol 'gyur bas// nges par 'grub 'gyur the tshom yongs ma skyed// yon tan tshad med mtha' yas ji snyed pa//
130a2(rgyud): sems la bsams bzhin yongs su sdud par byed// gal te de ltar chos bzhin spyod nus na// nges par 'grub 'gyur the tshom yongs ma skyed// gtsang ma'i gnas su gos gsar bgos nas
130a3(rgyud): nidakyil 'khor che chung ji tsam nus par bya// bum pa gtsang ma bzhi ni ro zhim dgang bar bya// me tog pog spos ci 'byor mchod par bya// lnga lji ba dan dag dang gdugs bres te// byug
130a4(rgyud): spos phye ma kun tu khyab brgyan nas// sangs rgyas lha mo spobs chen mchod byed na// lha lus mthong bar 'dod na smon bzhin 'grub// lha mo spobs chen mdun du snga ma'i sngags/
130a5(rgyud): zhag ni nyi shu rtsa gcig 'don par bya// gal te lha de mthong bar ma gyur na// rtse gcig sems kyis zhag dgu dran par bya// nam gyi cha smad 'on kyang ma mthong na// gnas gtsang dam pa gzhan
130a6(rgyud): dag btsal nas ni// lha mo spobs chen gzugs ni rab bris te// mtshang gnas bzlas brjod sems kyis mi gtang zhing // nyin mtshan le lo sems ni mi skyed na// bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs
130a7(rgyud): mthar thug med// rnam smin gang thob skye dgu sbyin byed na// smin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// gal te yid bzhin ma grub zla ba gsum// yang na drug dang dgu dang lo gcig par/
130b1(rgyud): rab brtson gsol 'debs sems ni mi g.yo na// lha yi mig dang gzhan sems shes thob 'gyur// de nas bram ze ko'u di n+yas de skad ces bstan pa thos pa dang / dga' mgu rangs shing ngo mtshar du gyur nas/
130b2(rgyud): 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces kyi khyed cag lnga dang mi'i 'khor mang po thams cad shes par byos la/ sems rtse gcig tu deng bdag gis kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i chos la brten nas/ lham spobs
130b3(rgyud): ba mchog dam pa de dag la bsngags pa brjod pa nyon cig ces smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'jig rten dag la dbang phyug thob gyur pa// lha mo mthu chen thob la gus phyag 'tshal// deng bdag ga/
130b4(rgyud): mo de la bsngags pa yang // sngon gyi drang srong ji skad bstan pa bzhin// bkra shis yongs rdzogs sems ni bde bar gnas// sems gsal ngo tsha khrel yong grags dang ldan// ma ma byas te 'jig rten rab tu
130b5(rgyud): bskyed// rab dpa' rtag par brtson 'grus chen po spyod// 'thab mo'i g.yul du rtag par rgyun du rgyal// rab dul byams sems bzod pa gsol bar byed// da ltar gshin rje'i sring mo chen mor gyur// gos
130b6(rgyud): su rtag par dar tshon sngon po gyon// sdug dang mi sdug byang bzhin kun dang ldan// mig ni mthong ba thams cad rab tu sdang // spyod mchog dam pa tshad med 'jig rten 'das// phyogs shing mngon dang mi kun yong/
130b7(rgyud): su sdud// res 'ga' ri brag zab mo dag ma gnas// res 'ga' brag phug gtsang po'i 'gram na gnas// res 'ga' ljon shing nags tshal chen por gnas// lha mo phal cher 'di dag kun tu gnas// ri dang /
131a1(rgyud): rags tshal mi rgod ji snyed pa// rtag par lha mo la ni mchod par byed// rma bya'i smos ni rgyal mtshan pa ngan byed// dus su mchog tu rtag par 'jig rten skyong // stag dang seng ge
131a2(rgyud): spyang kis rgyun du bskor// gnag lug bya la sogs pas rten yang 'cha'// dril chen bsgrags nas sgra ni phyung bas na// byi ti'i ri la sgra ni kun tu bsgrags// res 'ga' rtse gsum tri shUl thogs byed
131a3(rgyud): cing // g.yas g.yon rgyun du nyi zla ru mtshon 'dzin// zla ba nag po'i tshes dgu bcu gcig la// de yi dus su rtag par mchod pa bya// res 'ga' ba su lha chen sring mor ston// g.yul 'gyed mthong na rtag par
131a4(rgyud): snying yang brtse// sems can thams cad rnam par lta ba la/ lha mo mchog tu gyur pas bzlas pa med// res 'ga' ba rdzi bu mo dga' mor ston// lha dang 'thab tshe rtag par rgyal ba 'thog pa 'jig rten dag
131a5(rgyud): na yun ring gnas par byed// rab dul bzod dang khro gtum ston par byed// bram ze chen po rig pa'i chos bzhi dang // sgyu 'phrul sngags sogs thams cad rab tu rtogs// drang srong nang na rang dbang dag
131a6(rgyud): dang ldan// sa bon dang ni sa chen byed par nus// lha yi bu mo la sogs 'dus pa'i tshe// rgya mtsho'i rlabs ltar nges par der yang 'du// klu dang gnod sbyin mang po'i tshogs kun gyi// gtso bor gyur pas rab
131a7(rgyud): tudul bar byed// bud med nang na tshangs spyod mchog dang ldan// tshig byung dper na 'jig rten bdag po 'dra// rgyal po'i gnas na pad+ma dang yang mtshungs// chu bo'i 'gram na gnas tshe gru zam bzhin// byang bzhin
131b1(rgyud): drug mangs zlab la ba 'dra/ mang pos phun tshogs gnas dang rten yang byed// spobs pa mchog byung ri rje mthon po'ang // dran pa thams cad kun gyi gling yang byed// lha ma yin la sogs te lha tshogs rnams
131b2(rgyud): thams cad 'di yi yon tan bsngags par byed/ mig stong brgya byin lha yi dbang pos kyang // bus pa'i sems kyis lta zhing rab tu rtog/ sems can gang zhig re zhing 'tshol ba yod/ de dag thams cad myur du
131b3(rgyud): 'grub par byed// yid myur spobs dang chos 'dzin ldan byed pas// sa chen steng ma mchog tu gyur pa yin// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams ni 'di dag tu// mar me che ltar rtag par kun gsal byed/ tha na \u0f7f/
131b4(rgyud): 'dre gcan gzan dag la yang // de bas bsam bzhin thams cad rdzogs byed 'gyur// bud med rnams kyi nang na ri rtse 'dra// sngon gyi drang srong ji bzhin yun ring gnas// lha mo gzhon nu ji bzhin 'dod chags
131b5(rgyud): spangs// 'jig rten bdag po che bzhin bden tshig smra// 'jig rten yum gyi khyad par rgyan rnams dang // 'dod khams lha yi khang pa kun bltas nas// lha mo 'ba' zhig gtso mor grags pas na// sems can
131b6(rgyud): mchog tu gyur pa yongs mi snang // gal te g.yul 'gyed 'jigs pa gnas dag dang // me dong lhung ba dag ni mthong gyur tam// chu bo nyam nga chom rkun 'jigs pa'i tshe// 'jigs pa de dag thams cad sel bar/
131b7(rgyud): nus 'gal te rgyal po'i khrims kyis bcings sgrogs sam// gral te sha chags gsod par byed pa'i tshe// sems ni rtse gcig mi g.yo gnas gyur na// nges par mya ngan sdug bsngal kun las thar// dge sdig mi kun
132a1(rgyud): yongs su skyob pa na// byams dang snying rje'i brtse ba rtag sngon snang // de phyir bdag ni bsam pa rtse gcig tu// lha mo che la phyag 'tshal skyabs su mchi// de nas bram ze des sngags dang
132a2(rgyud): bsngags pa brjod pa'i tshig gis lha mo de la mngon par bstod pa/ 'jig rten gtso la gus phyag 'tshal// ma rnams nang na kun gyi mchog gyur pas// 'jig rten gsum po thams cad khyod la mchod// byad bzhin
132a3(rgyud): rab mdzes kun gyis lta bar mos// yon tan dam pa sna tshogs lus rab brgyad// mig yangs pad+ma sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra// bsod nams ye shes snang ba'i grags par rgyas// dper ma rin thang med pa'i nor bu
132a4(rgyud): mtshungs// deng bdag dam pa khyod la bsngags pas na// sems la bsams pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// yang dag yon tan bkra shis gya nom pa// pad+ma lta bu shin tu rnam par dag/ lus mdog rab mdzes
132a5(rgyud): kun gyis lta bar mos// mtshan mar ngo mtshar bsam gyis mi khyab pa// dri med ye shes 'od zer rab 'gyed pas// dran pa kun gyi nang na mchog tu gyur// ji ltar seng ge gcan gzan mchog gyur ltar// rtag par
132a6(rgyud): lag pa brgyad kyis bdag nyid brgyan// so sor mda' gzhu ral gri sta re dang // tho rings lcags kyi 'khor lo zhags pa thogs// rab mdzes lha mo zla ba nya ba 'dra/ tshig la thogs med dbyangs snyad 'byin par byed//
132a7(rgyud): sems can gang zhig sems la sngon yod na// skyes bu dam pas bsams bzhin rdzogs par byed/ brgya byin lha mang kun gyis khyod mchod nas// thams cad bsngags brjod skyabs su 'gro bar byed// bsam gyis mi/
132b1(rgyud): byang don tan sbyang byed pas// dus rnams kun tu gus pas skyed par byed// swA hA/ gal tate spongs can lha mo gsol 'dod na// sngags bstod cig ni 'di las 'thung ba bzhin/ gnang bar rnam das sems kyis/
132b2(rgyud): rtse gcig 'don// bsam pa'i dngos po thams cad bsams bzhin 'grub// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis / zas ze la khyod kyis sems can rnams la phan gdags shing bde ba sbyin pa'i cheng du/ lba mo de la bsdungs
132b3(rgyud): ba brjod nas byin gyis rlob par gsol ba btab pas/ bsod nams dpag tu meng pa thob par 'gyur ba legs so legs so zhes bka' stsal to// / gser 'od dam pa
132b4(rgyud): mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po'i mdo bam po brgyad pa// de nas bram ze ko'u ri rgyas gong du bstan pa lta bu'i mngon par bstod pa'i tshig dang / sngags kyi tshig gis lha mo
132b5(rgyud): spobs pa chen mo la mngon par bstod nas/ 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// khyed cag lha mo spobs pa chen mo la gsol ba btab nas/ snying brtse ba'i byin gyis brlabs nas/ tshe 'di nyid la
132b6(rgyud): thogs pa med pa'i sems myur ba dang / ye shes chen po dang / tshig la shin tu mkhas pa dang / shes pa rgya chen po 'thob pa dang / 'bel ba'i gtam gyi phan tshun lan 'debs pa dang / tshig 'bru'i rgyad ying
132b7(rgyud): bzhin du grub nas thogs pa med par 'dod na/ sems rtse gcig tu gus pas 'di ltar gsol ba gdab par bya'o// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo//
133a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos dang / 'phags pa thams cad dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas yang dag pa'i
133a2(rgyud): bden pa'i tshig mngon par grub pa/ dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i bden tshig gsung ba/ mi slu ba'i tshig gsung ba/ bskal pa chen po bye ba tshad med pa snyed du rtag par yang dag pa'i bden tshig gsum
133a3(rgyud): zhing yang dag pa'i bden tshig dang ldan pa thams cad la rjes su yi rang nas phyag 'tshal lo// mi bden pa'i tshig ma gsungs pa'i phyir/ yangs shing ring ba'i ljags phyung nas nyid kyi zhal dang / 'dzam bu/
133a4(rgyud): gling dang / gling bzhi dang / stong dang / stong gnyis dang / stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad kun tu khyab par g.yogs nas/
133a5(rgyud): nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad rab tu sel bar mdzad pa la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas ljags kyi mtshan de lta bu dang ldan pa thams cad la gus pas phyag 'tshal nas/ bdag ming
133a6(rgyud): 'di zhes bya ba shin tu gya nom pa'i spobs pa dang ldan par spos nas/ sems rtse gcig tu srog phyogs so// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spobs pa dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa dam pa dang / rang
133a7(rgyud): rgyal 'phags pa'i spobs pa dam pa dang / zhugs bzhi'i 'bras bzhi'i spobs pa dam pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa'i tshig gi spobs pa mchog dang / drang srong lha'i spobs pa dam pa dang tshangs 'khor/
133b1(rgyud): drang srong spongs pa dam pa dang / lha chen dbu ma'i 'i spobs pa dam pa dang / skal ldan lnga'i spobs pa dam pa dang / rgyal po mi na sa'i spobs pa mchog dang / yid bzhin lha'i spobs pa dam pa dan
133b2(rgyud): rgyal chen bzhi'i spobs pa dam pa dang / rab gnas lha'i bu'i spobs pa dam pa dang / rdo rje'i gsang ba'i bdag po'i spobs pa mchog dang / khyab 'jug lha'i spobs pa dam pa dang / lha mo b+hi ma'i spobs
133b3(rgyud): pa dam dang / biSh+Nu lha'i spobs pa dam pa dang / lha mo bzang mo'i spobs pa dam pa dang / shi ri ma ti'i spobs pa dam pa dang / he ri tshig gi spobs pa dam pa dang / ma dang ma chen spobs pa dam pa
133b4(rgyud): dang ha ri ta'i spobs pa dam pa dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyi spobs pa dam pa dang phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i spobs pa la gus phyag 'tshal/ las mchog ci mnga' thams cad bdag stangs nas// spobs
133b5(rgyud): mchog dam pa mtha' med thob par shog/ bslu ba med la gus phyag 'tshal// rnam par grol la gus phyag 'tshal// 'dod chags spangs la gus phyag 'tshal// 'ching sgrib spangs la gus phyag 'tshal//
133b6(rgyud): rnam dag sems la gus phyag 'tshal// 'od dang ldan la gus phyag 'tshal// bden tshig smra la gus phyag 'tshal// rdul chags med la gus phyag 'tshal// don mchog gnas la gus phyag 'tshal// 'khor/
133b7(rgyud): mang dag la gus phyag 'tshal// spobs pa'i lha la gus phyag 'tshal/ bdag ni tshig la thogs med shog/ bdag gis smon cing gnyer ba'i dngos// thams cad myur du grub par shog gnad med rtag tu/
134a1(rgyud): rab bde zhing // tshe ring lo nur 'thob par shog/ rig sngags kun la rab mkhas shing // nan tan byang chub lam bsgoms nas// skye dgu rgya cher phan btags te/ bsam pa myur/
134a2(rgyud): du 'grub par smon// bdag gis bden tshig smras pa dang // bdag gis bslu ba med smras pa// lha mo'i spobs pa gang yin pa// bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol// lha mo khyod ni 'dir gshegs/
134a3(rgyud): te/ tshig thogs ma mchis bgyi slad du// bdag lus khar ni myur zhugs nas// yid myur spobs dang ldan par mdzod// bdag gi lce yi dbang po yis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs thob
134a4(rgyud): pas tshig de'i mthu stobs dbang gis ni// sems can rnams ni 'dul bar shog/ bdag ni tshig dag smras pa'i tshe/ don ni ci bzhin grub gyur cing // thos pa dag ni gus bskyed nas// byas
134a5(rgyud): pa chung gson ma gyur cig/ bdag gis spobs pa gnyer ba yi// dngos po gal te ma grub na// lha mo'i bden tshig gang yin pa// thams cad rdzun pa nyid du 'gyur// bdag gis mtshams med sdig
134a6(rgyud): byas pa// sangs rgyas gdung gis 'dul bar 'gyur// de bzhin dgra bcom gang yin dang // drin gzo'i tshig ni ji snyed dang // shA ri'i bu dang mo'u 'gal bu// bcom ldan 'khor mang mchog gyur
134a7(rgyud): pa/ 'di la sogs pa'i bden tshig rnams// thams cad bdag la 'grub par shog/ deng bdag sangs rgyas nyan thos 'khor// thams cad 'dir ni spyan 'dren na// thams cad myur du 'dir gshegs
134b1(rgyud): ta bdag gi smon ba rdzogs mdzad smon/ yang dag bden cig gang gnyer ba// thams cad bdag la 'grub par shog / gong du 'og mim lha man chad/ gnas gcang rigs kyi lha ngag dang
134b2(rgyud): tshangs chen tshangs lha nye phan dang // tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'khor rnams dang // stong gsum 'jig rten kun khyab dang // mi mjed 'jig rten bdag po dang // 'khor ni mang po thams cad kun// deng
134b3(rgyud): bdag thams cad spyan 'dren na// byams dang thugs rje rab bskyed de// thams cad brtse bas gzung du gsol// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha rnams dang // 'phrul dga'i lha ni de dag dang // dga'
134b4(rgyud): ldan pa yi lha tshogs dang / byams pa mngon par rdzogs 'gyur dang // 'thab bral ba yi lha rnams dang // sum cu rtsa gsum lha dag dang // rgyal chen bzhi yi lha tshogs dang // lha mang 'khor ni/
134b5(rgyud): thams cad dang // sa chu me rlung lha rnams dang // ri rab brten nas gnas pa dang // mtsho bdun ri yi lha tshogs rnams// 'khor ni mang po bcas pa dang // nor rgyas dang ni mgo lnga dang // nyi zla
134b6(rgyud): gza' skar lha dag dang // 'di la sogs pa'i lha mang po// 'jig rten bde bar byed pas na// 'di la sogs pa'i lha mang po// sdig pa'i las ni byed mi mos// sangs rgyas gus pa 'phrog ma dang /
134b7(rgyud): de yi bu sdug tha chungs dang // lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za dang ni lha ma yin// mi 'am ci yi 'khor rnams dang // lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa// bdag ni bcom ldan mthu stobs kyis/
135a1(rgyud): de dag thams cad spyan 'dren na/ khyams dang snying rje'i sems skyed nas// bdag la thogs med spobs pa stsol// lha dang mi yi 'khor rnams las// gzhan gyi sems ni rig
135a2(rgyud): gyur pa// thams cad byin gyis brlabs pas ni// bdag la spobs pa dam pa stsol// nam mkha'i khams ni mthar thug dang // chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa na// sems can rnam pa ji snyed pas//
135a3(rgyud): bdag la spobs pa dam pa stsol// de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mos de skad gsol ba btab pa thos pa dang / bram ze de la 'di skad ces smras so// kye skyes bu chen po legs so// skyes pa
135a4(rgyud): 'am bud med la la zhig sngags de dang / sngags kyi mngon par bstod pa de dag la brten nas/ sngar gong du bstan pa bzhin du chos yang dag par blangs te/ dkom mchog gsum la gus par
135a5(rgyud): skyabs su 'gro zhing / sems rtse gcig tu dran pa nye bar 'jog par byed na/ ci dang ci bsgrubs pa thams cad chud za bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gser 'od dam pa shin tu gya nom pa'i
135a6(rgyud): sde 'di yang dag par bzung ste/ klog cing 'don par byed na/ smon pa thams cad 'bras bu dang ldan par 'gyur zhing myur du mngon par 'gyur te/ sems rtse gcig tu ma byas pa de ma gtogs so//
135a7(rgyud): de'i tshe bram ze de shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis rab tu dga' bar gyur pas thal mo sbyar/ spyi bos yang dag par blangs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo spobs pa chen mo la
135b1(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi lha mo khyod kyis mdo sde'i rgyal po ngas pa 'di rgya cher spel nas / mdo sde yang dag par 'dzir pa dag la yongs su skyob pa dang / yongs su bsrung bar byas pa dang /
135b2(rgyud): sems can thams cad la ban gangags shing ba ba thob par bya ba'i ched du chos de sa bu bstan na/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spobs pa byin te/ bsod nams chad med pa thob par gyur ba dang
135b3(rgyud): sems bskyed pa rnams mur du byang chub las gzhol bar byas pa legs so legs so// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ lha mo spobs pa chen mo'i le'u/
135b4(rgyud): ste bco lnga ba'o// / de nas dpal gyi lha mo chen mo stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas gus pas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das
135b5(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo
135b6(rgyud): sde'i rgyal po 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / gzhan dag la yang dag par ston par bgyid pa zhig mthong bar gyur na/ bdag gis sems rtse gcig tu gus
135b7(rgyud): pas bkur sti dang mchod par bgyid do// chos smra ba de dag la 'di lta ste/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos dang / mal cha dang / gsos sman dang / yo byad ci 'tshal ba thams cad phun
136a1(rgyud): sum tshogs par sbyar te/ brel zhing 'phongs pa ma mchis par bgyid do// gdugs mtshan du mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di'i tshig gi don ji snyed pa dag la so sor brtags te
136a2(rgyud): yid la bsams shing yongs su btsal nas bde bar gnas pa dang / mdo sde 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed pa las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag tu thos par 'gyur zhing
136a3(rgyud): myur du nub par mi 'gyur bar bgyid na/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshang ma mchis pa snyed du lha dang mi'i longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur logs so// rtag par lo legs
136a4(rgyud): shing mu ge'i rgud pa gtan du sel bar gyur pas/ skye bo rnams gtan du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mjal bar 'gyur/ slad ma'i dus kyi tshe myur du byang chub
136a5(rgyud): chen po'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur bas/ ngan 'gro gsum dang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi bgegs gtan du gcod par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon dran lags
136a6(rgyud): 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bai DUR+Ya dang gser gyi ri bo rin po che'i me tog sdang ba dpal gyi yon tan rgya mtsho zhes bgyi ba
136a7(rgyud): mtshan rnam pa bcu dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ bdag de las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun te/ de bzhin gshegs pa des byams pa dang thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyi mthus brtse bar dgongs par gyur pa'i
136b1(rgyud): slad du deng bdag gang du bsams pa'i gnas de dang / gang du bltas pa'i phyogs de dang / gang du mchis pa'i yul de dang de dag tu sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong cang ma mchis pa snyed
136b2(rgyud): shin tu bde ba'i longs spyod myong zhing / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad dang / gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / byu
136b3(rgyud): dang 'gror bu dang / mu tog la sogs pa rin po che ci 'tshal ba thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur lags so// gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig tu gser 'od dam pa mchog tu
136b4(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'don pa 'dis gdugs re bzhin du spos sna tshogs bsregs nasame tog dam pa rnams kyis bdag gi ched du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
136b5(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bai DUR+Ya dang gser gyi ri bo rin po che'i me tog snang ba dpal gyi yon tan rgya mtsho de la mchod par bgyi'o// gzhan yang gdugs gcig bzhin du dus gsum du
136b6(rgyud): bdag gi ming nas brjod cing rjes su dran par bgyis nas logs shin tu spos dang / me tog dang / zas mchog rnams kyis bdag mchod cing / rtag par mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyid
136b7(rgyud): na bsod nams 'di lta bu dag 'thob par 'gyur lags so// de nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'di ltar mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin pa'i slad// bdag dang 'khor rnams gnod pa kun dang
137a1(rgyud): bral// gos zas ci 'tshal 'phongs pa ma mchis 'gyur// gzi byin ldan zhing tshe yang dpag par dka'// sa yi ro yang rtag tu 'phel bar 'gyur// lha rnams dus bzhin
137a2(rgyud): char ni rab tu 'bebs// lha 'khor de dag rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// skyed mos tshal dang 'bru yi lha rnams kyis// nags tshal ljon shing 'bras bu rab 'phel zhing // 'bru rnams thams cad yongs su
137a3(rgyud): smin par bgyid// rin chen nor tshol bsam pa rdzogs 'gyur zhing // ci dang ci smon bsam bzhin 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyisadapal gyi lha mo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis 'di
137a4(rgyud): ltar mngon gyi rgyud rjes su dran nas/ drin rjes su bsab pa'i phyir mchod pa byas pa dang / mtha' yas sems can rnams la phan gdags shing / bde bar bya ba'i ched du mdo sde 'di yongs su spel
137a5(rgyud): nas yon tan zad mi shes par byas pa legs so legs so// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ dpal gyi lha mo chen mo'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//
137a6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ dpal gyi lha mo chen mos yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang phyogs na lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu'i grong khyer nor ldan zhes bgyi
137a7(rgyud): ba mchis te/ grong khyer de las mi ring ba na me tog dam pa'i bsod nams kyi 'od ces bgyi ba'i kun dga' ra ba mchis pa de na/ gzhal med khang mchog dam pa rin po che sna bdun las mngon par grub
137b1(rgyud): ba zhig mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rtag par den gnas lags pas gang la la zhig 'bru rnam pa lnga gdugs gcig bzhin du 'brel ba dang / bang mdzod rnams rgyas shing gang
137b2(rgyud): bar 'chal bas/ gus pas dang ba'i sems bskyed de/ khang pa gcig gtsang mar bgyis nas/ ba lang gi lji bas dog sa la zhal zhal bgyis te/ bdag gi gzugs rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis
137b3(rgyud): rab tu brgyan par ri mor bris nas/ khrus legs par bkrus te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas byug pa dam pas byugs te/ khang pa gtsang ma'i nang du zhugs nas/ bdag gi ched du gdugs re dus
137b4(rgyud): gsum du sangs rgyas de'i mtshan dang mdo sde 'di'i mtshan brjod par sems bskyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa bai DUR+Ya dang gser gyi ri bo chen po me tog snang ba dpal gyi ri yon tan rgya mtsho la
137b5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod nas me tog dang spos rnams thogs te/ zhal zas bda' ba sna tshogs sems rtse gcig tu dbul bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang spos dang / me tog dang / bza' ba dang
137b6(rgyud): btung ba rnams kyis bdag gi gzugs brnyan la mchod par bgyi'o// gzhan yang bza' ba dang btung ba dag thogs te/ phyogs gzhan du gtor nas 'dre srin rnams la stsal bar bgyi'o// yang dag pa'i
137b7(rgyud): bden pa'i bden tshig gis dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la gsol ba btab nas/ ci dang ci gnyer ba'i smon lam gdab par bgyi'o// gal te ji skad smras pa bzhin du brdzun ma lags na/ gsol ba btab pa
138a1(rgyud): don dang ldan par mdzad du gsol zhes brjod par bgyi'o// de'i tshe dpal gyi lha mos dngos po de rig nas/ brtse ba'i bsam pa skye bar 'gyur bas/ de'i khyim du nor dang 'bru rnams/
138a2(rgyud): rab tu 'phel bar bgyid do// de nas sngags bzlas nas bdag g.yar drang bar bgyis te/ sngar sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang byang chub sems dpa'i ming nas brjod de/ sems rtse gcig tu gus pas phyag bgyi'o/
138a3(rgyud): phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug pud can la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i 'od zer rin po che'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo//
138a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas gser tog 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gser brgya'i 'od kyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gser gdugs rin po che brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gser
138a5(rgyud): gyi me tog 'od zer rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas sgron ma chen po'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin po che chen po'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas
138a6(rgyud): mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen tog la phyag 'tshal lo// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas lha'i rnga sgra
138a7(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' gser mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo//
138b1(rgyud): byang chubasams dpa' dag pashums la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' shin tu bde bar gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de ltar
138b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gus pas phyag bgyis nas/ de'i rjes la sngags bzlas te/ dpal gyi lha mo chen mo bdag g.yang 'dren par bgyid nas/ bsngags 'di'i mthus
138b3(rgyud): yongs su gnyer ba'i dngos po rnams thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur/ dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo// sngags ni 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ pra ti pur+d+ha tsa re/ sa man+ta/ dadra ni/ mahA
138b4(rgyud): bi hA ra ga ti/ sa man+te/ pi ta ma ma ni/ ma hA kA ra yaM/ pra ti/ bash+tsi pa ni/ sarba an+da sa man+ta nu/ pra pU re/ a ya na d+harma ta/ ma hA b+ho ga na/ ma hA mai tri/ u pa sing ha te/ ma hA kle sha/ su sang gri hi
138b5(rgyud): te/ sa mAn+da/ a nu pA la ni swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su bzung nas/ bdag g.yar 'dren par bgyid na/ bdag g.yar 'dren pa thos nas/ de'i
138b6(rgyud): thad du mchis te smon pa rnams 'grub par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'i tshig/ ting nge 'dzin mngon par sgrub pa'i tshig/ yang dag pa'i tshig/ bslu ba ma mchis pa'i tshig/ yang
138b7(rgyud): dag pa'i spyod pa sems can rnams kyi yang dag pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba lags pas/ gang la la zhig sngags 'di yang dag par 'dzin cing klog pa dang / 'don pa des gdugs mtshan bdun gyi bar du yan lag
139a1(rgyud): brgyad dang ldan pa'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs nas/ snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sngar so shing bcas te dag par bkrus nas/ slar snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ spos dang me tog dag gis sangs/
139a2(rgyud): rgyas thams cad la mchod pa bgyis te/ bdag nyid kyi dngos sdig bshags nas bdag dang sems can rnams smon pa myur du 'grub par bgyi ba'i slad du/ yongs su bsngo zhing smon lam gdang bar bya/
139a3(rgyud): khang pa gcig gtsang mar bgyis pa 'am/ yang na dben pa'i gnas sam/ dgon pa'i gnas kyang rung ste/ ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor bgyis nas/ tsan dan bsregs te mchod par bgyi'o// stan
139a4(rgyud): mchog gcig bting ste/ ba dan dang gdugs brgyan par gyi'o// me tog dam pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi nang bkram ste/ sems rtse gcig tu sngags snga ma bzlas nas/ bdag der mchi bar re bar bgyi'o//
139a5(rgyud): bdag de'i tshe de la rjes su sems shing lta bar dgyes pas/ de'i khang par zhugs te stan la mchis nas/ de'i mchod pa len par bgyis te/ de slan chad mi des g.yar lam bdag mthong bar gyur pas/
139a6(rgyud): ci dang ci smon pa'i dngos po rnams yang dag pa'i tshig gi sgo nas go bar bgyid do// grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ 'brog dgon pa 'am/ dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang yang rung ste/ ci dang ci smon pa thams
139a7(rgyud): cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pas/ gser dang / dngul dang / nor dang / rin po che dang / ba grang dang / lug dang / 'bru rnams dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos rnams yid bzhin du 'tho/
139b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing / bde ba'i longs spyod mchog la yongs su longs spyod par 'gyur lags so// de ltar 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mchog dam pa thob nas kyang / skal ba mchog gang lags pa des dkon
139b2(rgyud): mchog gsum la mchod cing bdag la'ang stsal bar bgyi'o// chos kyi 'dus pa rgya cher bshams nas/ bza' ba dang btung ba rnams sbyar te/ spos dang me tog gcal du bkras nas mchod par bgyin/
139b3(rgyud): mchod par bgyis nas mchod par bgyis pas zas lhag ma ci mchis pa bcings te/ rin blangs nas yang mchod par bgyis na/ bdag nam 'tsho'i bar du rtag tu der gnas nas/ gang zag de la bsrung
139b4(rgyud): zhing skyob pa dang / 'phongs shing brel ba ma mchis pa dang / smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyid do// dus dus su dbul 'phongs pa rnams la'ang sprul bar bgyi zhing / bdag gcig
139b5(rgyud): bu'i chang du ser snas 'phangs par mi bgyi'o// rtag par mdo sde 'di lhags nas rgyun chad pa ma mchis par bgyi ste/ bsod nams ci mchis pa de'ang thams cad la'ang btang zhing byang chub tu yongs
139b6(rgyud): su bsngos nas/ 'khor ba la nges par 'byung zhing myur du rnam par grol ba 'thob par 'gyur bar smon par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dpal gyi lha mo khyod kyis de ltar mdo sde 'di rgya cher/
139b7(rgyud): sbal nas/ bdag dang gzhan gnyis ka la phan pa thos ma gyis mi khyab pa byas pa legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyam
140a1(rgyud): po las/ dpal gyi lha mo chen mos nor 'phel bar byed pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas sa'i lha mo brtan ma 'khor mang po'i nang nas stan/
140a2(rgyud): las langs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di da ltar ram/ spang
140a3(rgyud): ma'i dus kyi tshe gal te grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ ri 'am/ phug gam/ nags tshal dag na'ang rung ste/ mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di
140a4(rgyud): spel bar bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag der mchis nas mchod pa dang / bkur sti dang / yongs su bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab par bgyis te rgya cher spel bar bgyid do// sa phyogs gang
140a5(rgyud): yang rung ba dag tu chos smra ba'i mkhan po'i ched du khri mthon po btsugs te/ mdo sde 'di 'chad par byed na/ bdag rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus lus mi gda' bar bgyis nas/ der mchis te de'i rkang
140a6(rgyud): pa nas spyi bos 'degs par bgyid de/ bdag chos thos par gyur nas kyang shin tu dang ba'i bsam pas rab tu dga' bar bgyid do// chos kyi ro thob pa'i dbang gis gzi byin 'phel bar 'gyur bas/
140a7(rgyud): mgu ba tshad ma mchis pa thob par 'gyur te/ bdag de lta bu'i phan yon thob pa nyid kyis/ sa chen po 'di'ang dpag tshad brgya phrag brgya brgyad cu rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la thug pa tshun chad sa'i bcud
140b1(rgyud): thams cad rab tu 'phel bar bgyid do// rgya mtsho bzhi tshun chad kyi sa chen po ji snyed pa de dag sa'i bcung rgyas shing rab tu gshin pas ston pas kyang lhag pa dang ches khyad par du 'phags par bgyid/
140b2(rgyud): do 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na chu bo dang / rdzing dang / rdzing bu dang / ljon shing dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / yal ga dang / 'o ma dang /
140b3(rgyud): 'bru rnam pa sna tshogs ci mchis pa de dag kyang dbyings mdzes shing yid du mchi ba dang / mang po kun gyis lta bar mos pa dang / kha dog dang dri phun sum tshogs pa dang / longs spyod du rung bar bgyid de//
140b4(rgyud): sems can gang gis bza' ba dang btung ba mchog de lta bu de dag la longs spyod pa rnams kyang tshe ring zhing kha dog dang stobs dang ldan pa dang / dbang po rnams bde zhing gzi byin 'phel ba dang / bro nang
140b5(rgyud): rnams ma mchis pa dang / sems kyi shes rab dpa' zhing ci'ang rtsol rngo thogs par 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang sa chen po 'di las ji tsam du yongs su spyad par bgyi ba'i dngos po brgya stong ji snyed
140b6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyang phun sum tshogs par bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen des na 'dzam bu'i gling rnams rab tu bde zhing lo legs pa dang / mi rnams dar zhing rgyas pa dang / gnod pa rnams ma
140b7(rgyud): mchis pas sems can ji snyed mchis pa de dag thams cad bde ba myong bar 'gyur lags so// de ltar lus dang sems kyis bde ba myong bar gyur nas kyang / mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di la shin tu gus pa bskyed/
141a1(rgyud): nas gang du gnas kyang rung ste/ thams cad kyis yongs su gzung ba dang / mchod pa dang / bkur sti dang / bla mar bgyi zhing sngags brjod par smon par bgyi'o// gzhan yang chos
141a2(rgyud): 'chad pa'i mkhan po chen po de dag gang du chos 'chang pa'i gnas der yang mchis te/ sems can rnams kyi ched du mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di 'chad par gsol ba gdab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
141a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di bshad pa'i dbang gis bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la sman par 'gyur zhing / 'od dang / kha dog dang / mthu stobs dang / dpa' zhing gzi byin dang ldan pa
141a4(rgyud): dang byang bzhin shin tu sdug cing sngon pas ches khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur bas so// bcom ldan 'das bdag sa'i lha mo brtan ma'ang chos kyi ros tshim par gyur pa'i dbang gis 'dzam bu'i gling
141a5(rgyud): dpag tshad bdun stong tshun chad sa thams cad bcud dang ldan pa dang / sngags bzhin du sems can ji snyed pa thams cad kyang bde ba myong bar bgyid lags so// de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe sems
141a6(rgyud): can de dag gis kyang bdag gi drin bsab pa'i slad du/ bdag cag gdon mi za bar mdo sde 'di mnyan nas bkur sti dang / rim gro dang / mchod pa dang / bla mar bgyis nas/ bsngags pa brjod par bgyi'o/
141a7(rgyud): snyam du bsam par bgyi'o// de ltar bsams nas kyang gnas nas byung ste/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / khang khyim dang / dgon pa'i gnas gang du chos bshad pa'i 'dus pa der mchis
141b1(rgyud): ting chos bshad pa'i mkhan po la spyi bos btud de phyag bgyis nas mdo sde 'di mnyan par bgyi'o// mdo sde 'di mnyan nas kyang so so nas rang gi gnas su mchis te/ rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed de// 'di/
141b2(rgyud): skad du bdag cag deng shin tu zab cing bla na ma mchis pa'i chos gya nom pa thos nas/ 'di ni bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa snyed yongs su bsdus par gyur to// mdo sde'i mthu stobs kyi
141b3(rgyud): dbang gi bdag cag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis shing mtha' ma mchis pa snyed la mchod cing rim gro bgyis pas ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dang bral bar gyur to// ma
141b4(rgyud): 'ongs pa'i tshe rabs brgya stong gi bar du'ang rtag par mtho ris dang mi'i nang du skyes nas bde ba mchog myong bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe mi mang po de dag so so nas slar rang gi gnas su
141b5(rgyud): mchis nas skye bo mang po rnams la mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di las gsungs pa'i dpe gcig tsam mam/ le'u gcig tsam mam/ sngon gyi gtam rgyud gcig tsam mam/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi mtshan
141b6(rgyud): tsam mam/ byang chub sems dpa' gcig gi ming tsam mam/ tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam mam/ yang na tshig tsam zhig sems can rnams la yang dag par ston par bgyid dam/ tha na mad
141b7(rgyud): sde 'di'i mtshan tsam zhig rjod par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag gang na gnas pa'i sa phyogs de dag thams cad bcud dang ldan zhing gzhan pas lhag par 'gyur ba dang / sa can po las
142a1(rgyud): skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po thams cad kyang rgya cher rab tu 'phel zhing rab tu rgyas par 'gyur bas/ sems can rnams shin tu bde ba'i longs spyod myong bar 'gyur ro// rin po
142a2(rgyud): che dang nor mang bar 'gyur/ sbyin pa legs par gtong bar 'gyur/ rtag par sems brtan zhing dkon mchog gsum la shin tu mngon par yid ches par 'gyur lags so// de skad ces gsol pa
142a3(rgyud): dang de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha mo brtan ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di las
142a4(rgyud): tha na tshig gcig tsam zhig thos par gyur na/ yang tshe 'phos pa'i 'og tu sum cu rtsa gsum dang / lha'i gnas gzhan dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// sems can gang la la zhig mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di
142a5(rgyud): mchod par 'dod pa'i phyir/ khang khyim dag rab tu brgyan nas bla re gcig bre bar byed dam/ ba dan rim gcig tsam sbyor bar byed na/ rgyu de dang rkyen des lha'i ris drug po dag tu ji ltar bsams
142a6(rgyud): pa bzhin du skye bar 'gyur bas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang mchog dam pa dag la yid bzhin du longs spyod par 'gyur/ so so nas lha'i bu mo bdun stong dang phan tshun lhan cig rtse
142a7(rgyud): zhing nyin mtshan rtag par khyad par du 'phags pa'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ sa'i lha mo
142b1(rgyud): brta mas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen des na 'khor bzhi po las gang la la zhig chos kyi stan la mchis nas/ chos 'di yang dag par spyod pa na/ bdag gdugs mtsham du
142b2(rgyud): gang zag de la yongs su srung zhing sgrub par bgyid/ rang gi lus mi gda' bar bgyis nas/ chos kyi stan drung du mchis te/ de'i rkang pa nas 'degs par bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das
142b3(rgyud): mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di na/ sems can de dag gis sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pas na/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher 'phel zhing nub par mi 'gyur ba lags so//
142b4(rgyud): sems can gang gis mdo sde 'di mnyan par bgyid pa de dag slad mo'i dus kyi tshe/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed kyi bar du lha dang mi'i nang du rtag par bde ba mchog
142b5(rgyud): la longs spyod par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas mang po dang mjal nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ ngan song gsum dang 'khor
142b6(rgyud): ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la sngags kyi snying po lha dang mi
142b7(rgyud): rnams la phan 'dogs shing thams cad la bde bar bgyid pa mchis te/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / 'khor bzhi po dag las gang la la zhig bdag gi lus yang dag par mngon
143a1(rgyud): sum du mthong bar 'tshal ba des/ sems rtse gcig tu gzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ ji ltar smon pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyid do//
143a2(rgyud): nor dang / rin po che'i gter dang / mngon par shes pa dang / tshe ring ba'i sman dam pa gnyer ba dang / sems can gyi nad mang po gso ba dang / phyir rgol ba'i dgra pham par bgyi ba dang / tha dad par
143a3(rgyud): smra ba rnams tshar gcod par 'tshal na khang pa gtsang mar bgyis te dkyil 'khor bgyi'o// lus bkrus te gos gsar pa gtsang ma bgos nas/ rtswa bting ba'i steng du mchis te/ ring bsrel dang sku
143a4(rgyud): gzugs kyi spyan sngar ram/ yang na ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bdug pa bsregs te/ me tog gtor nas bza' ba dang btung ba dag gis mchod par bgyis te/ zla ba yar gyi ngo
143a5(rgyud): tshes brgyad la skar ma rgyal rdzogs pa na/ g.yar 'dren pa'i sngags 'di bzla bar bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ku ru ku ru/ ku Tu ku Tu/ to Tu to Tu/ bA ha bA ha/ sha ba ri sha ba ri
143a6(rgyud): swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das rigs sngags 'di 'khor bzhi po las gapal la zhig gis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ bdag g.yar 'dren par bgyis na/ bdag gis de'i cheng du g.yar 'dren pa der
143a7(rgyud): mchi bar 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das sems can gang la la zhig bdag dngos po mngon sum du mngon par mthong zhing lhan cig gtam bgyi bar 'tshal na'ang snga ma bzhin du chog
143b1(rgyud): bshams nas/ gzungs 'di 'azlas par bgyi'o// t+ya d+hA/ ma can/ kri mig nyin ti/ shir shi d+ha r+ye/ haha hi ti/ ku ru d+ha re swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la nyis sngags 'di 'do pa na khang/
143b2(rgyud): bad+haH brgyang bzlas nas sngags snga ma'ang 'don par bgyid na/ bdag gdon mi 'chal bar lus mngon du bstan nas/ des ci sde smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyid pas/ rnams
143b3(rgyud): kyang chub 'tshal bar mi bgyid do// gal te sngags 'di 'don par 'tshal na/ sngar lus srung ba'i sngags 'di 'don par bgyi'o// tad+ya/ ni shi ri/ ma sha ka ni/ na ti ku ti/ bud d+hi bud d+hi ri/ bi ti bi ti
143b4(rgyud): ku ku ti/ bi tsa ri swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das sngags 'di 'don pa'i tshe/ tshon sna lnga'i skud pa blangs nas/ sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bgyis nas/ dpung pa g.yon pa la bcings nas/ slan chad lus
143b5(rgyud): bsrung bar bgyis pas/ 'jigs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig tu sngags 'di zlos par byed na/ bsams pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur te/ bdag sho
143b6(rgyud): bi mi mchi ste/ bdag gi dbang du sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog bzhugs pa nyid du rab tu mkhyen par 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa'i lha mo la bkas
143b7(rgyud): stsal pa/ khyod yang dag pa'i bden tshig gi sngags kyis mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di dang / chos smra ba la yongs su bsrung bar byas pa legs so legs so// rgyu dang rkyen 'dis khyod bsod nams kyi rnam
144a1(rgyud): par smin pa tshad med pa snyed thob par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//
144a2(rgyud): de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes zhes bya ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tu 'khor mang po'i nang nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag
144a3(rgyud): pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dra/
144a4(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di da ltar ram/ slad ma'i dus kyi tshe grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ ri 'am/ dgon pa 'am/ nags tshal
144a5(rgyud): lam rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ dge 'dun gnas pa'i gnas dag tu 'ang rung ste/ yang dag par bstan nas rgya cher spel bar bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po
144a6(rgyud): yang dag shes gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tu der mchis nas/ so so nas rang gi lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ ci rigs par chos smra ba'i mkhan po de dang / chos nyan pa'i//
144a7(rgyud): 'khor de dag la yongs su bsrungs nas/ gnod pa rnams spangs te rtag par bde ba myong bar bgyid do// skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di las tha na/
144b1(rgyud): tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang dag par 'dzin par bgyid dam/ tshig gcig tsam yang dag par 'dzin par bgyid dam/ mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di'i mtshan tsam smos par bgyid
144b2(rgyud): dam mdo sde 'di las gsungs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi mtshan tsam mam/ byang chub sems dpa' gcig gi ming tsam brjod par sems bskyed nas/ gus par rim gro dang mchod
144b3(rgyud): par bgyid na/ bdag gis yongs su srung zhi byin gyis brlabs nas/ gnod pa ma mchis par bgyis te/ sdug bsngal spangs nas bde ba thob par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/
144b4(rgyud): babadag gi mi nga yang dag shes zhes bgyi ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gang lags pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mngon sum du mkhyen pa lags te/ bdag gis chos rig pa dang / bdag gi/
144b5(rgyud): chos thams cad kyi ji snyed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi ji lta ba dang / chos thams cad rnam pa dang / ngo bo nyid dang / bye brag ji snyed pa thams cad gsal bar rtogs pa lags te/ bcom/
144b6(rgyud): ldan 'das 'di ltar chos rnams bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba dang ldan pa dang / bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi sgron ma dang ldan pa dang / bdag dpag par dka' ba'i
144b7(rgyud): ye shes kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi phung po dang ldan pa dang / bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi spyod yul rnams mngon par rtogs par gyur pa lags
145a1(rgyud): so/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'di ltar chos thams cad yang dag par rig/ yang dag par gsal bar rtogs/ yang dag par khong du chud/ yang dag par so sor rtogs
145a2(rgyud): par bgyid pas/ bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen de'i slad du/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes zhes bgyi ba lags te/ don de'i slad du bdag gis chos smra ba'i mkhan po de'i tshig gi spob
145a3(rgyud): pa gsal zhing rgyan dang ldan pa dang / gzi byin dang mdangs spu'i bu ga kun nas 'jug pa dang / lus kyi mthu stobs dang ldan pa dang / gzi byin dang ldan zhing dpa' ba dang / dpag par dka' ba'i ye
145a4(rgyud): shes kyi snang ba thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang / yang dag par dran pa thob nas spa bkong ma mchis pa dang / de'i lus la phan 'dogs shing nyams pa ma mchis pa dang / dbang po rnams bde
145a5(rgyud): zhing rtag par dga' ba bskyed par bgyi'o// rgyu dang rkyen de'i slad du sems can gang dag sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas/ bsod nams kyi las mngon par sgrub pa dag gi ched
145a6(rgyud): du 'dzam bu'i gling dag tu rgya cher spel nas/ myur du nub par mi 'gyur bar bgyid pas/ sems can de dag gis mdo sde 'di thos nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba chen po dang / bsod
145a7(rgyud): nams kyi phung po tshad ma mchis pa thob par 'gyur zhing / slang ma'i dus kyi tshe yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tshad ma mchis pa'i bar du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lha dang mi'i bde ba myong ba dang / rtag par
145b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas mang po dang maN+Dal nas/ sgur du tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal shir/
145b2(rgyud): bu mi bzang pa dag kyang myong bar mi 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la gzungs
145b3(rgyud): mchis te/ sems can rnams la sman par bgyi zhing brtse ba'i slad du/ dong bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag nyid kyis bshad par bgyi'o// de nas sngags spras pa/ na mo bud d+hA ya / na mo d+harmA ya
145b4(rgyud): na moHsa~M g+hA ya/ na mo pra d+hA la/ na ma sh+tsa turma hA rA dzA ne/ tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ go ri mA hA go ri/ gar+b+ha ri/ mahA gan+d+ha ri/ dr-i mi Ti/ ma hA dr-i si ri/ daN+Da lu gur+b+ha ha ha ha ha ha/ #
145b5(rgyud): hi hi/ ho ho ho/ ha mo d+ha me/ gu d+ha me/ tsa tsa tsa tsaM/ tsi tsi tsi tsi/ tsu tsu tsu d+ha/ dar+Ne shwa ra/ shi kha ra shi kha ra/ ut+tiSh+TaM he b+ha ga ban/ saM bid dzA ya swA hA/ gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'dzin par
145b6(rgyud): bgyid na/ bdag gis 'tsho ba'i yo byad sman dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / rin po che ngo mtshar che ba dag gis rim gro bgyid do// gal te skyes pa dang
145b7(rgyud): bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che dang / rgyan 'phreng gi rnam pa rnams yongs su gnyer bar bgyid na'ang / bdag gis thams cad sbyar nas/ ji ltar smon pa bzhin
146a1(rgyud): du chud cing 'phongs pa ma mchis par bgyid do// rig sngags 'di mthu chen po dang ldan pas sngags 'don pa'i tshe bdag myur du de'i thad du mchis nas thogs pa ma mchis par yid/
