173a7(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba zhig mthong ba dang / rgyal bu chen pos 'di skad du/ kye ma stag mo 'di ni bu bcas nas zhag bdun lon te/ bu bdun gyis yongs su bskor bas zas btsal ba'ang mi khom ste/
173b1(rgyud): bkres pa dang skom pa dgra gis rab tu gzir bas gdon mi za bar bu rnams za bar 'gyur ro zhes smras so// rgyal bu sems can chen pos smras pa/ sdug 'di dag rtag par zas ji lta bu zhig pa/
173b2(rgyud): rgyal bu chen ngos smras pa/ stag dang seng ge bar spyad rnams// shA khrag dron mo 'ba' zhig za// de bas gzhan pa'i zas skom gyis// 'di na nyam chung sel mi nus// rgyal bu 'bring pos de
173b3(rgyud): skad smras pa thos pa dang / 'di skad ces smras so// stag mo 'di ni rid cing nyam chung la// bkres skom gyis nyon mongs pas srog gi lhag ma cung zad tsam zhig lus na/ bdag cag gis ji
173b4(rgyud): lhar rnying par dka' ba'i zas dang skom btsal bar nus/ su zhig ni 'di dag gi ched du rang gi lus dang srog spangs nas/ bkres pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal sel bar byed/ rgyal bu chen pos smras
173b5(rgyud): pa spang bar dkar ba thams cad kyi nang na bdag gi lus las lhag pa gang yang med do// rgyal bu sems can chen pos smras pa/ deng bdag cag ni so so nas rang gi lus la sred cing mngon par
173b6(rgyud): zhen pa dang / shes rab med pas gzhan rnams la phan 'dogs mi nus kyis/ skyes bu dam pa dag ni snying rje chen po'i sems dang ldan pas rtag par gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ rang gi
173b7(rgyud): lus khyad du bsad nas sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par byed/ gzhan yang 'di snyam du bdag gi lus 'di ni tshe rabs brgya stong du ma'i bar du don med par rul zhing myags te bor bas phan/
174a1(rgyud): pa ci'ang byas pa med na/ ci'i phyir deng mchil snabs bzhin du yongs su spangs nas/ bkres pa dag gis nyen pa'i sdug bsngal sel bar mi byed snyam mo// de'i tshe
174a2(rgyud): rgyal bu de dag tshig de lta bu dag smras nas/ so so nas byams shing brtse ba'i sems bskyed de/ stag mo nyam chung ba de la mig mi g.yeng bar bltas nas/ ring zhig tu bskor te cig car spangs nas/
174a3(rgyud): dong ngo // de nas rgyal bu sems can chen po 'di snyam du/ bdag gis lus srog btang ba'i dus ni deng yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gis yun ring lus 'di rab bzung yang // mi gtsang/
174a4(rgyud): mnam la rnag 'dzag yid mi 'ong // yo byad gos zas shing rta glang po rta// nor dang rin chen rim gro byas kyang ni// 'gyur zhing 'jig chos ngo bo nyid mi rtag/ rtag tshol dgang dka' srung bar rab
174a5(rgyud): tu dka'// rtag tu mchod cing rim gro byas kyang ni// nams kyang bdag 'dor byas pa'i drin mi shes// gzhan yang lus 'di ni mi brtan pas bdag la phan pa med pa 'jigs su rung bas dgra/
174a6(rgyud): dang 'dra ba/ mi gtsang bas lung dang mtshungs pa yin pas/ deng bdag gi lus 'dis yang shing rgya che ba'i las mngon par bsgrubs nas/ skye shi'i rgya mtshor gru gzings chen po byas te/ 'khor/
174a7(rgyud): kha yongs su spangs nas nges par 'byung ba thob par bya'o snyam mo// gzhan yang 'di snyam du gal te lus 'di spangs par gyur na/ 'di nyid 'bras dang / nad ma rungs pa tshad med pa dang
174b1(rgyud): 'jigs shing skrag pa brgya stong du ma spangs pa yin no// lus 'di ni bshang gci 'ba' zhig dang ldan pa/ chu bur lta bur mi brtan pa/ srin bu mang po 'dus pa/ rtsa rgyas rus pa phan tshun
174b2(rgyud): 'brel ba/ shin tu yongs su skyo bar bya ba'i nyes dmigs dang bcas pa yin pas/ de'i phyir deng bdag gis lus yongs su spangs nas/ bla na med pa mthar phyin pa mya ngan las 'das pa
174b3(rgyud): yongs su btsal te/ mya ngan gyinyes pa dang / mi rtag pa'i sdug bsngal dang / 'khrug pa gtan du spangs nas/ 'khor ba rgyun bcad de nyes pa rnams spangs nas/ ting nge 'dzin dang shes
174b4(rgyud): rab kyi stobs kyis phun sum tshogs par bsgoms nas/ bsod nams brgya stong mang pos brgyan pa/ thams cad mkhyen par gyur pa/ sangs rgyas mang pos rab tu bsngags pa'i chos kyi sku
174b5(rgyud): shin tu gya nom pa thob par bya'o// thob par gyur nas kyang sems can rnams la chos kyi sman tshad med pa gtang bar bya'o snyam mo// de'i tshe rgyal bu de shin tu brtul ba'i dpa' bsran dang sman
174b6(rgyud): lam chen po btab nas/ snying rje chen po'i bsam pas sems brtas shing 'phel bar gyur kyang / phu bo gnyis skrag cing dngangs pas bar chad kyi bgegs byas nas smon pa mi 'grub par dogs
174b7(rgyud): pas phu bo gnyis la gcen gnyis slar gshegs shig/ bdag re zhig slar mchis so zhes smras so// de nas rgyal bu sems can chen po slar tshal gyi nang du zhugs nas/ stag mo'i
175a1(rgyud): drung du phyin te/ gos phud nas 'od ma'i steng du gzhag ste smon lam 'di skad btab bo// bdag ni chos mkhas sems can kun gyi phyir// bla med byang chub gnas ni ma/
175a2(rgyud): bas ma/ snying rje chen po'i sems bskyang g.yo ba med// skye bos 'phangs pa'i lus ni gtong bar byed// byang chub nang med gdung ba med pas na// blo dang ldan pa kun gyis rab tu mos/
175a3(rgyud): khams gsum sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i sems can kun// deng bdag drangs nas bde la 'god par shog/ de nas rgyal bus tshig de skad smras nas/ stag mo ltogs pa'i mdun du lus bor te
175a4(rgyud): nyal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de'i byams pa dang snying rje'i gzi byin gyi mthus stag mos ci'ang byed ma nus so// byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu mthong ba dang / ri mthon po'i steng
175a5(rgyud): du 'dzegs te lus bor nas 'di snyam du stag mo 'di ni/ nyam chung zhing rgyabs bdag la bza' bar mi nus so snyam du bsams nas langs te/ mtshon btsal yang ma rnyed pas/ 'od ma skam
175a6(rgyud): po'i tshal pas lkog mar khrag phyung ste/ mthar gyis stag mo'i drung du nye bar bsnyen pa dang / de'i tshe 'di ltar rlung gis chu bskyod pa bzhin du sa chen po'ang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur/
175a7(rgyud): nyi ma'ang sgra gcan gyis bsgribs pa bzhin du 'od dang mi ldan pas/ phyogs bcu kun tu mun nag tu gyur nas/ lha rnams kyis kyang me tog dam pa dang spos mchog dam pa'i char yang mngon
175b1(rgyud): bar phab pas/ tshal gyi nang du kun tu khyab cing gang bar gyur to// de'i tshe bar snga pa la gnas pa'i lha tshogs mang po rnams kyis dngos po de lta bu mthong ba dang / rjes su yi rang ba'i sems/
175b2(rgyud): bskyed na/ sdos cad nam yang 'di lta bu ma byung ngo zhes bsngags pa brjod do// thams cad kyis skyes bu chen po legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
175b3(rgyud): skyes bu chen po yongs su skyob pa snying rje'i sems bskyed nas bu gcig bzhin du sems can mnyam par lta// rab dpa' dga' chen sems la 'jungs med pas// lus spangs 'phongs/
175b4(rgyud): skyobs bsod nams dpag par dka'// nges par rtog bde gya nom gnas phyin nas// 'khor ba 'ching ba mang po gtan du spong // ring por mi thogs byang chub 'bras thob nas// nyer zhi
175b5(rgyud): bde ba skye med mngon rtogs 'gyur// de'i tshe stag mo ltogs pa des byang chub sems dpa'i lkog ma nas khrag zag pa mthong ba dang khrag bldags te/ sha ma lus par zos pas
175b6(rgyud): rus pa 'ba' zhig lus par byas so// de nas rgyal bu chen pos sa g.yos pa mthong ba dang / nu bo la smras pa/ sa chen ri klung kun kyang rab tu g.yos// phyogs kun mun nag
175b7(rgyud): nyi ma'i 'od mi ldan// lha yi me tog lhung bas mkha' khyab nas// 'di ni nu bos nges par lus spangs rtags// rgyal bu 'bring pos phu bos de skad smras pa thos pa dang tshigs
176a1(rgyud): su bcad de smras pa/ stag mo lus ltogs shin tu nyam chung ga/ bkres gzir bu phrug bza' dogs mthong nas ni// sems can chen po smra ba bdag thos nas/ nu bos/
176a2(rgyud): lus btang deng bdag the tshom 'tshal// de nas rgyal bu gnyis mya ngan dang sdug bsngal chen po skyes pas/ smre sngags bton te ngus nas/ gnyis ka lhan cig tu slar stag mo'i drung du phyin te
176a3(rgyud): nu bo'i gos ni 'od ma'i yal ga la bkal/ rus pa dang sgra ni kun tu 'thor/ khrag babs pas ni rdzab tu gyur nas/ sa gzhi kun tu khyab par gyur pa mthong ba dang / brgyal nas rang gi lus kyang
176a4(rgyud): gzung ma nus pas/ rus pa'i drung du lus brdabs te/ ring zhig lon nas dran pa slar thob pa dang / langs nas lag pa bteg ste rab tu ngus nas smre sngags bton pa/ bdag cag nu bo byad
176a5(rgyud): sdug mdzes// pha ma gnyis ka lhag par byams// ci phyir lhan cig phyir byung nas// lus spangs slar ni ldog ma gyur// gal te pha mas dris gyur na// bdag cag lan ni ji skad gdag/ lhan
176a6(rgyud): cig srog ni btang bla na// rang gi lus ni ci phyir bzhag/ de nas rgyal bu gnyis smre sngags bton te ngus nas/ yid la gcags bzhin du mthar gyis spangs te dong ngo // de'i tshe rgyal bu tha chungs
176a7(rgyud): khrid pa'i g.yog 'khor rnams phan tshun gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ rgyal bu gang na yod pa lhan cig btsal ba'i rigs so smras par gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal po'i btsun mo yang tog mthon po'i
176b1(rgyud): steng du nyal ba'i rmilam na/ las ngam pa'i mtshan ma mthong ba 'dis sta/ num gnyis gzhan gyis bcad pa dang / so srung ba dang / dug ro gyi phrug gu gsum thob pa la/ gcig ni zas gyur//
176b2(rgyud): gnyis ni dngangs shing skrag par gyur pa dag mthong bar gyur to// sa g.yos pa'i tshe btsun mo sad de/ sems la mya ngan chen po skyes nas 'di skad du smras so// ci'i phyir deng ni sa chen rab tu g.yos
176b3(rgyud): chu klung nags tshal ljon shing kun kyang 'gul// nyi ma 'od med g.yos shing bsgribs pa 'dra// mig 'gul nu g.yo sngon chad yong mi 'dra// snying la mangs phog bzhin du sdug bsngal gzir// lus
176b4(rgyud): kun rab tu g.yo zhing bde ba ci yang med// bdag gis rmi lam ltas ngan mthong bas na// nges par sngon med ltas ngan dngos po yod// btsun mo'i nu ma gnyis nu zho zags pa dang // 'di snyam du 'di//
176b5(rgyud): ni gdon mi za bar ltas ngan gyi dngos po ston pa yin no snyam mo// de'i tshe nang 'khor ma zhig phyi rol gyi mi rnams rgyal bu btsal ba las da dung ma rnyed do zhes zer ba thos pa dang / sems la shin tu skrab
176b6(rgyud): cing 'jig pa skyes nas pho brang gi nang du song ste/ btsun mo la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mo mkhyen lags sam/ slad rol gyi mi rnams las kun tu so sor btsal ba las/ da dung ma rnyed ces mchi ba
176b7(rgyud): thos lags so// de nas btsun mo des tshig de skad smras pa thos pa dang / mya ngan chen po skyes pas smre sngags bton te/ mig mchi mas gang bzhin du rgyal po'i drung du phyin nas/ rgyal po la 'di skad
177a1(rgyud): gsol to// lha chen po bdag gis slad rol gyi mi rnams las 'di skad du/ bdag gi bu sdug tha chungs stod ces mchi ba thos lags so// rgyal pos tshig de thos pa dang /
177a2(rgyud): shin tu skrag par gyur pas/ brnangs bzhin du smre tshig 'di skad du kyi hud sdug bsngal lo// deng nga'i bu yid du 'ong ba stor bar gyur to zhes smras nas/ mchi ma phyis te btsun mo la spro ba bskyed
177a3(rgyud): nas 'di skad du bzhin bzang khyod mya ngan ma byed cig/ da deng lhan cig phyir byung ste bu sdug btsal bar bya'o zhes smras nas/ rgyal po btsun mo dang skye bo'i tshogs mang po dang lhan cig tu grong
177a4(rgyud): khyer nas phyir byung ste/ so sor gyes te phyogs kun tu btsal ba las/ ring pa ma lon par blon po chen po zhig nye bar 'ongs te/ rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// lha rgyal bu bzhugs zhes
177a5(rgyud): thos pas/ thugs ngan mi mdzad du gsol/ rgyal bu tha chungs ni da dung mi gda' lags so// rgyal pos tshig de thos pa dang smre sngags bton nas 'di skad du kyi hud nga'i bu yid du 'ong ba
177a6(rgyud): stosbyor bar gyur to zhes smras par gyur to// dang po bu yod tshe na dga' ba chung // phyis ni bu stor tshe na sdug bsngal che// gal te bu srog ni slar thob na// nga yi lus shi sdug bsngal ci yang med// btsun
177a7(rgyud): mos de skad thos pa dang / dper na mangs phog pa bzhin du mya ngan gyis kun tu dkris par gyur pas/ smre tshig 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gi bu gsum 'khor dang bcas par ni// nags tshal/
177b1(rgyud): dong ste lhan cig rtse ba las/ du sdug tha chungs gcig pu ma 'ongs pas// nges par bral ba'i lhas ngan dngos po yod 'gyur ba/ de'i 'og tu yang blon po 'bring po rgyal po'i drung du nye bar 'ongs pa las/
177b2(rgyud): rgyal pos blon po de la bu sdug gang na 'dug ces smras pa las/ blon po 'bring pos de yid la gcags te ngus pas/ lkog ma dang lde'ang bskams nas tshig 'byen cing lan 'debs kyang ma rus pa
177b3(rgyud): dang / btsun mos 'di skad ces dris so// bu chung da ltar gang na myur du smos// bdag gi lus gdung kun tu bsregs par gyur// myos 'khrugs rmongs pas nang gi sems nyid stor// bdag gi zang
177b4(rgyud): ninide ringags snyam byed// de nas blon po 'bring pos rgyal bus lus yongs su btang ba'i dngos po de dag zhib tu rgyal po la gsol te shes par byas pa dang / rgyal po dang btsun mos gtam de thos nas/
177b5(rgyud): sme zhing mchi mas brnangs bzhin du lus yongs su btang ba'i sa phyogs myur zhing rings par dong ste/ 'od ma'i tshal byang chub sems dpas lus yongs su btang ba'i gnas su phyin nas/ rus pa rnams
177b6(rgyud): kun tu 'thor ba mthong ba dang / cig car sa la 'gyel te shi ba dang 'dra bar brgyal bar gyur pas/ de dper na rlung drag pos ljon shing chen po 'gyel ba bzhin du sems rmongs shing dran pa stor bas shes
177b7(rgyud): paci'ang med par gyur to// de nas blon po chen po la sogs pas chus kun tu gtor ba dang / rgyal po dang btsun mo ring zhig lon nas gdong dran pa thob par gyur to// de nas lag pa bteg ste 'dug/
178a1(rgyud): nas smre tshig smras pa/ kyi hung bu sdug mdzes pa'i mtshan ldan pa// ci'i phyir 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal sngar 'ongs gtses// gal te khyod kyi mdun du bdag shin// 'di 'dran/
178a2(rgyud): sdug bsngal mthong bar ga la 'gyur// de nas btsun mo myos shing brgyal ba khad kyis zhi bar gyur nas kyang / skra long long por gyur te/ lag pa gnyis kyis brang brdungs nas/ nya skams la 'byu
178a3(rgyud): ba bzhin du sa la 'gre ste/ ba bu stor ba bzhin du ngus nas smre tshig smras pa/ bdag gi bu ni sus gtubs na// rus pa lhag ma sa la gtor/ bdag gi bu sdug stor bas na// mya ngan sme ba rang mi theg
178a4(rgyud): kyi hud bu ni sus bsad na// mya ngan dngos po 'di 'dra mthong // bdag snying rdo rje ma yin nam// ci yi phyir na gas ma gyur// bdag gi rmi lam nu ma gnyis// gzhan dag gis ni bcad pa dang /
178a5(rgyud): so rnams lhung bar mthong bas na// deng ni sdug bsngal chen po myong / phug ron phrug gu gsum las ni// gcig ni khras khyer mthong bas na// deng ni bu sdug stor gyur pas/ ltas ngan ston la
178a6(rgyud): mi bden med// de nas rgyal po chen po de btsun mo dang / bu gnyis dang bcas par brtse bar gtugs te ngus nas rgyan thams cad bkrol te/ skye bo'i tshogs mang po dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems
178a7(rgyud): dbas bzhag pa'i lus kyi ring bsrel bsdus te/ mchod pa bya ba'i phyir mchon rten gyi nang du bzhag go// kun dga' bo khyod kyis 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' de'i ring bsrel yin par rig par
178b1(rgyud): bya'o// yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba/ nga stor 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang ldan pa'i tshe na'ang / sems can dmyal ba dang
178b2(rgyud): yi dgas dang / dud 'gro'o skye gnas la sogs pa'i 'gro ba lnga po dag tu'ang rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su bskyabs nas phan btags te/ nges par 'byung ba thob par byas nas/ da ltar nyon mongs
178b3(rgyud): pa thams cad zad nas bag chags kyi lhag ma med de/ lha dang mi'i ston par gyur nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pas/ sems can re re'i phyir yang bskal pa mang po'i bar du/ sems can dmya
178b4(rgyud): ba dang gnas gzhan dag tu gnas te/ sdug bsngal sna tshogs dang du blangs nas skye shi dang nyon mongs pa'i 'khor ba las nges par 'byung ba thob par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de nas bcom
178b5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis don de nyid yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nga sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/ bskal pa grangs med tshad med snyed// res 'ga' yul gyi rgyal po byas// res
178b6(rgyud): 'ga' rgyal bu byas pa na// rtab par sbyin pa che ba btang // shin tu 'phangs pa'i lus btang bas// 'khor ba las ni nges byung ste// byang chub dam pa byin par smon// sngon byung yul chen zhig tu ni/
178b7(rgyud): yul bdag shing rta che zhes bya// rgyal po dpa' bo zhes bya ba// rtag par sbyin gtong ser sna med// de la phu bo gnyis yod de// sgra chen lha chen zhes bya ba// gsum po lhan cig phyir byung ste// mthar
179a1(rgyud): gyis ri dang nags tshal phyin// stug mo bkres pas nyen mthong nas// 'di 'dra'i sems ni bskyed par gyur// sug mo bkres mes rab bsregs kyang // gzhan bzar rung ba cis/
179a2(rgyud): med/ skyes chen 'di 'dra mthong nas ni// de yis bu ni zos ngogs phyir// chags med lus ni rab btang nas// bu bskyabs rmas pa med par byas// sa chen dang ni ri rnams kyang // dus gcig thams
179a3(rgyud): cad rab tu gtos// chu klung rgya mtsho shin tu 'khrug/ rlabs chu dag ni gyen du 'bab// gnam sa 'od ni sbyor bas na// mun nag ci yang mthong ba med// nags tshal dgon pa'i gcan gzan rnams/
179a4(rgyud): 'bur rgyug rnams ni yongs su spangs// bu gnyis ci'i phyir ma log ces// mya ngan brtse ba'i sdug bsngal skyes// g.yog 'khor mang po rnams dang ni// nags tshal kun tu yongs su btsal// spun gnyis lhan
179a5(rgyud): cig rab 'grogs te// ri zab nags su phyin nas ni// phyogs bzhir bltas kyang mi ma mthong // stag mo mthong ba'i gnas stong du// ma dang bu bdun bcas par ni// thams cad khrag gis kha bskus
179a6(rgyud): dpa' rus pa stag mo sgra yi rnams// sa la kun tu 'thor ba mthong // gzhan yang khrag ni zags pa rnams// 'od ma'i tshal kun 'bags pa dag/ phu bo gnyis kyis mthong nas ni// sems la 'jin
179a7(rgyud): skrag chen po skyes// gnyis ka brgyal nas sa la 'gyel// 'khrugs myos ci yang mi dran pas// sa rdul dag gis lus kun gos// rnam shes drug ni dran pa nyams// rgyal bu g.yog ni mang po rnams//
179b1(rgyud): de tshe sems la mya ngan skyes// chu gtor dran pa thob nas kyang // lag btes skang ces phyung ste dus// byang chub sems dpa'i lus btang ste/ byams pa'i ma ni pho brang dang // zung mang lnga brgya
179b2(rgyud): rnams dang ni// lhan cig longs spyod myong ba las// btsun mo ngam pa'i num gnyis/ 'ang gi nu'o zags gyur pas// lus kun khab kyi drug pa bzhin/ shin tu sdug bsngal rab tu byed// sa
179b3(rgyud): 'du shes skyes pas na// mya ngan zug rngu sems la zug/ rgyal po chen po zhes byas nas// sdug bsngal dngos po de dag bshad// cho nges smra ba mi bzod pas// brtse ba'i skad kyis rgyal po la/
179b4(rgyud): rgyal po chen po mkhyen par mdzod// deng bdag sdug bsngal chen po skyes// nu bo gnyis ni rang byung bas// bkab kyang bsam pa bzhin ma grub// khab kyis lus kun phug pa bzhin// mya ngan brang
179b5(rgyud): nags la thug/ bdag ni g.yar lam snga ltas ngan// nges par bu sdug stor bar gyur// lhas ni bdag gi srog skyobs la// bu ni gum gson mkhyen par mdzod// g.yar lam phug ron gsum
179b6(rgyud): mthong ba// chung ngu de ni bu sdug lags// khras ni phrogs te 'tshal bas na// mya ngan rdzogs par gsol ba dka'// deng bdag mya ngan mtshor bying bas// 'chi bar 'gyur ba ring mi thogs// bu srog
179b7(rgyud): mi gson glo ba chung // myur ba nyid du btsal bar gsol// gzhan yang slad rol ma rnams las// bu chung ma rnyed thos pas na// deng bdag sems ni rab mi bde// lhas ni bdag la brtse bar mdzod/
180a1(rgyud): brgyan mos de skad smras nas ni// lus btags la rab tu brdabs// rab tu brtse bas sems brgyal myos// rab rmongs shes pa ci yang med// nang 'khor bud med btsun mor/
180a2(rgyud): brgyal te sa la 'argyal mthong nas// skad tshor phyung ste rab tu ngus// mya ngan dngangs smag gnas kyang sto// rgyal pos tshig thos pas na// mya ngan rang nyid gzungs nus// blon po thams cad
180a3(rgyud): bkug nas ni// bu sdug tshol bar yongs su bkye// thams cad grong khyer phyir byung ste// de dag de dag kun tu btsal// ngus nas mi ni mang po la// rgyal bu gang na yod ces smras// da ltar gson
180a4(rgyud): nam 'on te shi/ gang du song ba su yis shes// ji ltar byas na mthong gyur nas// bdag cag mya ngan bsal bar 'gyur// skye bo mang po thams cad kun// rgyal bu de ni shi zer bas// thos pa thams
180a5(rgyud): cad rab tu gdung // smre sngags sdug bsngal brjod par dga'// de tshe rgyal po shing rta che// cho nges smras nas stan las langs// btsun mo'i drung du nyer song ste// de yi lus la chus kyang gtor
180a6(rgyud): btsun mo chus ni gtor bas na// ring zhig lon nas dran pa thob// rab smras rgyal po la zhus pa// bdag bu da ltar gang na mchis// rgyal pos btsun mo la bsgo ba// ngas ni pho nya mang bkye ste// phyogs/
180a7(rgyud): bzhir rgyal bu tshol bcug na// da dung gtam skyel yongs ma 'ongs// rgyal pos btsun mo yang bsgo ba// khyod ni mya ngan ma byed par// re zhig rang nyid bde bar byos// lhan cig phyir byung btsal bar bya/
180b1(rgyud): danas rgyal po bdud mo bcas/ banon pa 'on nas mdu d+hangs// skye ba'i srang kyis tshangs btag/ gdung sems sa skye 'bar byabab+hA rabs rna rabs brtas dngas/ rnam pa /
180b2(rgyud): su zong khyer byung // 'artse ba'i drwag+sa mi chad par// sa sor rgyam bu yangs su bcal// rgyal pos zla sdug btsal ba'i phyir// mig gis phyogs bzhir bzlas pa las// smra ba shig thag gas
180b3(rgyud): lus bslus te// lus kun rdul gyis gos pa dang // ngus nas mdun bcad 'ong ba yi// mi zhig kyang ni mthong bar gyur// rgyal pos ltas don de mthong nas// lhag par mya ngan skyes par gyur
180b4(rgyud): rgyal pos lag pa gnyis bteg nas// brtse bas dus te bkag ma nus// thog mar blon po chen po zhig/ rings stabs rgyal po'i drung 'ongs nas// rgyal po de la 'di skad smras// lha ni thugs
180b5(rgyud): ngan mi mdzad gsol// lha yi thugs brtse sras bu de// da dung rung par ma gyur kyang // ring por mi thogs phyin par mtsho// lha ni thugs ngan mi mdzad gsol// rgyal po yang ni song ba las/
180b6(rgyud): blon po 'bring po 'ongs pa mthong // blon po rgyal po'i drung 'ongs nas// dus te rgyal la 'di skad smras// rgyal bu gnyis ni bzhugs pa yang // mya ngan zhugs kyis yongs su gdungs// rgyal bu \u0f7f/
180b7(rgyud): rlungs gang lags pa// de ni mi rtag pa yis med// bu bcas stag mo lhogs pa zhig/ bu 'chel snyam pa gzigs nas ci// rgyal bu sems can chen po yis// thugs rje chen po'i sems
181a1(rgyud): bskyed de/ bla med las ni gnyer ba dang / mang po thams cad 'azla ba'i slad/ byang chub mchog la 'dugs bcings/ shin tu za 'angs rgyamatsho bzhin// ring tsa rtsal
181a2(rgyud): 'dzegs nas ni// stag mo ltogs mdun sku yang bor// nyam chung 'tshal rngo ma thogs nas// 'od mas mgur du khrag phyung bas// rgyal bu'i sku ni 'tshal bas na// sku gdung lhag ma tsam zhig
181a3(rgyud): lus 'de tshe rgyal po btsun mor bcas// de skad thos nas brgyal bar gyur// sems ni mya ngan mtshor bying ste// nyon mongs me yis rab tu bsregs// blon pos tsan dan chu dag gis// rgyal po
181a4(rgyud): btsun mor gtor bas na// cig car langs nas rab tu ngus// lag bteg brang dag la yang brdungs// blon po chung ngu 'ongs nas ni// rgyal po de la 'di skad smras// bdag gi rgyal bu gnyis
181a5(rgyud): po ni// tshal na brgyal bar gyur pa mthong // bdag gis chab grang gtor bas na// dran pa cung zad thob par gyur// phyogs bzhi dag ni gzigs pas na// rab tu 'bar me kun khyab 'dra// skad
181a6(rgyud): cig bzhengs kyang slar yang 'gyel// cho nges bdag nyid 'dzin mi spyod// phyag bteg brtse ba'i tshig dag gis// gcung gi ya mtshan bsngags par mdzad// rgyal pos de skad thos nas kyang /
181a7(rgyud): mya ngan me yis lhag par bcos// btsun mos rab tu ngus nas ni// skad cer phyung ste 'di skad smras// bdag gi bu sdug lhag par byams pa de// mi rtag srin po dag gis ming bar gyur/ 8
181b1(rgyud): sngar bu gnyis lus par gyur pa yang // mya ngan me yis rab sregs nyon yang mongs// bdag deng ri drung dag tu myur song la// spro bskyer srog gi lhag ma bsrung bar bya// de nas bzhon zhon lam/
181b2(rgyud): du myur zhugs nas// rtse gcig sems kyis lus spangs brag drung song // bu gnyis yid gcags brang brdungs spyod tshul nyams// 'gro bzhin du ba dag dang lam du 'phrang // pha mas pang blangs
181b3(rgyud): mya ngan smra sngags bton// cig car lus btang ri dang nags su dong // byang chub sems dpas lus spangs nas phyin nas// lhan cig 'dus nas rab dus sdug bsngal tshe// rgyan 'phreng bkrol te
181b4(rgyud): snying tshim ngus nas ni// byang chub sems dpa'i rus bu lhag ma bsdus// skye bo mang pos lhan cig mchod pa byas// rin chen sna bdun mchod rten brtsigs nas ni// ring bsrel de ni sgom gyi
181b5(rgyud): nang du bzhag/ mya ngan bcas bzhin slar ni grong khyer dong // kun dga' la ni bka' stsal pa// sngon byung sems can chen po ni// shAkya thub pa nga yin pas// gzhan yin snyam du bsam mi
181b6(rgyud): bya ba rgyal po zas gtsang yab yin te// btsun mo pa yum sgyu 'phrul yin// rgyal bu chen po byams pa yin// rgyal bu 'bring po 'jam dpal yin// stag mo skye dgu'i bdag mo yin/
181b7(rgyud): bu lnga dge slong lnga po yin// gcig ni mo 'gal chen po'i bu// gcig ni shA ri'i bu yin no// ngas ni khyed cag thams cad la// sngon gzhan phan btags pa yi gtam// byang chub sems
182a1(rgyud): dpa'i spyod pa bshad// sangs rgyas 'grub rgyu 'di slob byos// byang chub sems dpas lus btang che// smon lam rgya chen 'di skad btag// bdag lus rus pa lhag
182a2(rgyud): ma yis// ma 'ongs sems can phan 'dogs shog/ 'di ni lus btang gnas yin te// rin chen sna bdun mchod rten de// lo ni tshad med par du gnas// de nas sa 'og byin par 'gyur// sngon gyi
182a3(rgyud): smon lam mthu stobs kyis// rkyen ni ji bzhin sems can zlos// lha mi kun la phan gdags phyir// sa las 'phags te byung ba yin// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon rgyud 'di bstan pa na/
182a4(rgyud): lha dang mi skye bo'i tshogs tshad med grangs med pa snyed yongs su gdung ba dang dga' ba chen po skyes te/ sngon chad nam yang 'di lta bu ma byung ngo zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/ thams cad bla na med pa
182a5(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo la yang bka' stsal pa ngas ni drin lan blan pa'i phyir gus pas phyag byas pa yin no// bcom ldan
182a6(rgyud): 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu mngon par bsdus pa dang / mchod rten de yang slar sa'i 'og tu bying bar gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ lus yongs
182a7(rgyud): su btang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o// / de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
182b1(rgyud): mas nas/ byang chubasams dpa'i tshogs bye ba khrug khrig brgya myong cang med pa snyeng sa so nas 'ang bri zhing khams nas bya nad kyi lung thal rnyil phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan /
182b2(rgyud): lhags nas yang lag lnga sa la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas sems rtse gcig tu thal mo sbyar te/ mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bskyod pa/
182b3(rgyud): bcom ldan su mchog gsar gyi kha dog ldan// 'od zer kun gsal gser gyi ri ba 'ang// rnam dag rab mnyen pad+ma dag dang mtshungs// mtshan mchog ngam pa tshang med kun tu bkod// mtshan ni sum/
182b4(rgyud): cu rtsa gnyis rab brgyan te// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs// 'od zer rab gsal dpe zla yong ma mchis// dri bral dper na rnam dag zla nya 'dra// gsung dbyangs rab dang shin tu gya nom/
182b5(rgyud): pas seng ge bzhin du 'brug sgra sgrogs par mdzad// dam pa rnam brkyang dbang po mthun mdzad pas// ka la bing ka'i sgra sgrogs kun las 'phags/ bsod nams brgya yi mtshan mchog sku
182b6(rgyud): brgyan pas// 'od zer phun tshogs dri ma yongs mi mnga'// mkhyen blo rab gsal dper na rgya mtsho 'dra// yon tan rgya chen nam mkha' dag dang mtshungs// yongs rdzogs 'od zer phyogs bcu'i 'jig
182b7(rgyud): rten bkang // rkyen ni ji bzhin sems can sgrol bar mdzad// nyon mongs srid pa'i bag chags kun gsal nas// chos kyi sgron ma rtag par rgyun mi chad// thugs brtses sems can dag la phan 'dog/
183a1(rgyud): pas 'dra wAr spad ma'i dus tshe bde ba stsol// rtag par don mchog dam pa rab bshad nas// yang dag rab dben mya ngan 'das la 'god// bcom ldar bdud rtsi chos mchog
183a2(rgyud): rab bstan nas// bdud rtsi'i gya nom don ni su la mdzad pas// bdud rtsi'i grong khyer dag tu rab drangs nas// bdud rtsi'i 'dus ma byas kyi bde la 'god// rtag par 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po nas/
183a3(rgyud): sdug bsngal sems can thams cad thar bar mdzad// de dag bde ba shul du rab btsud de// de bzhin bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab stsol// bcom ldan yon tan rgya mtsho zab la yangs// dpe ni mang po//
183a4(rgyud): ngag gis rig mi 'gyur// rtag par kun la thugs rje cher gzigs pas// thabs mkhyen brtson 'grus dag ni rgyun mi 'chad// bcom ldan yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' ma mchis// bskal pa bye ba brgya
183a5(rgyud): stong bar du ni// lha mi thams cad lhan cig dpag bsams kyang // cha shas tsam yang rig par yod mi 'gyur// bdag cag sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho las// thigs pa 'ga' zhig bsngags
183a6(rgyud): pa brjod pa yi// bsod nams de dag skye dgu yongs bsngos nas// thams cad byang chub 'bras bu myur thob smon// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' mang po de dag la bka'
183a7(rgyud): stsal pa/ legs so legs so// khyed kyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa nyid kyis sems can la phan 'dogs shing / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgya cher byed/
183b1(rgyud): par 'gyur bas/ sdig pa rnams yongs su byang nas/ bsod nams tshad mang ba snyeng skye bar 'gyur ro// gser 'ong ngam pa mchog tu rnam par dul ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las phyogs bcu'i byang
183b2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bstags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog star las langs te/ bra gos brog pa
183b3(rgyud): gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ba sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod pa / thub pa
183b4(rgyud): bsod nams brgya yi mtshar rdzogs shing // yon tan tshad ma mchis pas sku rab brgyan// rnam dag rgya che sems can blta mos las// nyi ma stong bzhin 'od kyis sdang bar mdzad// kha dog mtha'
183b5(rgyud): yas 'od ni rab tu rgyas// rin chen pad+ma'i phung bzhin mtshan rnams mdzes// dper na gdugs shar nam mkha' snang bzhin bgyid// kha dog dkar gsal gser gyi mdog kyang gnon// gser gyi ri
183b6(rgyud): bzhin 'od kyis gsal mdzad pas// zhing ni brgya stong mang po kun tu khyab// sems can sdug bsngal tshad med zhi mdzad nas/ bde ba dam pa mtha' yas sprul bar mdzad// mtshan rnams phun
183b7(rgyud): tshogs rnam dag rab mdzes pas// sems can blta mos skyo ba yongs ma mchis// dbu skra rab mnyen kha dog mthon mthing gnas// bung ba nag pos me tog sdug pa 'dra// dges dang btang ston/
184a1(rgyud): chen po dag pas brgyan// khyams pa thugs rje dag ni phun sum tshogs// mtshan dang dpe byad dam pa rab mdzes pa// byang chub yan lag chos las grub pa lags// bcom ldan/
184a2(rgyud): bsod nams phan yon mang btang bas// de dag rtag tu bde ba chen po 'thob// yon tan dam pa sna tshogs rab rgyas pas// 'od kyis zhing ni brgya stong snang bar mdzad// bcom ldan 'od zer shin tu rdzogs
184a3(rgyud): pas na// dper na gdugs kyis nam mkha' kun khyab 'dra// bcom ldan ri rab bzhin du yon tan ldan// phyogs bcu kun tu khyab par ston par mdzad// bcom ldan gser zhal dam pa rab tu mdzes
184a4(rgyud): tshems dkar gtams pa'i dung gi kha dog 'dra// bcom ldan zhal mdzes dpe zla yod ma mchis// smin mtshams pa spu rtag par g.yas su 'khyil// 'od mnyen dkar gsal chu shel dag dang mtshungs//
184a5(rgyud): dper na zla nya nam mkha'i khams gnas 'dra// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags
184a6(rgyud): pa brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pas/ thams cad la phan 'dogs par 'gyur zhing / gang dag khong du ma chud pa de dag kyang rjes su mthun par rnal 'byor sgom pa la slob par 'gyur ro// gser
184a7(rgyud): 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// / de nas byang
184b1(rgyud): nub kyi shing gi lha mos kyang tshigs su bcad pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ bcom ldan nam dag blo la gus phyag 'tshal// yang dag chos gnyer blo la gus phyag 'tshal// rdzos
184b2(rgyud): spyod spong ba'i blol bus phyag 'tshal// rnam rtog mi mnga' thol gus phyag 'tshal// kye ma ngo mtshar bcom ldan mtha' yas spyod// kye ma mthong dka' u du byar 'dra// kye mngo mtshar rtsa tsha/
184b3(rgyud): ro rgyal 'dra// kye ma ngo mtshor bde gshegs 'od tshad med// kye ma ngo mtshar kha sbyar smon lam che// kye ma ngo mtshar shA ka ri'i nyi ma 'das// 'di 'dra'i mdo sde dkon mchog bkas bshad nas// @
184b4(rgyud): bas skye dgu rnams la phan 'dogs mdzad// thub pa rab dben dbang po mnyam 'jog pas// rab zhi mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer gshegs// rab dben gzungs kyi sgo la rab zhugs pas// rab
184b5(rgyud): dben spyod yul zab mo dag kyang mkhyen// rkang gnyis gtso bo rab dben bzhugs pas na// nyan thos slob ma lus kyang de bzhin stong // chos rnams thams cad ngo bo ma mchis pas// sems can thams
184b6(rgyud): cad kyang ni stong zhing dben// bdag ni rtag tu bcom ldan dran par bgyid// bdag ni rtag tu bcom ldan mthong bar mos// bdag ni rtag tu gus sems bskyed pas na// rtag par de bzhin gshegs pa
184b7(rgyud): gdugs dang mjal// bdag ni rtag tu bcom ldan phyag bgyis nas// rtag par zhal blta sems kyis mi spong smon// rab gdung du sems par chang ma mchis pas// rtag par rim gro bgyid kyang skyo mi bgyid
185a1(rgyud): bcom ldan thugs rje'i thugs ni rab bskyed nas// mdangs ldan zhal ni bdag gis rtag mthong mdzod// bcom ldan nyan thos dge 'dun rnam dag pas// rtag par lha mi dag ni
185a2(rgyud): bsgral bar bgyi// sku ni rang bzhin rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra// sgyu ma smig rgyu chab kyi zla ba mtshungs// bdud rtsi mya ngan 'das pa'i chos bshad nas// yon tan phung po thams cad bskyed par smon//
185a3(rgyud): bcom ldan rnam dag spyod yul byams pa dang // bcom ldan rnam dge spyod yul bsam mi khyab// nyan thos rang rgyal gzhal bar mi 'gyur zhing // drang srong byang chub sems dpa'i dpog mi 'gyur// de bzhin
185a4(rgyud): gshegs pas bdag la thugs brtse nas// thugs rje chen po'i sku ni rtag mthong smon// las gsum ngal med byams gtso mchod nas ni// myur du nges 'byung yang dag mtha' phyogs smon// de nas
185a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bsngags pa brjod nas/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis shing gi lha mo la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi lha mo khyed kyis nga'i yang dag pa'i mi brdzun pa'i chos kyi sku rnam
185a6(rgyud): bar dag pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas/ bdag gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ mtshan mchog gya nom pa yang dag par bsgrags pa legs so legs so// bsod nams 'dis khyod myur du bla na bar
185a7(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur zhing / sems can thams cad mtshungs par rnal 'byor skom par 'gyur la/ gang gis thos pa de dag thams cad kyang tha med
185b1(rgyud): ba'i bdud rtsi'i chos kyi sgor 'jug par 'gyur ro// gsar 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyam po las/ byang chub kyi shing gi lha mos bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u su nyi shu dadu
185b2(rgyud): pa'o// / de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mo stan las langs te/ gus pas thal mo sbyar nas yang dag pa'i tshig gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa de/
185b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/ sku yang dag pa gser gyi kha dog dang ldan pa/ mgur dung gi dbyibs dang zhal zla ba nya ba lta bu/ spyan pad+ma
185b4(rgyud): sngon po dang mtshungs pa/ sgros dmar zhing bzang ba/ chu shel gyi kha dog dang 'dra ba/ shangs kyi dbyibs mtho zhing drang bas gser gyi gar bu bcad pa lta bur gyur pa/ dkar zhing thags bzang bas
185b5(rgyud): me tog ku mu da dang mtshungs pa/ 'od kyis kun tu snang bar mdzad pas nyi ma brgya stong lta bur gyur pa/ 'od kyis kha dog kun tu khyab pa/ 'dzam bu gser dang 'dra ba'i tshig gsung la nor cing 'khrul
185b6(rgyud): pa med pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yang dag par bstan nas byang chub rnam pa gsum gyi lam yang dag par 'byed pa/ thugs rtag tu rnam par dag cing thugs kyi mos pa'ang de bzhin du gyur pa
185b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i gnas dang spyod yul rnams dag par gyur pa/ spyod lam ma lags pa spangs pas gshegs shing bzhugs pa dag la 'khrul pa mi mnga' ba/ lo drug dka' ba mdzad
186a1(rgyud): nas chos kyi 'khor lo lan gsum bskor ba/ sdug bsngal ba'i sems can yongs su bzlas nas pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin par mdzad pa/ sku'i mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa//
186a2(rgyud): n+ya gro d+ha'i ljon shing lta bur gyur pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su bsgoms pas 'phrin las rnam pa gsum la skyon mi mnga' ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pas bdag dang gzhan gyi don
186a3(rgyud): phun sum tshogs par mdzad pa gang ci gsung yang rung ste/ rtag par sems can gyi don du 'gyur bar mdzad pa/ don ma mchis par mi gsung ba shAkya'i rigs kyi nang nas seng ge chen por gyur pas
186a4(rgyud): rab tu brtan cing dpa' ba/ rnam par thar pa brgyad phun sun tshogs par gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// deng bdag gi nyams kyis ji tsam lcogs pa'i rjes su de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi phyogs
186a5(rgyud): las cung zad tsam zhig bsngags pa brjod pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sbrang bus rgya mtsho chen po'i chab 'tshal ba dang 'dra yang / bsod nams de'i dbang gis sems can thams cad 'khor ba gtan du
186a6(rgyud): spangs nas/ bla na med pa'i lam mngon par grub par smon no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha mo spongs pa chen mo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis yun ring po nas bsgoms pa las spobs
186a7(rgyud): pa chen po dang ldan par gyur nas/ deng nga'i yon tan rgya cher bsngags pa brjod pa legs so legs so// 'di'i dbang gis khyod myur du bla na med pa'i chos kyi sgo mo mngon par rtogs nas mtshan dang
186b1(rgyud): dab byad bzang po phun sum tshogs par gyur te/ thams cad la rgya cher phan 'dogs par gyur to// gser 'ong dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las ka lha mo spongs pa chen mos bsngags/
186b2(rgyud): pa brjod pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' tshad med snyed rnams dang / lha dang mi rnams dang / 'khor mang po rnams la
186b3(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ khyed kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ ngas bskal pa chen po tshad med grangs med pa nas/ nan tan brtson 'grus kyis dka' ba spyad de thob pa'i chos shin tu zab pa byang chub kyi
186b4(rgyud): rgyurgyu yang dag pa gang yin pa de ni khyed la yang dag par bstan zin na/ khyed cag las su zhig rab tu brtul ba'i sems bskyed nas/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu chos kyi rnam grang
186b5(rgyud): 'di gus pas yongs su bsrungs nas/ rgya cher yang dag par spel te/ yang dag pa'i chos 'jig rten na yun ring du gnas par byed do// de nas 'khor mang po'i nang nas/ byang chub sems
186b6(rgyud): dpa' chen po bye ba phrag drug cu dang / lha'i 'khor phal mang po bye ba phrag drug cus mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad la'ang mos pa'i sems mchis pas/
186b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa tshad ma mchis pa nas/ nan tan brtson 'grus kyis dka' ba mdzad de brnyes pa'i chos shin tu zab pa'i byang chub rgyu yang dag par gang lags pa de la gus pas yod/
187a1(rgyud): su bsrungs nas/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na'ang lus dang srog la 'phangs pa ma mchis pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher spel te
187a2(rgyud): yang dag pa'i chos 'jig rten na yun ring du gnas par bgyid do zhes gsol to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mang po de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad de gsol
187a3(rgyud): pa/ bcom ldan yang dag bden tshig gsung // yang dag chos la rab tu zhugs// yang dag bden pa de dbang gis// mdo sde 'di ni srung 'dzin bgyid// thugs rje chen po go mnabs nas/
187a4(rgyud): thugs rje che la rab tu bzhugs// da dung thugs rje de stobs kyis// mdo sde 'di ni srung 'dzin bgyid// bsod nams tshogs ni yongs rdzogs nas// ye shes tshogs ni rab tu bskyed// tshogs
187a5(rgyud): rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i slad// mdo sde 'di ni srung 'dzin bgyid// bdud rnams thams cad rab btul te// log smra thams cad rnam par shig/ ngan lha thams cad bsal ba'i slad//
187a6(rgyud): mdo sde 'di ni srung 'dzin bgyid// 'jig rten skyong dang brgya byin dang // tshangs pa dang ni lha ma yin// klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pas// mdo sde 'di ni srung 'dzin bgyid// sa yi steng
187a7(rgyud): dang mkha' gnas pa// yun ring 'dir ni gnas pa rnams// bcom ldan bstan pa 'dzin bgyid pas// mdo sde 'di ni srung 'dzin bgyid// tshangs pa'i bzhugs pa mtshungs ldan zhing // 'phags/
187b1(rgyud): bden bzhi yis rab brgyan nas// bdud rnams dag ni pham mdzad slad// mdo sde 'di ni srang 'dzin bgyid// nam mkha' thogs bcas 'gyur yang srid// phyogs bcas nam mkhar 'gyur/
187b2(rgyud): srid kyi// sangs rgyas rnams kyis srung bzung ba// lus kyang bskul zhing bskyod mi 'gyur// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi bcom ldan 'das kyis dam pa'i chos 'di srung ba bkas bshad
187b3(rgyud): pa thos pa dang / so so nas rjes su yi rang ba'i sems bskyed nas/ yang dag pa'i chos yongs su srung ba'i sems kyis cig car mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bdag cag
187b4(rgyud): rado sde 'di la ni// bu dang bu mo 'khor dang bcas// thams cad rtse gcig rab bsrungs nas// rgya cher yang dag spel bar bgyid// gang zhig mdo 'di rab bzung nas// byang chub rgyu ni sgrub bgyid
187b5(rgyud): nabadag cag rtag par phyogs bzhi nas// srung skyob rim gro dag kyang bgyid// de nas lha'i dbang pos gus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ sangs rgyas chos ni thugs
187b6(rgyud): su chud// drin ni bsab par bzhed pa na// byang chub sems dpa' phan gdags slad// 'jig rten 'das kyang mdo sde gsungs// bdag kyang sangs rgyas de dag la// drin bsab slad du rtag mchod
187b7(rgyud): nas 'di 'dra'i mdo sde 'di dang ni// mdo sde 'di la srung bar bgyid// de nas dga' ldan pa'i lha'i bu rnams gus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bcom ldan gsung
188a1(rgyud): pa'i mdo sde 'di// gang zhig 'dzin par bgyis pa ni// byang chub gnas skabs gnas pas na// dga' ldan wAr ni skye bar 'gyur// bcom ldan bdag cag rab tu gnas/
188a2(rgyud): lha yi rnam smin mchog spangs nas// 'dzam gling dag tu gnas pas na// mdo sde 'di ni sgrog par bgyid// de nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs pa lha'i
188a3(rgyud): rgyal pos gus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bsam gtan rnams dang theg rnams dang // rnam thar tshad med thams cad kyang // mdo sde 'di las byung bas na/
188a4(rgyud): de slad mdo sde 'di rab gsungs// mdo sde 'di ni ston pa'i gnas// tshangs pa'i bde ba bdag spangs nas// mdo sde 'di ni mnyan pa'i slad// rtag par yongs su srung skyob bgyid// de
188a5(rgyud): nas bdud kyi rgyal po'i bu tshong dpon zhes bya bas yang gus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ yang dag don dang ldan pa'i mdo// bdud gcod rjes su mi 'brang zhing
188a6(rgyud): bdud kyi las ngan skyong bgyid pa// 'di ni gang zhig 'dzin bgyid na// bdag cag mdo sde 'di la ni// brtson pa dag gis rab bsrungs nas// brtson 'grus chen po'i sems bskyed de//
188a7(rgyud): kun tu rgya cher spel bar bgyid// de nas bdud kyi rgyal pos thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gang zhig mdo sde 'di bzung nas// nyon mongs rnams ni pham bgyid pa/
188b1(rgyud): 'dra'i sems can de dag la// srung skyob pa de la 'god par bgyid// mdo sde 'di ni gang 'chang ba// bdud rnams kyis ni grags mi rnyed// bcom ldan byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus// bdag/
188b2(rgyud): gis de la srung bar bgyid// de nas lha'i bu bkra shis dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub mchog/ mdo sde 'di
188b3(rgyud): las ston pas na// gang zhig mdo sde 'dzin bgyid na// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'gyur// bdag gis mdo sde 'di bzung nas// bye ba'i lha la rab bshad nas// gus par nyan
188b4(rgyud): par bgyid pa dag/ byang chub gnas su skul bar bgyid// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ byang chub la ni rab gnas
188b5(rgyud): nas// gsol ba ma btab grogs mthong na// lus srog dag kyang rab spangs nas// mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di srung bgyid// 'di 'dra'i chos ni bdag thos nas// dga' ldan lha gnas mchis
188b6(rgyud): nas kyang // bcom ldan byin rlabs dbang gis na// lha mi rgya chen ston par bgyid// de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos gus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol
188b7(rgyud): pa bcom ldan nyan thos thob par ni// bdag ni shes rab chung bar gsungs// deng bdag rang gi stobs kyi mthus// mdo sde 'di ni srung 'dzin bgyid// gang zhig mdo 'di 'dzin bgyi
189a1(rgyud): na bdag gi de ni rab bzung ste// tshig dang spobs pa'i mthu sprul nas// rjes 'brang rtag par legs zhes brjod// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun blos thal mo//
189a2(rgyud): sbyar tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bdag gis bcom ldan mngon sum du// mdo sde tshad med thos gyur kyang // chos mchog rgyal po 'di 'dra ba// nams kyang thos par yong ma gyur// deng
189a3(rgyud): bdag mdo 'di bcom ldan las// mngon thos yongs su bzung bas na// gang dag byang chub mos pa la// rgya chen rab tu spel bar bgyid// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'/
189a4(rgyud): rnams dang / lha dang mi'i 'khor mang po de dag so so nas/ mdo sde 'di rgya cher spel zhing rgyas pa dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bsrung bar sems bskyed nasabyang chub sem/
189a5(rgyud): dpa' rnams la yang dag par bskul te/ sems can la rgya cher phan 'dogs par gzigs pa dang / legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/ khyed kyis 'di ltar mdo sde'i rgyal po//
189a6(rgyud): mchog dam pa 'di sems rtse gcig tu rgya cher spel nas/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu'ang 'thor zhing nub par mi 'gyur bar byed pa de ni/ bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu yang
189a7(rgyud): dag pa yin pas/ bsod nams 'di snyed cig 'thob par 'gyur ba ni/ bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du brjod kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro// dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am
189b1(rgyud): dge bsnyed nam/ ngag bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la sogs pa gang la la zhig mchod pa dang bkur sti byas nas/ yi ger bris te rgya cher spel ba dang
189b2(rgyud): gzham dag la yang dag par ston par byed pas thob pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de'ang de bzhin no// de lta bas na khyed kyis kyang yang dag pa'i brtson pas rnal 'byor bsgom par bya'o zhes
189b3(rgyud): bka' stsal to// de nas na meng mtha' med pa'i gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i 'khor mang po rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos pas/ thams cad rang
189b4(rgyud): tu dga' bar gyur nas/ shin tu dang ba'i dad pas yang dag par blangs nas bka' bzhin du spyod par gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ yongs
189b5(rgyud): su gtad pa'i le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o// / 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
189b6(rgyud): rdzogs so// / zhu chen gyi mkhan po dang lo tsa ba bcom ldan 'das kyi ring lugs pa/ ban d+he chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe la bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
189b7(rgyud): n+ya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su bar+Na pra b+hA sa ut+ta ma sU tra in+da rA dzA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gser 'od
190a1(rgyud): dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
190a2(rgyud): dang rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab/ bya rgod phung po'i ri'i
190a3(rgyud): zom shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings zab mo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod yul dam pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / dge slong dgu khri brgyad stong dang thabs cig
190a4(rgyud): tu bzhugs pa thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa chen po/ glang po'i rgyal po ltar shin tu dul ba/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam/
190a5(rgyud): rnam par grol ba/ bya ba byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par sbyor ba yongs su bcad pa/ dbang phyug dam pa'i mchog thob pa/ tshul khrims rnam par dag pa la rab
190a6(rgyud): tu gnas pa/ thabs dang shes rab kyis yongs su bkod pa/ rnam par grol ba brgyad mngon du gyur cing / pha rol gyi mthar phyin par gyur pa la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u nga n+ya
190a7(rgyud): dang tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa ming chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa bzang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas
190b1(rgyud): bod spangs dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa chu bo 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / dga' bo dang 'di
190b2(rgyud): ngag la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams phye dro'i dus kyi cha/ so so nas nang du yang dag par 'jog pa las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
190b3(rgyud): la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khor ro// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba brgya stong dang yang thabs cig ste/ de dag
190b4(rgyud): kyang klu'i rgyal po chen po ltar dpal dang gzi brjid chen por ldan pas kun tu grags pa/ sbyin pa dang tshul khrims rnam par dag pa rtag tu srung bar mos pa dang / bzod pa dang brtson 'grus bskal
190b5(rgyud): ba grangs med par spyod pa/ bsam gtan kun las 'das pa'i dran pa mngon du gyur pa/ shes rab kyi sgo rnam par phye ba/ thabs mkhas pa shin tu bsgrubs pa/ dbang dam pas rnam par rol
190b6(rgyud): cing mngon par shes pa dam pa brnyes pa/ gzungs chen po thob pa/ spobs pa mi zad pa/ nyon mongs pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ myur du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
190b7(rgyud): pa'i ye shes thob cing / bdud dang phyir rgol ba'i dpung 'joms pa/ chos kyi rnga chen po brdung bas mu stegs can thams cad 'dul zhing sems rnam par dang bskyed par byed pa/ dam pa'i chos
191a1(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo skor nas lha dang mi rnams sgrol bar byed pa/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad brgyan par byed pa/ 'gro ba drug na gnas pa rnams la phan dam pa
191a2(rgyud): 'dogs pa/ ye shes chen po phun sum tshogs pa/ bzod pa chen po dang ldan pa/ byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i sems la gnas pa/ mthu chen po brtan pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad la
191a3(rgyud): bsnyen bkur byas pa/ yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing ma 'ongs pa'i mtha' klas pas gnas par yi dam chen po 'chang ba/ sangs rgyas mang po la rgyu rnam par dag pa bskyed pa/ dus gsum/
191a4(rgyud): gyi chos mi skye bar bzod pa thob pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul las shin tu 'das pa/ thabs mkhas pa chen pos 'jig rten 'dren pa/ ston pa chen pos bstan pa'i chos zab mo
191a5(rgyud): dgongs pa 'grel pa la mkhas pa/ stong pa nyid mngon du gyur pas the tsom yongs su chad par gyur pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang
191a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rtag par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtson pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mi gtong brtson pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'/
191a7(rgyud): byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / byang
191b1(rgyud): chub sems dpa' spobs pa chen pos bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhun po'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho zab mo'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po/
191b2(rgyud): tshelo tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tog chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' na ba mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag ma
191b3(rgyud): chen dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i stobs dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos chen mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' shin tu 'od bkod/
191b4(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od chen pos bkod dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims rnam dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' shin tu
191b5(rgyud): rnam dag blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems nam mkha' bzhin dang / byang chub sems dpa' smon lam chen po mi gtong ba dang / byang
191b6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' smar sbyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs nad sel dang / byang chub sems dpa' sman pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' dga' bas mthong ba'i rgyal po dang / bya
191b7(rgyud): chub sems dpa' lung bstan mchog thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen rnam dag 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen chos 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen grags
192a1(rgyud): dga' dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen grags pa mtha' med ston dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen seng ge'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen khyu mchog/
192a2(rgyud): sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen bkra shis dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen rin chen dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen nyi ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin/
192a3(rgyud): chen zla ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen skar ma'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen me'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen glog gi 'od dang / byang chub sems
192a4(rgyud): dpa' sprin chen 'brug sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen shes rab kun tu 'char ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen rnam dag char pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen
192a5(rgyud): me tog shing rgyal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen ut+pa la'i dri dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen rin po che tsan dan dri bas la sku dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen mun se la
192a6(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen rab rib sel ba la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad meng grangs med pa rnams so so nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe ga nang du yang
192a7(rgyud): dag par 'jog pa las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
192b1(rgyud): denas yang li tsa byi gzhon nu rnams la 'di lta ste/ gzhon nu seng ge'i 'od dang gzhon nu seng ge'i blo gros dang / gzhon nu chos sbyin dang / gzhon nu dbang po sbyin dang / gzhon nu 'ong
192b2(rgyud): chen dang / gzhon nu dpal chen dang / gzhon nu sangs rgyas skyong dang / gzhon nu chos skyong dang / gzhon nu dge 'dun skyong dang / gzhon nu rdo rje skyong dang / gzhon nu nam mkha' skyong dang
192b3(rgyud): gzhon nu nam mkha' sgrogs dang / rin chen snying po gzhon nu dang / bkra shis mchog gi snying po gzhon nu la sogs pa lnga 'bum brgyang stong de dag kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
192b4(rgyud): byang chub la bde bar gnas pa theg pa cher po la rab tu mos pa de dag so so nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag
192b5(rgyud): 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang lha'i sras po la 'di lta ste/ lha'i sras po dga' ba mthong ba dang / lha'i sras po rab dga' dang / lha'i sras po
192b6(rgyud): nyi 'od dang / lha'i sras po zla ba'i gtsug pud dang / lha'i sras po shes rab gsal dang / lha'i sras po nam mkha' rnam ngag shes rab dang / lha'i sras po nyon mongs sel dang lha'i sras po bkra/
192b7(rgyud): shes dang / de ngag la sogs pa lha'i sras po ba ni khri nyis stong yang theg pa cher po srung ba dang / yang dag pa'i chos rjes su 'dzin cing rgyun mi bachang par sngon lam rgya chen po btab pa de dag thams cad /
193a1(rgyud): kyang phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig
193a2(rgyud): tu 'khod do// gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po la 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po pad+mo dang / klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab ma dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs chen dang / klu'i rgyal po sgra chen dang / klu'i rgyal po rba
193a3(rgyud): rlabs chung dang / klu'i rgyal po klung 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po gser gdong dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po nyi khri brgyad stong po de dag kyang theg pa chen po'i chos 'chang zhing
193a4(rgyud): 'dzin par mos pa dang / yongs su rgyas pa dang / srung bar sems bskyed pa sha stag ste/ de dag thams cad kyang so so nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags nas
193a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa sum khri drug stong/
193a6(rgyud): la 'di lta ste/ gnod sbyin a mra dang / gnod sbyin a mra 'chang dang / gnod sbyin pad+mo 'od kyi snying po dang / gnod sbyin pad+mo'i gdong dang / gnod sbyin khro gnyer can dang / gnod sbyin 'jigs
193a7(rgyud): pa chen po ston dang / gnod sbyin sa g.yo byed dang / gnod sbyin zas 'phrog la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos yang dag pa la dad cing srung ba la brtson pa
193b1(rgyud): gnab ste/ de dag thams cad kyang phyi ro'i dus kyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ las gsum bskor ba byas nasu
193b2(rgyud): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po spos kyi glang po che mthu stobs rgyal po la sogs pa bzhi khri dgu stong dang / gzhan yang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang mi
193b3(rgyud): 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa dang / rI dang / nags tshal dang / chu bo dang / rgya mtsho'i lnga'i drang srong rnams dang / rgyal po chen po dang / de'i 'khor dang / btsun mo dang / sras dang /
193b4(rgyud): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang / lha dang / mi la sogs pa de thams cad bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po 'di klog cing 'don pa dang / 'chang zhing 'dzin pa dang / 'dri ba dang / rgyas par byed/
193b5(rgyud): pa dang / srung zhing skyob par smon lam yongs su 'debs pa de dag thams cad kyang phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag
193b6(rgyud): 'tshal nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de ltar nyan thos dpa byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding la sogs
193b7(rgyud): pa sde brgyad po de dag sprin bzhin du 'dus pa sems rtse gcig tu byas nas/ thal mo sbyar te mig mi 'dzum pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du blta zhing dam pa'i chos bstan par mos par/
194a1(rgyud): gsol ba 'debs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/ 'khor 'dus pa mang po la gzigs nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
194a2(rgyud): gsungs so// mdo sde'i rgyal po'i dbang po ste// mnyan na shin tu zab pa dang // yongs su brtags na zab pa nyid// gser 'od dam pa 'di 'chad do// phyogs bzhir sangs rgyas rnams kyis
194a3(rgyud): ni byin gyi rlabs kyis byin brlabs pa// mi 'khrugs pas ni shar phyogs su// rin chen tog gis lho phyogs su// 'od dpag med kyis nub phyogs su// rnga s+thA yis ni byang phyogs su// sdig
194a4(rgyud): pa thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir// bshad pa dam pa bkra shis pa// sdig pa'i las rnams zad byed pa// bde ba thams cad sbyin byed pa// sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig byed pa// thams cad mkhyen
194a5(rgyud): pa nyid kyi gzhi// dpal kun gyis ni legs par brgyan// byin gyis brlabs te brjod par bya// sems can gang dag dbang po nyams// tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang // phun sum tshogs min gang
194a6(rgyud): chags dang // lha rnams rgyab kyi phyogs pa dang // mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang // bran ze la sogs gtses pa dang // phan tshun mthun pa ma yin dang // nor 'gribs pas ni gnod pa dang /
194a7(rgyud): mya ngan ngal dang gnod pa dang // 'jigs pa dang ni 'phongs pa dang // gza' dang rgyu skar byad stems dang // mi bzang gdon gyis nyen pa dang // mya ngan ngal las byung ba yi// rmi lam sdig pa
194b1(rgyud): mthong na yang // nga ni rab khrus gtsang ma yin/ mdo sde'i dam pa mnyan par bya// gang dag ming dag sems dang zhing // gos gtsang rnams kyis rab brgyan te/ khab mo sangs rgyas spyod
194b2(rgyud): yul ba// mdo 'di nyan par byed na ni// mangs 'di yi gzi brjid kyis// srog chags kun gyi gnod pa dag/ shin tu mi bzang 'di 'dra ba// de dag rtag tu zhi bar 'gyur// 'jig rten sbyong /
194b3(rgyud): ba bdag nyid dang // blon po'i tshogs kyi dbang phyug bcas// gnod sbyin bye ba du ma yis// de dag la ni srung bar byed// lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang // ne rany+dza rar gnas pa dang // 'byung
194b4(rgyud): ma mo 'phrog ma dang // sa yi lha mo brtan ma dang // tshangs pa'i dbang dang lha dbang dang // klu dbang mthu chen rnams dang ni// mi 'am ci dbang lha min dbang // de bzhin nam mkha' lding dbang
194b5(rgyud): rnams// sde dang stobs dang bzhon pa dang // bcas te de dag der lhags nas// nyid dang mtshan mo mi g.yel bar// de dag la ni srung bar byed// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba/
194b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ste// bskal pa bye bar rnyed dka' ba// mdo 'di rab tu bshad par bya// gang dag mdo sde nyan pa dang // gang dag gzhan la thos byed dang // gang dag rjes su yi rang
194b7(rgyud): dang gang dag mchod par byed pa rnams// de dag lha dang klu dag dang // mi dang mi 'am ci dag dang // lha min gnod sbyin du ma yis// bskal pa bye bar mchod par 'gyur// srog
195a1(rgyud): chags bsod nams byed pa rnams// de dag bsod nams phung po ni// mtha' yas grangs kyang med pa dang // bsam gyis mi khyab skye bar 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i rdzog+sa/
195a2(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin zab mor spyod pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang // rab tu bzung bar 'gyur ba yin// gtsang ma'i gos rnams rab bgos la/ dri zhi ba yaM kos
195a3(rgyud): 'chang zhing // byams pa'i sems ni nyer gzhag nas// g.yel ba med par mchod par byas// rang gi sems ni dri med cing // rgya che bar yang rab byed la// sems kyang shin tu dang byed kyis//
195a4(rgyud): mdo sde dam pa mnyan par gyis// gang dag mdo 'di nyan pa ni// de dag mi nang legs par 'ongs// mi yi srid pa legs par thob// 'tsho ba bde bas 'tsho bar 'gyur// gang gi rna ba'i bu gar//
195a5(rgyud): yang / bshad pa 'di ni grags 'gyur ba// de dag dge rtsa sbyangs pa ste// sangs rgyas mang pos rab tu bsngags// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u
195a6(rgyud): zhes bya ste dang po'o// / de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba sngon gyi rgya
195a7(rgyud): ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la rim gror byas pa zhig gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyu gang dang rkyen
195b1(rgyud): gang gis/ bcom ldan 'das shAklu thub pa 'di lta ste/ lo brgyad cu zhig phub ste/ 'di ltar sku tshe thung snyam nas/ de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du/
195b2(rgyud): rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis kyis tshe ring bar 'gyur te/ gnyis ga zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa spangs pa dang / kha zas rab tu sbyin pa'o zhes gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das/
195b3(rgyud): thub pa ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa mang po nas/ srog gcod pa spangs par gyur pa nas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi bar du yang dag par blangs te gnas par gyur
195b4(rgyud): zas dang phyi nang gi dngos po rnams sems can dag la yongs su btang ste/ cher na rang gi lus kyi sha dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang gis kyang sems can ltogs pa rnams tshim
195b5(rgyud): par mdzad na/ zas gzhan gyis lta ci smos snyam mo// de nas skyes bu dam pa des sangs rgyas la song ba'i yid la byed pa dag las 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis bsam pa 'di dag sems pa na
195b6(rgyud): de'i khyim yangs shing rgya che ba/ bai nuR+Ya sngon po las grub pa/ lha'i rin po che du mas smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs ngas kha dog bsgyur ba dag byung ngo // lha'i las 'das pa'i spos
195b7(rgyud): kyis khyab par gyur to// khyim de'i phyogs bzhi nas lha'i rin po che'i khri bzhi byung bar gyur to// khri de dag las kyang lha'i ras bcos bu rin po che'i phrugs rnams bting ba dag byung bar gyur
196a1(rgyud): to/ khri de dag las kyang lha'i me tog pad+ma rin po che du mas spras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas kha dog bsgyur ba dag byung ngo // pad+ma de dag las kyang sangs
196a2(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhi byung bar gyur to// shar phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa byung / lho phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog byung / nub phyog
196a3(rgyud): nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med byung / byang phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra byung ste/ seng ge'i khri de dag las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byung ma thag tu
196a4(rgyud): de nas de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dang / phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams
196a5(rgyud): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dag snang bas khyab par gyur/ lha'i me tog gi char yang bab/ lha'i sil snyan dag gi sgra'ang byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
196a6(rgyud): rten gyi khams 'dir sems can thams cad kyang lha'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// sems can dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni dbang po thams cad dang ldan par gyur/ sems can dmus long dag ni
196a7(rgyud): mig gis gzugs rnams mthong / sems can 'on pa rnams ni rna bas sgra rnams thos/ sems can smyon pa rnams ni dran pa so sor rnyed/ sems can sems rnam par g.yengs pa dag ni sems
196b1(rgyud): rna par mi gsang bar gyur/ sems can sgren mo rnams so gos bgos par gyur/ sems cad bkres pa ngas ni sgo 'phangs par gyur/ sems can som pa dag sonas pa dang bral bar gyur/
196b2(rgyud): sems can nad kyis btab pa dag ni rang dang bral bar gyur/ sems can lus kyi dbang po nyams pa dag ni dbang po rnams tshang bar gyur te/ 'jig rten du ngo mtshar rmang du byung ba'i chos rnams
196b3(rgyud): rgya cher byung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas ngo mtshar rbang du gyur te/ de tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab
196b4(rgyud): tu dka' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag rnams las
196b5(rgyud): rjes su dran la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i yon tan rjes su dran zhing / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad la the tshom za bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di ltar
196b6(rgyud): lo brgyad cu zhig thub ste/ sku tshe thung ba 'di ji lta bu/ 'di ji zhig snyam du bsams pa de sems shing 'dug par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dgongs shing mkhyen bzhin/
196b7(rgyud): du byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di snyam du/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di ltar sku tshe thung ngo snyam du ma sems shig
197a1(rgyud): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par/ lha dang bcas papa bdud dang bcas pa tshungs pa
197a2(rgyud): dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram ze'i spyi dgu dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad kyi
197a3(rgyud): mtha' phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar du'ang rtogs par nus pa nged kyis su'ang ma mthong ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa brjod ma thag tu
197a4(rgyud): de nas de'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i bu 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams dang / gzugs na spyod pa rnams dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang //
197a5(rgyud): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'dus nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gi khyim der lhags so// de nas de
197a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ rgya mtsho'i chu rnams thams cad kyi/
197a7(rgyud): thigs pa dag ni bgrang bar nus// shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad// sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so// ri rab rnams ni thams cad kyang // phrag rab rdul rlags bgrang bar nus// shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshangad/
197b1(rgyud): sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so// sa la gang dag yod pa yi// rab tu phra rdul ji snyed pa// thams cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi// rgyal ba'i sku tshe'i tshad mi nus// gal te la las nam mkha' la// snga
197b2(rgyud): 'ga' zhig gis dpag 'dod kyang // shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad // sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'ad sring bzhugs// bskal pa dag ni 'di skad cig/ bskal pa bye ba
197b3(rgyud): brgya dag ces// grangs ni rnyed par mi rung ngo // gang phyir de yi byed rgyu gnyis// rgyu yang rnam pa gnyis gsungs te// gzhan la 'tshe ba spangs pa dang // kha zas mang po byin pa ste// de phyir bdag nyid ro
197b4(rgyud): ba de'i// sku tshe'i tshad ni mi rnyed de// bskal pa 'di skad cig ce 'am// grangs med pa yang de bzhin te// de bas the tsom med par 'gyur// the tsom cung zad ma za zhig/ rgyal ba'i sku tshe'i tha ma yi//
197b5(rgyud): grangs ni gang du'ang mi dmigs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa de thos nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de/
197b6(rgyud): dag la 'di skad ces gsol to// ji ltar na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pas de ltar sku tshe'i tshad thung bar bstan par gyur ces de skad gsol pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom
197b7(rgyud): de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa de ni snyigs ma rnam pa lnga'i 'jig rten du skye dgu'i tshe'i tshad
198a1(rgyud): lo brgya thub pa'i dus su bltams nas/ sems can mos pa dman pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang dad pa chung ba'i sems can de dag bdag tu lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang /
198a2(rgyud): srog tu lta ba dang / gso bar lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / log par lta ba dang / bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dag dang / rtag pa dang chad par lta ba la sogs pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams
198a3(rgyud): la phan 'dogs pa dang / gzhan yang mu stegs can rnams la yang dag pa'i lta ba bskyed pas myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sku tshe'i tshad thung
198a4(rgyud): ba bstan no// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de mya ngan las 'da' ba bstan pas/ sems can rnams de dkon pa dang phrad par dka' ba'i 'du shes dang / mya ngan dang sdug bsngal gyi
198a5(rgyud): 'du shes la sogs pa bskyed pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i mdo 'di dag myur du 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag
198a6(rgyud): la'ang rgya cher yang dag par stor pa la skur pa 'debs pa med par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas sku tshe thung bar bstan to// de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu bzhugs shing mya ngan
198a7(rgyud): las mi 'da' na/ sems can rnams gus pa med pa dang phrad par dka' ba'i 'du shes kyang mi skyed pas/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo zab mo dag 'dzin cing klog pa dang / kun chub par
198b1(rgyud): byeng ba dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni bcom ldan 'das cag tu 'jig rten na bzhugs par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu dper gang la la
198b2(rgyud): zhig pa ma la nor bu rin po che rgyas pa mang du yod pa mthong nas/ nor de la dkon pa dang ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes mi skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ pha ma'i nor rdzas de la rtab tu yod pa'i 'du shes skye ba'i phyir/
198b3(rgyud): ro/ de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das rtag tu mya ngan las mi 'da' na de la dkon pa dang phrad par dka' ba'i 'du shes so 'byung ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dper na la la zhig pha ma dbul zhing nor
198b4(rgyud): dang mi ldan pa zhig ste rgyal po 'am blon po chen po zhig gi gnas su phyin te/ de dag gi bang mdzod dang / nor dang / rin po che la sogs pa mang po rgyas pa mthong na de dkon pa dang rnyed par dka' ba'i 'dug
198b5(rgyud): skyes te/ dbul po de nor btsal ba'i thabs sgrub pa la brtson par byed do// de ni dbul ba dang 'phongs pa spangs te/ bde ba dang 'byor pa sgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin
198b6(rgyud): gshegs pa mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong na/ de dkon pa dang / phrad par dka' ba dang / mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes kyang bskyed cing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten
198b7(rgyud): du byung ba dang / bskal pa grangs med pa na la lan 'ga' zhig byung ste/ ji ltar u dum ba ra'i me tog brgya lam na yang 'ga' zhig 'byung ba bzhin pas/ sems can rnams de la dkon pa dang phrad
199a1(rgyud): par dka' ba'i 'du shes skyed cing / bcom ldan 'das de la gus pa skye bar 'gyur/ zhal nas gsungs pa'i mdo rnams la'ang bden pa'i 'du shes dang / yongs su gzung ba'i/
199a2(rgyud): 'du shes skyed cing skur pa 'debs par mi byed do// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu de dang rkyen de'i phyir 'jig rten na yun ring du mi bzhugs shing myur du mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad pas/
199a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni thabs mkhas pa phun sum tshogs pa de lta bus sems can rnams yongs su smin par mdzad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi po de dag kyang mi snang bar gyur to//
199a4(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mdzes pa'i tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong tshad med pa dang / gzhan yang srog chags bye ba brgya stong tshad med pa dang thabs cig tu bya rgod kyi
199a5(rgyud): phung po'i ri ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i
199a6(rgyud): gis ji lta bur gyur pa de dag gsol nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhi'ang bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bzhugs par byon nas/ phyogs so so'i gdan gyi steng na bzhugs te/
199a7(rgyud): 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu song la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa dang nyam nga ba chung ngam/ spyod pa yang ngam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol
199b1(rgyud): cig/ gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po shin tu zab pa 'di sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / su ga'i ya ba yongs su/
199b2(rgyud): bsal te/ thams cad bde ba dang ldan pa'i phyir 'di ston pa lags te/ rjes su dgyes pa mdzad do zhes kyang gsol cig/ de nas so so'i zhabs 'bring nas mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag
199b3(rgyud): gis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das bzhi po de dag gis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du
199b4(rgyud): gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la legs so zhes bka' stsal te//
199b5(rgyud): legs so legs so// de bzhin gshegs pa bzhis kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du dam pa'i chos 'di bshad par nga la bskul ba mdzad pas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
199b6(rgyud): kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// bya rgod phung po'i ri la nga bzhugs te// mdo sde rin chen 'di ni 'chang mdzad kyang // skye bo mang po de dag bsgral ba'i phyir// yongs su mya ngan bzla ba'ang/
199b7(rgyud): sbyor ba mdzad/ byis pa lnga ba log par gyur pa rnams// nga yi bstan la mos par mi byed pa// de dag kun tu bsgral ba'i don gyi phyir/ yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba'ang ston mdzad do// de nas de'i tshe
200a1(rgyud): 'khor der slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di n+ya zhes bya ba dang / bram ze stong phrag du mas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya
200a2(rgyud): ngan las 'da' ba chen po'i sgra thos nas 'phral du ngus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ gal te bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la thugs
200a3(rgyud): brtse ba thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ phan par bzhed pa/ sems can thams cad la pha ma lta bu mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par gyur pa/ zla ba lta bur snang ba mdzad pa/ shes rab dang ye shes chen po'i
200a4(rgyud): nyi ma shar ba lta bu lags shing / gal te khyod sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs na/ bdag la dam pa zhig stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to//
200a5(rgyud): de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor der li tsa byi gzhon nu sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba zhes bya ba de spobs pa skyes nas/ slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di n+ya la 'di skad ces
200a6(rgyud): smras so// ci bram ze chen po khyod bcom ldan 'das la dam pa zhig gsol lam/ bdag gis khyod la dam pa sbyin no// bram zes smras pa/ li tsa byaM gzhon nu bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa
200a7(rgyud): dngadang ring bsrel gyi phye ma dgos pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la brten par 'dod do// ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam de ma brjed par mchod na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
200b1(rgyud): lha rnams kyi bdag po 'ba' zhig thob ces drag go// kye li tsa byi gzhon nu gser 'od dam pa'i mdo nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shes par dka' ba/ khong du chud par dka' ba/ de lta druH/
200b2(rgyud): mtshan nyid dang yon tan dang ldan pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo 'chad ces grag gis nyon cig/ kye li tsa byaM gzhon nu gser 'od dam pa'i mdo ni de ltar shes par dka' zhing rtogs par dka' bas ra/
200b3(rgyud): bo cag mtha' 'khob kyi gling gi bram ze rnams ni gang bcangs na/ sems can rnams myur du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po thob par 'gyur ba'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam za ma tog gi nang du
200b4(rgyud): bcug la bcangs kyang rung ngo // kye li tsa byi gzhon nu khyod ci de bzhin gshegs pa las ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam gsol nas/ ring bsrel za ma tog gi nang du bcug ste bcangs pas sems
200b5(rgyud): can rnams sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po thob par mi 'dod dam/ kye li tsa byi gzhon nu kho bos ni dam pa de lta bu gsol to// de nas li tsa byi gzhon nu sems can thams cad kyis mthong na
200b6(rgyud): dga' bas/ slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di n+ya la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis slar smras pa/ nam zhig gang+gA'i chu rgyun la// me tog rnams ni skye ba dang // bya rog dmar por 'gyur ba dang // khu/
200b7(rgyud): byug dung mdog 'drar 'gyur dang // 'dzam bur ta la'i 'bru chags dang // 'bra gor a mra'i dog pa chags// de yi tshe ma yungs 'bru tsam// ring bsrel du ni gsal bar 'gyur// nam zhig rus sbal
201a1(rgyud): spu rnams las// gos su legs par btags gyur te// dkun gyi grang ba sal byed pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par gyur// nam zhig sbrang bu'i rkang lag las// yang thog leH/
201a2(rgyud): par byas gyur te// brtan zhing rab tu mi g.yo na// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig srin bu pad pa kun// so ni dkar por skyes gyur te// rno zhing chen por gyur pa na// de tshe ring bsrel
201a3(rgyud): yod par 'gyur// mtho ris su ni 'dzeg pa'i phyir// nam zhig ri bong rA rnams las// skas ni legs par byas gyur pa// de tshe ring bsrel sod par 'gyur// nam zhig skas der rab 'dzegs te//
201a4(rgyud): byi bas zla ba bza' ba dang // sgra gcan la yang gnod byed pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// grong na rgyu ba'i sbrang bu yis// nam zhig rdza ma'i chang 'thungs te// khyim na gnas par byed 'gyur ba/
201a5(rgyud): de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig bong bu bde 'gyur la// chu dmar bim pa 'drar gyur cing // glu gar rnams la mkhas gyur pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig 'ug pa
201a6(rgyud): bya rog rnams// dben par song nas rtse ba dang // phan tshun mthun par 'gyur ba na// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// pa la sha yi lo ma rnams// rin chen sna gsum gdugs gyur te// char 'bab
201a7(rgyud): skyabs su nam 'gyur ba// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig rgya mtsho'i gru bo che// 'khrul 'khor dang ni g.yor mor bcas// thang la byung ste 'gro ba na// ri tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/
201b1(rgyud): ram zhig bya ni 'ug pa rnams// ri bo spos kyi ngad ldang ba// mchu la thogs te 'gro 'gyur ba// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u ri rgyas tshigs su
201b2(rgyud): bcad pa 'di dag thos nas/ li tsa byi gzhon nu 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis slar smras pa/ legs so legs so gzhon du mchog
201b3(rgyud): rgyal ba'i sras po tshig po che// dpa' zhing thabs la mkhas ldan pa// lung bstan pa ni dam pa thob// 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid// bsam gyis mi
201b4(rgyud): khyab go rims bzhin// gzhon nus bdag la mnyan par gyis// sangs rgyas yul ni bsam mi khyab// de bzhin gshegs rnams mtshungs pa med// sangs rgyas thams cad rtag tu shes// sangs rgyas
201b5(rgyud): thams cad yang dag 'byung // sangs rgyas thams cad kha dog mtshungs// 'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid yin// bcom ldan de ni bcos ma min// de bzhin gshegs pa ma skyes te// rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i
201b6(rgyud): su sprul pa'i sku ni ston par mdzad// drang srong chen po'i ring bsrel ni// yungs 'bru tsam zhes bya ba med// sku la rus pa khrag med na// ring bsrel yod par ga la 'gyur// sems can rnams la phan
201b7(rgyud): pa'i phyir// thabs kyis ring bsrel bzhag par mdzad// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings// chos ston mdzad pa ci 'dra ba// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku de 'dra/
202a1(rgyud): bdag gis 'di thos shes nas ni// bdag gis dam pa gsol bar bya// de nyid kho na lung bstan phyir// gtam gleng ba ni bdag gis byas// de nas lha'i bu sum khri nyis stong
