257a4(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa yis ni bshags pa yis// bdag gi sdig pa'i rgya mtsho bskams par shog/ bdag gi las kyi rgya mtsho zad gyur cig/ bdag gi nyon mongs rgya mtsho chad par shog/ bdag gi
257a5(rgyud): bsod nams rgya mtsho rdzogs gyur cig/ ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yis// bdag gi ye shes rgya mtsho rnam dag shog/ yon tan kun gyi rgya mtshor 'gyur bar shog/ byang chub yon tan yon
257a6(rgyud): tan rin chen rdzogs// gser 'od dam pa'i bshags pa'i stobs kyis ni// bdag gi bsod nams rab tu snang bar shog/ bdag gi byang chub snang ba rnam ngag gyur// ye shes dri med snang ba dam/
257a7(rgyud): pa yi// bdag gi lus kyi 'od ni snang bar shog/ bsod nams snang ba lhang nger bya ba'i phyir// 'jig rten gsum na khyad par 'phags gyur cig/ bsod nams stobs dang rtag tu ldan par shog/
257b1(rgyud): sdug bsngal gyur rolas norgol ba dang / bde ba kun gyis rgya mtsho 'dra ba yis/ ma 'ongs bskal bar byang chub spyad par bgyi/ 'jig rkyen gsum na sngon mthar gyis gshegs/ de dag cig/
257b2(rgyud): ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi// yon tan mtha' yas khyad 'phags ci 'dra ba// yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyis bdag gi zhing // ma 'ongs dus na de 'drar 'gyur bar shog/ mdzes pa'i tog gis
257b3(rgyud): shes par byos// rgyal po gser gyi lag dbang gis// sngon tshe smon lam 'di btab ste// de nyid da ltar khyod yin no// sngon gyi dus kyi bu gnyis ni// gser gyi lag dang gser gyi 'od// de nyid
257b4(rgyud): dngul tog dngul 'od ces// ngas ni de tshe lung bstan to// 'khor mang de dag 'di thos nas// kun gyis byang chub sems bskyed pa// da ltar ma 'ongs dus dag tu// rtag par bshags pa 'di byed
257b5(rgyud): shogagaser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la bstod pa'i le'u zhes/
257b6(rgyud): bya ste bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de'i nang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bar gnas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
257b7(rgyud): to// rigs kyi bu gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du mchod
258a1(rgyud): cing bkur stir byed par 'dod pas gzungs 'di 'chang zhing gzung bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs 'di 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi sangs rgyas
258a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yum yin pa'i phyir/ gzungs 'di 'dzin pa'i bsod nan+da gyi tshogs rgya cher 'phel bar 'gyur ro// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa
258a3(rgyud): dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyis 'dzin cing 'chang bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims rnam par dag pa ma nyams shing skyon med pa rnams kyis/ chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu zab mo 'di
258a4(rgyud): la 'jug nus par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzungs sngags sgrub pa'i cho ga ni/ sngar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mtsha
258a5(rgyud): 'di dag brjod cing sems rtse gcig pas phyag 'tshal lo// de nas sngags 'di 'don par bya'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems
258a6(rgyud): dpa' chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// shar phyogs
258a7(rgyud): kyi sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin po che'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// byang
258b1(rgyud): phyoms kyi sangs rgyas rnga sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas yangs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas spang ba dam pa'i dpal la/
258b2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin chen snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kun tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas spos mchog
258b3(rgyud): brtsegs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas mnyam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal
258b4(rgyud): lo sangs rgyas rin cher bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin chen 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dri med 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas spobs pas bkod par dgongs
258b5(rgyud): pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas zla 'od rnam dag grags pa'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas me tog 'od bkod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'od snang rgyal po la phyag
258b6(rgyud): 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dge 'od dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas spyan ras gzigs dbang mi 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'jigs med
258b7(rgyud): grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rab mchog rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// byang
259a1(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub
259a2(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
259a3(rgyud): po kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob la phyag
259a4(rgyud): 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po legs pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag la phyag
259a5(rgyud): 'tshal nas gzungs 'di 'don par bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ku Ti ku Ti ni i mi ri to/ ko sha Ni/ i mi ri Ni/ i rI swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
259a6(rgyud): bde bar gnas pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzungs 'di ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum yin pa'i phyir/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di 'chang
259a7(rgyud): zhing mdzin na/ bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med dpag tu med pa dag 'phel bar 'gyur ro// grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bkur sti dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / sngags
259b1(rgyud): par byas par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas de rnams kyis kyang tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu de la lung ston par 'gyur ro// bang bar gnas pa gang zhig gzungs sngags 'ang /
259b2(rgyud): 'drang ba des gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / rinam po che dang / mang du thos shing mkhas pa dang / nang meng cing tshe ring ba la sogs pa yang bzhir du thob ste/ bsod nams shin tu mang du 'phel
259b3(rgyud): yo/ ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de dag thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// bde bar gnas/ sngags 'di 'chang zhing 'dzin na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma thob kyi bar du/ rtag
259b4(rgyud): bar byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi grong khyer ri bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang
259b5(rgyud): phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ping ga la chen po la sogs pa dang lhan cig tu gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis srung bar byed
259b6(rgyud): de bde bar gnas/ gzungs 'di sgrub pa'i cho ga ni 'di yin par shes par rig par bya'o// thog mar bzlas brjod khri rtsa brkyang tshang bar bzlas pas bsnyen par bya'o// de nas khang pa dan/
259b7(rgyud): pa'i nang du dkyil 'khor byas te/ tshes bcu drug gi nyin par khrus byas te/ gos gsar pa gyon te bdug pa dang / me tog dang / zhal zas sna tshogs mang po la sogs pas mchod pa bya/
260a1(rgyud): zhing dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas/ thog mar sngar spros pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod de gus pas phyag 'tshal
260a2(rgyud): zhing sdig pa bshags nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ sngags de stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzla'o// de nas lus bsrangs te 'dug nas/ ci 'dod pa de bsam par
260a3(rgyud): bya'o// de nas nyi ma ma shar bar dkyil 'khor gyi nang du kha zas gtsang ma za gcig tu bza' bar bya'o// de nas zhag bco lnga lon pa dang / gzod dkyil 'khor de nas 'byung bar byas
260a4(rgyud): te mi de ni bsod nams dang gzi brjid kyi mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan zhing bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gal te bsams pa ma grub na yang dkyis
260a5(rgyud): 'khor der zhugs nas/ bsams pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bas/ de phyin chad kyang rtag par rjes su dran par bya'o// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ gsen
260a6(rgyud): can zhes bya ba'i gzungs te le'u brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs de gsungs nas/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
260a7(rgyud): po dang / lha dang / mi la sogs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa de dag la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ don dam pa'i bden pa stong pa'i mtshan nyid de bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
260b1(rgyud): ngag gsungs so// bsam gyis mi khyab mngon mas gzhan dag tu// stong pa'i chos rnams rab tu rgyas bshad de// de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir// stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam
260b2(rgyud): bshad par bya// sems cadan blo rlung rnam par mi shes pas// chos rnams thams cad shes par mo nus te// de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir// stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam rab tu
260b3(rgyud): bshad// sems can kun gyis ci nas shes 'gyur dang // sems can 'byung bya'i phyir ni snying rje'i dbang // thabs dang tshul dang rgyu gzhan rnams kyis ni// mdo mchog dam pa dbang po 'di bshad
260b4(rgyud): do/ lus 'di grong khyim stong pa ji bzhin te// dbang po rnams ni dmag dang chom rkun 'dra// de dag thams cad grong gcig gnas mod kyi// de dag phan tshun rnam par mi shes so// mig gi dbang /
260b5(rgyud): po gzugs gyur rnams la rgyug/ rna ba'i dbang po sgra la rnam par dpyod// sna yi dbang po sna tshogs dri rnams 'phrog/ lce yi dbang po rtag tu ro la rgyug/ lus kyi dbang po reg pa dag la rgyug
260b6(rgyud): yid kyi dbang po chos rnams rnam par dpyod// dbang po drug po 'di dag phan tshun du// rang rang yul la rab tu 'jug par byed// sems ni sgyu ma lta bur g.yo ba yin// dbang po drug ni yul la
260b7(rgyud): nam dpyod de// ji ltar mi zhig zong stong rgyug pa dang // dmag dang chom rkun ngag dang gnas pa bzhin// ji ltar bya zhig yul drug gnas bcas shing // dbang po spyod yul dag kyang rab shes pa
261a1(rgyud): de ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas te// dbang po'i spyod yul rnams kyang rab tu shes// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri rnams dang // ro dang reg bya de bzhin spyo/
261a2(rgyud): yul chos// sems ni dbang po drug po thams cad la// dbang por zhugs pa bya bzhin g.yo bar 'gyur// dbang po gang dang gang du gnas bcas pa// dbang po de ni shes pa bdag nyid byed//
261a3(rgyud): lus ni g.yo ba med cing byed pa med// snying po med cing rkyen las byung ba yin// yang dag ma yin yongs su rtog las byung // grong stong las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'dra bar gnas// sa dang me dang /
261a4(rgyud): chu dang rlung rnams ni// grong gzhan gnas te phyogs dang phyogs na gnas// dper na sbrul gdug gnas gcig ji bzhin te// rtag tu phan tshun mthun pa ma yin bzhin// khams kyi sbrul rnams
261a5(rgyud): bzhi po de dag kyang // gnyis ni steng 'gro gnyis ni thur du 'gro// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su gnyis gnyis te// khams sbrul de dag thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur// sa yi sbrul dang //
261a6(rgyud): chu yi sbrul dag dang // 'di gnyis 'og tu zad par 'gyur ba yin// me yi sbrul dang rlung gi sbrul dag dang // 'di gnyis steng gi nam mkhar 'gro ba yin// ji ltar sngon chad byas pa'i las rnams
261a7(rgyud): kyis// sems dang rnam shes kun tu gnas nas dong // lha dang mi dang ngan song gsum dag tu// ji ltar byas pa'i las kyi srid par skye// bad kan rlung dang mkhris pa zad gyur na// lus shi gcin
261b1(rgyud): dang ngan blugs rnams kyis gang / mngon par mi dga' srin bu'i phung por gyur// ngur khrod dag na 'thor ba shing bzhin gyur// wa mo khyod ni chos 'di rnams la ltos// 'di la sems can gang
261b2(rgyud): zag gang zhog yod// chos rnams 'di dag thams cad spong ba ste// ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin// 'byung ba chen po 'di dag che 'byung min// ma byung ba las byung zhing mi 'byung ste// gang
261b3(rgyud): gi phyir ni 'byung dang mi 'byung ba// de phyir 'byung ba che zhes ngas brjod do// yod pa min zhing nam yang yod min la// ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin// ma rig 'di ni yod pa ma yin te/
261b4(rgyud): de bas ngas ni ma rig 'di bshad do// 'du byed rnam shes ming dang gzugs bcas dang // skye mched drug dang reg dang tshor ba dang // sred dang len pa de bzhin srid pa dang // skye dang rga shi mya ngan
261b5(rgyud): gnod pa rnams// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar gnas pa dag/ ma byung ba las byung dang mi 'byung dang // tshul bzhin ma yin sems kyis
261b6(rgyud): rnam dpyad dang // bdag gi lta bar gyur pa bcad par gyis// ye shes ral gris nyon mongs rgya mo drol// phung po'i gnas la stong par gyur par ltos// byang chub yon tan rgya chen reg par gyis/
261b7(rgyud): ngas ni bdud rtsi'i grong khyer sgo yang phye// bdud rtsi'i khu ba'i snod kyang kun tu bstar// ngas ni bdud rtsi'i grong khyer gnas der 'jug/ ngas ni bdud rtsi'i khu bas bdag tshim byas// ngas ni chos
262a1(rgyud): kyi cha chen dam pa brdungs// ngas ni chos kyi dung gi mchog kyang bus// ngas ni chos kyi sgron ma mchog 'bar byas// ngas ni chos kyi char pa dam pa phag/ ngas ni nyon mongs
262a2(rgyud): dgra tshogs rnams las rgyal// ngas ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa bsgrengs// srid pa'i mtsho las sems can rab tu bsgral// ngas ni ngan song gsum gyi lam rnams bkag/ sems can nyon
262a3(rgyud): mongs me yis gdungs gyur pa// rten med gyur cing dpung gnyen med pa dag/ srog chags nyon mongs mes gdungs zhi byas nas// bdud rtsi'i khu ba bsil bas tshim par byas// gang phyir bskal
262a4(rgyud): pa du mar sngon chad ngas// 'dren pa bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa byas// chos kyi sku de yongs su 'tshol ba na// brtul bzhugs brtan pas byang chub phyir spyad de// lag pa dang ni mig dang rkang pa
262a5(rgyud): dang / yan lag mchog dang bu sdug bu mo dang // nor dbyig nor bu mu tig rgyan dang gser/ bai DUR+Ya dang rin chen sna tshogs btang // stong gsum shing ljon thams cad dang // rtswa dang rtswa rnams
262a6(rgyud): thams cad dang // nags tshal dag dang sa las ni// 'khrungs pa thams cad bcang gtubs te// de dag thams cad phyer brlags nas// rab tu phra ba'i rdul 'drar byas// nam mkha'i dkyil
262a7(rgyud): 'khor ji cham par// phye ma'i phung po srungs nas ni// 'di la cha gsum dbye bar nus// sa la rdul ni yod pa rnams// stong gsum dag ni thams cad kyi// rdul khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa//
262b1(rgyud): sems can kun gyi shes pa gang // nan sems can gcig gi gyur// shes pa de yis rdul rnams kyi/ phye ma bgrang bar byed na ni// sems can kun las rab 'phags pa// ye shes rab ldar/
262b2(rgyud): mi rnams kyis// thams cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi// rgyal ba'i mkhyen pa mi nus so// thub pa chen po'i ye shes gang // skad cig gcig la 'jug pa yang // bskal pa bye ba du mar ni// gang
262b3(rgyud): du'ang bgrang bar mi nus so// gser 'ong ngam pa mad sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o// / de nas lha mo rim chen 'od 'phros chos
262b4(rgyud): bstan pa shin tu zab mo de thos nas/ dga' ba dang rangs pa skyes te 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lga nga sa la
262b5(rgyud): btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ bstan pa zab mo 'di la ji ltar rnal 'byor du bya ba zhu ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol
262b6(rgyud): papargyal ba rkang gnyis gtso lags te// 'jig rten kun tu snang mdzad pa// byang chub spyod pa yang dag tshul// bdag la thugs rjes bshad du gsol// rigs kyi lha mo la bka' stsal pa/ khyed la
262b7(rgyud): the tsom ci yod pa// dri ba'i don de zhus shig dang // rnam par phye ste bshad par bya// de nas yang rigs kyi lha mos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bdag dang gzhan la phan gdags phyir/
263a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das bral ba'i// byang chub spyod pa ji ltar spyod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rigs kyi lha mo la 'di skad ces/
263a2(rgyud): bka' stsal to// lha mo chos kyi dbyings la gnas te/ byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad pas ni mnyam pa nyid la nan ton du bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rigs kyi lha mos/ bcom ldan
263a3(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos kyi dbyings la gnas te/ byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod cing mnyam pa nyid la nan tan du bgyi ba lags/ bka' stsal
263a4(rgyud): palha mo de ni phung po lnga la chos kyi dbyings su 'dogs te/ chos kyi dbyings ni phung po lnga nyid do// phung po lnga'ang brjod du med pa/ phung po lnga ma yin pa'ang brjod du med pa ste/ de la chos
263a5(rgyud): kyi dbyings de nyid phung po lnga yin na ni chad par 'gyur ro// gal te phung po lnga las gzhan par 'dod na ni rtag par 'gyur te/ mtshan ma gnyis dang bral bar mtha' gnyis la mi gnas pa
263a6(rgyud): bltar med pa/ blta bar bya ba las 'das pa/ ming dang mtshan ma med pa de ni chos kyi dbyings zhes brjod do// rigs kyi lha mo phung po lnga la chos kyi dbyings su ji ltar gdags she na/ phung po
263a7(rgyud): lnga po de ni rgyu dang rkyen gyis ma bskyed pa ste/ de yang gal te rgyu dang rkyen las skye ba zhig yin na ni/ skyes zin pa skye 'am/ mi skye ba skye zhes bya/ gal te skyes zin pa skye na ni/ rgyu dang rkyen kyang
263b1(rgyud): mi dgos pa'i rigs so// gal te ma skyes pa skye na ni/ skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang ma skyes pa'i chos rnams ni yod pa ma yin pa nyid pas ming med pa
263b2(rgyud): mtshan ma med pa/ gzhal ba dang / dpag pa dang / dper bya bas mi brjod pa ste/ rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed par bya ba ma yin no// rigs kyi lha mo dper na rnga'i sman shing dang / ko ba dang / la
263b3(rgyud): pa la brten te sna 'byung mod kyi/ rnga'i sgra de ni 'das pa'ang stong / ma 'ongs pa'ang snang de ltar byung ba'ang skyong ste/ nga'i slan ni shing las kyang ma byung / ko ba dang lag pa las kyang
263b4(rgyud): byung dus gsum gyis ma bskyed pas mi skye ba ste/ gang mi skye ba de ni mi 'gog pa'o// gang mi 'gog pa de ni gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa'o// gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de ni gang du'ang mi 'gro
263b5(rgyud): ba'o// gang du'ang mi 'gro ba de ni rtag pa dang chad pa ma yin pas/ gcig pa'ang ma yin/ tha dad pa'ang ma yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te gcig pa yin na chos kyi dbyings dang tha mi dad
263b6(rgyud): pas 'o na ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis kyang / don dam pa'i bden pa mngon du gyur pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba dam pa thob par 'gyur ba zhig na/ de lta ma yin pas de gcig/
263b7(rgyud): pa ma yin no// gal te tha dad pa yin na ni sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'ang mtshan ma de nyid 'dzin pa yin pas/ rnam par grol bar yang mi 'gyur zhing / nyon
264a1(rgyud): mongs pa'i 'ching ba dang ma bral bas/ de tha na meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang mi rgya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags pa rnams ni 'du byed/
264a2(rgyud): dang 'du byed ma yin pa yang dag pa'i ngo bor gcig pa'i phyir tha dad pa ma yin no// de bas na phung po lnga de ni yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin/ rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed pa'ang ma yin/
264a3(rgyud): byu dang rkyen med pas bskyed pa'ang ma yin pa tshig gi thog tu mi phebs pa/ ming dang mtshan ma med pa/ rgyu dang rkyen med pa/ dpes bstan du med pa thog ma dang tha mar dben pa/ rang gi
264a4(rgyud): ngang gis stong pa ste/ de ni 'phags pa rnams kyis mkhyen par bya ba yin gyi/ gzhan gyi spyod yul du ma gyur pa'o// de bas na phung po lnga la chos kyi dbyings su ston to// gzhan yang rigs kyi lha
264a5(rgyud): mo gang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don dam pa dang / kun rdzob gzhan dang gzhan ma yin par 'dod pa de ni dpag par dka
264a6(rgyud): ba ste/ 'phags pa dang ma rabs kyi spyod yul ni gcig pa dang tha dad pa'i rang bzhin ma yin te/ kun rdzob kyang ma spangs/ don dam pa dang yang bral bar ma gyur pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnas
264a7(rgyud): shing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'o// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rigs kyi lha mo de rab tu dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas stan las langs te/
264b1(rgyud): thagos phrag pa gcig tu gapar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhab sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba btud de spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
264b2(rgyud): ldan 'das ji gar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de la bdag gis bslab par 'tshal lo// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po 'khor 'dus pa
264b3(rgyud): de'i nang na 'dug pas/ rigs kyi lha mo rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces dris so// lha mo byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa shin tu sgrub par dka' ba 'di khyod ji ltar spyod pas de la dbang thob par
264b4(rgyud): 'gyur/ de nas rigs kyi lha mos/ tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don de shin tu zab pas/ so so'i skye'o
264b5(rgyud): thams cad kyis de'i don mi shes te/ 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul bas/ mchog tu phra ba shes par dka' ba'o// bdag ni chos 'di la brten te bde bar gnas pa thob bo// gal te tshig de
264b6(rgyud): bden pa blta na/ snyigs ma lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag ni tshad med/ grangs med/ dpag tu med pa'i sems can de dag thams cad gser gyi kha dog can du gyur te/ mtshan sum cu rtsa
264b7(rgyud): gnyis dang ldan pa/ skyes pa'ang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin pa sha stag tu gyur te/ rin po che'i pad+ma la 'dug cing / bde ba tshad med pa la longs spyod pa dang / lha'i me tog mchog gi cha
265a1(rgyud): 'bab cing / lha'i sil snyan dang rol mo ma dkrol bar rang byung ba'i mchod pa de lta bu dang ldan par shog cig/ ces smras ma thag tu snyigs ma lnga'i 'jig rten gyi
265a2(rgyud): khams thams cad na/ sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad gsar gyi kha dog can skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan pa/ skyes pa'ang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin par gyur nas/ rin po
265a3(rgyud): che'i pad+ma la 'dug cing / bde ba tshad med pas longs spyod par gyur pa ni ji ltar gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha'i gzhal med khang pa ni/ ngan 'gro thams cad med cing rin po che'i ljon shing sna tshogs
265a4(rgyud): 'dres pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+mas 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang lha'i me tog gi char 'bab pa/ lha'i rol mo sna tshogs kyis longs spyod par gnas pa
265a5(rgyud): bzhin du gyur to// de nas rigs kyi lha mo rin chen 'od 'phros yang bud med kyi lus las/ tshangs pa'i lus su bsgyur cing 'dug go// byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro la/ tshangs
265a6(rgyud): pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa khyod ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod/ smras pa/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po chu'i zla ba byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin/ bdag kyang
265a7(rgyud): byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do// rmi lam byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do// smig rgyu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do// /
265b1(rgyud): sgra brnyad byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do// de skad ces bshad pa tshangs pa chen pos zos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so//
265b2(rgyud): btsun pa khyod don gang la gnas te tshig de skad ces smra/ lha mos smras pa/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po chos gang yang bden pa'i mtshan nyid du ma grub cing / rgyu dang rkyen la brten nas grub pa'i phyir ro//
265b3(rgyud): tshangs pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de ltar na so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar rigs so//
265b4(rgyud): smras pa/ skyes bu khyod ci'i phyir de skad ces smra/ byis pa'ang gzhan/ mkhas pa'ang gzhan/ byang chub kyang gzhan/ byang chub ma yin pa'ang gzhan/ rnam par grol ba'ang gzhan/ rnam par grol
265b5(rgyud): ba ma yin pa'ang gzhan ma yin mod kyi/ tshangs pa chen po chos de dag thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa nyid de/ so so ma yin pa/ yang dag par dbyer med pa/ bar mtshams med pa
265b6(rgyud): 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med pa la mngon par chags shing 'dzin to// tshangs pa'i rgyal po dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/ de'i slob ma sgyu ma sprul pa la mkhas shing byang bar gyur pa zhig gisag lam
265b7(rgyud): gyi bzhi mdor sa dang / bye ma dang / shing dang / rtswa dang / lo ma la sogs pa gnas gcig tu bsdus te/ sgyu ma sprul pa 'di lta ste/ rta dang glang po che'i tshogs dang / dmag dang shing rta la
266a1(rgyud): sogs pa'i tshogs dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi phung po dang / bang ba dang mdzod la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kun la ston to// de la sems can byis pa blun po mi
266a2(rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin can dag gis mthong nas/ sgyu ma sprul par mi shes te/ rta dang glang po che la sogs pa mthong ba dang thos pa 'di dag ni yang dag par yod pa yin te/ gzhan ni brdzun pa snyam
266a3(rgyud): du sems shing / phyis kyang de la zhib tu rtog par mi byed do// de la mkhas pa shes pa'i rang bzhin can rnams ni de lta ma yin te/ sgyu ma sprul pa yin par shes nas/ thos pa dang mthong ba de
266a4(rgyud): dag la 'di snyam du sems te/ rta dang glang po che la sogs pa bdag gis mthong ba 'di ni yang dag pa ma yin pa sgyu ma sprul pas 'gro ba'i mig slu bar byed pa ste/ rta dang / glang po che dang /
266a5(rgyud): bang mdzod la sogs pa 'di dag ni der snang ba tsam du zad de/ bdag gis mthong ba dang thos pa bzhin du bden pa ma yin par yang 'dzin la phyis zhib tu brtag na'ang brdzun pa slu ba'i
266a6(rgyud): chos su shes so// de lta bas na mkhas pa rnams kyis ni/ chos 'di dag thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs te/ ji ltar mthong ba dang thos pa'ang kun rdzob tsam du
266a7(rgyud): de dag gis don mtshon pa dang / tshig gi tha snyad la brten nas yang dag pa'i don shes par bya ba tsam du zad kyi/ don dam pa ni de lta ma yin no snyam mo// yang tshangs pa chen po byis pa so som/
266b1(rgyud): skye bo 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi mig ma thob pa rnams kyis ni/ chos 'di dag thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med par yang mi shes la/ gang mthong ba
266b2(rgyud): dang thos pa dang / 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos rnams ji ltar brtags pa ltar bden pa nyid du mngon par zhen te/ chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med pa don dam
266b3(rgyud): ba'i tshul de shes par mi nus so// de la 'phags pa rnams kyis ni gang gzigs shing gsan pa dang / 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos rnams kyi mthu dang / las ji lta bu
266b4(rgyud): yin pa de la bden pa'o zhes mngon par mi zhen te/ 'du byed kyi chos kyang mi bden pa/ 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos kyang mi bden pa/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtog pas brtags pa tsam du 'du
266b5(rgyud): byed dang 'du byed ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ming tsam du zad pa/ bden pa'i rang bzhin du ma grub par 'phags pa rnams kyis kun rdzob kyi tha snyad la brten nas/ yang dag pa bden pa'i
266b6(rgyud): don de ston par byed do// de bzhin du tshangs pa chen po gang 'phags pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i gzigs pas chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med pa bzhin/ 'du
266b7(rgyud): byed dang 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos kyang de bzhin du lta ste/ kun rdzob tu ming dang mtshan ma sna tshogs la brten nas gzhan la ston par byed do// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'dra/
267a1(rgyud): lang tshangs pa chen pos 'di skad ces smras so// sems cad ji skad cig gis chos zab mo 'di lta bu rtogs shing shes par rus/ smras pa/ tshangs pa chen po gang sprul pa mang /
267a2(rgyud): po'i sems dang sems las byung bas chos zab mo 'di yang dag par shes par gyur pa de nyid kyis shes so// tshangs pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/ sprul pa de dag nyid kyang rang bzhin yod pa ma yin
267a3(rgyud): nade dag gi sems dang sems las byung ba gang nas skye bar 'gyur/ smras pa/ gang chos kyi dbyings yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin par yang dag par shes pa de dag gis zab mo de'i
267a4(rgyud): don shes par nus so// de nas tshangs pa chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste
267a5(rgyud): chos kyi gzhung zab mo 'di la mkhas pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin te/ tshangs pa chen po de ji ltar khyod kyis smras pa de bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa'
267a6(rgyud): rin chen 'od 'phro 'dis khyod la ji skad bstan pa bzhin du nan tan du sgrubs shig dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i rgyal po tshangs pa chen po dang / gzhan yang
267a7(rgyud): tshangs pa'i 'khor de dag stan las langs te/ tha kos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro'i
267b1(rgyud): rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshig 'di skad ces smras so// deng skyes bu chen po khyod dang phrad cing bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos 'di lta bu thos par gyur pa ngo mtshar che lags so//
267b2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshangs pa chen po la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ rin po che'i 'od dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin
267b3(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba
267b4(rgyud): lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to// de skad ces bka' stsal pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag sum stong gis bla na med pa
267b5(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// lha'i bu khri phrag brgyad stong dang / rgyal po dang / blon po la sogs pa tshad med grangs med pa rnams kyis rdul med cing rdul
267b6(rgyud): dang bral ba'i chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur to// de nas 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang nas dge slong khri phrag lnga bcu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa/ byang chub kyi sems las
267b7(rgyud): phyir mi ldog par sems pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phros chos bstan pa 'di thos nas/ byang chub kyi sems phyir zhing brtan pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa bla na med
268a1(rgyud): ba'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs nas yang byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ so so nas rang rang gi gos gyon pa phud de/ byang chub sems dpa' la gsol nas/ bla na med pa'i/
268a2(rgyud): mchog dam pa'i sems bskyed de/ smon lam 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ci mchis pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
268a3(rgyud): bsngo'o zhes smon lam btab bo// tshangs pa chen po dge slong de dag gis bsod nams de la brten nas ji skad smras pa bzhin nan tan du bsgrubs nas/ bskal pa chen po dgu bcu 'das pa na
268a4(rgyud): 'khor ba las yongs su 'das pa'i shes pa skyes par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong de dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed bskal pa grangs med pa sum cu 'das
268a5(rgyud): pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/ bskal pa'i ming ni rgyal bar dka' ba'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ yul gyi ming ni dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya bar dus gcig tu kun kyang bla na med pa
268a6(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ste/ de dag kun kyang mtshan smon lam rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yon tan gyi mtshan bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/
268a7(rgyud): zhes lung bstan to// gzhan yang tshangs pa chen po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po gang nyan pa dang 'dzin pa de dag gi mthu dang / gzi brjid chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ dper na gang
268b1(rgyud): la la zhig gis thabs dang mi ldan pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug bskal pa chen po brgyad stong du spyod pa bas/ gang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i
268b2(rgyud): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di glegs bam du bris te zla ba phyed phyed cing sems rtse gcig tu byas te klog cing 'don na/ bsod nams kyi phung po 'di la bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye
268b3(rgyud): bar mi phod pa nas/ grangs su bgrangs pa dang / dper sbran par yang mi bzod do// tshangs pa chen po de lta bas na khyed kyis rtag tu yid la bya zhing / nan tan du sgrub pa dang / gzung zhing
268b4(rgyud): gzhan la'ang yang dag par rgya cher bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon 'das pa'i dus na nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ ji ltar skyes bu dpa' bo g.yul ngor lus dang srog/
268b5(rgyud): la mi lba ba bzhin du ngas kyang mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gzung zhing 'dzin pa dang / klog cing 'don pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa la thogs pa med par gyur to//
268b6(rgyud): tshangs pa chen po dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nam 'jig rten na gnas kyi bar du/ rin po che sna bdun yang med par yang mi 'gyur ro// gal te rgyal po mi bzhugs na rin po che sna bdun yang mod//
268b7(rgyud): la med par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa chen po de ltar de bzhin du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'jig rten na gnas kyi bar du/ bla na med pa'i chos rin po che thams cad kyang nub par mi
269a1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di nam med pa na gzhan dag kyang nub par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di sems rtse gcig tu byas te/ mnyan pa dang / gzung /
269a2(rgyud): ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher bshad pa dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta bas ngal ba dang / dub pa khyad du gsod cing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
269a3(rgyud): spyad par bya ste/ bsod nams kyi nang na mchog yin par nga'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du bslab cing nan tan du bya'o// de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po la sogs te/ tshangs pa'i 'khor grangs
269a4(rgyud): med pa dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gzhan yang gnod sbyin gyi dbang po la sogs pa de dag thams cad stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
269a5(rgyud): nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo
269a6(rgyud): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di bsrung ba dang yongs su rgyas par bgyi'o// chos 'di ston pa'i tshe bgegs dang bar chad kun bsal te dge bar 'gyur ba dang / kha dog dang mthu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
269a7(rgyud): ba dang / spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang / lus dang sems bde bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i 'khor rnams kyang bde ba nyams su myong ba dang / gang na gnas pa'i yul 'khor de'ang mu ge dang / dgra'i/
269b1(rgyud): 'jigs pa dang / mi ma yin pas 'tsho ba zhig mchis na'ang / bdag cag lha'i 'khor gyis yongs su bsrungs pas de dag bde zhing skyid pa dang gnod pa rnams mi 'byung bar gyur na/ de dag kyang
269b2(rgyud): bdag cag lha'i mthu lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di la mchod cing rim gro bgyid na/ de la bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra bar mchod cing rim
269b3(rgyud): gro bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i rgyal po tshangs pa chen po la sogs te/ tshangs pa'i 'khor de dag dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po la sogs pa rnams
269b4(rgyud): la legs so zhes bka' stsal te/ legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyed kyis dam pa'i chos zab mo 'di'ang thos/ mdo sde'i dbang po 'di dang 'di 'dzin pa la/ srung ba dang / bskyab pa'i sem/
269b5(rgyud): bskyed pa des bsod nams kyi khyad par tshad med pa dang ldan pas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
269b6(rgyud): bka' stsal nas/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ stong pa nyid la brten nas
269b7(rgyud): bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags
270a1(rgyud): skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha bas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das
270a2(rgyud): ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin
270a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyis
270a4(rgyud): yongs su gzung ba/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod pa/ lha'i dbang po'i tshogs thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams
270a5(rgyud): cad kyis mchod cing bsngags te/ brjod nas rab tu bkur ba/ lha'i khang khyim thams cad snang bar bgyis pa/ sems can thams cad la mchog tu bde ba thams cad rab tu sbyin bar bgyid
270a6(rgyud): pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad skems pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad kyi rgyud gcod pa/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs/
270a7(rgyud): thams cad rab tu zlog pa ga/ mu ge'i yang ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ nad kyi yang ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gza'i gnod pa thams cad sel ba/ mchog tu zhi bar bgyis
270b1(rgyud): par mya ngan dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa 'bum rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa lags so// btsun pa bcom/
270b2(rgyud): ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'khor gyi nang du rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad na/ chos nyan pa chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang
270b3(rgyud): g.yog tu bcas pa bzhi'i lha'i lus 'di gzi byin chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag gi lus la brtson pa dang / stobs dang / mthu'ang skyed par 'gyur/ gzi brjid dang
270b4(rgyud): dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa'ang bdag cag gi lus la 'jug par 'gyur te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi ni chos dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba/ chos kyi
270b5(rgyud): rgyal po lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni chos kyi lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phya
270b6(rgyud): chen po rnams kyi rgyal po bgyi'o// 'byung po'i tsho gas mi bzad pa/ snying rje ma mchis pa/ gzhan gyi gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal
270b7(rgyud): po chen po bzhi gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rtag par rgyud du lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas/ 'dzam bu'i
271a1(rgyud): gling thams cad la blta bar bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i slang du/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 'jig
271a2(rgyud): rten skyong ba zhes ming du chags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang su dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur ram/ mu ge'i yang ba 'am/ nad kyi
271a3(rgyud): yang ba 'am/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong dang / gnod pa 'bum dag gis gtses par gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis gser 'od dam pa/
271a4(rgyud): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag la bskul bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyis brlabs
271a5(rgyud): kyis dge slong chos smra ba de dag la bskul ba na/ yul gang dang gang du mchi bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yul de dang de dag tu rgya cher yang dag par ston par 'gyur te//
271a6(rgyud): gang gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa sna tshogs stong yul du 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang gi yul du mdo sde'i dbang
271a7(rgyud): popo 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag mchi bar 'gyur ba'i yul de dag tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'ang bsnyen par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal
271b1(rgyud): pos gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan te/ de thos nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag phyir rgol ba thams cad las kun tu srung bar bgyid/ yongs su
271b2(rgyud): bskyab pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang / yongs su myong bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i tshul po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can
271b3(rgyud): rnams kun tu bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i
271b4(rgyud): rgyal pos nam dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa la/ bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
271b5(rgyud): bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bde ba dang yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o//
271b6(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal pos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa la bsti stang du bgyid / bla mar bgyid/ rang
271b7(rgyud): gror bgyid cing mchod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal po chen po de la rgyal po thams cad pas ches bsti stang du bgyid/ ches bla mar bgyid/ ches rim
272a1(rgyud): gror bgyid/ ches mchod par bgyi ste/ yul thams cad du'ang rab tu bsngags par gyi'o// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po chen po bzhis/
272a2(rgyud): lha dang mi rnams la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal
272a3(rgyud): po chen po dag legs so legs so// rgyal po chen po khyed yang legs so legs so// 'di lta ste/ khyed ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ sangs
272a4(rgyud): rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba/ chos kyi rgyal po/ chos kyis lha dang mi rnams kyi rgyal po byed pa'o// 'di lta ste/ khyed ni
272a5(rgyud): yun ring por sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la
272a6(rgyud): zhugs pa/ mi phan pa thams cad 'gog pa/ sems can thams cad la bde ba thams cad nye bar sgrub par brtson pa te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
272a7(rgyud): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa dang rim gro byed par brtson pa de dag la kun tu srung bar gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang
272b1(rgyud): bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ des na rgyal po chen po dpung dang / g.yog dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba/
272b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi tshul kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro// yongs su bskyang ba dang / yongs su gzung bar yang 'gyur ro// des na rgyal po chen po dpung dang / g.yog dang
272b3(rgyud): banod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhis/ lha dang lha ma yin du g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar 'gyur ro// lha ma yin rnams pham par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
272b4(rgyud): po'i rgyal po pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad 'dul bar byed pa 'di'i phyir/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la kun tu srung bar
272b5(rgyud): gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po
272b6(rgyud): chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
272b7(rgyud): btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gser 'od dam pa
273a1(rgyud): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ yul 'khor ram/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / mi'i
273a2(rgyud): rgyal po gang dang gang gi yul du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal por gyur pa gang la la zhig lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig rgyal po'i bstan bcos 'dis rgyal po
273a3(rgyud): bgyid cing / rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan tam/ rim gro bgyid dam/ mchod par bgyid dam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge
273a4(rgyud): bsnyen ma 'am/ mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la'ang bsti stang du bgyid/ btsun par bgyid/ rim gror bgyid cing mchod de/ rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
273a5(rgyud): po'i rgyal po nyan na/ chos mnyan pa'i chu bo'i chus/ chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa bzhi dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma'i/
273a6(rgyud): lha'i lus 'di dag gzi byin chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag la brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / stobs chen por yang bgyid par yang 'gyur/ bdag cag gi gzi byin
273a7(rgyud): dpa dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa'ang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag
273b1(rgyud): du ma dang lus ltar mi gda' bar bgyis te/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor gang na gser 'od dam pa mngo/
273b2(rgyud): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di spyod par 'gyur ba de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gror bgyid pa dang / mchod pa
273b3(rgyud): bgyid pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chang pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o//
273b4(rgyud): rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang
273b5(rgyud): chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// yul de dag kyang 'jig pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag
273b6(rgyud): tshogs rnams kyang slar bzlog par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po gang la la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gror bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de'i dgra zla 'dab
273b7(rgyud): nye ba'i rgyal po gzhan zhig mchis la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba de'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der song ste/ yul
274a1(rgyud): de rnam par gzhig go snyam du sems bskyed na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus
274a2(rgyud): dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de/ rgyal po gzhan dag dang g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur/ rang gi yul du phyin na'ang yul 'khrug par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/
274a3(rgyud): yul du gza' dang nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de rang gi yul du phyin/
274a4(rgyud): naganod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / brel pa sna tshogs brgya 'di lta bu 'byung ngo // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag bsogs te/ pha rol
274a5(rgyud): gyi dmag tshogs su mchi ba'i slad du rang gi yul nas byung ste/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der mchi 'tshal ba dang / gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
274a6(rgyud): rgyal po 'di gnas pa'i yul de rnam par gzhig par 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin 'bum
274a7(rgyud): phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ der mchi bar bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de shul du zhugs pa las kyang de nyid nas ldog par bgyi'o// brel pa sna tshogs brgya dag
274b1(rgyud): kyang nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// bgegs kyang bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de mchi bar yang mi nus na/ yul gzhig par bgyid pa lta ga la 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan/
274b2(rgyud): 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so// rgyal po chen po dag khyed yang legs so// khyed bskal pa grangs med pa
274b3(rgyud): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa
274b4(rgyud): dang / rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag la kun tu srung bar gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang
274b5(rgyud): bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu srungs shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs
274b6(rgyud): su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrugs pa thams cad las
274b7(rgyud): yongs su thar par gyis shig/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang zlog par gyis shig/ 'dzam bu gling thams cad gnas pa'i mi'i rgyal po de dag mi 'thab pa dang / mtshang mi 'dru ba dang
275a1(rgyud): rtsod pa dang / mi 'gyed par bya ba la spro bar gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhis 'dzam bu gling 'dir / nam grong khyer brkyang khri bzhi stong de
275a2(rgyud): dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag rang rang gi yul la mngon par dga' ba dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug des mngon par dga' ba dang / rang gi nor gyi phung pos phan tshun rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang /
275a3(rgyud): phan tshun rnam par 'tshe ba mi skyed pa dang / rang gis ji ltar sngon gyi las bsags pas rgyal po thob pa'i rang gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gis dga' ba dang / phan tshun du yul 'jig par mi byed
275a4(rgyud): pa dang / yul gzhig pa'i phyir pha rol gyis gnod pa dang / nam 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag nang phan tshun du byams pa'i sems
275a5(rgyud): su 'gyur/ byams pa'i sems dang phan pa'i sems su 'gyur te/ phan tshun du mi 'thab/ mtshang mi 'dru/ mi rtsod/ mi 'gyed par rang rang gi yul dag na dga' bar 'gyur na/ de'i phyir rgyal po
275a6(rgyud): chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhis 'dzam bu gling 'di rgyas par 'gyur/ lo legs par 'gyur/ nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur/ sa'ang byin can du 'gyur/
275a7(rgyud): dus dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / lo khyud 'khor thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i dus dang ldan par 'gyur/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma yang nyin mtshan du legs par
275b1(rgyud): rgyu bar 'gyur/ ra ba'i rgyud kyang sa la dus dus su 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang nor dang 'bru thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/ longs rgyu/
275b2(rgyud): tshab dang ser sna med par 'gyur/ gtong ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur/ phal cher bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/ lha'i khang /
275b3(rgyud): khyim rnams kyang lha dang lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur/ rgyal po chen po dag gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par gyur
275b4(rgyud): te rim gro byas/ mchod pa byas/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la'ang bsti stang du byeng/ bla mar byed/ rim gror
275b5(rgyud): byed/ mchod par byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po
275b6(rgyud): 'di nyan na/ chos snyan pa'i chu klung / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis khyed cag gi lus 'di dag tshim par 'gyur ro// khyed kyi lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi byin chen po'ang rnam par 'phel lo// khyed kyi
275b7(rgyud): brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / stobs kyang skyed do// khyed kyi gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa'ang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// mi'i rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
276a1(rgyud): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa pa la'ang mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya chen po yangs pa byas par 'gyur ro// mi'i rgyal po nges 'das pa
276a2(rgyud): dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la'ang yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya che ba yangs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas par 'gyur/
276a3(rgyud): ro// des na mi'i rgyal po chen po de la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// des na mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su
276a4(rgyud): bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar byas par 'gyur ro// btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad dang / rgyal po'i pho brang
276a5(rgyud): 'khor thams cad kyang bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur
276a6(rgyud): ba byas par 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyang ches gzi byin dang ldan pa dang / ches stobs dang ldan pa dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/
276a7(rgyud): dang ldan par 'gyur/ dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ grong khyer de dag dang yul 'khor de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur/ yongs su bskyang bar 'gyur/ gnod pa med par 'gyur/ dgra med/
276b1(rgyud): bar gyur/ pha ros gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro// de sad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po/
276b2(rgyud): chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po lu 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pa dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang / de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
276b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gis gser 'ongad dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'ang nyan 'tshal bar gyur/ bdag nyid la'ang bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ btsun
276b4(rgyud): mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la'ang bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag thams cad
276b5(rgyud): la'ang zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med pa bgyid 'tshal ba gyur/ tshe 'di nyid la bdag gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug
276b6(rgyud): chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal po nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa'ang yongs su 'dzin
276b7(rgyud): 'tshal bar gyur/ bdag gi yul thams cad kyang kun tu bsrung 'tshal bar gyur/ yongs su bskyang 'tshal bar gyur/ rang gi yul na gnod pa ma mchis pa dang / dgra ma mchis pa dang / pha rol gyi dam
277a1(rgyud): tshogs kyis mi brdzi ba dang / nang 'gro ba ma mchis pa dang / 'khrug pa ma mchis par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des g.yeng ba ma
277a2(rgyud): mchis pa'i sems dang / gus pa dang bcas pa dang / rim gro dang bcas pas gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di bsti stang du bgyis te mnyan par bgyi'o// gser 'od dam
277a3(rgyud): pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan pa'i slad du/ mi'i rgyal po des rgyal po'i pho brang khyad par du 'phags par mchi bar bgyi'o// der mchis nas kyang rgyal po'i pho brang spos chab sna tshog
277a4(rgyud): kyis chag chag btab cing / me tog sil ma sna tshogs bkram par bgyi'o// spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag btab pa der chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa
277a5(rgyud): bsham par bgyi'o// phyogs der gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po des lus/ bkru bar bgyi'o// gos dri rab tu bda' ba
277a6(rgyud): gos gsar pa mdzes pa bgos nas/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// bdag gis stan rab tu dma' ba gding bar bgyis te/ stan de la mchis nas rgyal po'i rgyags pas dregs par
277a7(rgyud): mi bgyi'o// der rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la chags par mi bgyi'o// rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal dang / dregs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i sems kyis/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
277b1(rgyud): po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de la'ang ston par 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po des de'i tshe de'i dus dus na/ btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams
277b2(rgyud): rang rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la sdug pa dang phan pas blta bar bgyi'o// btsun mo dam pa rnams dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams
277b3(rgyud): la tshig snyan par smra bar bgyi'o// btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la'ang tshig snyan par smra bar bgyi'o// chos mnyan pa'i phyir mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs spyod du stsal bar bgyi'o//
277b4(rgyud): dga' ba bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa ma mchis pas bdag tshim par bgyi'o// dga' ba dang bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bde bar bgyi'o// dbang po bde bar bgyi'o// bdag nyid don
277b5(rgyud): chen po thob par bsam par bgyi'o// bdag dga' ba chen pos dga' bar bgyi'o// rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas/ chos smra ba bsu bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
277b6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag de'i tshe de'i dus ni mi'i rgyal po des gos thams cad dkar po gsar pa mdzes pa bgo bar bya'o//
277b7(rgyud): spyad pa dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis bdag la legs par brgyan par bgyi'o// gdugs dkar po'ang gzung bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal po'i bkod pa chen pos bkra shis
278a1(rgyud): tha dad pa sna tshogs thogs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de nas byung la/ chos smra ba de bsu ba'i phyir der 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi'i rgyal pos der gom pa ji snyed por/
278a2(rgyud): ba de snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gi 'khor ba phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur/ de snyed kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal rigs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag thob par 'gyur/ der gom pa ji snyed
278a3(rgyud): bor ba de snyed du tshe 'di la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar gnas yangs shing rgya che ba lha'i gzhal med khang rin
278a4(rgyud): po che sna bdun las byas pa dag thob par 'gyur/ mi rnams kyi rgyal rigs dang lha'i rgya che zhing rgya che ba 'bum phrag du ma thob par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur/ tshe ring
278a5(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/ grags pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ brjod pa shin tu rgya che bar 'gyur/ bsngags par
278a6(rgyud): 'os par 'gyur/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur/ lha dang mi rnams kyi bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba thob par 'gyur/ stobs che bar 'gyur/ tshan po che
278a7(rgyud): chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan zhing gzugs bzang bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang / blta na sdug pa dang / kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du de bzhin
278b1(rgyud): gaganas pa dang blad par 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams rnyeng par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dngag tu med pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po dag yon tan gyi bar/
278b2(rgyud): yon 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong nas/ mi'i rgyal po des dpag tshad tsam du chos smra ba bsu bar bya/ dpag tshad brgya dang / dpag tshad stong du'ang bsu bar bya/ chos smra ba de la ston par 'du shes
278b3(rgyud): bskyed par bya'o// yang 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa deng bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'jug par 'gyur ro// dang
278b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/ bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir bshos gsol bar 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
278b5(rgyud): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa mnyan par bgyi'o// deng bdag gis chos mnyan pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par
278b6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bgyi'o// deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis 'das pa dang
278b7(rgyud): ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yangs shing rgya che ba byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gi sems can dmyal ba dang
279a1(rgyud): dung 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag gi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus/
279a2(rgyud): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis brgya byin nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa
279a3(rgyud): khon bskyed par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis
279a4(rgyud): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar 'khor ba las yongs su thar par byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa bla na med pa yangs shing rgya che ba bsam gyis
279a5(rgyud): mi khyab pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// de bdag gis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir zhi ba dang /
279a6(rgyud): bde legs su 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med pa byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis yul 'di dag thams cad kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro// yongs
279a7(rgyud): su bskyang ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / dgra med pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba dang / nang 'gro ba med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro snyam du sems bskyed
279b1(rgyud): par bya'o// rgyal po chen po dag dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa de dag la/ mi'i rgyal po de dam/
279b2(rgyud): pa'i chos la gus pa de lta bus bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / lha'i tshogs de dag dang
279b3(rgyud): gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dag la shas kyi dam pa byin na/ mi'i rgyal po bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa de dang / tshe 'di'i lus kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang
279b4(rgyud): phyag chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa des rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la rgyal po'i gzi brjid chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa
279b5(rgyud): dang gzi brjid kyis kyang brgyan par 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / dgra thams cad chos dang mthun par shin tu tshar chod par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom
279b6(rgyud): ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ de chos la gus pa de lta bus gser 'od dam pa
279b7(rgyud): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan la/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nas/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la'ang bsti stang du bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gror
280a1(rgyud): bgyid/ mchod par bgyid cing / rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi slang du rgyal po'i pho brang de shin tu dag par phyag bdar bgyid/ spos rab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par
280a2(rgyud): 'debs la/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan cig thun mong du chos mnyan pa de dag nyan cing / bdag dang lha thams cad kyi slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shas cung zad cig sbyin par bgyid na
280a3(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong chos smra ba de chos kyi stan la mchis ma thag tu/ mi'i rgyal po des bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i don gyi slad du/ spos sna tshogs kyis bdug par
280a4(rgyud): bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de la mchod pa'i slad du bdug pas bdug ma thag tu spos sna tshogs rnams las/ spos dang bdug
280a5(rgyud): pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la rgyal po chen po bdag cag bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa
280a6(rgyud): sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur ro// spos dri rgya chen po'ang mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des
280a7(rgyud): bdag cag gi khang pa rnams kyang snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la mi mjed kyi/
280b1(rgyud): bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can ma dang / lha mo chen mo brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang
280b2(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang
280b3(rgyud): 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya 'khor dang ldan pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang / de dag rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la byung ste/ spos dang
280b4(rgyud): bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri sna tshogs rgya chen po'ang mnam par 'gyur/ khang pa rnams kyi nang du gser du snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /
280b5(rgyud): snang ba des gnas thams cad snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po
280b6(rgyud): dag rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa rnams kyi steng gi bar snang la spros dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par ma zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal
280b7(rgyud): po chen po bdag mo'i rgyal po des gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ spos sna tshogs de dag gis bdug ma thag tu/ lag na pog snod gcig thogs par
281a1(rgyud): ma las spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag srang cig thang cig yung tsam de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
281a2(rgyud): 'di dag thams cad na/ gang na zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po khor yug dang khor
281a3(rgyud): yug chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag ban+d+ha dang / rgyal cher bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / sum cu rtsa gsum bye ba phrag brgya nasa'adu shes
281a4(rgyud): med 'du shes med min du nye bar song ba'i bar gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad du/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya po
281a5(rgyud): thams cad nas/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams kyi rang rang gi khang pa dag gi steng gi
281a6(rgyud): bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos kyi dri rgya chen po'ang mnam par 'gyur/ lha'i khang pa rnams su gser gyi kha dog lha
281a7(rgyud): bu'i snang ba'ang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des kyang lha'i khang pa rnams snang bar byas par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/
281b1(rgyud): lha'i khang pa thams cad kyi steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa'i 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas pa de bzhin du/ gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la
281b2(rgyud): mchod pa'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po des spos sna tshogs de dag gis bdugs ma thag tu/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs
281b3(rgyud): kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la kun tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag
281b4(rgyud): khrig 'bum phrag rnams su/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrag 'bum phrag du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed de dag gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing rnams su gnas
281b5(rgyud): par 'gyur/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs rgya che zhing rgya che ba mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur
281b6(rgyud): zhing / snang ba des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba byas par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag cho 'phrul chen po de lta bu de dag byung ma
281b7(rgyud): thab tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snying dag na/ chos smra ba de la dgongs par 'gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// skyes bu dam pa/
282a1(rgyud): khyod gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i tshul 'di lta bu zab mo'i don 'di lta bu/ zab mor snang ba 'di lta bu/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa
282a2(rgyud): 'di lta bu 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'dod pa/ khyod yang legs so legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// su tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa'i
282a3(rgyud): sems can de dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / 'chad pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'khor la rgya cher yang dag
282a4(rgyud): par rab tu ston pa lha mos kyang ci dgos te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
282a5(rgyud): phrag du ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de nas phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye
282a6(rgyud): ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bzhugs pa dag gis/ de'i tshe de'i dus na tshig mthun pa dang / ngag mthun pi dang / sgra
282a7(rgyud): skad mthun pas dge slong chos smra ba chos kyi khri stan la 'dug pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam
282b1(rgyud): pa kyang byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par songs shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug nas/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyang bar du 'phags pa sems can thams cad las rab tu
282b2(rgyud): 'das pa'i brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub spyod pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs dka' ba spyod pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma ngag ston par 'gyur/ skyes bu ngam pa khyod byang chub kyi
282b3(rgyud): snying po la legs par rgyan par byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod shing gi rgyag/
282b4(rgyud): po'i drung du 'dug ste/ bdud kyi sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzugs rab tu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa/ mi sdug pa ston pa/ gzugs mi sdug pa sna tshogs dag las rgyal bar 'gyur/
282b5(rgyud): skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpe med par rab tu zhi ba/ rdul dang bral ba/ zab mo mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang/
282b6(rgyud): rgya bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod rdo rje'i gdan snying po brtan pa la 'dug ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ mchog tu zab pa/ bla na med pa rnam pa bcu gnyis
282b7(rgyud): rab tu bskor bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rnga chen po bla na med pa rdung bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi dung bla na med pa 'bud par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rgyal mtshan
283a1(rgyud): chen po sgreng bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi sgron ma tha na med pa 'bar bar byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi char bla na med pa 'bebs par 'gyur/ skyes//
283a2(rgyud): bu dam pa khyod nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'bum phrag du ma las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma shin tu 'jigs su rung ba 'jigs pa chen po'i
283a3(rgyud): rgya mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems cad bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las yongs su thar par byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sangs
283a4(rgyud): rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro zhes gsung bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis
283a5(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i yon tan tshe 'di dang ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba 'di lta bu bu 'di dag
283a6(rgyud): mthong ba/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa yongs su 'dzin pa mthong nas snying brtse ba'i slad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan
283a7(rgyud): 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma rang rang gi khang pa na mchis pa dag/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag gi
283b1(rgyud): gdugs kyis bskul ma thag tu/ lus myi gda' bar bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i khang pa brtsegs pa phyag dar ma mchis pa legs par phyag bdar bgyis pa/ spos chab sna tshogs kyis
283b2(rgyud): chag chag legs par btab pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang ga la ka der chos mnyan pa'i skad du mchi bar bgyi'o// mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha
283b3(rgyud): rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can ma dang / lha mo chen mo dpal dang / sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde
283b4(rgyud): dpor chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang / 'phrog ma'i bu lta brgyas
283b5(rgyud): 'khor can dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag lus mi ganga' bar bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i pho brang rgyan sna tshogs
283b6(rgyud): kyis brgyan pa de ga la ba dang / chos smra ba de'i chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyad pa/ me tog bkram pa'i sa la bshams par gyur pa ga la ba der chos mnyan pa'i slad du/
283b7(rgyud): mchis par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma de dag thams cad mthun par bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal
284a1(rgyud): po dge ba'i grogs bgyid pa dge ba thob par bgyid pa/ bla na med pa/ chos kyi sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa de la/ chos kyi bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par gyur ma zag
284a2(rgyud): tu mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal
284a3(rgyud): po'i pho brang de dang / grong khyer de dang / yul de'ang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su
284a4(rgyud): 'gyur bar bgyi'o// chad pa spang bar yang bgyi'o// yul der yang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom
284a5(rgyud): ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i yul du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di byung la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po de dge slong ngam/
284a6(rgyud): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa dag la bsti stang du mi bgyid/ bla mar mi bgyid/ rim gror mi bgyid/ mchod par/
284a7(rgyud): mi bgyid na/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la chos mnyan pa 'di dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par mi bgyid/ rim gror mi bgyid//
284b1(rgyud): wa'i lus 'di dag gzi byin yang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid/ bdag cag gi brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / stobs kyang mi skyed/ bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjing dang / dpal dang
284b2(rgyud): phun sum tshogs pa'ang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig
284b3(rgyud): 'bum phrag du ma dag gis yul de yal bar dor bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis yul de yal bar bor na/ yul na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang yul
284b4(rgyud): de yal bar 'dor bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor na/ yul der yul rnam par 'khrug pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa/
284b5(rgyud): mi bzad pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang 'thab pa skye ba dang / mtshang 'dru ba skye ba dang / rtsod pa skye bar 'gyur/ dngogs pa dang 'gyed par 'gyur
284b6(rgyud): ba dang / gza' dang nad rnam pa sna tshogs yul du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyogs tha dad pa nas skar mnga' ltung bar 'gyur/ gza' dang rgyu skar rnams kyang phan tshun mi mthun par gda' bar 'gyur/
284b7(rgyud): dgung zla 'char ba na nyi ma lta bur gda' bar gyur/ zla ba'i gza' dang nyi ma'i gza' 'byung bar 'gyur/ nyi ma dang zla ba nam mkha' la gnas pa'ang rtag par rgyun du sgra gcan gyi gnod pa dang
285a1(rgyud): ldan par 'gyur/ dus dus su nam mkha' la 'ja'i kha dog lta bu 'khyil bar 'gyur/ sa'ang g.yo bar 'gyur/ sa la gnas pa'i khron pa'ang sgra 'byin pa grag par
285a2(rgyud): 'gyur/ yul du rlung drag po ldang bar 'gyur/ char pa drag po 'bab par 'gyur/ yul du mu ge'i ya nga ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dpag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur/ yul
285a3(rgyud): de phung bar gyur/ sems can de dag kyang nyon mongs pa mang bar 'gyur/ yul de nyams mi dga' bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog
285a4(rgyud): tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang / yul na gnas pa'i lha dang klu rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor na/ yul der 'di lta bu'i gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya dpag gnod pa
285a5(rgyud): stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ de bdag nyid la kun tu bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal po'i bde ba sna
285a6(rgyud): tshogs yun ring por myong bar 'tshal bar gyur/ bde ba thams cad bstabs pa'i sems kyis rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar bgyid/
285a7(rgyud): 'tshal bar gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad pham par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ yul thams cad du yun ring du yongs su skyong 'tshal bar gyur/ chos kyi rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal
285b1(rgyud): bar gyur/ rang gi yul yang 'jig pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
285b2(rgyud): mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar/ gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyid/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nom/ dge bsnyen ma
