285b3(rgyud): mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la'ang bsti stang du bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ ri mor bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyang
285b4(rgyud): chos mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par bgyid/ bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi byin chen po'ang rnam par 'phel bar
285b5(rgyud): bgyi'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po nges gdon mi 'tshal bar/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom
285b6(rgyud): ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang pos 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed pa bstan pa dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan bcos rnam
285b7(rgyud): pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs ngag gis sems can dag gi don gyi slad du/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
286a1(rgyud): bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag pas ches mchog/ ches khyad par du 'phags pa/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di//
286a2(rgyud): ni btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang po 'bum phrag de dag dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can bye ba khrag khrig
286a3(rgyud): 'bum phrag du ma thams cad pas ches mchog/ ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad pa lags
286a4(rgyud): so// ci nas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi rgyal pos rgyal po nyid bgyi ba dang / ci nas sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas rang gi yul kun tu
286a5(rgyud): bsrung bar 'gyur ba dang / yongs su bskyang bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas yul thams cad na gnod pa dang dgra ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams pham snga phyir/
286a6(rgyud): phyogs par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas yul de dag na nad 'gro ba ma mchis shing 'khrug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas yul thams cad chos kyis 'khrug pa ma mchis shing mi brtse bar/
286a7(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / ci nas mi'i rgyal po de dag gis rang rang gi yul rnams su chos kyi sgron ma chen po 'bar bar bgyis shing snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas lha'i khang khyim thams cad
286b1(rgyud): lha dag dang lha'i bu rnams kyis blang bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag cag rgyal ba can po pa'i dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang / 'jam du gling gnas pa'i rtsag
286b2(rgyud): tshogs thams cad tshim pa dang rim gror bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di rag gzi brjid chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag cag gi lus
286b3(rgyud): la brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu chen po skyed par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /
286b4(rgyud): nas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du lo legs shing nyams dga' la/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams bde bar
286b5(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas sems can thams cad bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba dag myong bar 'gyur ba dang /
286b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang lhan cig gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de
286b7(rgyud): ngag thams cad bldan/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dag pas ches 'phags/
287a1(rgyud): pa'i thugs rje chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dag gi lha'i shes pa bas ches 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i
287a2(rgyud): mkhyen pa bla na med pa dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad pas ches 'phags pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa/
287a3(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi skad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher yang dag
287a4(rgyud): par rab tu bshad do// mi'i rgyal po'i dgos pa dang / rgyal po'i bstan bcos dang / rgyal po'i bgyi ba gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na mchis pa dang / gang dag gis sems can 'di dag thams
287a5(rgyud): cad bde bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde dbang po'i rgyal po nye bar
287a6(rgyud): bstan/ yongs su brjod/ yang dag par rab tu bshad do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgya de dang rkyen des/ mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
287a7(rgyud): po 'di gus par mnyan par bgyi/ gus par rim gror bgyi/ gus par mchod par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
287b1(rgyud): to de'i phyir rnam po chen po byung ba'i dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pas gdo mi bya bar mi'i rgyal po gser 'ong ngam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim blo byeng ba dang / mchong/
287b2(rgyud): byed pa de dag kun tu srung ba'i phyir spro ba rgya cher gyis shig rgyal po chen po dag dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa de dag
287b3(rgyud): kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'dzin du chug cig dang / de dag lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ gser 'od dam pa mdo
287b4(rgyud): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par gyur te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis ci nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge
287b5(rgyud): bsnyen ma srung ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / nang med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa dang / sems bde bar 'gro zhing / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par
287b6(rgyud): 'gyur bar/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag kun tu bsrung bar bya/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su
287b7(rgyud): bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bya'o// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu stan las langs te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la yid bzhin gyi nor bu
288a1(rgyud): zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs mchis pa 'di/ sems can gang la la dag 'dzin cing 'chang bar mos pa de la bsod nams dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu de la bdag
288a2(rgyud): gis srung zhing bskyabs pas/ de'i sdug bsngal thams cad bsal te bde bar gnas par bgyi'o// bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyang bskyed par bgyi'o// gang gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin par
288a3(rgyud): 'dod pas lus srung ba'i phyir sngags 'di sngar brjod par bgyi'o// na mo bai shra ba NA ya/ ma hA rA dzA ya/ tad+ya thA/ rA ra ra ra/ ku no ku no// khu no khu no/ ru no ru no/ sa ba sa ba/ ka ra ka ra/ bi kA
288a4(rgyud): raM/ ma hA bi kA raM/ ma hA kA la/ ma hA rA dza/ rak+Sha rak+Sha tu mAM/ sarba satwA nany+dza swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das sngags 'di skud pa dkar po la sngags lan re bzlas shing mdud pa lan re bor te/ de ltar
288a5(rgyud): lan bdun byas nas dpung pa la btags na don de nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas khang pa dben pa'i nang na khrus byas la gos gtsang ma gyon te/ spos gu gul dang / tsan dan dang ga ga pur dang //
288a6(rgyud): du ru ka dang / a ka ru dang / pog dkar po la sogs pa 'di dag cha mnyam par sbyar ba'i spos kyis mchod cing sngags 'di bzlas pas/ rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu spyan drang bar bya'o// na mo 'i kra ba N+Da la
288a7(rgyud): mahA d+hA na dA ya/ tsar+N+Na shwa rA ya/ A kaR+Sha/ a pa ra mi ta/ tsaN+De shwa ra/ pa ra ma/ ka ru Ni ka/ sarba satwA/ hi ta tsan+ti/ ma ma d+ha na badz+ro/ par+ye sha swa yaM/ a kiR+Sha ya swA hA/ sngags 'di lan bdun/
288b1(rgyud): bzlas pa'i 'og tu rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o// sngags 'di 'don pa'i dus su dkon mchog gsum dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la sngar phyag 'tshal bar bya'o// rgyal po chen po rnam
288b2(rgyud): thos kyi bu ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa skong zhing nor sbyin pas sems can thams cad bde bar mdzad pa'i phyir/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di bzlas na/ sems can de dag
288b3(rgyud): yid bzhin du bde ba rnyed par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba'i sngags kyi snying po 'di smras so// na mo rat+na tra yA
288b4(rgyud): ya na mo ba shra ba NA ya/ ma hA ra dzA ya/ tad+ya thA/ si mi si mi/ su mu su mu/ tsaN+DA tsaN+Da/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ki li kai li/ ku ru ku ru/ mu ru mu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ sa~M dA ya/
288b5(rgyud): at+ma naM/ ni t+yan/ an+tar+d+ha tu swA hA/ na mo bai shra ba NA ya swA hA/ d+hA na dA ya swA hA/ ma no ra tha pa ri pU ra ya swA hA/ sngags 'di sngar lan stong bzlas pa'i 'og tu/ khang pa dben pa'i nang du lci ba'i
288b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du zhig byas te/ be shos ci dang ci 'byor par mchod par bya'o// spos dam pa bsregs pa'i du ba'i rgyun mi 'chad par bya zhing / nyin mtshan du sems rtse gcig pas/ sngags kyi stong
288b7(rgyud): po 'di bdag nyid kyis thos pa tsam du bzlas pa byas na/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i swa dzi nar sha b+ha zhes bya ba gzhon nu'i gzugs kyis/ de'i gan du mchis te nga'i yab la ci zhig gsol/
289a1(rgyud): zhes dri bar bya'o// de nas bdag ni dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i phyir nor zhig gsol gyis stsol cig ces smos shig/ de nas sras dzi na sha b+has yab la gsol pa
289a2(rgyud): skyes bu dam pa zhig dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i phyir nor zhig gsol lo zhes gsol pa dang / yab kyis khyod myur du song la nyin gcig bzhin du kar sha pa Na brgya brgya byin cig ces bka' stsal
289a3(rgyud): de nas sngags sgrub pa des ltas de lta bu mthong nas don de grub par shes te/ gnas dben par bdag gcig pu spos bsregs la/ nyal khar sngas su dri'i za ma tog gcig gzhag ste nyal bar bya'o//
289a4(rgyud): de phyin chad nang gcig bzhin du za ma tog de'i nang nas nor 'byung ba las/ nor de de'i nyin par dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i yo byad me tog dang / spos dang / zhal zas la sogs pa sbyar ba dang /
289a5(rgyud): brel cing 'phongs pa rnams la'ang sbyin zhing zad par bya'o// sems can thams cad la byams par bsam mo// khro ba dang 'tshe ba'i bsam pa bskyed na/ de nyams par 'gyur bas khro ba'i sems mi skye
289a6(rgyud): bar rtag tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// de nas yang sngags 'di 'dzin pa des nyin gcig bzhin lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang / gzhan yang sras dang sras mo'i 'khor du bcas pa la rtag par bsam zhing
289a7(rgyud): bstod pa dang bsngags pa bya'o// rtag par dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis gtong zhing / lha la sogs pa rnams kyi mthu dang bsod nams mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / dge ba rgyas pa dang
289b1(rgyud): bla mang ba'i byang rub kyang thob par 'gyur ro// lha de dag gis de ltur byed pa de mthong nas/ kun dga' zhing mgu rangs pas 'ong zhing de la srung ba dang skyob par byed do// sngags mkhas de nyid kyang
289b2(rgyud): che lo dpag tu med par gnas shing / ngan song gsum yongs su spong ba dang / bgegs dang bar chad thams cad kyang med par 'gyur ro// yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'ong dag dang gter gzhan dag kyang thob
289b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul la dbang sgyur zhing bsam pa thams cad kyang grub par 'gyur ro// gal te longs spyod can du 'dod na'ang yid bzhin du grub pa dang bya dang gcan gzan gyi skad thams cad/
289b4(rgyud): kyang shes par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das sngags sgrub pa nges bdag mthong bar 'tshal na tshes brgyad dam/ tshes bco lnga'i nyin par ras dkar po la bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs ka pi ta dang
289b5(rgyud): sbyar ba'i tshon rtsis rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi g.yon phyogs su ni dpal gyi lha mo'i gzugs bri/ sangs rgyas kyi g.yas
289b6(rgyud): phyogs su ni rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bdag bu smad dang 'khor du bcas par bris te/ gnas der bkram nas me tog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs mang po dang / mar me dam pa dang / zhal zas
289b7(rgyud): bda' ba sna tshogs kyis nyin mtshar rgyur mi 'chad par mchod par bya'o// sngags 'di zlos pas sems mi g.yeng bar bya zhing / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu spyan drang ba'i sngags 'di bzlas par bya'o//
290a1(rgyud): na mo shrI kar+N+Na ya/ bud d+hA yA/ na mo be shra ba d+hA ya/ yak+Sha rA dzA ya/ mahA rA dzA ma/ a ti rA dz+wA la na saHshrI ma hA de bye/ tad+ya thA/ ta ra ta ra/ tu ru tu ru kha ra bar
290a2(rgyud): su gud+d+ho su shud+d+ho/ ha na tA na/ ma ni kai na/ badz+ra bai d+hAR+Ya/ muk+ti ka/ a laM kr-i ta/ sha rI rA ya/ sarba satwA/ hi ta kA ma/ bI za ba NA/ thAM ya di bi pra b+ha ya/ e hi e hi/ mA bi l-I/ krAr+Na krUr+Na
290a3(rgyud): ra s+ya/ ba ra s+ya/ da dA hi ma ma/ daR+sha na/ kA ma s+ya daR+sha naM/ ma ma/ ma na pra la dA ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngags zlos pa de dang mchod pa rgya chen po mthong nas/ bdag byams pa
290a4(rgyud): dang dga' ba'i bsam pa skyes nas/ bdag de'i mdun du byis pa gzhon nu'i gzugs sam/ yang na rgan po 'am/ dge slong gi gzugs su byas te/ bdag lag na yid bzhin gyi nor bu gser gyi snod
290a5(rgyud): dang bcas pa thogs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas/ lus kyis gus pa ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig tu brjod de/ sngags mkhan de la 'di skad ces smra'o// khyod ci dang ci slong ba
290a6(rgyud): de dag thams cad grub par bya ste/ nags tshal dben par 'gro 'dod pa 'am/ nor bu rin po che 'dod pa 'am/ mi mang po'i yid du 'ong bar 'dod pa 'am/ gser dang dngul la sogs pa'i nor 'dod
290a7(rgyud): pa 'am/ sngags gzhan sgrub pa'i dngos grub 'dod pa 'am/ rdzu 'phrul dang / mngon par shes pa dang / tshe ring bar 'dod pa dang / sman bcud kyis len 'dod pa la sogs pa thams cad bsams pa
290b1(rgyud): bzhin du thub par bya'o// bdag gis dngos po de dag la sogs pa mdo tsam zhig smos par zad kyis de ma yin pa gzhan zhig 'dod na'ang thams cad bsams pa bzhin du yongs su grub par bya ste/
290b2(rgyud): rin po che'i gter mi zad pa dang / bsod nams tshang med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dper na nyi zla 'di sa la ltung bar 'gyur ba dang / sa chen po 'di gzhan du 'gyur ba'i dus ni yod kyang srong rgya
290b3(rgyud): bden pa'i tshig 'dis ni nams kyang slu bar mi 'gyur bas rtag tu bde ba dang / yid bzhin du skyid pa longs spyod pa thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
290b4(rgyud): 'di gang zhig 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing 'don pa'ang rung / sngags 'di sgrub pa'ang rung ste/ tshegs chung ngus myur du grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can
290b5(rgyud): dbul zhing 'phongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa rnams kyi ched du sngags 'di bshad pas/ des phyug cing bde ba'i mchog dang phun sum tshogs pa tshe gcig tu 'byor par 'gyur ro// bdag gis
290b6(rgyud): kyang de yongs su bsrung zhing bskyab pa'i phyir rjes su 'brang zhing gnod pa dang 'tshe ba thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o// gzhan yang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de 'dzin cing rgyas
290b7(rgyud): par byed pa dang / sngags 'di 'chang ba'i gang zag de gom pa brgya tshun chad 'od kyis sdang bar byas te/ bdag gi 'khor gnod sbyin stong rnams kyis kyang rtag tu de'i g.yog tu sgom zhing mngag gzhug
291a1(rgyud): yid bzhin du byed du gzhug go// bdag gi bden pa'i tshig 'di slu ba med par yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs su gsol/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus sngags/
291a2(rgyud): de skad ces smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so legs so zhes bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sems can thams cad sred pas gdung ba'i sdug bsngal gyi dra ba
291a3(rgyud): thams cad bral bas phyug cing bde bar bya ba'i phyir sngags 'di smras pa dang / gzhan yang mdo sde 'di 'jig rten du yongs su rgyas par bya ba'i phyir sngags 'di bshad pa ni legs so legs so//
291a4(rgyud): de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag
291a5(rgyud): 'tshal te/ de'i tshe mngon sum du tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba zla ba dri ma med pa'i sku// rgyal ba nyi ma 'od zer stong
291a6(rgyud): gi 'od// rgyal ba pad+ma dri ma med pa'i spyan// rgyal ba me tog pad rtsa rdul med tshems// rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu ste// rin po che ni du ma'i 'byung gnas gyur// rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes
291a7(rgyud): chu yis gang // ting 'dzin rgya phrag stong gis kun tu gang // rgyal ba'i zhabs ni 'khor los bris 'dra ste// khor yug mu khyud de bzhin rtsib ma stong // phyag dang zhabs ni dra bas spras pa ste/
291b1(rgyud): zhabs kyi drab dang ba'i dbang po bzhin// gser gyi ri bo lta bur rab tu gangal// rgyal ba dri med gser gyi ri dbang rgyal// yon tan thams cad ri dbang 'dra ba ste// sangs rgyas ri dbang rgyal la
291b2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba chu zla 'dra// nam mkha' dang yang mtshungs shing 'dra ba ste// sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bur chags med pa// rgyal ba dri ma med la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom
291b3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ stobs bcu dag gis gser 'od dam pa yi// mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po rab mchog 'di sa 'jig rten skyong ba
291b4(rgyud): khyed cag rnams kyis ni// brtson 'grus rab tu brtan pas bskyang bar bya// 'di ltar mdo sde dkon mchog zab mo 'di// sems can kun la bde ba spyon byed pa// sems can rnams la phan
291b5(rgyud): dang bde ba'i phyir// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yun ring gnas par 'gyur// 'di ltar stong gsum gyi ni stong chen gyi// 'jig rten drag na ngan song sdug bsngal dang // sems can dmyal ba'i sems
291b6(rgyud): can rnams kyi ni// sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa yin// 'dzam gling 'di na 'jam gling gnas pa yi// rgyal po gang dag yin pa thams cad kyis// rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas ni//
291b7(rgyud): chos rnams kyis ni yul dag bskyang bar gyis// gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir bde ba dang // shin tu lo legs nyams kyang dga' 'gyur zhing // 'dzam bu'i gling ni thams cad dag na yang/
292a1(rgyud): sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur bar gyis// 'di ni mi yi dbang po gang rnams ni// yul la dga' dang bdag bde dga' ba dang // rgyal srid rnam par 'byor pa dag
292a2(rgyud): ba des// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni mnyan par bya// mdo sde'i dbang 'di mchog tu dge bar byed// pha rol dgra ni yang dag zad par byed// pha rol dmag tshogs zlog byed dge ba byed// mchog tu
292a3(rgyud): 'jigs pas 'phongs pa sel bar byed// dper na rin chen shing lton rab mdzes pa// yon tan kun 'byung khyim na yod pa ltar// rgyal po yon tan 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang // mdo sde'i dbang po
292a4(rgyud): mchog 'di de ltar lta// dper na chu grang skom pa sel byed pa// tsha bas nyam thag tshe ni rnyed pa ltar// yon tan ngag gis skom pa'i rgyal po la// mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no//
292a5(rgyud): dper na rin chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// rin chen snod ni lag mthil yod pa ltar// mi yi dbang po'i tshogs la gser 'od mchog/ mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no// 'di
292a6(rgyud): ni lha yi tshogs kyis mchod mchod pa// mdo sde'i dbang po lha dbang phyag byas pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul chen po pa/ bzhi po dag gis kun tu bsrung ba yin// phyogs bcu dag na sangs
292a7(rgyud): rgyas rnams kyis kyang // mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni rtag tu dgongs// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni bshad pa na// sangs rgyas rnams kyis legs zhes brjod pa byin// gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag brgya
292b1(rgyud): rnams kyis// phyogs bcu dag tu yul yang srung bar byed// rab tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu sems kyis// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni nyan par byed// 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas par gyur pa yi/
292b2(rgyud): lha yi tshogs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa// lha tshogs de dag kun kyang rab dga' bas// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni nyan par byed// chos rnams mnyan par bya ba 'di yis ni// gzi
292b3(rgyud): brji dang ni stobs dang brtson 'grus thob// gzi byin chen po yis ni lha yi lus// shin tu rgyas shing rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das las tshigs/
292b4(rgyud): su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag thos pa dang / ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur/ dga' bar gyur te/ de dag chos kyi shugs kyis yud tsam zhig dus nas mchi ma phyis te/ de dag lus 'phar yan/
292b5(rgyud): lag kun 'dar zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man da ra ba dag gis gtor/ mngon par gtor to// mngon par
292b6(rgyud): gtor nas kyang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba re logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ brtse
292b7(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi/ rgyal po chen po re re la'ang gnod sbyin lnga brgya lnga brgya dang / chos spa ba ri la bsrung ba dang yongs su
293a1(rgyud): bskyang ba'i slad du rtag tu dge slong chos smra ba'i srang bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o// gal te mdo sde 'di las tshig gi don 'ga' zhig brjed par gyur na'ang / bdag cag gis de/
293a2(rgyud): la dran pa dang / mi brjed pa'i mchog gi gzungs chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di dag gang na bzhugs pa'i gnas de dag gi sems can rnams kyis yongs
293a3(rgyud): su rgyas par byed pas nam yang nub par mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa de dag la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sems can de dag gis ye shes dang/ spobs
293a4(rgyud): pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa thob pas/ nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i bde ba dang ldan te/ bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas shing 'khor ba yongs su spangs te/ bla na med pa yang
293a5(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa myur du thob par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po chen po bzhis yul 'khor yongs su skyong ba'i le'u zhes
293a6(rgyud): bya ba ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs
293a7(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la bsgoms pa rnams kyi ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su/
293b1(rgyud): 'dzin pa yin do// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs ni yul na mi gnas phyogs nam/
293b2(rgyud): gnas pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs gzungs zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi tshig gi des gang lags skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis me dang lda pa shA ra dwa tI'i du/
293b3(rgyud): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar khyod theg pa chen po la gnas pa dang / theg pa cher po la mos pa dang / theg pa chen po la lhag par bya ba byas pa yin na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu
293b4(rgyud): ltar khyod gzungs ni yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas shing / chos kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa'ang ma yin/ 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin/
293b5(rgyud): dngos po can yang ma yin/ dngos po med pa can yang ma yin/ rkyen las byung ba'ang ma yin/ rkyen med pa las byung ba'ang ma yin/ 'gro ba las byung ba'ang ma yin/ 'gro ba med pa las byung ba 'ang/
293b6(rgyud): ma yin/ chos gang gi skye ba'ang ma yin/ 'gog pa'ang ma yin par chos ston mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang ga sangs
293b7(rgyud): rgyas kyi tshul khrims dang / sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs sgrub
294a1(rgyud): pa'i lam gyi rig pa dang / stobs kyi gnas 'dri ba legs so legs so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'ji
294a2(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ gzungs thob pas gang na gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang //
294a3(rgyud): yang dag par dam bcas par 'gyur ba dang / rten med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin gyi spobs pa can gyi slob dpon dang / lam la shin tu gnas par 'gyur ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad du
294a4(rgyud): gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu legs
294a5(rgyud): so legs so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la sangs rgyas nyid du brjod par bya ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang la la gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
294a6(rgyud): la bkur stir byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / rim gror byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa des/ sangs rgyas la bkur stir byas par 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti bu gang la la gzungs 'di nyan par byed pa dang /
294a7(rgyud): gang dag gzungs 'di 'chang bar byed pa dang / gang dag mos par byed pa de rnams la byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral bas/ sangs rgyas la ji ltar mchod pa de bzhin du 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzung
294b1(rgyud): deni 'di yin te/ d+yaH/ sad+d+ha ra ti/ srad+hA raNi/ su sa~M pra tin+tite/ su nA ma/ su rba tiSh+ThatA/ bi dz+wa la ba la tAdz+nyA b+hU tid+hA/ su a rod+ha/ dz+nyAn rba ti/ ad+hA ni/ a ba nA ba ne/ a b+hi Shin+da ni/
294b2(rgyud): zlathab ste/ sumi ni ta/ hA brad+d+ha/ bad+heb dustan/ ra dba'i brtsags pa mang ba'i garungs kyi chen 'a byang chub sems dpa' ga gas shin tu gnas pa dang / legs par bang
294b3(rgyud): kha byas nas 'ching bar byed pa de la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa bas lhag pa 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya phrag stong du'ang smon lam zad par mi 'gyur la/ de'i lus la mtshon gyis tshugs/
294b4(rgyud): par mi 'gyur te/ dug gis ma yin zhing / sbrul gyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu chags pa med pa'i gzungs 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ ma byon/
294b5(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum ste/ 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang dag gis stong
294b6(rgyud): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa phrag bcu rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yon du phul zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
294b7(rgyud): la bskal pa grangs med par na bza' dang zhal zas gya nom par bzhugs par byed pa bas/ gang dag gis chags pa med pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshig gcig tsam 'dzin par byed
295a1(rgyud): pa'i sems can de dag de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la chags pa med pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam/
295a2(rgyud): grangs 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum yin no// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//
295a3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis glog thams cad zlog pa/ so sor 'brang ba'i sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
295a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa/ nga'ang da ltar 'chad kyis zung zhig/ kun dga' bo shar phyogs na 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo lho phyogs na skad brgya pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod//
295a5(rgyud): kun dga' bo nub phyogs na 'od nyams pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo byang phyogs na rgyun gyi bdag po zhes bya ba'i glog yod do// kun dga' bo gang la la glog 'di rnams kyi ming shes pa
295a6(rgyud): dang phyogs rnam par gnas pa shes pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung bar shes par bya'o// glog gi ming 'di dag yi ger bris te/ gnas gang dag tu gzhag pa'i gnas de dag tu glog
295a7(rgyud): thams cad mi 'bab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis des tshe/ drA bi Da'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bka' stsal to// tad+ya thA/ ni mi ni mi/ ni min d+ha ri/ 'jig rten gsum snang bar byed pa
295b1(rgyud): lagan rtse gsum pas phyogs 'dir thog thams cad bdag la grangs shig srungs shig swA hA/ yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor/
295b2(rgyud): de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la/ drA bau Da'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams/
295b3(rgyud): brjod par 'gyi'o// tad+yaSh+Ta/ ka Te bI ka Te/ ni ka Te/ pra t+ya mi tre/ pra t+ya mi twe/ shud+d+he/ muk+te/ bi ma le/ pra b+ha sa re/ ar+t+ta re/ paN+Da re/ shwe te/ pat+tA ra/ ba si ni/ ha ri kAN+Da ri/ ka pi li/ piM ga la/
295b4(rgyud): a da d+hi mu khi/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las bdag la srungs shig srungs shig/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzi brjid kyis bdag dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad
295b5(rgyud): mthong bar ma gyur cig swA hA/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
295b6(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ mu ni mu ni/ mu nin d+ha re/ ma ti ma ti/ su ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ ha ha ha ha/ khyod la sdig pa med
295b7(rgyud): kyis ma 'jigs shig ces lag na rdo rjes smras kyi/ drA bi Da swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi srung ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di su'i snying la 'dzin tam/ yi ger bris pa de dag gi rtag par rgyun du 'jig
296a1(rgyud): pa thams cad las bsrung bar bgyi'o// dus ma lags par 'bum pa thams cad las thar bar bgyi'o// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das la
296a2(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba bskyed pa'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags
296a3(rgyud): kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ tsi li swA hA/ brah+ma pu re swAhA/ brah+ma sre ra swA hA/ brah+ma b+hi su gar+b+he/ puSh+pa saM sta re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi srung ba tshangs
296a4(rgyud): pa'i chad pa zhes bgyi ba ste/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa/ sdig pa thams cad las rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
296a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags/
296a6(rgyud): kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ bi naM ba ra ni/ ban+d+ha/ ma dat+te/ ma ni ne te/ ti ni go ri/ gan+d+ha ri/ tsar+t+ti li/ ma ti gi/ puk+ka se/ sa la pra b+he/ he na ma t+yo taM/ ut+tA ra ni/ ma ho ra ni/
296a7(rgyud): ra Ni ge/ tsakra bA ge/ sha ba ri sha ba ri swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni/ bdag gi rig sngags rdo rje'i lce 'bebs pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par bgyid pa/ dus ma
296b1(rgyud): lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa lags so// de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi/
296b2(rgyud): dus/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / skye ba mang po la phan pa dang /
296b3(rgyud): skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ puSh+pa su puSh+pe/ dum pa raH
296b4(rgyud): r-iHAr+ya pu sha ste/ shAn+ti ni muk+te/ maM ga l+ya/ hi ra N+ya gar+b+he sU ste/ sta bi te swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag gi srung ba 'jigs pa ma mchis pa zhes brgya
296b5(rgyud): ste 'jigs pa thams cad las mi 'jigs par bgyid pa/ tshe skyong ba dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa lags so// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal
296b6(rgyud): po grog 'od dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po glog lce dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od zer brgya pas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung de/ bcom ldan 'dra/
296b7(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi srung ba chen po yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba/ grog thams cad zlog pa/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad sel ba drug
297a1(rgyud): rnams mi gdug par bgyid pa/ gshed byed dang / byang snrums dang / ro langs dang / bkra mi shis pa'i 'jigs pa zhi bar bgyid pa mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
297a2(rgyud): cag klu'i skye gnas 'di nas dbyung ba dang / ser sna spang ba'i slad du/ thugs brtse bar dgongs te bzhes su gsol/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu rnams ni ser sna can te
297a3(rgyud): sems ser snas skor ba lags so// tad+ya thA/ a tsa le/ a ma le/ a mri te/ a k+Sha ye/ a b+hi ye pu N+ye/ bar+ya ba te/ sarba pA paM/ pra sha ma nI ye swA hA/ Ar+ya ban+du su ba ra nI ye swA hA/ btsun pa/
297a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang la la lce la 'don tam/ yi ger bris pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad ma mchis par rig par bya'o// rtsa ba'i dug
297a5(rgyud): gam/ mche ba'i dug gam/ dbyig dug gam/ gang dag gzhan yang yan lag las byung ba'i dug de dag gis de 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang gnod pa
297a6(rgyud): thams cad las bde bar gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / klu'i dbang po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ bzhin bzang
297a7(rgyud): ngag khyed skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rjes su yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ drA bi Da'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams bshad pa legs/
297b1(rgyud): so legs so// phyogs rnams na gnyid log pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa rnams srung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal 'am/ dge slong de dag dang
297b2(rgyud): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten spyong ba de dag dang / klu'i bdag po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
297b3(rgyud): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs kyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu bzhi pa'o// /
297b4(rgyud): de nas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyis/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba
297b5(rgyud): btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dbyangs can bdag gis kyang / dge slong chos smra ba de'i tshig rgyan pa'i slad du/ spobs
297b6(rgyud): pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi/ gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi/ nges pa'i tshig gis brjod pa kun tu bzhag par bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de la shes pa'i snang ba chen po bgyi/ gser 'od dam pa
297b7(rgyud): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tshig 'ga' 'am/ yi ge gang yang rung ba dag cig yongs su nyams par gyur tam bskyang na/ bdag gis dge slong chos smra ba de'i nges pa'i sgra dang /
298a1(rgyud): dang / yi ge de dag thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o// ci nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'bum phrag dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/
298a2(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na yun ring du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can du ma dag gis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i/
298a3(rgyud): rgyal po 'di thos nas/ shes rab rno ba bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / tshe 'di la tshe phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob
298a4(rgyud): par 'gyur ba dang / srog la phan gdags pa dang / bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / thabs sna tshogs rab tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / bstan
298a5(rgyud): bcos thams cad la rab tu mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / bzo'i bgyi ba sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / bskyud pa ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du/ de la gzungs kyang stsal/
298a6(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// dge slong chos smras pa de dang / sems can chos mnyan pa de dag gi don gyi slad du/ sngags dang sman dang ldan pa'i khrus kyi las brjod par bgyi ste/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang /
298a7(rgyud): skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho ba'i gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa dang / 'khrug grong dang / khrag khrug dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang / byang dang ro langs
298b1(rgyud): thams cad rab tu'i bar 'gyur/ gang gis mkhas pa dag khrus bgyid du stsa lwa ba'i sngar dang sngags ni 'di dag ste/ bu dag gi'u wang smi ka dang // sha mya sha myi shi ri sha/ in+d+ra hasta skal pa/
298b2(rgyud): dzam shing tsa a ka ru// shi ri be sta swa rtsi'i pog/ gu gul ra sa sha la gi/ rdo dreg lo ma rgya spos dang // tsan dan dang ni ldong ros dang // gi'u wang dang bcas ru rta dang // gur kum grwa skab
298b3(rgyud): yungs kar dang // spyi mo sug spel na la da// na ga ge sar u shi ra// 'di dag cha ni mnyam bgyis nas// skar ma rgyal la btags par bgyi// phye ma la ni sngags tshig 'di// lan brgya mngon
298b4(rgyud): par gdab par bgyi// tad+ya thA/ su kri te/ ka ma ta li/ na li dza na ka ra te/ haM ka ra te/ in+da dzA li ni/ shaM kA ra dr-i/ ba shar dre/ a brta ka/ sau ke na ku tra ku/ ka ba le/ ka be la ma ti
298b5(rgyud): shI la ma ti/ sin+d+hu/ d+hu d+hu ma ba ti/ shi ri shi ri/ sad t+ya s+thi te swAhA/ lci bas dkyil 'khor bgyis nas ni// me tog sil ma bkram par bgyi// gser gyi snod dang dngul sdong du// mngar ba'i khub
298b6(rgyud): gzhag por bgyi// skyes bu go cha bgos pa ni// bzhi zhig der yang gzhag bgyi// rab tu brgyan pa'i bu mo bzhi// bum pa thogs pa gzhag par bgyi// rtag tu gu gul bdugs par bgyi// sil snyan
298b7(rgyud): lnga lnga bgyid du stsalo// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa ran gyis// lha mo re re legs par brgyan/ khar bar dag tu me long gzhag/ mda' dang mdung rtse snga spang gzhag/ de nas mtshams kyang gcang pas
299a1(rgyud): bgyi// de yi 'og tu dgos pa brtsam// sngags kyi las ni 'di dag gis// mtshams gcad pa yang brtsam par bgyi// s+yAng ya the dan/ a ra ke/ na ya ne/ hi li mi li/
299a2(rgyud): ki le khi khi le sAH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su khrus bgyis nas/ sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na khrus kyis zhi bar sbyar ro// tad+ya thA/ sa ga De/ bi ge De/ bi ga ta ba ti swAhA
299a3(rgyud): phyogs bzhi dag na gang gnas pa'i// rgyu skar dag gis tshe srungs shig btsas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang // phung po'i las kyi 'jigs 'byung dang // 'byung po'i khams rnams 'khrugs bgyid
299a4(rgyud): bab+ha 'jigs pa mi bzang zhi gyur cig/ tad+ya thAsha me bi sha me swA hA/ sa ga De/ bi ga De swA hA/ bi ga De ba te swA hA/ sA gA ra/ saM bud+d+hA ya swA hA/ skan+ta mA tA ya swA hA/ ni la kar+N+Na ya swA hA/ a
299a5(rgyud): pa ra dzi ta/ bir+yA ya sAt+ma/ hI ma ban+d+ha/ saM bud+d+hA ya sAhA/ a ni mi la bak+tA ya sA hA/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ brah+ma Ne/ na ma swa ra swa t+yaM/ ma hA de byaM sid d+h+yan+tu mAM/ man+ta pa dA na ta ra tu bi tsi taM/ brah+mA nu ma
299a6(rgyud): nu t+ya swA hA/ dge slong chos smra ba de la srung ba dang / chos mnyan pa de dag dang / yi ger bris pa de dag gi don gyi slad du/ khrus kyi las 'dis bdag nyid der mchi bar bgyi'o// lha'i tshogs thams
299a7(rgyud): cad dang lhan cig tu grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grol rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang der nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// ci nas dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma/
299b1(rgyud): mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag gi srog la phan gdags par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba las 'byung ba thob par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par
299b2(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / gza' dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa dang / btsas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang
299b3(rgyud): rmi lam ngan pa dang / log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang / byad dang / ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha mo dbyangs can la/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs
299b4(rgyud): can khyod/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ khyod kyi sngags dang sman dang ldan pa'i tshig 'di 'dra ba bshad pa ni legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lha
299b5(rgyud): mo chen mo dbyangs can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di n+yas lha mo dbyangs can de bkug go/ lha mo
299b6(rgyud): chen mo dbyangs can mchod 'os dka' thub che// 'jig rter kun tu rnam grangs mchog sbyin yon tan che// brtser gnas mdzes ma dur ba rtswa yis gos bsdus pa// dur ba'i rtswa yi gos gyon rkang pa gcig
299b7(rgyud): gis gnas// lha rnams thams cad lpags nas 'di skad tshig smras te// sems can rnams la dge ba'i tshig shod lce khrol mdzod// s+yAd ya the dan/ mu re/ tsi re/ a ba dze/ a ba dza ba te ha~M gu
300a1(rgyud): le/ mA~M gu le/ bing+ga la ba ti/ ming+ga mA ri ts+yai/ sa ma te/ da sha ma ti/ a kr-i ta ma shrI/ tar tsi tAr tsa dwa ti/ tsi cing/ shi ri ma ri/ mA ri n+ye/ bran dri me lokA \u0f7f
300a2(rgyud): lo ka shre Sh+Te/ lo ka pri ye/ sid+d+hi prap+te/ b+hI ma mu khi Dashu tsi tsa ri/ a pra ti ha te bud+d+hi/ na mu tsi/ ma hA/ na mu tsi/ ma hA de byi/ pra ti gr-I hA/ na ma ska rA na/ bdag gi blo thogs pa med par gyur cig
300a3(rgyud): bstan bcos dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i rgyu dang sde snod dang / snyan dngags la sogs pa la/ bdag gi rig sngags dngos grub tu gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ ma hA pra b+ha be/ hi li hi li/ mi le mi li
300a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo dbyangs can gyi mthus bdag rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig/ kA ra te ke yU re/ ke yU ra ma ti/ hi li mi li hi li mi li/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa
300a5(rgyud): dang dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang / dbang po'i bden pa dang / chu lha'i bden pas/ lha mo chen mo dgug par bya'o// gang dag 'jig rten na bden pa smra ba de dag gi bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gis lha
300a6(rgyud): mo chen mo dbyangs can dgug par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ hi li mi li/ hi li mi li/ bdag rnam par rgya bar gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la phyag 'tshal lo//
300a7(rgyud): bdag la gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ de nas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyis gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag smras nas/ yang bram ze ko'u di r+ya la 'di skad ces smras so// skyes
300b1(rgyud): bu chen po khyod sems can thams cad la spobs pa dam pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / mngon par shes pa dang / shes rab che ba dang / nor dang / dbyig la sogs pa sbyin pas phan 'dogs shing mA ra/
300b2(rgyud): bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa legs so legs so// mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gzungs 'di dang por su 'don pas// dkon
300b3(rgyud): mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal te// 'khrul pa med par bzlas byas na// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams dang dam chos dang // byang chub rang rgyal nyan thos dang // tshangs
300b4(rgyud): pa dang ni brgya byin dang // rgyal chen bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo// rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa dang // rim gro gus par bsam byas te// zhi la dben pa'i gnas su ni// sgra bskyed gzungs dang bstod pa
300b5(rgyud): brjod// ji snyed sangs rgyas lha klu la// mchod pa rgya chen bshams par bya// skye bo'i rig ni mang po la// snying rje'i sems kyang bskyed par bya// bcom ldan gser mdog mtshan rab can// rtsag ci/
300b6(rgyud): sems kyis bsam bya zhing // bcom ldan gsung rab dam chos kyi// dbang po so sor nges mdzad pa'i// de yi tshig don legs bsams te// stong nyid sgrub pa'ang gnas par byos// bcom ldan
300b7(rgyud): thams cad mngon sum du// rtse gcig sems kyis bsam byas na// ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes dang // gzungs mchog dam pa thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan dpal mgur gsung chos kyis// dam
301a1(rgyud): pa'i dbyangs nges 'khor rnams 'dul// ljags kyis stong gsum khebs mdzad cing // so sor ci rigs ya mtshar ston// de lha'i gsung mchog dam pa la// rtag par bsam/
301a2(rgyud): zhing 'jigs pa spongs// bsam mi khyab pa'i ljags mtshan 'di// smon lam rgya chen dbang gis brnyes// chos rnams med par ston mdzad pa// ji ltar mkha' la ma chags bzhin// sangs rgyas lhags//
301a3(rgyud): mtshan gsung sgra la// de bsams smon lam tshang meng 'grub// gang zhig dbyangs can mngon mchod ngam// yang na slob mas man ngag bzhin// lung bzhin chos de gang sgrub pa// bkur sti mchog rnams
301a4(rgyud): thob par 'gyur// gang zhig ye shes mchog sgrub pa'ang // rtse gcig sems kyi chos 'di gzung // bsod nams ye shes tshogs 'phel zhing // nges par 'grub la yid gnyis spongs// gang zhig nor//
301a5(rgyud): sgrub nor ldan dang // khe dang grags pa'ang de bzhin 'grub// 'byung bar 'dod pa'ang rnam grol bar// nges par 'grub pas yid gnyis spongs// yon tan mang po tshad med dang // bsam pa bzhin du kun
301a6(rgyud): 'grub pas// 'di la tshul bzhin gang gnas pa// nges par 'grub pas yid gnyis spongs// dben par gtsang ma'i gos gyon te// dkyil 'khor ci ran byas pa der// bum pa brgyan pa bzhi bzhag ste//
301a7(rgyud): dus bzhin me tog bdug pas mchod// ba dan gdugs dang lnga ldi bre// phye ma byug pas brgyad par bya// sangs rgyas dang ni dbyangs can mchod// lha de mthong 'dod mthong bar 'gyur// dbyangs can lha mo
301b1(rgyud): de mdun du// zhab bdun gsum du bzlas brjod de// gal te lha de ma mthong na// bsam pa brtan pas 'ag dgur bzlas// de yi nub mo'ang ma mthong na// gzhan du shis pa'i gos bcal te/ tshul/
301b2(rgyud): bzhin lha mo'i gzugs bris la// mchod cing bzlas brjod rgyan mi gcod// bdag dang gzhan don tshad med la// nyin mtshan rgyun du brtson bskyed de// de yi 'bras bu gzhan la stobs// des ni
301b3(rgyud): bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur// de ste'ang bsam pa ma grub na// zla ba gsum dang drug dang dgu// yang na brtson pas lor bzlas na// mngon shes drug la sogs pa'ang thob// de nas bram ze ko'u di n+yas/
301b4(rgyud): de skad ces bshad pa thos nas/ dga' ba dang rangs pa tshad med pa skyes te/ 'khor 'dus pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha dang mi la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis sems ma g.yeng
301b5(rgyud): bar bdag la nyon cig dang / bdag gis kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten te/ dbyangs can lha mo mchog la bstod pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de smra bar bgyi'o// phyag 'tshal lha mo mthu chen la// 'jig rten
301b6(rgyud): khams 'dir dbang brnyes par// sngon gyi drang srong gis bshad pas// de phyir bdag gis khyed la bstod// dpal ldan thugs ni bde ba dang // thos 'dzin mdzes ldan grags ldan pa// 'jig rten 'di/
301b7(rgyud): skyed yum yang yin// rtag tu dpal la brtson chen spyod// g.yul gyi gnas las rtag tu rgyal// snying rje bzod la dul bas bskyed// gshin rje'i sring mos lung ston cing // rtag tu dang gos sngon mo
302a1(rgyud): mnabs// mdzes dang mi mdzes kun ston cing // spyan mi sus mthong dngang bskyed// spyod pa tshad med 'jig rten 'das// skyabs su su 'ongs rjes su 'dzin// khar 'ga'/
302a2(rgyud): ri dang brag la gnas// bar 'ga' phug dang chu bo'i 'gram// yang na ljon sdong nags rnams su// gnas de dag ni lha mo'i rten// ji ltar ri brag mi rnams kyis// rma bya'i mdongs las gdugs/
302a3(rgyud): byas shing // rtag tu lha mo de mchod na// thams cad dus su 'jig rten skyog/ stag dang seng ges 'khor byas shing // bya dang phyugs dang de la rten// dril chen sgra dag mngon bsgrags pas/ bin
302a4(rgyud): d+hA'i ri la grags par gyur// phyag na tri shUl thor tsugs dbu// yang na nyi zla'i ru mtshon bsnams// zla ba mar ngo'i bcu gcig gam// dgu yi dus su mchod par bya// g.yul 'gyed dus su thugs
302a5(rgyud): brtse bas// 'jig rten kun la gzigs pa'i phyir// lha mo ba su'i gzugs ston pas// lha mo'i mchog de dpe med pa'o// phyugs rdzi rgan mo'i gzugs ston cing // lha dag 'thab pa'ang rtag
302a6(rgyud): tu rgyal// yun ring 'jig rten bde bar byas// bar 'ga' khros shing rab 'ga' zhi// bram zer smra zhing chos bzhi dang // rdzu 'phrul gsang sngags kun la mkhas// drang srong lha yi dbang brnyes pas//
302a7(rgyud): sa chen 'di dang sa bon byed// lha mo 'du ba'i dus su yang // rgya mtsho lung bzhin nges par 'du// gnod sbyin klu la sogs rnams kyi// kun gyi gtso byed 'dul bar nus// mi rnams kun gyi tshangs
302b1(rgyud): spyod mchog/ 'jig rter gtso sbyin bdag la dgongs// rgyal po'i gnas nabang pad+mo bzhin// chu bo la yang gru dang gzings// zla ba nya bzhin zhal yang rgyas// mang du thos ldan rte yang byed//
302b2(rgyud): bo'i rtse bzhin spobs pa 'phags// bsam pas gling dang rab kyang ston// lha min la sogs lha rnams kyis// kun gyis yon tan bstod cing bsngags// spyan stong brgya byin lha rgyal yang // gus
302b3(rgyud): pa'i sems kyis zhal du blta// sems can gang dag ci 'dod pa// de kun bsams pa myur du skong // blo myur thos pa 'dzin pa yang // sa chen 'di gnas kun gyi mchog/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig
302b4(rgyud): rten khams dag tu// rtag tu sgron chen snang byed bzhin// bya dang gcan gzan ri dgas kyi'ang // kun gyi bsam pa yongs su skong // bud med kyi mchog ri bo bzhin// drang srong 'jig rten ring
302b5(rgyud): gnas bzhin// lha mo gzhon bzhin 'dod dang bral// mi mjed bdag bzhin bden par smra// 'jig rten mthun par gzugs ston cing // 'dod khams bar gyi lha gnas su'ang // khyod ni lha
302b6(rgyud): mo'i gtso yin pas// de las mchog pa'i sems can med// gal te g.yul dang 'jigs pa'i gnas// me yi dong du lhung gyur tam// chu bo g.yang sa mi rgod las// 'jigs pa de las sgrol
302b7(rgyud): bar mdzad// rgyal po'i chad pas bcings pa yang // yang na dgra yis bsad par yang // rtse gcig sems ni ma g.yos pa// sdug bsngal dag las thar par 'gyur// dge dang mi dge kun las skyo
303a1(rgyud): byams dang snying brtse mdun du gnas// de phyir bdag ni sems btud de// phyag 'tshal lha mo chen mo la'o// de nas yang slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di n+yas/ lha mo
303a2(rgyud): chen mo dbyangs can la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// 'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad ngal nyan par gyis// lha dang dri za lha dbang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/
303a3(rgyud): bud med dam pa lha mo mchog gis rab gang yin// lha mo dam pa mchog tu mdzes pa'i zhal la bstod// yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs bsags pas yan lag brgyan// dbyangs can zhes bya
303a4(rgyud): spyan ni yangs shing bsod nams 'bar// dri med ye shes yon tan rnams kyis rnam par brgyan// rin chen sna tshogs tha dad lta bur blta ba'i phyir// mchog rab dag gi yon tan khyad par
303a5(rgyud): de bstod do// dam pa mchog gi dngos grub byed pa dang // yang dag bsngags pa yon tan byed pa dang // dri med mchog dang pad+ma 'bar ba dang // mig mchog dang ni mig gi dam pa dang // dge
303a6(rgyud): kha'i gnas dang dge ba mthong ba dang // yon tan bsam mi khyab pas brgyan pa dang // zla ba dang 'dra dri ma med 'od dang // ye shes 'byung gnas dran pa dam pa dang // seng ge mchog dang mi la
303a7(rgyud): zhon pa dang // lag pa brgyang rnams kyis ni brgyan pa dang // mda' gzhu mdung dang ral gri dgra sta dang // be con lcags kyu 'khor lo zhags pa bsnams// zla ba nya ba lta bur snang ba'i zhal// yid/
303b1(rgyud): dra'ong ba dag dang dbyangs snyan dang / shes rab zab mo dang ni ldan pa dang // dgos mchog sgrub byed sems can dam pa dang / lha dang lha mis dbang pos mchod pa dang // lha dang lha yin chom
303b2(rgyud): kun gnas brjod dang // 'byung po'i tshogs kyi gnas rtag mchod pa'i phyir// swA hA bdag cag lha mo 'di la phyag bya'o// bdag la yon tan khyad par kun stsol cig/ dgos pa kun tu bdag
303b3(rgyud): la dngos grub gsol// dgra rnams khrod na bdag la rtag tu srungs// yi ge rdzogs shing tshig rgyas 'di dag ni// nang par langs nas gtsang mar brjod par bya// bsam pa dang ni nor 'bru thams
303b4(rgyud): cad rnyed// dngos grub dge ba rgya chen thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bram ze ko'u di n+ya la legs so zhes bka' stsal te/ khyod kyis sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i
303b5(rgyud): phyir lha mo dbyangs can la bstod pa dang / dngos grub dam pa slong bas bsod nams tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di n+yas bstod pa dang gsang
303b6(rgyud): sngags kyi tshig gis/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la gsol nas/ yang 'khor de dag la smras pa/ skyes bu khyed kyis lha mo dbyangs can spyan drang ba dang / de'i thugs rjes skyabs shing tshe
303b7(rgyud): 'di nyid la spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang / thos pa 'dzin cing shes rab chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas shing tshig sbyor ba'i rgyan la gsal zhing thoH/
304a1(rgyud): pa med pa grub par 'dod pas/ bsam pa de nges shing gus pa'i sems kyis/ lha mo dbyangs can spyan drang ba'i tshig 'di brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal/
304a2(rgyud): lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la sogs pa/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs
304a3(rgyud): pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i 'phags pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par bden pa'i gsung la gnas pa/ so so'i dbang po
304a4(rgyud): dang mthun par bden pa ston pa la mi slu bar gsung ba bskal pa bye ba tshad med par yang dag par bden pa'i tshig rtag tu ston cing / gsung ba de dag la rjes su yi rang ngo // bden pa gsung //
304a5(rgyud): bas ljags yangs la ring ba bkram ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling dang / rgyal chen bzhi dang / stong gcig dang / stong gnyis dang / stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / phyogs bcu'i//
304a6(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing / nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad sel ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la lus btud de phyag 'tshal/
304a7(rgyud): lo// ljags kyi mtshan dam pa de 'dra ba dang / bdag spobs pa tshad med pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ phyag 'tshal bcom ldan dbyangs can mchog/ byang chub chen po dbyangs can mchog
304b1(rgyud): 'phags pa rang rgyal dbyangs can mchog/ zung bzhi ya brkyang dbyangs can mchog/ bden pa bzhi gsung dbyangs can mchog pa yang dag gzigs dang dbyangs can mchog/ drang srong
304b2(rgyud): tshangs 'khor dbyangs can mchog/ lha mo dbu ma dbyangs can mchog/ skyes byed lha yang dbyangs can mchog/ ga can kA yang dbyangs can mchog/ mtshan mo lha mo dbyangs can mchog
304b3(rgyud): rgyal chen bzhi po dbyangs can mchog/ bden gnas lha sras dbyangs can mchog/ rdo rje gsang bdag dbyangs can mchog/ khyab 'jug lha yang dbyangs can mchog/ lha mo be mo dbyangs can
304b4(rgyud): mchog/ tshogs bdag lha yang dbyangs can mchog dpal gyi lha mo dbyangs can mchog/ dpal gyi blo gros dbyangs can mchog/ hi ri tshig 'chang dbyangs can mchog/ ma mo kun mchog
304b5(rgyud): dbyangs can mchog 'phrog ma mo yang dbyangs can mchog/ gnod sbyin kun kyang dbyangs can mchog/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal po dbyangs can mchog bdag la las mchog kun gyis stongs/
304b6(rgyud): mtha' med dbyangs can mchog thob mdzod// sku med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par grol la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dod chags bral la phyag 'tshal lo// bcings pa bcad la phyag 'tshal lo//
304b7(rgyud): rnam dag sems la phyag 'tshal lo// 'od snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// bden tshig gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// rdul dang bral la phyag 'tshal lo// don dam gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/
305a1(rgyud): 'khor mang gtso la phyag 'tshal lo// dbyangs can lha la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni tshig la thogs med mdzod// bdag gi bsam pa ci mchis pa// thams cad myur du/
305a2(rgyud): grub par mdzod// nad med rtag tu bde ba dang // tshe ring ba yang thob par shog rig pa'i gnas la mkhas pa dang / byang chub lam la brtson pa dang // skye bo kun la phan mang mdzod// re ba
305a3(rgyud): thams cad myur du skongs// bdag gi yang dag bden tshig dang // bdag gis mi slu tshig smras pa// dbyangs can lha mo mchog gis ni// bdag gi don de grub par mdzod// lha mo 'dir ni gshegs
305a4(rgyud): par gsol// bdag gi tshig la thogs med mdzod// lus dang ngag la myur zhugs shing // yid myur spobs pa rdzogs par mdzod// bdag gi lce yi dbang po la// bde gshegs spobs pa ldan
305a5(rgyud): par mdzod// tshig gi gzi brjing mthu des ni// sems can thams cad 'dul bar mdzod// bdag gis tshig ni ci smras pa// don de thams cad grub par shog/ tshigs la thams cad gus bskyed cing
305a6(rgyud): byed pa thams cad chung ma gson// nam zhig bdag gi spobs 'dod pa// don de grub par ma gyur na// lha mo khyod kyi bden tshig ni// thams cad brdzun pa nyid du 'gyur// mtshams yang lnga yi hrIs
305a7(rgyud): bgyis pa// sangs rgyas bkas ni 'dul bar 'gyur// gang yang dgra bcom pa dag dang // byas pa gzo ba'i tshig rnams dang // shA ri'i bu dang mo'u 'gal dang // bcom ldan 'khor gyi gtso bo ste/
305b1(rgyud): de la sogs pa'i bden tshig kyang // thams cad bdag la grub par shog/ sangs rgyas nyan thos 'khor rnams dang // bdag gis reng 'dir spyan drang gis// bdag gi re ba bskang ba'i phyir// tham/
305b2(rgyud): cad myur du gshegs par mdzod// yang dag bden pa'i tshig gsol pa// thams cad slu ba med par shog/ srid pa'i rtse mo man chad dang // gtsang ma'i gnas ni thams cad dang // tshangs pa tshangs
305b3(rgyud): chen mdun 'don dang // tshangs pa'i rgyal 'khor thams cad dang / stong gsum 'khor ba'i bar dag dang // mi mjed 'jig rten gtso bo dang // de dang de yi 'khor rnams dang // de kun reng 'dir/
305b4(rgyud): spyan drangs te// thugs rjes bdag la dgongs mdzad cing // brtse ba kun gyis gzung bar mdzod// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha dag dang // gzhan yang 'phrul dga'i lha dag dang / byams pa
305b5(rgyud): mngon par 'tshang rgya'i gnas// dga' ldan gnas kyi lha rnams dang // 'thab bral gyi ni lha rnams dang // sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams dang // rgyal chen bzhi yi lha rnams dang / gzhan yang lha
305b6(rgyud): 'khor thams cad dang // sa chu me rlung lha dag dang // ri rab lhun la gnas pa dang // chu bdun ri bo lha rnams dang // de kun 'khor dang bcas pa dang // zur phud lnga can nor rgyas dang // nyi zla gza'
305b7(rgyud): dang rgyu skar dang // de la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang // 'jig rten bde bar mdzad pa'i gnas// de la sogs pa'i lha thams cad// sdig pa'i las la ma mos dang // sangs rgyas la gus
306a1(rgyud): 'byung ba'i ma// bu rab gzhon la byams pa dang // lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin rnams// dri za dang ni lha ma yin// gzhan yang mi 'am ci dag dang / lto 'phye che la sogs
306a2(rgyud): pa rnams// kun kyang bcom ldan mthu yis ni// bdag gis deng 'dir spyan drangs te// thugs rjes brtse ba'i dgongs pa yis// bdag la thogs med spobs pa bskyed// lha dang mi rnams thams
306a3(rgyud): cad kyi// gzhan gyi sems rig mkhyen pa rnams// kun gyi mthu yis byin brlabs shing // bdag la spobs pa'i mchog stsol cig/ ji snyed nam mkha' mtha' gtugs shing // chos kyi
306a4(rgyud): dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sems can de dag thams cad kyi// bdag la spobs pa'i mchog srul cig/ de nas dbyangs can lha mo la/ bram ze ko'u di n+yas de skad ces gsol pa dang galha
306a5(rgyud): mos skyes bu chen po de la dge'o zhes smras te/ gang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag 'chang zhing 'dzin
306a6(rgyud): pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ste/ sems 'dun pas rjes su dmigs shing / ci 'dod pa'i don cho ga bzhin du bsgrubs nas chung za bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gser 'od
306a7(rgyud): dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po shin tu phra zhing zab pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa de bsam pa thams cad myur du 'grub par 'gyur te/ sems g.yeng bas byas
306b1(rgyud): pa ni ma gtogs so// de skad ces smras pa dang / bram ze ko'u di n+ya rab tu dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ thal mo sbyar ba byas nas rjes su 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo//
306b2(rgyud): dbyangs can la legs so zhes bka' stsal te/ lha mo khyod kyis dam pa'i chos 'di yongs su bsrung zhing yongs su rgyas par bya ba dang / mdo 'di 'dzin pa'i sems can thams cad la chos
306b3(rgyud): 'di lta bu bstan pas bde ba dang / bsod nams dang / spobs pa tshad med pa 'phel bar 'gyur te/ gang sems bskyed pa rnams kyang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob
306b4(rgyud): par byas pa legs so legs so// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las lha mo dbyangs can gyi le'u zhes bya ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom
306b5(rgyud): ldan 'das la/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun po bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen po dpal bdag gis ci nas kyang / chos smra ba'i dge slong de yo byad thams cad
306b6(rgyud): phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / brel 'phongs pa ma mchis pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / sems rtas pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / sems bde bar gdugs mtshan bas par 'gyur ba dang
306b7(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tshig dang yi ge rnam pa tha dad pa dag chub par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par rjod par 'gyur ba dang
307a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'bum phrag dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu gling du yun/
307a2(rgyud): ring du gnas par 'gyur zhing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
307a3(rgyud): 'bum phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang / mu ge ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / lo legs par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar
307a4(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang /
307a5(rgyud): sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ gos dang zas dang / mal cha dang / stan
307a6(rgyud): dang na ba'i gso sman dang / sman zong dang / yo byad dang / 'tshog chas kyi bye brag gzhan dag gis kyang dge slong chos smra ba de spro bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
307a7(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog yon tan rgya mtsho bai DUR+Ya dang gser gyi ri kha dog bzang po gser du sdang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de la/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ des
307b1(rgyud): da ltar phyogs gang dang gang du sems pa dang / phyogs gang dang gang du lta ba dang / phyogs gang dang gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs de dang der sems cad bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag bde bar
307b2(rgyud): sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur/ zas dang / skom dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / b+hu ru
307b3(rgyud): dang / dngul dang sa le sbram dang / yo byad gzhan dag gis kyang mi 'phongs par 'gyur/ sems can de dag yo byad thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyi mthus de bzhin gsha/
307b4(rgyud): pa de la mchod par bya/ spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa'ang dbul bar bya/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming nas lan gsum brjod cing / de la spos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog kyang byin la/
307b5(rgyud): ro sna tshogs kyang byin na/ de'i 'bru'i phung po chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sa la sa yi bcud dag rnam par 'phel// lha rnams rtag tu rab tu dga' bar
307b6(rgyud): 'gyur// 'bras bu lo tog ldum sdong ljon shing rnams// lo tog shin tu sna tshogs rnams kyang skyed// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i ming brjod pa'i sems can de dag la/ lha
307b7(rgyud): mo chen mo dpal ni sems par 'gyur/ de dag la dpal chen por byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dpal lha mo chen mo la legs so zhes bka' stsal te/ legs so legs so//
308a1(rgyud): lha mo khyod kyis sngon byas pa rjes su dran pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / sems can tshad med pa rnams la phan pa dang bde bas phan 'dogs shing ba mdo/
308a2(rgyud): sde 'di'ang yongs su rgyas par byed pa'i bsod nams zad mi shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las lha mo dpal gyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu drug/
308a3(rgyud): pa'o// / de nas lha mo dpal chen mos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di nas byang phyogs su mi ring ba zhig na/ lha'i rgyal
308a4(rgyud): po rnam thos kyi bu'i pho brang lcang lo can gyi 'khor na skyed mos tshal dam pa bsod nams kyi me tog 'od ces bya ba na/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khang bzang pad+ma dam pa gser gyi rgyal
308a5(rgyud): mtshan zhes bya ba na bdag gnas te/ mi gang la la zhig 'bru'i phung po spel bar 'dod pa des/ rang gi khyim phyag bdar legs par bya/ khrus legs par bya/ gos dkar po gtsang ma bgo bar
308a6(rgyud): bya gos rab tu dri zhim par bgo bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog yon tan rgya mtsho bai DUR+Ya dang gser gyi ri kha dog bzang po gser
308a7(rgyud): du gnang ba'i dpal de la phyag 'tshal zhing / mtshan nas kyang lan gsum brjod/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyi lag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos
308b1(rgyud): kyang dbul/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang dbul/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i ming yang lan gsum brjod/ bden pa'i tshig kyang brjod/ lha mo chen mo dpal la'ang mchod cing // me tog/
308b2(rgyud): dang bdug pa'ang dbul/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang dbul na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i mthus/ de'i tshe lha mo chen mo dpal khyim de la sems par 'gyur/ de'i
308b3(rgyud): 'bru'i phung po chen po'ang 'phel bar 'gyur ro// lha mo chen mo dpal dgug par 'dod pa des/ rig pa'i gsang sngags 'di dag dran par bya'o// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar/
308b4(rgyud): byang ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor
308b5(rgyud): can la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par 'bar ba'i rin chen 'od zer snang ba'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gser gyi
308b6(rgyud): rgyal mtshan gser du snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser du snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma brgya'i 'od zer snang ba'i snying po la phyag
308b7(rgyud): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser dang rin chen 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyi tog la phyag 'tshal
309a1(rgyud): lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog la phyag 'tshal lo// shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mi//
309a2(rgyud): 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog la phyag 'tshal lo// nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// byang phyogs kyi
309a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa'
309a4(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngu la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags
309a5(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' rab gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag la phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'di bdag la sbyor bar bya ste/ rig sngags 'di bdag la 'byor par gyur cig
309a6(rgyud): s+yA ya the dan/ pra ti pUr+Na tsa re/ sa man+ta daR+sha ne/ ma hA bi hA ra ga ti/ sa man+ta bi ma nA ga ti/ ma hA kar+ya/ pra ti pra ma ne satwa ar+thA sa man+ta nu pra pu ne/ a yA na d+harma tA/ ma hA b+ho ge na/ ma hA me
309a7(rgyud): traM/ su pa saM hi te/ mahA kle she/ su saM gr-i hi te/ sa mar thA nu pA la ni swA hA/ 'di dag ni spyinas dbang bskur ba'i chos nyid kyis gsang sngags kyi tshig gcig tu de kho na yang dag par grub
309b1(rgyud): bar sbyin pa mi slu ba'i don gyi tshig ste/ sems can bar ma la spyod pa rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dag gis lo bdun du 'don cing / 'dzin pa dag la yan lag brgyang ba'i
309b2(rgyud): bstan par gnas pa la bskur te/ bdag dang sems can kun thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ snga dro dang phyi dro sangs rgyas thams cad la me tog dang spos
309b3(rgyud): rnams kyis mchod nas/ des bdag gis bsam pa 'di 'byor par gyur cig/ myur du 'byor par gyur cig/ gtsug lag khang dang dgon pa'i gnas kyang rung ste/ khyim de shin tu gtsang
309b4(rgyud): khar byas la/ lci bas dkyil 'khor byas te/ spos dang bdug pa'ang dbul bar bya/ stan gtsang ma'ang bting bar bya'o// sa la me tog gi sil ma bkram ste bsdad par bya'o// de nas skad
309b5(rgyud): cig de nyid la dpal lha mo 'ongs nas der gnas par 'gyur ro// de phyin chad khyim mam/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas su nam
309b6(rgyud): yang brel cing 'phongs pa med par 'gyur ro// 'gron bu dang / gser dang / rin po che dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / yo byad thams cad 'byor pa dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar/
309b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag byed pa de dag thams cad las lha mo chen mo dpal la shas kyi mchog sbyin par bya ste/ de nas de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de na gnas par 'gyur/ 'phang par
310a1(rgyud): mi 'gyur/ de dag gi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis nor yongs/
310a2(rgyud): su spel ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser
310a3(rgyud): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'i sman ljongs sam po brang
310a4(rgyud): 'khor gang du gnas par 'gyur ba'i grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'i sman ljongs sam/ pho brang 'khor der/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa
310a5(rgyud): lha mo brtan ma bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang na gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur ba dang / sa phyogs gang
310a6(rgyud): dang gang na dge slong chos smra ba de'i chos kyi khri gshom par 'gyur ba dang / gang dang gang du chos smra ba stan la mchis nas/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par
310a7(rgyud): rab tu bstan par 'gyur ba dar/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag sa phyogs de dang de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o// lus mi gda' bar chos kyi khri'i 'og logs su mchis te/ yan
310b1(rgyud): lag gi dam pa mgos dge slong chos smra ba de'i rkang mthil nas brten par bgyi'o// bdag kyang chos mnyan pa dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par bgyi/ yang dag par rim gror bgyi/ yang /
310b2(rgyud): dag par mchod par bgyi'o// bdag tshim par 'gyur/ rim gro bgyi ba bgyis par gyur/ rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ sa'i phung po dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad po 'di nas/ sa'i sa ni
310b3(rgyud): rdo rje la thug pa'i bar du/ sa'i bcud kyis rnam par 'phel bar bgyi/ yang dag par rim gro bgyi/ yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// steng du'ang rgya mtsho'i mtha' la thug pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor
310b4(rgyud): 'di sa'i bcud kyi snum gyis brla par bgyi'o// sa chen po 'di rab tu gzi byin dang ldan par bgyi'o// de nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal sna
310b5(rgyud): tshogs rnams gzi byin dang rab tu ldan par 'khrud par 'gyur/ kun dga' ra ba dang / nags tshal dang / shing ljon pa thams cad lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog rnam pa
310b6(rgyud): sna tshogs pa thams cad kyang rab tu gzi byin dang ldan par bgyi/ dri dang rab tu ldan pa dang / snum dang rab tu ldan pa dang / ro zhim por 'gyur/ blta na rab tu sdug pa dang / rab tu che bar 'gyur/
310b7(rgyud): ro/ sems can de dag kyang btung ba dang bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs de dag 'tshal nas/ tshe dang / stobs dang / kha dog dang / dbang po rnams rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gzi byin
311a1(rgyud): dang stobs dang / kha dog dang / gzugs dang rab tu ldan par gyur nas kyang / sa la mchis pa'i dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa 'bum phrag du ma dag bgyid//
311a2(rgyud): par 'gyur/ brtson par 'gyur/ 'bad par 'gyur/ stobs su bgyi ba'i las rnams bgyid par 'gyur/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgya nges 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/
311a3(rgyud): ba dang / lo legs pa dang / rgyas pa dang / nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur/ dga' ba rnam pa
311a4(rgyud): sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ sems can de dag gzi byin dang / stobs dang / kha dog dang / gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i slad du
311a5(rgyud): dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen namadage bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag chos kyi khri stan la mchis pa'i gan du mchi bar 'gyur/ mchis nas kyang sems rab tu dang
311a6(rgyud): bas sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad par bgyi ba'i slad du chos smra ba de dag la/
311a7(rgyud): gsol ba 'debs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rab tu bshad pa na/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag g.yog
311b1(rgyud): dang bcas te/ rab tu gzi byin dang ldan pa dang / rab tu stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bdag cag gi lus la stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / mthu chen po steng par 'gyurabadag cag gi/
311b2(rgyud): lus la gzi byin dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa'ang 'jug par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par gyur/ gzi byin/
311b3(rgyud): rang stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / shugs chen po thob par gyur na/ sa chen po dpag tshad stong phrag bdun pa'i 'dzam bu'i gling 'di sa'i bcung chen pos rnam par 'phel bar
311b4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sa chen po gzi byin dang rab tu ldan par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa la brten pa'i sems can 'di dag thams cad kyang 'phel zhing rgyas la yangs par 'gyur/ chen por
311b5(rgyud): yang 'gyur ro// sa la gnas pa'i sems can de dag chen por gyur nas kyang / longs spyod dang yongs su spyod pa sna tshogs la spyod par 'gyur/ bde ba dag kyang myong bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams
311b6(rgyud): cad bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bca' ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / gos dang / mal tshe dang / stan dang / gnas dang / khang po dang / gzhal med khang dang / skyed mos tshal dang / chu bo dang
311b7(rgyud): rdzing dang / chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / mtsho dang / ldeng ka dang / 'di lta bu'i yo byad bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs la gnas pa sa las 'byung ba/ sa la brten pa 'di dag la spyod par 'gyur ro//
312a1(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu des na sems can de dag thams cad kyi bdag la byas pa gzo bar bgyi'o// gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po//
312a2(rgyud): 'di bsti stang du bgyis te/ mnyan par bgyi/ bkur stir bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ rim gror bgyi/ mchod par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe sems can de dag chos smra ba de'i gan du
312a3(rgyud): mchi ba'i slad du/ rigs tha dad pa dang khyim tha dad pa dag nas byung ste mchis nas/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par gyur la/ thos nas kyang rang rang gi rigs dang
312a4(rgyud): khyim dang / grong dang / grong rdal tha dad pa dag tu zhugs nas/ rang rang gi khyim na gnas pa dag phan tshun du 'di skad ces bdag cag gis de ring chos mnyan pa zab mo thos so// de ring bdag ca/
312a5(rgyud): gis bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bzung ngo // bdag cag gis chos mnyan pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag mnyes par byas so//
312a6(rgyud): deng bdag cag gis chos mnyan pa 'dis sems can dmyal ba las yongs su thar to// dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul las yongs su thar to// deng
312a7(rgyud): bdag cag gis chos mnyan pa 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ tshe rabs 'bum phrag du mar lha dang mi'i skye ba yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro zhes gtam zer bar 'gyur ro// khyim tha dad pa na gnas
312b1(rgyud): par gyur ba de dag sems can gzhan dag la/ gser 'ong ngas pa mdo sde dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las thar dpe gcig cam brjod dam/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las
312b2(rgyud): thA na le'u gcig gam/ sngon byung ba gcig gam/ tha na byang chub sems dpa'i ming ngam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gcig gam/ tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam
312b3(rgyud): tshig gcig gis sems can gzhan dag la thos par bgyid dam/ tha na gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i mtshan gzhan dag la rab tu ston tam btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
312b4(rgyud): gang dang gang na sems can rnam pa tha dad pa de dag phyogs rnam pa tha dad pa dag tu mdo sde'i gtan tshigs rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta bu 'di dag gcig la gcig rjod dam/ thos par bgyid dam/
312b5(rgyud): gtam rgyud rjod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs de dag thams cad shin tu gzi byin dang ldan pa dang shin tu sdum par 'gyur ro// sa phyogs de dang de dag tu sems can de dag thams cad
312b6(rgyud): kyi phyir/ sa'i bcud rnam pa sna tshogs dang yo byad thams cad rgyas par skye bar 'gyur ro// rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ shin tu rgyas par 'gyur/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang bde bar 'gyur/
312b7(rgyud): ro// nor che ba dang / longs spyod che ba dang / sbyin pa la mos par 'gyur/ dkon mchog gsum la mngon par dad par 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis sa'i lha
313a1(rgyud): mo brtan ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sa'i lha mo sems can gang la la ngag gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na tshig gcig nyan na
313a2(rgyud): de dag mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i rigs kyi nang du lha'i rigs gang yang rung ba zhig tu skye bar 'gyur ro// sa'i lha mo sems can gang la la dag
313a3(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di dag la mchod pa'i phyir gnas de dag legs par rgyan par byed dam/ tha na gdugs gcig gam/ ba dan gcig gam/ ras bcos bu gcig
313a4(rgyud): gis g.yogs na/ sa'i lha mo rtag tu brgyan pa'i gnas de dag 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris bdun po de dag tu lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang rgyan thams cad kyis legs par
313a5(rgyud): brgyan pa dag tu gnas par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe sems can de dag mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas shi 'phos te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang de dag tu skye ba de'i tshe/ sa'i lha mo rin po che sna
313a6(rgyud): bdun gyi gzhal med khang re rer yang lan bdun bdun du skye bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang myong bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la
313a7(rgyud): sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das des na sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag dge slong chos smra ba chos kyi khri stan la mchis pa de'i tshe/ chos kyi stan gyi 'og logs
313b1(rgyud): kyis phyogs de dang de dag tu gnas par bgyi'o// ci nas kyang sangs rgyas 'bum phrag dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems cad de dag gi don gyi spang du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang por/
313b2(rgyud): rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang gsor 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par 'gyur ba dang ga la 'os/
313b3(rgyud): pa'i dus na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa myong bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs
313b4(rgyud): pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
313b5(rgyud): rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyur bar lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ dge slong chos smra ba de'i rkang pa la yan lag gi dam pa mgo bos brten par bgyi'o// de nas sa'i
313b6(rgyud): lha mo brten mas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la sngags kyi snying po zhig mchis pa 'di lha dang mi thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba ste/ gang skyes pa 'am khung
313b7(rgyud): med ngam/ 'khor bzhi po gang la la zhog gis bdag mngon sum du mthong bar 'dod pa dang / nor dang / nor bu rin po che dang / dbyig la sogs pa 'dod pa dang / sman bzang pos tshe ring zhes
314a1(rgyud): nang med par 'dod pa dang / phas kyi dgra thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad 'jil bar 'dod na/ gnas dben par dkyil 'khor byas te/ khrus byas gros gsar/
