342a3(rgyud): dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas mchod rten de phye ba dang / des der gser gyi 'od 'phro ba can gyi nor bu dang mu tig gis khebs par g.yogs pa'i gser gyi tha ma tog
342a4(rgyud): cig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gser gyi za ma tog dag cig mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ za ma tog bdun/
342a5(rgyud): po 'di dag thams cad phye zhig/ de bzhin du thams cad kha phye ba dang / des der rus pa'i kha dog kha ba dang / me tog ku mu da 'dra ba dag cig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad/
342a6(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rus pa dag cig gda' 'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo skyes bu chen po'i rus pa rnams khyer te shog/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
342a7(rgyud): rus pa de dag blangs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rus pa rnams dge 'dun du bsnams te/ phyag tu bzhes nas bka' stsal pa/ rus pa 'di dag yon tan
342b1(rgyud): mchog rab tshogs ldam tho gros mchog/ dul dang bsam gtan bzod pa sngob grags mchog ram pa ste// blo thos ldan rnams phyir shing rtag tu byang chub 'di la ni// spo badra mos dang blo zos mchog tu/
342b2(rgyud): spyir la dga' bar byas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa'i nus pa tshul khrims dang yon tan gyis yongs su bsgos pa mchos
342b3(rgyud): hU~Mr thong bar dka' ba/ bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa rnams la phyag tshol cig/ de nas dge slong de dag gis thal mo sbyar te/ 'dun pa'i yid kyis rus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal to// de nas tshe dang
342b4(rgyud): ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ sems can thams
342b5(rgyud): cad kyi phyag bgyis pa lags na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rus pa 'di dag la phyag bzhes/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun
342b6(rgyud): dga' bo rus pa 'di dag gis pa 'di ltar myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ rgyal po shing rta
342b7(rgyud): chen po zhes bya ba bzhon pa dang stobs du ma dang ldan pa/ thogs pa med pa'i stobs kyis pha rol gnon pa zhig byung ste/ de la bu lha gzhon nu dang 'dra ba gsum zhig yod de/ sgra chen po dang / lha chen/
343a1(rgyud): po dang / snying stobs chen po'o// de nas rgyal po chen po rtse ba'i phyir/ skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ba dang / gzhon nu de dag skyed mos tshal de'i yon tan la chags shing / me tog
343a2(rgyud): 'dod pas phan tshun rgyu ste/ nags khrod chen po bcu gnyis su zhugs so// de nas rgyal po'i bu dag dong ba dang / gzhon nu'i rim gro pa rnams kyang rgyal bus bskrad nas phan tshun du dong ste/ kun tu bsrungs
343a3(rgyud): pa'i skyed mos tshal chen po'i nags khrod bcu gnyis su zhugs so// de nas sgra chen pos nu bo gnyis la smras pa/ kho bo'i snying la 'jigs pas non na 'dir bdag cag gcan gzan gyis gsad du 'ong gis
343a4(rgyud): tshur shog/ lha chen pos smras pa/ bdag la 'jigs pa ni ma mchis na/ skye bo sdug pa dang bral ba snyam du bgyid pa'i snying du gyur to// snying stobs chen pos smras pa/ thub pas bsngags pa'i nags khrod
343a5(rgyud): dben pa 'dir// bdag ni mi 'jigs mya ngan ma mchis kyi// shin tu rgyas mchog don chen rnyed snyam ste// bdag gi snying 'di rab tu dga' bar gyur// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag nags khrod bcu gnyis po de/
343a6(rgyud): dag gi khyod du rU ba na/ stag mo bu byung nas zhag drug gam/ zhag bdun zhig lon par gyur la/ bu lngas bskor te bkres shing sgom pas nyams spang nas/ lus mchog tu nyam chung bar gyur pa de 'dra ba zhig
343a7(rgyud): mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang sgra chen pos smras pa/ kye ma'o nyon mongs ma 'di lta bu byung nas zhag drug gam/ zhag bdun zhig lon par gyur la/ da ltar zas ma rnyed pas/ yang na ni rang gi bu la za bar du
343b1(rgyud): yang na ni bkres pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// snying stobs chen pos smras pa/ nyon mongs ma 'di'i zas ci/ sgra chen pos smras pa/ 'dir gang shA gsar pa dang khrag dron mo yod na/ de ni stag/
343b2(rgyud): dang / dom dang / dred dang / seng ge rnams kyi zas yin no zhes zer ro// lha chen pos spras pa/ 'dir nyon mongs ma 'di bkres pa dang skom pa dang ldan pa'i lus su gyur pas srog gi lhag ma cung zad
343b3(rgyud): cig lus te/ rab tu nyam chung bas 'dis gnas 'dir zas skom tshol ni mi rus na/ 'di'i srog yongs su srung ba'i phyir/ su zhig rang gi lus yongs su gtong bar byed par 'gyur zhig gu/ sgra chen pos
343b4(rgyud): smras pa/ kye rang gi lus yongs su gtang ba ni bya dka' ba'o// snying stobs chen pos smras pa/ bdag cag lta bu srog dang lus la mngon par chags pa blo chung ba rnams la ni tshul 'di bya dka' ba lags
343b5(rgyud): kyi gzhan lus yongs su gtong ba la zhugs pa/ gzhan la phan par brtson pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams la ni bya dka' ba ma lags so// yang / snying rje snying brtse las byung 'phags pa'i sems can
343b6(rgyud): dag/ lha yul dang ni sa 'dir rang lus rnyed snyam ste// gzhan gyi srog phyir mthun pa'i dga' ba'i yid kyis ni// 'gyur ba med par 'dir ni rnam par brgya yis brtse// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de shin tu mi
343b7(rgyud): dga' ste/ stag mo de la mig mi 'dzums par ring zhig tu bltas nas song ngo // de nas snying stobs chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ da ni bdag gi lus 'di yongs su gtang ba'i dus la bab bo// de ci'i
344a1(rgyud): phyir zhe na/ 'jig cing 'gyes pa'i chos can mthar 'bye mthar ngan pa// rnag can lus 'di zas dang skom dang mal cha dang // gzhon pa 'os pa chen po dag gis ring bsrungs kyang /
344a2(rgyud): sngar med rang gi rang bzhin mi 'dor byas don med// yang na thams cad du mi gtsang bar gyur pas na// de'i 'tsho ba med kyis/ nga bdag gis de las bzang po'i las sbyar bar bya'o// de'i phyir bdag skye ba dang
344a3(rgyud): 'chi ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal ba'i gru bo che lta bur 'gyur ro// yang snying po med lus dbu ba 'dra la srid bu brgyas gang byas pa chung gson pa// 'bras dang 'dra ba'i srid pa brgya ldan gcin dang phyi sas gang ba 'di
344a4(rgyud): gtang ste// mya ngan med cing 'gyur med phud med dri med bsam gtan la sogs yon tan gyis// kun tu gang ba'i chos sku yon tan brgyas gang rdul dang bral ba thob par bya// de snying rje chen po mchog dang ldan pa'i
344a5(rgyud): snying du gyur pas/ de ltar brtul nas khyed gnyis gshegs su gsol// bdag ni rang gi bgyi ba zhig gi slad du nags khrod chen po bcu gnyis su 'jug go zhes de gnyis bskrad do// de nas rgyal bu
344a6(rgyud): gzhon nu snying stobs chen po nags 'dab de nas slar log ste/ sdug gi gnas su song nas nags kyi yal ga la gos gzar te/ bdag ni 'gro la phan phyir byang chub mtshungs med pa zhi ba thob 'dod de
344a7(rgyud): gzhan gyis gtang bar dka' ba'i lus ni blo gros 'gyur ba med pa'i snying rjes sbyin// bdag gis skyon med byang chub ring med rgyal sras rnams kyis gnyer ba thob par shog/ bdag gis srid pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu
344b1(rgyud): 'jigs las 'jig dar gsum po bskal bar bya// zhes smon lam btab bo// de nas sring stobs chen pos skrag mo'i mdun du lal ba dang / de nas byams pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' las/
344b2(rgyud): mos ci'ang ma byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kye ma'o// 'di ni nyam chung bas mi nus so snyam nas langs te/ snying brtse ba'i blo gros kyis mtshon ma btsal na gang nas kyang mtshon cha ma rnyed nas
344b3(rgyud): de nas 'od ma'i yul ga lo brgya lon pa sra ba zhig blangs te/ bdag gis mgul pa bcad nas stag mo'i mdun du 'gyel to// byang chub sems dpa' 'gyel ma thag tu/ chu'i dbus su sor pa'i gru rlung /
344b4(rgyud): gis bskyod pa bzhin du sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// nyi ma'ang sgra gcan gyis zin pa bzhin du 'od zer rnams kyis mdzes pa med do// lha'i spos dang phye ma dang 'dres pa'i me tog gi char yang bab
344b5(rgyud): khode nas lha zhig gis ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i yid kyis byang chub sems dpa' la bstod pa/ blo gros bzang po khyod 'dir ji ltar thugs rjes sems can rnams khyab ste// mi yi dbang po rab tu dgyes/
344b6(rgyud): pas ji ltar sku 'di btang bas na// skye ba dang ni 'chi ba'i don dang bral ba zhi ba'i gnas kyi mchog/ zhi ba gtsang ma khyod kyis 'dir ni tshegs med ring por mi thogs brnyes// de nas stag mo des byang chub
344b7(rgyud): sems dpa'i lus khrag gis sbags pa la bltas nas/ yud tsam gyis sha dang khrag med par rus pa tsam zhig lus par byas so// de nas sgra chen pos sa g.yos pa de la bsams nas/ lha chen po la/
345a1(rgyud): 'di skad ces smras so// ji ltar phyogs bcur rgya ma tsho'i mthar thug rgya mtshor bcas pa yi// sa 'di rab tu g.yos shing nyi ma'ang 'od ni med gyur la// me tog char pa 'bab
345a2(rgyud): cing kho ba'i yid kyang 'khrugs pas na// da gzod bdag gi nu bos rang gi lus ni btang yang dag/ lha chen pos smras pa/ de ni ji ltar snying rje'i tshig smras pa// bkres dang ldan zhing sdug bsngal
345a3(rgyud): brgyas gtses pa// shin tu nyam chung rang gi bu la yang // za bar chas la lta bas bdag kyang dogs// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de gnyis rab tu mya ngan gyis non nas mchims mig gang ste/ lam de
345a4(rgyud): nyid la slar log nas stag mo'i drung du phyin pa dang / gos thams cad ni 'od ma'i yal ga dag la gzar/ rus pa rnams ni bye zhing bral/ khrag ni rdzab tu gyur/ skra ni phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su
345a5(rgyud): 'thor ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang brgyal te rus pa'i steng du 'gyel nas ring zhig lon pa dang / 'du shes rnyed de langs nas lag pa sgreng ste/ nyam thag pa'i sgra phyung ngo // kye ma'o nu bo sdug pa dang
345a6(rgyud): ni rgyal po dang // de bzhin du ni bu la rab tu gdung ba'i ma// pad+ma 'dra ba'i mig ring khyed kyis gar gzhag ces// ma ni bdag cag la yang tha chungs 'dri bar 'gyur// kye ma bdag cag gnyis ni sa phyogs
345a7(rgyud): 'di nyid du// shi na legs kyis gson pa de lta ma yin no// snying stobs chen po med par gyur pas bdag la// pha ma dag gis ji ltar lto ba ster bar 'gyur// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de gnyis snying rje rje'i//
345b1(rgyud): skad du rnam pa yang por ngus nas dong ngo // de nas rgyal bu gzhod du'i rim tho pa rnams kyang gzhon du tshol zhing phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su rtag pa dang / gcig gis gcig mthong nas
345b2(rgyud): gzhon nu ga re gzhon nu gA re zhes 'dri'o// de lo cha btsun mo mal na nyal ba'i rmi lam na sdug pa dang bral bar rmis pa la 'di lta ste/ nu ma gnyis bcad pa dang / so byung ba dang / thi ba'i
345b3(rgyud): zug gu sreg pa gsum zhig rnyed pa las gcig khrus khyer bar rmis so// de nas btsun mo sa g.yos pas snying sngangs te/ mod la sad nas sems pa la zhugs te/ 'byung po'i rten ma rgya mtshor
345b4(rgyud): gos can 'di ni kun tu rab g.yo ci zhig gu// nyi ma'i 'od zer med par gyur pas nga yi snying la mya ngan 'gyur ba ston// nga yi lus ni zhum zhing mig kyang g.yo la rang gi nu ma bcad rmis pa// nga yi bu
345b5(rgyud): rnams nags khrod 'dir ni rtser dong ba dge bar 'gyur ram kye// de nas de snyam du bsam pa dang / bran mo'ang snying myos te 'ongs nas/ btsun mo la smras pa/ jo mo gzhon nu'i rim gro pa dag gnon
345b6(rgyud): nu 'tshol zhing mchis na/ jo bo skor ces gda'o// de skad ces thos ma thag tu btsud mo'i snying 'dar zhing mig dang gdong mchi mas gang ste/ rgyal po'i gan du song nas smras pa/ lha bdag gi bu sdug
345b7(rgyud): pa stor ces thos so// rgyal po'ang snying 'dar zhing shin tu myos te/ kyi hung bdag gi bu sdug pa dang bral ba lta zhes smras so// de nas rgyal pos btsun mo dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir/ nga gzhon nu btsal ba
346a1(rgyud): la nan tan du byed kyis/ bzang mo mya ngan ma byed cig/ der gzhon nu 'tshol ba la zhugs pa dang / skye bo'i tshogs dag rong rong por gyur to// de nas ring po ma lon par rgyal pos/
346a2(rgyud): rgyal bu gzhon du gnyis rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang smras pa/ gzhon nu de dag ni 'ong na thams cad ni ma yin te/ kyi hung bu dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal ba'o// ji ltar bu
346a3(rgyud): dang bral bar gyur na yid ni mi bde ba// mi rnams bu rnyed pa ni de ltar dga' ba ma yin no// 'jig rten na ni gang dag bu med pa dang shi ba 'am// mi rnams gang dag bu gson de dag bde ba yin nam ci/
346a4(rgyud): de nas btsun mo shin tu mya ngan gyis non nas/ rngo mo gnang du bsnun pa bzhin du shin tu mi zad pa'i sgra byung ngo // de ltar bu gsum dag ni g.yog gi tshogs bcas te// me tog rnams kyis gang ba'i nags
346a5(rgyud): khrod zhugs pa las// bdag gi bu dge tha chungs 'ongs par ma gyur na// bdag gi snying dang 'dra ba'i bu chungs de ga re// de nas de gnyis lhag pa dang / rgyal pos bu la dris pa/ khye'u tha chung ga re zhes
346a6(rgyud): gzhon nu gnyis la dris pa dang / de nas mya ngan gyis nyam thag cing mig mchims gang ste/ rkan dang / mchu pa/ kha dang / so bskams nas cang mi zer ro// btsun mos smras pa/ kho mo'i bu sdug tha
346a7(rgyud): chungs de ga re// kho mo'i snying 'digs la thug gyur cing // lus ni mi bzang rab tu gzir gyur te// kho mo'i dran pa nyams gyur myur du spros// de nas gzhon nu de gnyis kyis ji ltar gyur pa de zhib tu spras
346b1(rgyud): so// de thos ma thag tu rgyal po dang btsun mo myos par gyur te/ myos pa sangs nas snying rje rje'i slang du ngu zhing phyogs der dong ngo // de nas rgyal po dang btsun mos rus pa de dag sha dang / khrag dang / rgyus/
346b2(rgyud): bamed cing / skra phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su 'thor ba mthong nas/ shing rlung gis btab pa bzhin du 'gyel to// de nas mdun na 'don pa dang / blon po dag gis de ltar gyur pa de mthong nas/ chung pa
346b3(rgyud): ma la ya'i tsan dan gyi lde gus rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i lus sim par byas so// de nas ring zhig lon pa dang 'du shes rnyed nas/ rgyal po langs te snying rje rje'i skad du 'bod pa/ kyi hung bu sdug yid 'ong
346b4(rgyud): mthong dga' ba// 'chi bdag dbang du ci phyir myur du song // 'chi bdag ci phyir ngal sngar ma 'ongs// nga la sdug bsngal 'di las gzhan mi 'byung // btsun mo'ang myos pa las sangs nas/ skra gzhig
346b5(rgyud): cing lag pa gnyis kyis brang la brdungs te/ 1thang la phyung ba bzhin du sa'i steng du 'dre ldog cing ma he be'u ster ba dang rnga mo rde'u stor ba bzhin du snying rje rje'i skad du ngu'o// kyi hung sdug cing gcis pa'i sra
346b6(rgyud): ni pad+ma 'di// su yis sa yi steng du bshig nas rab tu gtor// yid 'ong mig ldan zla 'dra'i bzhin can bdag gi bu// bdag gi dgra bo gang gis de rings 'dir bcom// kyi hung sa 'dir bu mchog bsad
346b7(rgyud): mthong ba// lus 'di ci phyir de ring zhig ma gyur// sdug bsngal 'di 'dra mthong yang mags pa// bdag gi snying 'di lcags ni yin yang dag/ de ring rmi lam du ni bdag gi nu ma 'ga' zhig gos ni ral gris
347a1(rgyud): bcad// so yang phyung bas de ring bdag gi bu sdug de ni myur du ma rungs gyur// bdag gis thi ba'i phrug gru gsum zhig rnyed pa gcig 'dir ji ltar khras khyer bzhin// bdag ni bu
347a2(rgyud): gsum dag gis bskor ba las kyang gcig ni de ring 'chi bdag khyer// kyi hud sdig pa can gyi rmi lam de'i 'bras bu grub pa ni 'di yin no// de nas rgyal po dang btsun mo snying rje rje'i skad du rnam pa mang po sme
347a3(rgyud): zhing rgyan thams cad bkrol nas/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu bu'i rus pa la mchod pa byas nas/ gzhon nu'i rus pa rnams phyogs 'dir bzhag go// kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu
347a4(rgyud): gzhon nu snying stobs chen po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu snying stobs chen po zhes bya bar
347a5(rgyud): gyur to// kun dga' bo 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug las yongs su ma grol ba de'i tshe'ang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal las/ ngas 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan btags
347a6(rgyud): nas skyon thams cad dang bral te/ yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa da ltar lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ltar sems can re re'i phyir yang sems can dmyal ba rnams su bskal par gnas par spro zhing /
347a7(rgyud): skye ba'i 'khor ba las rnam par grol lo// sems can gyi snying pos shin tu bya dka' ba rnam pa sna tshogs du mas 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan btags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs
347b1(rgyud): su bcang ba 'di dgu bka' stsal to// byang chub mchog 'di yongs su 'tshol ba na// bskal pa mang por ngas ni lus btang ste// ji ltar rgyal po dang ni rgyal bur gyur// de ltar ngas ni lus rnams yongs
347b2(rgyud): su btang // sngon gyi tshe rabs rnams ni rjes dran te// shing rta chen po zhes bya'i rgyal po 'byung // de la bu ni gtong ba che ldan pa// snying stobs che zhes bya ba dam pa yod// de la bu bo dag ni gnyis yod de/
347b3(rgyud): ming ni sgra chen po dang lha chen po// spun tshogs de dag nags tshal khrod du dong // de dag skrag mo bkres pas gzir ba mthong // de la sems can mchog de snying rje skyes// stag mo 'di ni bkres skom gci
347b4(rgyud): bas na// bdag bu de dag za bar 'ong gis pa// de ltar bdag lus da ni gtang bar bya// shing rta che yi bu ni snying stobs che// stag mo bkres mthong stag phrug rnams// thar par bya phyir snying rje yis// ri ngos
347b5(rgyud): gzar bar mchongs pa dang // sa ni ri dang bcas su g.yos// bya tshogs rnam mang rnam par 'thor// ri dgas tshogs skrag 'jig rten 'di// mun pas thibs por gnas par gyur// de yi phu bo sgra chen dang /
347b6(rgyud): de bzhin lha chen de gnyis kyis// nags tshogs chen po der bltas nas// snying stobs chen po ma rnyed nas// shin tu mya ngan zug rngu'i snying // dran med nags kyi nang na rgyu// nu bo de ni yongs 'tshol zhing //
347b7(rgyud): gdong la mchi zag nags khrod rgyu// sgra chen de bzhin lha chen po// rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag gnyis// stag mo nyam chung gang nyal ba// der ni nye bar song ba dang // stag mo dang ni stag drug gi/ stag gi mchu
348a1(rgyud): la khrag chags mthong // skra dang rus pa cung zad cig/ sa la rnam par 'thor ba mthong // de yi khrag gi thigs pa ni// nyung zhig sa la yod par gyur// rgyal po'i bu ni de gnyis kyis/
348a2(rgyud): khrag chags pa yis de mthong // rab tu brgyal te sa 'di la// 'gyel nas yid ni nyams par gyur// lus rnams la ni rdul gyis gos// dran dbang nyams shing sems kyang myos// de dag gi ni 'khor
348a3(rgyud): rnams kyang // snying rjer ngu zhing mya ngan non// de dag chus ni rab 'thor zhing // lag pa bsgrengs te ngu zhing gnas// de ni 'gyel ma thag tu yang // btsun mo gces mchog bskyed pa'i ma// bud med dag ni lnga/
348a4(rgyud): brgya dang // pho brang nang na der 'dug pa// nu sor gnyis ka'i rtse mo nas// 'o ma khrag tu 'byung zhing 'dzag/ de yi lus dang yan lag kun// khab kyis gtsags pa bzhin du tsha// snying ni rab tu mya ngan gang //
348a5(rgyud): bu bral mya ngan drag mangs phog/ rgyal po'i gan du nyer song ste// mya ngan rab gdungs yid mi dga'// snying rje'i sgra yis rab ngu zhing // rgyal po shing rta che la smras// mi dbang rgyal po bdag la gson/
348a6(rgyud): bdag lus mya ngan me yis tshig/ bdag gi nu sor rtse gnyis nas// 'o ma khrag tu rab tu 'byung // bdag lus khab kyis gtsags bzhin tsha// bdag gi snying yang gas la thug/ ji ltar sdug pa'i bu rnams
348a7(rgyud): mi/ byin chad mi mthong 'di 'dra'i lhas// bdag gi bu rnams de ltar 'tshal// thugs rje mdzod de bdag srog gsol// de ring bdag gi rmi lam na// thib phru gu gsum rnyed na// bdag gi thi ba'i drug pu/
348b1(rgyud): ni// sdug cing yid 'ong gang lags pa// der ni khra mchis bdag gi ni// thib phru gu de khras 'tshal// bdag gi rmi lam 'di 'dra yi// mya ngan snying 'dir rab tu zhugs// sems ni mya ngan rab gdungs
348b2(rgyud): pas// bdag ni ring por mi thogs 'gum// bdag gi bu rnams de ltar 'tshal// thugs rje ldan pa bdag srog sgrol// de skad smras nas btsun mo mchog/ brgyal nas sa der 'gyel bar gyur// dran pa'i
348b3(rgyud): dbang po rnam par nyams// sems kyang stor cing dran pa med// btsun mo'i 'khor tshogs thams cad kyang // snying rje'i skad kyis rab tu ngu// btsun mo dam pa brgyal gyur te// sa la 'gyel pa mthong nas ni/
348b4(rgyud): de ma thag tu rgyal dbang de// bu dang bral ba'i mya ngan non// blon po dang ni 'khor rnams kyang // gzhon nu rnams ni btsal phyir dong // grong khyer kun gyi skye bo dag/ tha dad khyim nas byung zhing 'khod// du
348b5(rgyud): zhing gdong nas mchi ma zag/ lam kar snying stobs che de 'dri// gson nam 'on tam shi 'am ci// snying stobs chen po de gar song // bdag cag de ring mthong zhig gam// yid 'ong sems can mthong re
348b6(rgyud): dga'// de ring mi snyan thos gyur cing // yun ring mya ngan mi bzang rlung // sgra mi phyin cing rgyu mtha' yas// drag po'i sgra bcas ldang zhig gam// rgyal po shing rta che langs te// mya ngan non cing ngu bzhin
348b7(rgyud): pu btsu mo dam pa sar 'gyel la// bdag nyid chu yi drum yang 'thor// dza srong drang rnying lngar gyur pa// de srid du ni chu yis gtor/ bdag bu gum mam gson zhig ces// zhum pa'i yid kyis 'dri bar
349a1(rgyud): khyed// rgyal po shing rta chen po yis// btsun mo'i mchog la 'di skad smras// blon po rnams dang 'khor rnams kyang // gzhon nu rnams ni 'tshol phyir dong // khyod ni rab tu yid
349a2(rgyud): zhum zhing // rtag tu mya ngan snying ma byed// de ltar shing rta chen po yis// btsun mo dam pa spro bsring te// rgyal po pho brang nas byung nas// mya ngan non cing ngu zhing du// blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor
349a3(rgyud): te// yid ni rab zhum lus kyang zhan// srog chags brgya phrag mang po yang // ngu zhing mchi ma zag bzhin rgyug/ rgyal bu rnams ni btsal ba'i phyir// grong khyer gyi ni mchog nas byung // rgyal po byung ba
349a4(rgyud): mthong nas ni// rgyal po'i phyi bzhin kun tu 'brang // rgyal po shing rta chen po ni// grong khyer nas byung de ma thag/ sdug pa'i bu ni lta ba'i phyir// rgod pa'i mig gis phyogs su bltas// mgo bregs
349a5(rgyud): yayan lag khrag sbags shing // lus la rdul gyis gos gyur la// gdong la mchi zag ngu bzhin du// 'ong ba'i mi zhig mthong nas ni// shing rta chen po'i snying la yang // rab tu mi bzang mya ngan gnas/
349a6(rgyud): ngu zhing gdong la mchi ma zag/ lag pa bsgreng te ngu zhing 'dug/ de nas blon po gzhan zhig ni// rgyang ring myur du rings par 'ongs// 'ongs nas mi dbang rgyal po ni// shing rta che la 'di skad smras// mi
349a7(rgyud): dbang thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ khyod sras yid du 'ong bar mchis// ring po mi thogs khyod kyi gnas 'dir ni// sras mchog yid 'ong 'chi ba khyod kyis gzigs// rgyal po yud tsam lam du zhugs pa
349b1(rgyud): dang / de nas blon po chen po gnyis pa 'ongs// rdul chags drim can gyi gos gyon cing // mchi ma'i gdong gis rgyal la 'di skad smras// rgyal po chen po khyod kyi sras gnyis ri// mya ngan me yis rab tu/
349b2(rgyud): brdungs shing gnas// rgyal po khyod kyi sras mchog gcig mi gda'// snying stobs chen po mi rtag nyid kyis zin// stag mo bu byung ring por ma lon par// rang gi bu rnams za bar 'dod pa mthong // de dag
349b3(rgyud): la ni gzhon nu sems can ches// snying rje chen po ldan pas sems bskyed nas// byang chub tu ni smon lam che btab pa// sems can thams cad bdag gis dgrol bar bya// byang chub zab mo rgya chen 'dod pa
349b4(rgyud): la// ma 'ongs pa na bdag gis reg par bya// sems can chen po'i ngos gzar nas mchongs// stag mo bkres pas non pa de langs te// yud tsam gyis ni lus la sha med byas// rgyal po'i bu ni rus
349b5(rgyud): pa nyi tshe lus// ma rungs pa yis tshig ni de thos nas// rgyal po shing rta chen po brgyal gyur te// sa la 'gyel nas sems kyang stor bar 'gyur// mya ngan me ni shin tu mi bzang 'bar// 'khor dang blon po/
349b6(rgyud): snying rje'i skad kyis ni// ngu zhing mya ngan non bzhin de dag kyang // chus 'thor lag pa bsgrengs te rab tu ngu// blon po gsum pas rgyal la smras pa ni// bdag gis de ring gzhon nu gnyis po dag/ nags
349b7(rgyud): chen de na rab tu brgyal gyur te// sa la 'gyel te sems kyang stor mthong nas// dran pa rnyed de langs kyi bar du ni// bdag cag rnams kyis chab kyis rab tu gtor// phyogs bzhi dag nas kun nas 'bas
350a1(rgyud): ba mthong // yud tsam 'grengs nas slar yang sa la 'gyel// snying rje'i skad kyis smre sngags rab tu 'don// rtag par lag pa bsgrengs te gnas nas ni// nu bo de yi
350a2(rgyud): bsngags pa rab tu brjod// rgyal po de na rab tu sems zhum zhing // bu dang bral bas non nas sems kyang 'khrugs// mya ngan rab tu 'don zhing smre sngags 'don// rgyal po de ni 'di snyam yongs su
350a3(rgyud): sems// bdag bu sdug cing yid 'ong gcig pu ni// sems can chen po mi rtag nyid kyis zin// bdag gi bu ni gnyis po de dag kyang // mya ngan me yis srog ni zad 'ong gi/ 'di ltar bdag nyid myur/
350a4(rgyud): du der song la// mthong na dga' ba'i bu dag blta bar bya// bzhon pa mgyogs pas rgyal po'i pho brang gi/ rgyal po'i khab tu myur du bkri bar bya// de dag rnams ni skyed pa'i ma yi snying // mya ngan mi
350a5(rgyud): yis gas par 'gyur du 'ongs// bu gnyis mthong nas zhi ba thob gyur te// srog dang bral bar 'gyur ba ma yin no// rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor nas// glang chen zhon te bu rnams
350a6(rgyud): lha phyir song // bu gnyis snying rje'i skad kyis rab ngu zhing // nu bo'i ming 'bod lam nas 'ong ba mthong // rgyal pos bu de gnyis ni khrid nas su// rab tu ngu zhing khyim du song nas ni// de yis skyen
350a7(rgyud): par la gor myur du yang // btsun mo la ni rang gi bu rnams bstan// shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa nga// sngon gyi rgyal po shing rta chen po yi// bu de snyeng stobs chen po mchog gyur cing // ga
350b1(rgyud): gis stag mo bde bar byas pa yin// rgyal po'i dbang po dam pa zas gtsang ni// shing rta che zhes bya ba'i rgyal por gyur// btsun mo'ang btsun mo ngam pa sgyu 'phrul gyur// skya chen po ni byams par/
350b2(rgyud): gyur pa yin// rgyal po lnga chen po yang de bzhin du// de ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yin// stag mor gyur pa skye dgu'i bdag mo che// stag phrag rig ni dge slong lnga por gyur// de nas chub
350b3(rgyud): bo shing rta chen po dang / btsun mos snying rje bar smre sngags rnam pa mang po bton nas/ rgyun thams cad bkrol te/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu bu'i rus pa la mchod pa byas nas/ sbyong
350b4(rgyud): stobs chen po de'i rus pa 'di dag phyogs 'di nyid du bzhag ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod rten 'di byas so// snying stobs chen po 'dis stag mo lus la yongs su btang nas/ lus yos
350b5(rgyud): su btang ba 'dis phyi ma ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bgrangs pa las shin tu 'das pa rnams su'ang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bya'o zhes smon lam de skad btab bo// bstan
350b6(rgyud): pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// mchod rten 'di 'dir ston
350b7(rgyud): pa'i rgyu ni 'di yin no// rkyen ni 'di yin no// mchod rten de'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sa de nyid kyi nang du zhugs so// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ stag/
351a1(rgyud): mo la lus yongs su btang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du ma de dgade bzhin gshes/
351a2(rgyud): pa gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs kyi zhab
351a3(rgyud): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag du ma de dag gis thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser das
351a4(rgyud): rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba'i sku mdog btso ma'i gser 'dra ste// sku lus gser gyi mdog tu rnam
351a5(rgyud): par gda'// gser gyi ri dbang lta bur gser gyi mdog/ thub pa pad+ma dkar po'i gser mdog can// bzang po'i mtshan gyi mtshan gyis sku lus brgyan// dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs sku lus spras/
351a6(rgyud): gser gyi 'od ltar mdzes pa rnam par 'bar// shin tu dri med zhi ba ri dbang 'dra// tshangs pa'i sku dang sgra snyan tshangs pa'i dbyangs// seng ge'i sgra dang 'brug sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyangs// yan lag/
351a7(rgyud): drug cu'i bsgrags pa'i dri med sgra// rgyal dbyangs rma bya ka la bing ka'i sgra// shin tu dri med dri bral gzi 'od mdzes// rgyal ba bsod nams brgya yi mtshan gyis brgyan// mkhyen pa'i rgya mtsho dri med dri/
351b1(rgyud): bral mchog/ rgyal ba yon tan kun ldan ri rab 'dra// sems can rnams la phan par thugs brtse'i mchog/ 'jig rten dag na bde ba sbyin pa'i mchog rgyal ba dam pa'i don rnams ston pa ste//
351b2(rgyud): ngan 'das pa'i bde la 'dzud pa lags// 'chi ba med pa'i bde ba gsol ba ste// rgyal ba bdud rtsi'i chos ni rab tu ston// 'chi ba med pa'i grong khyer 'dzud pa ste// bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas bde
351b3(rgyud): ba'i gnas// rgyal ba 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal thar par mdzad// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las ni skye dgu sgrol// zhi ba'i lam la skye dgu rab tu 'dzud// skye dgu rnams la bde ba kun stsol ba// khyod
351b4(rgyud): la dpe ni bgyi bar mi nus te// ji snyed 'dren pa'i ye shes yon tan mtsho// srog chags kun la khyod kyi thugs rje dang // byams pa'i stobs dang thabs dang brtson 'grus dang // khyod kyi yon tan ye
351b5(rgyud): shes rgya mtsho las// bskal pa bye ba stong phrag mang por yang // yon tan thigs pa gcig tsam rab bstan par// lhar bcas 'gro ba'i nang na nus ma mchis// yon tan mtsho las yon tan thig blangs
351b6(rgyud): te// de ltar bdag gis mdor bsdus cung zad bshad// bdag gis bsod nams gang bsags de yis ni// sems can de dag byang chub mchog reg shog/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
351b7(rgyud): rgyal po las/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog stan las
352a1(rgyud): langs te/ tha gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ tshigs su
352a2(rgyud): bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// thub dbang khyod ni bsod nams brgya yis mtshan// dpal stong mdzes pa'i yon tan rnams kyis brgyan// kha dog rgya chen mchog tu
352a3(rgyud): zhi ba ston// nyi ma stong ltar 'od ni rnam par 'phro// 'od zer du ma 'bar bas 'od kyis khyab// kha dog sna tshogs gang bas rin chen 'dra// sngon po dkar po gser 'od bai DUR+Ya// zangs dang skya rengs shel gyi/
352a4(rgyud): 'od lta bus// rdo rje ri dbang ri rab thal mdzad cing // zhing rnams bye ba du mar snang mdzad do// sdug bsngal mi bzang drag po zhi bar mdzad// bde ba'i mchog gis sems can tshim par mdzad// mdog dang
352a5(rgyud): dbang po gsal ba lta na mdzes// gzugs bltas mi ngoms skye bos blta na dag/ rma bya'i mdog 'dra'i dbu skra rnam par mdzes// bung ba mang pos gang ba'i 'od dang 'dra// thugs rje rnam dag yon tan rnams/
352a6(rgyud): kyis brgyan// ting 'dzin byams pa bsod nams dam pa bsags// dpe byad bzang dang kha dog sna tshogs ldan// ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag yon tan brgyan// khyod ni rab tu tshim mdzad phan pa mdzad// bde
352a7(rgyud): mdzad bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas 'byung // yon tan zab mo sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// zhing rnams bye ba dag tu lhang nge ste// me yi 'od ltar 'od zer rnams kyis mdzes// ji ltar nam mkha'i nyid
352b1(rgyud): dkyil rdzogs pa bzhin// ri rab lta bur yon tan kun ldan par// 'jig rten khams rnams kun tu rab tu gangal/ ba zhog mung dang zla 'dra zhing // kha ba'i mdog dang dkar po bzang 'dra ba'i// tshems kyi/
352b2(rgyud): 'greng bas khyod kyi zhal mdzes pa// ngang ba'i rgyal pos bar snang ji bzhin no// khyod kyi zhi zhal mtshan gnas zla ba 'dra// g.yas su 'khyil cing khong chung 'dra ba lags// bai nuR+Ya 'dra'i spu 'od dkar
352b3(rgyud): rnams kyis// nam mkha'i dkyil na nyi ma lta bur mdzes// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o//
352b4(rgyud): de nas rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ rnam par dag pa'i chos la spobs
352b5(rgyud): pa'i blo mnga' ba// las ngan lam dang bral ba'i bdag nyid blo mnga' zhing // srid dang srid min mkhyen pa'i rnam dag blo mnga' ba// sangs rgyas rnam dag blo mnga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo// kye ma'o kye ma'o sas
352b6(rgyud): rgyas gzi brjid mtha' yas te// kye ma'o kye ma'o rgya mtsho dang ni ri rab 'dra// kye ma'o kye ma'o sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas te// u dum ba ra'i me tog bzhin du shin tu dkon// sems can dag ni
352b7(rgyud): thams cad rjes su gzung slad du// gang gis mdo sde dam pa 'di 'dra rab gsungs pa// mi dbang nyi ma shAkya'i dbang po'i rigs kyi tog/ kye ma'o kye ma'o de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje ldan// de bzhin
353a1(rgyud): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dbang po zhi// zhi ba dam pa zhi ba'i grong khyer rab tu zhugs// ting 'dzin zab cing zhi la rdul dang bral ba ni// rgyal ba sangs rgyas spyod yul der yang
353a2(rgyud): rab tu zhugs// de ltar nyan thos rnams kyi lus ni stong pa ste// rkang gnyis dam pa rnams kyi gnas pa'ang stong pa lags// chos rnams de dag thams cad rang bzhin stong lags na// sems can rnam/
353a3(rgyud): ni stong pa'i bdag nyid ma 'tshal to// rtag par khor zug tu ni rgyal ba dran par bgyid// rgyal ba mthong bar yang ni rtag tu mya ngan bgyid// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma mthong bar bgyi slad du// rtag
353a4(rgyud): par yang ni smon lam rab tu 'debs par bgyid// bdag ni rtag tu dog sar pus mo btsugs nas su// rgyal ba'i gzugs kyis skom pas rab tu mya ngan sems// 'dren pa'i slad du snying rje'i skad kyis/
353a5(rgyud): ngu bar bgyid// bdag ni bde bar gshegs pa mthong bar rab tu sgom// mya ngan ma yis kun tu rab tu 'bar bar gyur// mthong ba'i chu bsil bdag la rtag par sprul du gsol// bdag nyid khyod kyi gzug
353a6(rgyud): la blta bas rab tu sgom// thugs rje'i chab kyis bdag la rab tu tshim par mdzod// 'dren pa khyod ni bdag la thugs rjer mdzad du gsol// zhi ba'i gzugs mthong ba ni bdag la stsal du gsol// khyod/
353a7(rgyud): ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba'i skyob pa ste// 'di ltar nyan thos rnams kyi lus ni stong pa lags// sems can thams cad dag ni rmi lam rang bzhin te// nam mkha' 'dra zhing nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyang
353b1(rgyud): sa/ sgyum sig d+hA dang ni rgyas zab 'am da du 'ang kyi ston pa che dang ldan pa lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gdun las bzhengs tems pa'i sgra mang kyis dkanga' stsal pa/ rigs/
353b2(rgyud): gas so// cong yang lags sa// ldan 'das kyis de gang nam+b+ha gA stsal nas/ rims kyil mo byung rgyan yang dag par sgrus du dang / ma chen mo dbya
353b3(rgyud): la shes pa'i la'i du sod dag thams cad dang / lha ma chen mo dang la la sogs pa lta mo'i tshugs de dag thams cad dang / rnamathos kyi phul chags pa'i sna'i rgyam pa de dag byams sa/
353b4(rgyud): thas cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang lngam yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ 'phags
353b5(rgyud): pa gser 'ong dam pa mang sde'i dbang po'i rtul po las/ 'jug bsdus kyi le'u zhes kyu ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// / 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgya
353b6(rgyud): po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / shI la in+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+de ye shes sdes zhus te/ skang gsar
353b7(rgyud): bcad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya su bar+Na pra b+hA sot+ka ma su tre na ma tra rA dza nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bong
354a1(rgyud): skad du/ 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang ngo // / 'das pa dang
354a2(rgyud): ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig/
354a3(rgyud): nabya rgod phung po chos kyi dbyings// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul na// de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs nas ni// dag cing rdul rnams med pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' mchog rnams la/
354a4(rgyud): mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po ste// mnyan na shin tu zab pa dang // yongs su brtags na zab pa nyid// gser 'od dam pa 'di 'chad do// phyogs bzhir sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni// byin gyi rlabs kyis byin/
354a5(rgyud): brlabs pa// mi 'khrugs pas ni shar phyogs su// rin chen tog gis lho phyogs su// 'od dpag med kyis nub phyogs su// rnga s+tha yis ni byang phyogs su// sdig pa thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir/
354a6(rgyud): bshad pa dam pa dkra shis pa// sdig pa'i las rnams zang byed pa// bde ba thams cad sbyin byed pa// sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig byed pa// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gzhi// dpal kun gyis ni le/
354a7(rgyud): par brgyan// byin gyis brlabs te brjod par bya// sems can gang dag dbang po nyams// tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang // phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang // lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang /
354b1(rgyud): mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang // bram ze la sogs gtses pa dang // phan tshun mthun pa ma yin dang // nor 'grib pas ni gnod pa dang / mya ngan mngal dang gnod pa dang // 'jigs pa dang ni 'phongs pa
354b2(rgyud): dang // gza' dang rgyu skar byang snyems dang // mi bzang gdon gyis nyen pa dang // mya ngan mngal las byung ba yi// rmi lam sdig pa mthong na yang // des ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yis// mdo sde dam pa mnyan/
354b3(rgyud): par bya// gang dag yid dge sems dang zhing // gos gtsang rnams kyis rab brgyan te// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// mdo 'di nyan par byed na ni// mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis// srog chags
354b4(rgyud): kun gyi gnod pa ste// shin tu mi bzang 'di 'dra ba// de dag rtag tu zhi bar 'gyur// 'jig rten skyong ba bdag nyid dang // blon po tshogs kyi dbang phyug bcas// gnod sbyin bye ba du ma yis// de dag la ni
354b5(rgyud): srung bar byed// lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang // nai rany+dza rar gnas pa dang // 'byung po ma mo 'phrog ma dang // sa yi lha mo brtan ma dang // tshangs pa'i dbang dang lha dbang dang // klu dbang mthu chen
354b6(rgyud): rnams dang ni// mi dbang ci dbang lha min dbang // de bzhin nam mkha' lding dbang rnams// sde dang stobs dang bzhon pa dang // bcas te de dang der lhags nas// nyin dang mtshan mo mi g.yel bar/
354b7(rgyud): de dag la ni srung bar byed// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ste// bskal pa bye bar rnyed dka' ba// mdo 'di rab tu bshad par bya// gang dag mdo 'di nyan pa dang // gang
355a1(rgyud): la gzhan la thos byed dang // gang dag rjes su yi rang dang // gang dag mchod pa byed pa rnams// de dag lha dang klu dag dang // mi dang mi 'am ci dag dang // lha min gnod sbyin
355a2(rgyud): du ma yis// bskal pa bye bar mchod par 'gyur// srog chags bsod nams byed pa rnams// de dag bsod nams phung po mi// mtha' yas grangs kyang med pa dang // bsam gyis mi khyab skye bar 'gyur/
355a3(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin zab mor spyod pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang // rab tu gzung bar 'gyur ba yin// gtsang ma'i gos rnams rab bgos la/
355a4(rgyud): dri zhim pa yi gos 'chang zhing // byams pa'i sems ni nyer gzhag nas// g.yel ba med pas mchod par bya// rang gi sems ni dri med cing // rgya che bar yang rab byed la// sems kyang shin tu rang
355a5(rgyud): byed kyis// mdo sde dam pa mnyan par gyis// gang dag mdo 'di nyan pa ni// de dag mi nang legs par 'ongs// mi yi srid pa legs par 'thob// 'tsho ba bde bas 'tsho bar 'gyur// gang gi rna ba'i bu
355a6(rgyud): gar yang // bshang ba 'di ni grags 'gyur ba// de dag dge rtsa sbyangs pa ste// sangs rgyas mang pos rab tu bsngags// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya
355a7(rgyud): ba ste dang po'o// yang de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba/ sngon gyi rgyal ba
355b1(rgyud): la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la rim gro byas pa zhig gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis bcom ldan
355b2(rgyud): 'das shAkya thub pa 'di lta ste/ lo brgyad cu zhig thub ste/ 'di ltar sku tshe thung snyam nas/ de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du rgyu gnyis dang rkyer gnyis kyis tshe/
355b3(rgyud): ring bar 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa spangs pa dang / kha zas rab tu sbyin pa'o zhes gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
355b4(rgyud): grangs med pa mang po nas srog gcod pa spangs par gyur pa nas/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi bar yang dag par blangs par gyur/ zas dang phyi nang gi dngos po rnams sems can dag la yongs
355b5(rgyud): su btang ste/ tha na rang gi lus kyi shA dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang gis kyang sems can ltogs pa rnams tshim par mdzad na/ zas gzhan gyis lnga ci smos snyam mo// de nas skyes bu
355b6(rgyud): dam pa de sangs rgyas la song ba'i yid la byed pa dag las 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis bsam pa 'di dag sems pa na/ de'i khang pa yangs shing rgya che la/ bai DUR+Ya sngon po las grub pa/ lha'i
355b7(rgyud): rin po che du mas spras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas kha dog bsgyur ba/ lha'i las 'das pa'i spos kyis khyab par gyur to// khyim de'i phyogs bzhi nas/ lha'i rin po che'i khri bzhi byung bar gyur te/
356a1(rgyud): khri de dag las kyang lha'i ras bcos bu rin po che'i phrugs rnams bting ba dag byung bar gyur to// khri de dag las kyang lha'i me tog pad+ma rin po che du mas spras pa/ de bzhin
356a2(rgyud): gshegs pas kha dog bsgyur ba dag byung ngo // pad+ma de dag las kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhi byung bar gyur te/ shar phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa byung / lho
356a3(rgyud): phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog byung / nub phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med byung / byang phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra byung ste/ seng ge'i khri
356a4(rgyud): de dag las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byung ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig ce
356a5(rgyud): gyi khams kyi bar dang / phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dang / phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dag snang bas khyab par gyur/ lha'i me
356a6(rgyud): ngag gi char yang 'bab/ lha'i sil snyan gyi sgra'ang byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can thams cad kyang lha'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur/
356a7(rgyud): te/ sems can dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni dbang po thams cad dang ldan par gyur/ sems can dmus long dag ni mig gis gzugs rnams mthong / sems can 'on pa dag ni rna bas sgra rnams/
356b1(rgyud): thos/ sems can spyos pa dag ni dran pa so sor rnyed / sems can sems g.yeng ba dag ni sems mi g.yeng bar gyur/ sems can sgren mo rnams ni gos bgos par gyur/ sems can bkres/
356b2(rgyud): pa dag ni lto 'grangs par gyur/ sems cad sgom pa dag ni skom pa dang bral bar gyur/ sems can nad kyi btab pa dag ni nad dang bral bar gyur/ lus kyi dbang po nyams pa dag ni dbang po rnam
356b3(rgyud): tshang bar gyur te/ 'jig rten du ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnams rgya cher byung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong
356b4(rgyud): nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ de tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ga la ba der logs su thal mo
356b5(rgyud): sbyar ba btud nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag rnams rjes su dran la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i yon tan rjes su dran zhing / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i
356b6(rgyud): ched la the tshom za bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di ltar lo brgyad cu zhig thub ste sku tshe thung ba 'di ji lta bu/ 'di ci zhig snyam du bsam pa de sems shing 'dug par gyur to//
356b7(rgyud): de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis dgongs shing mkhyen bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di sa
357a1(rgyud): du/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di ltar sku tshe thung ngo snyam du ma sems shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
357a2(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye
357a3(rgyud): dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' phyi ma'i mthu'i mu'i bar du'ang rtogs par
357a4(rgyud): nus pa nged kyis su'ang ma mthong ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa brjod ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ lha'i
357a5(rgyud): bu 'dod par spyod pa rnams dang / gzugs na spyod pa rnams dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am rdzi dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag
357a6(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'dus nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gi khyim der lhags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thams/
357a7(rgyud): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa tshigs su bcad de mdor bka' stsal pa/ rgya mtsho'i chu rnams thams cad kyi// thigs pa dag ni bgrang bar
357b1(rgyud): rus// shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i chad// sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so// ri rab rnams ni thams cad kyang // phra rab rdul dang bgrang bar nus// shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshangad // sus kyang bgrang bar mi/
357b2(rgyud): nus so// sa la gang dag yod pa yi// rab tu phra rdul ji snyed pa// thams cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi// rgyal ba'i sku tshe'i tshad mi nus// gal te la las nam mkha' la// sna 'ga' zhig
357b3(rgyud): gis dpag 'dod kyang // shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad// sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di srid bzhugs// bskal pa dag ni 'di snyed cig/ bskal pa bye ba brgyad/
357b4(rgyud): dag ces// grangs ni rnyed par mi rung ngo // gang phyir de yi rgyu dang ni// rkyen yang rnam pa gnyis yin te// sdig pa'i 'tshe ba spangs pa dang // kha zas mang po byin pa ste// de phyir bdag nyid chen po de'i// sku tshe'i//
357b5(rgyud): grangs ni mi rnyed de// bskal pa 'di snyed cig ce 'am// grangs med pa yang de bzhin te// de bas the tshom med par 'gyur// the tshom cung zad ma za zhig/ rgyal ba'i sku tshe'i mtha' ma ni// grangs ni gang du'ang
357b6(rgyud): ma dmigs so// de nas de'i tshe 'khor der slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di n+ya zhes bya ba dang / bram ze stong phrag du mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan
357b7(rgyud): las 'das pa chen po'i sgra thos nas 'phral la dus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ gal te bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la thugs/
358a1(rgyud): brtse ba/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ phan par bzhed pa/ sems can thams cad la pha ma lta bu/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par gyur pa/ zla ba lta bur snang bar mdzad pa/ shes rab
358a2(rgyud): dang ye shes chen po'i nyi ma shar ba lta bu lags shing / gal te khyod sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs na/ bdag la dam pa cig stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi
358a3(rgyud): gsung bar gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor der li tsa byi gzhon nu sems can thams cad kyis mthong ma dga' ba zhes bya ba de spobs pa skyes nas/ slob dpon lung stor pa ko'u di rgyal 'di sad /
358a4(rgyud): ces smras so// ci bram ze chen po khyod bcom ldan 'das la dam pa cig gsol lam/ bdag gis khyod la dam pa cig sbyin no// bram zes smras pa/ li tsa byi gzhon du bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la
358a5(rgyud): mchod pa dang / ring bsrel gyi phye ma dgos pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la brten par 'dod do// ring bsrel yung 'bru tsam de mngon par mchod na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
358a6(rgyud): rnams kyi bdag po 'ba' zhig 'thob ces grags so// kye l-i tsa byi gzhon nu gser 'od dam pa'i mdonyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shes par dka' ba/ khong du chud par dka' ba de lta ru/
358a7(rgyud): mtshan nyid dang yon tan dang ldan pa/ gser 'od dam pa'i mdo 'char ces grag gis yon cig/ kye li tsa byi gzhon nu gser 'od dam pa'i mdo 'di ri de ltar shes par dka' zhing rtogs par dka' bas na//
358b1(rgyud): bo cag mtha' 'khob kyi gling gi zam ze rnams ni gang bcangs pa na/ sems can rnams myur du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po thob par 'gyur ba'i ring bsrel lung 'bru tsam za ma tog gi nang du bcug la/
358b2(rgyud): bcangs kyang rung ngo // kye li tsa byi gzhon nu khyod ci de bzhin gshegs pa las ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam gsol nas/ ring bsrel za ma tog tu bcug ste bcangs pas/ sems can rnams sum cu rtsa
358b3(rgyud): gsum pa'i bdag po thob par mi 'dod dam/ kye li tsa byi gzhon nu kho bos ni dam pa de lta bu gsol to// de nas li tsa byi gzhon nu 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' bas/ slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze/
358b4(rgyud): ko'u di n+yal tshigs su bcad pa dag gis slar smras pa/ nam zhig gang+gA'i chu rgyun la// me tog rnams ni skye ba dang // bya rog dmar por 'gyur ba dang // khu byug dung mdog 'drar 'gyur dang // 'dzam bur ta la
358b5(rgyud): 'bru chags dang // 'bra gor a mra'i dog pa chags// de yi tshe na yungs 'bru tsam// ring bsrel du ni gsal bar 'gyur// nam zhig rus sbal spu rnams las// gos su legs par btags gyur te// dgun gyi
358b6(rgyud): grang ba sel byed pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig sbrang bu'i rkang lag las// yang thog legs par byas gyur te// brtan zhing rab tu mi g.yo ba// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig srin bu/
358b7(rgyud): pad pa kun// so ni dkar por skyes gyur te// rno zhing chen por gyur pa na// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// mtho ris su ni 'dzeg pa'i phyir// nam zhig ri bong rwa rnams las// skad ni legs par byas gyur pa
359a1(rgyud): de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig sras ni der 'dzegs te// byi bas zla ba bza' ba dang // sgra gcan la yang gnod byed pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// grong ra rgyu ba'i/
359a2(rgyud): sbrang bu yis// nam zhig rdza ma'i chang 'thungs te// khyim na gnas par byed 'gyur ga za de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig bong bu bde 'gyur la/ chu dmar bim pa 'drar gyur cing // gru gar rnams/
359a3(rgyud): la mkhas gyur pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig 'ug pa bya rog rnams// dben par dong nas rtse ba dang / phan tshun mthun par gyur pa na// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// pa la sha yi lo
359a4(rgyud): ma rnams// rin chen sna gsum gdugs gyur te// char 'bab skyabs su nam gyur pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig rgya mtsho'i gru bo che// 'khrul 'khor dang ni g.yor mor bcas// thang la byung
359a5(rgyud): ste 'gro ba na// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig bya ni 'ug pa yis// ri bo spos kyi ngad ldan pa// mchu la thogs te 'gro 'gyur ba// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// slob dpon lung ston bram
359a6(rgyud): ze ko'u di rgyas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas/ li tsa byi gzhon nu 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis slar smras pa/ legs so legs so gzhon nu mchog
359a7(rgyud): rgyal ba'i sras po tshig po che// dpa' zhing thabs la mkhas ldan pa// lung bstan pa ni dam pa thob// 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid// bsam gyis mi khyab go rim/
359b1(rgyud): bzhin// gzhon nus bdag la mnyan par gyis// sangs rgyas yul ni bsam mi khyab// de bzhin gshegs rnams mtshungs pa med// sangs rgyas thams cad rtag tu zhi// sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag/
359b2(rgyud): drung // sangs rgyas thams cad la dog mardzus// 'di mi sangs rgyas chos nyid yin// bcom ldan 'das ni bcos ma yin// de bzhin gshegs pa ma skyes te// dze te lwa bur sra ba'i sku// sprul pa'i sra nI
359b3(rgyud): ston par mdzad// drang srong chen po'i ring bsrel ni// yungs 'bru tsam zhes bya ba med// sra la rus pa khrag med na// ring bsrel yod par ga la 'gyur// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// thabs kyis
359b4(rgyud): ring bsrel gzhag par mdzad// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings// chos ston mdzad pa ci 'dra ba// bcom ldan 'das kyi sgra de 'dra// bdag gis 'di thos shes
359b5(rgyud): ras ni// bdag gis dam pa gsol ba byas// de nyid kho na lung bstan phyir// gtam gleng ba ni bdag gis byas// de nas lha'i bu sum khri nyis stong gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa zab mo de
359b6(rgyud): lta bu de dag thos nas/ thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de dag yid kyi kun tu rtog pa rab tu dga' nas sgra dbyangs gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
359b7(rgyud): sbas so// sangs rgyas mya ngan yongs mi 'da'// chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te// sems can yongs su smin mdzad phyir// yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba ston// sangs rgyas bcom ldan bsam mi khyag/ re
360a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i sku// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis sangs rgyas bcom/
360a2(rgyud): ldan 'das de dag dang / skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes
360a3(rgyud): nas dga' ba dang mgu ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i chad bstan pa 'ang bshad pa'i tshe/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bla na meng pa yang dag par rdzog+sa/
360a4(rgyud): pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang mi sdang bar gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i le'u n+de/
360a5(rgyud): bya ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gnyid kyis log pa'i dri lam na/ gser gyi rnga kun tu snang ba 'di lta ste nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba
360a6(rgyud): zhig mthong ngo // phyogs thams cad na'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rin po che'i shing drung na/ rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i khri rnams la bzhugs shing 'khor brgya stong du
360a7(rgyud): mas yongs su bskor te/ mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa mthong ngo // de nas yang skyes bu bram ze'i gzugs lta bu zhig rdza de rdung ba mthong ste/ rnga'i sgra de las bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di la/
360b1(rgyud): rgya byu bzus so// das byang chubasams dpa' mangs pa'i tog sa ma g+sa tu/ bdun pa chags su samar pa de dag rjes sa dra ma// mas can nas kyang de'i mtsha mo dang pa dang /
360b2(rgyud): po'i 'ab gyi grong khyer chen po sa byung ste srog nams stong phrag dum dang lhan cig tu bya nad kyi phung ba'i rog la ba dang / bcam ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyir nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
360b3(rgyud): zhabs la lag thos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis
360b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas rmi lam na gang rnga'i sgra las bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa thos pa de dag gsol to// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
360b5(rgyud): po las/ rmi lam mthong ba'i le'u zhes bya ste gsum pa'o// / nub gcig g.yel ba med par yang // bdag gi rmi lam gyur pa ni// mdzes pa'i rnga chen mthong ba ste/
360b6(rgyud): thams cad du ni gser gyi 'od// ji ltar nyi ma bzhin du 'bar// kun tu rnam par lhang nge ste// phyogs bcu rnams su snang bar gyur// kun tu rin chen shing drung na// rin chen bai DUR+Ya dag gi/ khri la sangs
360b7(rgyud): rgyas rnams bzhugs te// brgya stong phrag ni du ma yi// 'khor dbus mdun gyis bltas pa mthong // bram ze'i gzugs ni 'dra ba zhig/ rnga chen rab tu rdung ba mthong // de yis de la brdungs pa dang // tshig
361a1(rgyud): su bcad pa 'di dag byung // gser 'od dam pa'i rnga chen sgra yis ni// stong gsum 'jig rten gsum 'di ni// ngan song sdug bsngal ma shingan rje'i sdug bsngal dang // dbul ba'i//
361a2(rgyud): sdug bsngal ma lus zhi bar shog/ rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni// 'jig rten rmongs pa thams cad zhi gyur cig/ ji ltar thub dbang 'jigs med 'jigs zhi ltar// sems can 'jigs med 'jigs
361a3(rgyud): dang bral bar shog/ ji ltar 'khor bar kun mkhyen thub dbang po// 'phags pa'i yon tan kun dang ldan pa ltar// skye dgu ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag gi/ yon tan ldan zhing yon tan rgya mtshor gyur//
361a4(rgyud): rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni// sems can thams cad tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan gyur// sangs rgyas dam pa byang chub mchog reg shog/ chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba skor gyur cig/ bskal pa bsam gyis mi
361a5(rgyud): khyab bzhugs par shog/ 'gro la phan phyir chos kyang ston gyur cig/ nyon mongs 'joms gyur sdug bsngal sel bar shog 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi gyur cig/ sems can gang dag ngan song
361a6(rgyud): sar gnas te// rus pa'i lus la me lce rab 'bar ba// de dag rnga chen bsgrags pa thos gyur cig/ sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig thos shog/ sems can kun gyis skye ba brgya dag dang // skye
361a7(rgyud): bstong phrag bye ba skye dran shog/ thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu drar gyur cig/ de dag gis ni rgya chen gsung thos shog/ rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas rnams dang rtag tu 'grogs rnyed gyur
361b1(rgyud): sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spong bar shog/ bya ba dge ba rnams ni spyod gyur cig/ mi dang lha dang srog chags thams cad kyi// de dag bsam dang smon pa gang yin pa// rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni//
361b2(rgyud): de dag rnams ni ngor kun rdzogs gyur cig/ sems can gang dag sems dmyal mi bzang skyes// lus la me lce kun tu rab tu 'bar// skyabs med mya ngan bcas shing yongs 'khyam pa// me rnams de dag rab tu zhi
361b3(rgyud): bar shog/ sems dmyal yi dgas mi yi 'jig rten na// sems can sdug bsngal mi bzad drag po gang // rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni// de dag rnams kyi sdug bsngal kun zhi shog/ rten med dpung gnyen med pa
361b4(rgyud): dang // skyabs med par yang gyur pa dag/ de rnams la ni skyob pa dang // dpung gnyen rten mchog bdag gyur cig/ sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso bo dag/ thugs brtse thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs// gang dag phyogs
361b5(rgyud): bcu'i 'jig rten na// bzhugs pa bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag gis sngon chang sdig pa'i las// shin tu mi bzang gang bgyis pa// stobs bcu spyar sngar bdag mchis te// de dag thams cad bshags/
361b6(rgyud): par bgyi// pha ma dag tu mi 'dzin dang // sangs rgyas rnams su mi 'dzin dang // dge ba dag tu mi 'dzin pas// sdig pa bdag gis gang bgyis pa// phyug pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa dang // rigs dang longs
361b7(rgyud): spyod rgyags pa dang // gzhon pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // nyes bsamanyes par spras pa dang // nyes par bgyis pa'i las rnams dang // nyes pa'i dmigs
362a1(rgyud): sum bltas pas// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang / khyis pa'i blo yis 'jug pa dang // mi shes mun pa'i sems dang ni// sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang gyur dang /
362a2(rgyud): nyon mongs rnam par 'khrug sems dang // rtsed mo dga' ba'i dbang nyid dang // mya ngan dang ni nang dbang dang / nor gyis mi chog nyes pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // 'phags min
362a3(rgyud): skye bo 'dre ba dang // phrag dog ser sna'i rgyu dang ni// g.yo dang dbul ba'i nyes pa yis// bdag gis nyes pa gang bgyis pa// 'phongs pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe// 'dod pa rnams kyi 'jig rgyu dang bya
362a4(rgyud): po ma yin gyur pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // g.yo ba'i sems kyi dbang nyid dang / 'dod dang khro ba'i dbang dag dang // bkres dang skom gyis nyen pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa
362a5(rgyud): gang bgyis dang // bza' ba dag dang btung ba dang // bud med rgyu dang gos kyi phyir// nyon mongs gdung ba sna tshogs kyis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdig nyes
362a6(rgyud): papar spyod pa rnam gsum bsags// 'di 'dra'i tshul ni gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// sangs rgyas rnams dang chos rnams dang // de bzhin nyan thos rnams la yang // gus pa ma lag/
362a7(rgyud): gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// gang yang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags bgyis pa rnams// de dag thams cad bdag
362b1(rgyud): 'chags so// dam chos smra ba rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags gang bgyis dang // chos la'ang gus pa ma bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// bdag gis rtag tu mi shes pas//
362b2(rgyud): dam pa'i chos ni spangs pa dang // pha ma rnams la ma gus dang // de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// blun pa dang ni byis pa dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti rug dang // nga rgyal dregs pas
362b3(rgyud): bsgribs bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// bdag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du// stobs bcu rnams la mchod pa bgyi/ bdag gis phyogs bcur sems can rnams kha sdug
362b4(rgyud): bsngal kun las gdon par bgyi// sems can bsam gyis mi khyab kun// sa bcu la ni dgod par bgyi// sa bcu la ni gnas nas kyang // thams cad de bzhin gshegs gyur cig/ ji srid sdug
362b5(rgyud): bsngal rgya mtsho las// de kun thar bgyi nus srid du// sems can re re'i phyir yang ni// bskal pa bye bar spyad par bgyi// gser 'od dam pa zhes bgyi ba// las rnams thams cad byang bgyid pa/
362b6(rgyud): zab mo dag ni ston pa 'di// sems can de dag bstan par bgyi// gang gis bskal pa stong rnams su// sdig pa shin tu mi bzang bgyis// lan cig rab tu bshags pa yis// de dag thams/
362b7(rgyud): cad byang bar 'gyur// gang gis las kyi sgrib pa rnams// myur du yang dag zang 'gyur ba// gser 'od dam pa dge ba yis// bshags pa 'di dag bshags nas ni// rin chen 'byung gnas
363a1(rgyud): mchog bcu po// sa bskul ni gnas par bgyi// sangs rgyas yon tan snang bar bgyi// srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho chu bo dang /
363a2(rgyud): yon tan rgya mtsho zab mo dang // sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas yi// thams cad mkhyen pa rdzogs par bgyi// ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong rnams dang // gzugs rnams bsam gyis mi
363a3(rgyud): khyab dang // dbang stobs byang chub yan lag gi stobs bcu dam par 'gyur bar bgyi// dgongs pa'i thugs kyis sangs rgyas rnams// bdag la rnam par gzigs su gsol// thugs rje
363a4(rgyud): ldan pa'i thugs kyis ni// nongs par rab tu gzung du gsol// bdag gis bskal pa brgya rnams su// sngon chad sdig pa gang bgyis pa// de phyir bdag ni mya ngan sems// 'phongs dang mya ngan
363a5(rgyud): 'jigs pas gzir// sdig pa'i las la 'jigs par bgyid// yid ni rtag tu dman par gyur// gang dag gang du spyod bgyid pa// bdag ni gang du dga' ma mchis// sangs rgyas thams cad thugs/
363a6(rgyud): rje ldan// 'gro ba kun gyi 'jigs sel bas// nongs pa rab tu gzung du gsol// 'jigs pa dag las bdag thar mdzod// bdag gi nyon mongs las rnams kyi// dri ma de bzhin gshegs pas
363a7(rgyud): shol// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag la ni// snying rje'i chu yis bkru bar gsol// sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi// sngon chad bdag gis gang bgyis dang // da ltar bdag gis sdig pa gang / de das
363b1(rgyud): thams cad bdag 'chags so// nongs par bgyis pa'i las rnams kun// sran chang mi bgyi bsdam par bgyi// bdag gis nongs par bgyis pa gang // sdig de bcwab par mi bgyi'o// lus kyi las ni rnam
363b2(rgyud): gsum dang / ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang // yid kyi rnam pa gsum po rnams// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// lus kyis bgyis dang ngag gi las// yid kyis rnam par bsams pa dang // las
363b3(rgyud): rnams bcu po bgyis pa dang // de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// mi dge las bcu spangs nas su// dge ba bcu po bsten bgyis te// sa bcu la ni bdag gnas bgyi// stobs bcu mchog tu 'gyur
363b4(rgyud): bar bgyi// bdag gi sdig pa'i las gang dag/ mi 'dod 'bras bu thob bgyid pa// sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas ni// de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir gang dag dang //
363b5(rgyud): 'jig rten khams ni gzhan dag tu// gang rnams dge ba'i las bgyid pa// de dag kun la yo rung ngo // lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang // bdag gis bsod nams gang bsgrubs pa// bdag ni dge
363b6(rgyud): ba'i rtsa ba des// byang chub mchog la reg par bgyi// srid 'gro nyam ngar byis pa'i blo yis ni// shin tu mi bzang sdig pa gang bgyis pa// stobs bcu mi mnyam spyan sngar mchis nas ni// sdig pa de kun
363b7(rgyud): ma sor bshags par bgyi// skye ba nyam ngasring pa nyam pa dang // 'jig rten 'am ngag yo sems nyam bar// lus kyi spyod pa nyam pa sna tshogs kyis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bsags de 'chags so//
364a1(rgyud): byis pa blun byas nyon mongs nyam nga dang // sdig pa'i grogs dang phrad pa nyam nga dang // srid pa nyam nga 'dod chags nyam nga dang // zhe sdang gti mug mun pa nyam nga dang // dal
364a2(rgyud): ba'i nyam nga dus kyi nyam nga dang // bsod nams sgrub pa nyam bdag gis kyang // rgyal ba mi nyam mngon sum mchis nas ni// sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi// sangs rgyas gser mchog ri snang
364a3(rgyud): ri rab 'dra// yon tan rgya mtsho 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba de dag rnams la skyabs su ma chi/ rgyal ba de dag kun la mgos phyag 'tshal// gser mdog gser ni dri ma med pa'i gser gyi mdog
364a4(rgyud): med rnam dag bai DUR+Ya yi yan lag spyan// sangs rgyas nyi ma dpal gzi grags 'bar 'byung ba'i gnas// thugs rje'i 'od zer dag gis mun pa mun nag bsal// yan lag rab tu dri med rab bzang rnam
364a5(rgyud): par mdzes// sangs rgyas nyi ma yan lag dri med gser 'dras khyab// nyon mongs mes gdungs yid can 'bar ba'i me 'dra la// thub pa'i zla ba'i 'od zer dra bas tshim par mdzad// mtshan mchog sum cu
364a6(rgyud): gnyis kyis dbang po yan lag mdzes// deng byang bzang po dag gis yan lag rnam par mdzes// dpal gzi bsod nams 'bar 'khrugs 'od zer dra ba yis// 'jig rten gsum na mur khrod nyi ma bzhin du
364a7(rgyud): bzhugs// dri med rgya chen kha dog sna tshogs bai DUR+Ya// skya rengs dmar dang dngul dang shel bzhin yang lag dmar// 'od zer dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs legs brgyan pas// thub chen khyod ni nyi ma bzhin du de yis ni/

364b2(rgyud): po rnams kyis skems// yan lag gser gyi mdog tu rnam par snang // ye shes 'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum kun mchog/ rab mdzes mtshan gyis yan lag rnam spras pa// sangs rgyas gser sku 'bar
364b3(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu ni dpag med dang // ji ltar sa la sa rdul mtha' yas dang // ji ltar ri rab rdo mtha' mtshungs med dang // ji ltar nam mkha'i mtha' ma mtha' yas pa// de bzhin
364b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te// sems can kun gyis shes par mi nus so// bskal pa du mar gzhal cing bsams kyang ni// yon tan mtha' ma shes par mi nus so// chu ni skra yi rtse mo'i tshad
364b5(rgyud): tsam dang // rdor bcas rir bcas rgya mtshor bcas pa ni// bskal par bgrangs na shes par nus kyang srid// sangs rgyas yon tan pa mtha' shes mi rus// yon tan kha dog snyan dang grags pa dang /

364b7(rgyud): mi ring sangs rgyas 'grub par bgyi// 'gro la phas phyir chos kyang ston par bgyi// sems can sdug bsngal mang gzir thar par bgyi// spobs bcas sder bcas bdud las rgyal bar bgyi/ chos kyi 'kho ma
365a1(rgyud): dge ba bskor bar bgyi// bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab gnas par bgyi// bdud rtsi chu yis sems can tshim par bgyi// ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal bas rdzogs pa ltar// pha rol phyin
365a2(rgyud): drug bla med rdzogs par bgyi// nyon mongs gzhom phyir sdug bsngal bsal bar bgyi// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi bar bgyi// skye ba brgya dang skye ba bye ba stong // bdag ni rtag tu skye ba dran par bgyi/
365a3(rgyud): thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran gyur cig/ de yi gsung ni rgya chen mos par bgyi// bdag ni dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis// rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa rnyed par bgyi// sdig pa'i las rnams rnam
365a4(rgyud): par spang bar bgyi// dge ba'i 'byung gnas dge rnams spyad par bgyi// zhing rnams kun na srog chags thams cad kyang // 'jig rten dag na sdug bsngal kun zhi gyur// sems can dbang po ma tshang yan lag
365a5(rgyud): nyams// de kun de'u re dbang po tshang bar shog/ gang dag nod btab nyam chung lus nyams dang // phyogs bcu dag na skyabs med gyur pa rnams// de kun myur du nad las thar gyur cig nad med stobs dang

369b7(rgyud): par chun du// rang rang yul la rab tu 'jig par byed/ sems ni sgyu ma lta bu g.yo ba yin/ dbang po drug ni yul la rnam spyod do// ji ltar mi zhig grong stong rtug pa dang // dmag dang chom du dgra dang gas
370a1(rgyud): pa bzhin// ji ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas shing // dbang po'i spyod yul dag kyang rab shes pa// de ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas te// dbang po'i spyod yul
370a2(rgyud): dag kyang rab tu shes// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri rnams dang // ro dang reg bya de bzhin spyod yul chos// sems ni dbang po drug po thams cad la// dbang por zhugs pa bya bzhin g.yo bar gyur// rab pa/
370a3(rgyud): po gang dang gang du gnas bcas pa// dbang po de ni shes pa bdag nyid byed// lus ni g.yo ba mang cing byed pa med// snying po med cing rkyen las byung ba yin// yang dag ma yin yongs su rtog las byung /
370a4(rgyud): grong stong las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'dra bar gnas// sa dang me dang chu dang rlung rnams ni// grong gzhan gnas te phyogs dang phyogs na gnas// dper na sbrul gdug gnas gcig ji bzhin te// rtag tu phan rtsa/
370a5(rgyud): mthun pa ma yin bzhin// khams kyi sbrul rnams bzhi po de dag kyang // gnyis ni steng 'gro gnyis ni thur du 'gro// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su gnyis gnyis te// khams sbrul de dag thams cad
370a6(rgyud): 'jig par 'gyur// sa yi sbrul dang chu yi sbrul dag dang // 'di gnyis 'og tu zad par 'gyur ba yin// ma yi sbrul dang rlung gi sbrul dag dang // 'di gnyis steng gi nam mkhar 'gro ba yin// ji ltar sngon chad
370a7(rgyud): byas pa'i las rnams kyis// sems dang rnam shes kun tu gnas nas dong // lha dang mi dang ngar song gsum dag tu// ji ltar byas pa'i las kyi srid par skye// bang kar rlung dang mkhris pa zad gyur nas// lus
370b1(rgyud): shi gcin dang ngan sngags rnams kyis gang // mngon par mi dga' srin bu'i phung po'i gyur// dur khrod dag na 'thor ba zhing bzhin gyur// lha mo khyod ni chos 'di rnams la ltos// 'di la sems can ga /
370b2(rgyud): zag gang zhig yod// chos rnams 'di dag thams cad stong pa ste// ma rig pa mi rgyas las byung ba yin// 'byung ba chen po 'di dag tshe 'byung mim ma byung ba las byung zhing mi 'byung ste// gang gi phyir ni
370b3(rgyud): 'byung ba mi 'byung ba// de phyir 'byung ba che zhes ngas brjod do// yod pa mim zhing nam yang yang min la// ma rig pa yi rkyed las byung ba yin// ma rig 'di ni yod pa ma yin te// de bas ngas ni ma rig
370b4(rgyud): 'di bshad do// 'du byed rnam shes ming dang gzugs bcas dang // skye mched drug dang reg dang tshor ba dang // sred dang len dang de bzhin srid pa dang // skye dang rga shi mya ngan gnod pa rnams// 'khor ba'i
370b5(rgyud): sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar gnas pa dag/ ma byung ba las byung ba mi 'byung dang // tshul bzhin ma yin sems kyis rnam dpyad dang // bdag gi lta bar gyur pa
370b6(rgyud): gcad par gyis// ye shes ral gris nyon mongs rgyu mo drol// phung po'i gnas la stong par byar par ltos// byang chub yon tan rgya chen reg par gyis// ngas ni bdud rtsi grong khyer sgo yang phye// bdud rtsi
370b7(rgyud): khu ba'i snod kyang kun tu bstar// ngas ni bdud rtsi'i grong khyer gnas der 'jug/ ngas ni bdud rtsi khu bas bdag tshim byas// ngas ni chos kyi rnga chen dam pa brdungs// ngas ni chos kyi dung gi mchog kyang dus/
371a1(rgyud): ngas ni chos kyi sgor ma mchog 'bar byas// ngas ni chos kyi nar pa dam pa phab// ngas ni nyon mongs dgra mchog rnams las rgyal// ngas ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa bsgrengs// srid pa'i/
371a2(rgyud): mtsho las sems can rab tu bsgral// ngas ni ngan song gsum gyi las rnams bkag/ sems can nyon mongs me yis gdungs gyur pa// rten med gyur cing dpung gnyen med pa dag/ srog chags nyon mongs
371a3(rgyud): mes gdungs zhi byas nas// bdud rtsi khu ba bsil bas tshim par byas// gang phyir bskal pa du mar sngon chad ngas// 'dren pa bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa byas// chos kyi sku de yongs su tshol ba na/
371a4(rgyud): brtul zhugs brten pas byang chub phyir spyad de// lag pa dang ni mig dang rkang pa dang // yan lag mchog dang bu sdug bu mo dang // nor dbyig nor bu mu tig rgyan dang gser// bai DUR+Ya dang rin chen sna tshogs
371a5(rgyud): btang // stong gsum shing ljon thams cad dang // rtswa dang rtswa rnams thams cad dang // nags tshal dag dang sa las ni// 'khrungs pa thams cad bcad gtubs te// de dag thams cad phyir brlags nas//
371a6(rgyud): rab tu phra ba'i rdul 'drar byas// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ji tsam par// phye ma'i phung po spangs nas ni// 'di la cha gsum dbye bar nus// sa la rdul ni yod pa rnams// stong gsum ngag ni thams cad kyi/
371a7(rgyud): rdul khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa// sems can kur gyis shes pa gang // de ni sems can gcig gir gyur// shes pa re yis rdul rnams kyi// phye ma bgrang bar byed na ni// sems can kun las rab 'phags/
371b1(rgyud): ba lags rab 'an mi rnams kyis/ thams cad bablangs par nas srid kyi/ rgyal ba'i mkhyer la mi nus so// thub pa chen po'i ye shes gang / mang cig gcig la 'am pa yang / bsal paste/
371b2(rgyud): bdu mar ni/ gang du'ang bgrang bar mi nus so// gser 'ong ngam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ste drug pa'o// / de nas rgyal po chen po rnam/
371b3(rgyud): thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas
371b4(rgyud): pa'i lha nga sa la bcugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo
371b5(rgyud): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ byang chub
371b6(rgyud): sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su gzung ba/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod pa/ lha'i dbang po'i tshogs thams cad kyi mngon par bstod
371b7(rgyud): pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis mchod cing bsngags pa brjod nas rab tu bkur ba/ lha'i khang khyim thams cad snang bar bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad la mchog tu bde ba rab tu sbyin par bgyid/
372a1(rgyud): pa sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshi rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu skams pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad kyi rgyun gcod pa/
372a2(rgyud): rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu zlog pa/ mu ge'i dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ nad kyi dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gza' thams cad sel ba mchog tu zhi bar
372a3(rgyud): bgyid pa/ mya ngan dang nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa brgya stong rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
372a4(rgyud): gagaser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'khor gyi nang du rgya cher yang dag par bshad na/ chos nyan pa bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa bzhi lha'i lus
372a5(rgyud): 'dis gzi chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag gi lus la brtson pa dang / stobs dang / mthu'ang skyed par 'gyur/ gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa'ang bdag cag gi
372a6(rgyud): lus la 'jug par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi ni chos dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba/ chos kyi rgyal po lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni chos kyis
372a7(rgyud): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / tra~M ba dang / mi 'am ci dang / lko'i gyi chen po rnams kyi rgyal po brgya'o// 'byung po'i tshogs mi bzang ba snying rje ma mchis
372b1(rgyud): gzhan gyi mdangs 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong /
372b2(rgyud): drag du ma dang lhan cig tu rtag par rgyun du lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad la blta bar bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bsrung bar bgyi ste/ btsun pa/
372b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 'jig rten skyong zhes ming du chags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang su dag 'dzam bu'i grong 'dir pha rol gyi dmag
372b4(rgyud): tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur ram/ mu ge'i dgon pa 'am/ nad kyi dgon pa 'am/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong dang / gnod pa brgya phrag stong dag gis gtses/
372b5(rgyud): par 'gyur ba na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag la bskul bar bgyi'o// btsun
372b6(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das nam bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi sa rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyi rlabs kyis dge slong chos smra ba de dag la bskul ba na/ yul gang dang gang du mchi bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
372b7(rgyud): dbang po 'di yul de dag tu rgya cher yang dag par ston par gyur te/ gang gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong yul du 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom
373a1(rgyud): ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang gi yul du mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag mchi bar 'gyur ba'i yul de dag tu gser 'ongad dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyam
373a2(rgyud): po 'di'ang bsnyen par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal pos gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan te thos nas/ mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag phyir
373a3(rgyud): rgol ba thams cad las kun tu srung bar bgyid/ yongs su sgrub pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang / yongs su skyod par bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal
373a4(rgyud): po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kun tu bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// btsun
373a5(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal pos nam dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa la bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan/
373a6(rgyud): 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bde ba dang yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o//
373a7(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal pos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa la bsti stang bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid cing
373b1(rgyud): mchod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal po de la/ rgyal po thams cad pas ches bsti stang du bgyi/ ches bla mar bgyi/ ches rim gror dgyi/ ches mchod par bgyi/
373b2(rgyud): ste/ yul thams cad du'ang rab tu bsngags par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po rag legs so legs so// rgyal po
373b3(rgyud): chen po khyed yang legs so legs so// 'di lta ste/ khyed ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la bsnyen
373b4(rgyud): bkur byas pa/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba/ chos kyi rgyal po/ chos kyis lha dang mi rnams kyi rgyal po byed pa'o// 'di lta ste/ khyed ni yun ring por sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang
373b5(rgyud): ldan pa/ bde ba dang byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ mi phan pa thams cad 'gogs pa/ sems can tham/
373b6(rgyud): cad la bde ba thams cad nye bar sgrub par brtson pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa dang / rim gror byed par brtson pa/
373b7(rgyud): de dag la kun tu srung bar gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bsrung ba dang / chang pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ ngas ra rgyal po chen
374a1(rgyud): po dpung dang / g.yog dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/
374a2(rgyud): chos kyi tshul kun tu bslangs par 'gyur ro// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung bar yang 'gyur ro// des na rgyal po chen po dpung dang / g.yog dang / gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed
374a3(rgyud): bzhi lha dang lha ma yin du g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar 'gyur ro// lha ma yin rnams pham par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad
374a4(rgyud): 'dul bar byed pa'i phyir/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la kun tu srung bar gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung
374a5(rgyud): ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po
374a6(rgyud): dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba
374a7(rgyud): btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam
