374b1(rgyud): ljongs sam/ yul 'khor tam/ pho brang 'khor bang du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / mi'i rgyal po gang dang gang gi yul du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal por 'gyur ba gang /
374b2(rgyud): la la zhig lnga'i dbang po'i dam tshig rgyal po'i bstan bcos 'dis rgyal po bgyid cing / rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan tam // rim gro bgying dam/ mchod pa
374b3(rgyud): bgyid dam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la'ang bsti stang bgyid/ btsun par bgyid/ rim gror bgyid cing mchod de
374b4(rgyud): rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan na/ chos nyan pa'i chu bo'i chu chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod
374b5(rgyud): sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma'i lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ bdag cag la brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / stobs chen por yang bgyid par 'gyur/ bdag cag gi gzi/
374b6(rgyud): brjing dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa'ang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma
374b7(rgyud): dang lus bltar mi gda' bar bgyis te/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs dus na grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
375a1(rgyud): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di spyod par 'gyur ba de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod
375a2(rgyud): pa bgyid pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o//
375a3(rgyud): rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa sba
375a4(rgyud): ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang
375a5(rgyud): bzlog par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po gang la la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gror bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de'i dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po gzhan zhig
375a6(rgyud): mchis la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba de'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der song ste/ yul de rnam par gzhig go
375a7(rgyud): snyam du sems bskyed na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe de'i dus na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus/ dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po gzhan dag dang
375b1(rgyud): g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur/ rang gi yul du phyin na'ang yul 'khrug par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du bza' dang nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du rtse
375b2(rgyud): ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de dag rang gi yul du phyin na/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang brel ba sna tshogs brgya 'di
375b3(rgyud): lta bu 'byung ngo // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag bsogs te/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs su mchi ba'i slad du rang gi yul nas byung ste/ dpung gi
375b4(rgyud): tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der mchi 'tshal ba dang / gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gnas pa'i yul de rnam par gzhig 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom
375b5(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig tu lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ der mchi bar bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de yul du
375b6(rgyud): zhugs pa las kyang de nyid nas ldog par bgyi'o// brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// bgegs kyang bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de mchi bar yang mi nus
375b7(rgyud): na/ yul gzhig par bgyid pa lta ga la 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so// rgyal po chen
376a1(rgyud): po khyed yang legs te/ khyed bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bsgrubs la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po
376a2(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag la kun tu bsrung ba gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yo
376a3(rgyud): su bsrung ba dang / chang pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang / yul de dag kyang yongs su/
376a4(rgyud): srung shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang /
376a5(rgyud): gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par gyis shig/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang zlog cig/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i mi'i rgyal po dag mi 'thab pa dang /
376a6(rgyud): mtshang mi 'dra ba dang / mi rtsod pa dang / mi 'gyed par bya ba la spro bar gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir/ nam grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag
376a7(rgyud): na/ rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag rang rang gi yul la mngon par dga' ba dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug des mngon par dga' ba dang / rang gi nor gyi phung pos phan tshun rnam par mi 'tsho ba dang
376b1(rgyud): phan tshun rnam par 'tshe ba mi bskyed pa dang / rang gis ji ltar sngon gyi las bsags pas rgyal po thob pa'i rang gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gis dga' ba dang / phan tshun du yul 'jig par mi byed pa/
376b2(rgyud): dang / yul gzhig pa'i phyir pha rol gyi gnod pa dang / nam 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag phan tshun byams pa'i sems su 'gyur/
376b3(rgyud): byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems su 'gyur te/ phan tshun du mi 'thab/ mtshang mi 'dra/ mi rtsod/ mi 'gyed par rang rang gi yul dag dga' bar 'gyur na/ de'i phyir rgyal po dpung dang g.yog
376b4(rgyud): tu bcas pa khyed bzhis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rgyas par 'gyur/ lo legs par 'gyur/ nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo mang po dang mis gang bar 'gyur/ sa'ang mdangs can du 'gyur/ dus dang /
376b5(rgyud): zla ba dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / lo khyud kor thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i dus dang ldan par 'gyur/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma'ang nyin mtshan du legs par rgyu bar 'gyur/ 6
376b6(rgyud): pa'i rgyun yang sa la dus dus su 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang nor dang 'bru thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/ longs spyod che ba dang ser sna med par ba
376b7(rgyud): gtong ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur/ phal cher bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/ lha'i khang khyim rnams kyang lha dang lnga'i bu rnams kyis gang
377a1(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur te/ rim gro byas/ mchod pa byas/
377a2(rgyud): dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la'ang bsti stang byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed
377a3(rgyud): bzhis dpung dang g.yog dang bcas pa/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma snying brtse ba'i phyir/ rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan na/ chos mnyan pa'i chu klung chu'i
377a4(rgyud): bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis khyed cag gi lus 'di dag tshim par 'gyur ro// khyed kyi lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi byin chen po'ang rnam par 'phel lo// khyed kyi brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / stobs kyang bskyed/
377a5(rgyud): dod khyed kyi gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa'ang rnam par 'phel lo// mi'i rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nga
377a6(rgyud): la'ang mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya chen po yangs pa byas par 'gyur ro// mi'i rgyal po des 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma lal
377a7(rgyud): yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya che ba yangs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas mi'i rgyal po de la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// des na mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung ba dang
377b1(rgyud): yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur ro// bcun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang //
377b2(rgyud): btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad kyang bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang chang
377b3(rgyud): pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyang chos gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / ches stobs dang / bde ba dang / yid
377b4(rgyud): bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab dang ldan par 'gyur/ dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ grong khyer de dag dang yul 'khor de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur/ yongs su bskyang bar 'gyur/ gnod pa med par
377b5(rgyud): 'gyur/ dgra med par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la
377b6(rgyud): rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom
377b7(rgyud): ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'ang nyan par 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid la'ang srung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bcun mo dam pa
378a1(rgyud): rnams dang / rlal bu rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs la'ang srung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de
378a2(rgyud): ngag thams cad la'ang zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med pa bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ cha 'di la bdag gi rgyal srid kyi dbang
378a3(rgyud): phyag chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po ma mchis pa yongs su 'dzin 'tshal/
378a4(rgyud): par 'gyur/ bdag gi yul thams cad kyang kun tu bsrung 'tshal bar 'gyur/ yongs su bskyang 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rang gi yul na gnod pa ma mchis pa dang / dgra ma mchis pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag
378a5(rgyud): tshogs kyis mi brdzi ba dang / nad 'gro ba ma mchis pa dang / 'khrug pa ma mchis par bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des g.yeng ba ma mchis pa'i sems
378a6(rgyud): dang / gus pa dang bcas pa dang / ri mo dang bcas pas gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di bsti stang du bgyid de mnyam par bgyi'o// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di
378a7(rgyud): mnyam pa'i slang du/ mi'i rgyal po des rgyal po'i pho brang khyad du 'phags par mchi bar bgyi'o// der mchis nas kyang rgyal po'i pho brang spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag ga bcing /
378b1(rgyud): me tog gi sil ma sna tshogs bkram par bgyi'o// spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag btab pa der chos kyi khri mthor po rnya sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyad pa bshams par bgyu'o//
378b2(rgyud): phyogs der gdunas dang / rgyal mnan dang / ba dang sna tshogs kyis legs par brgya par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po des lus bkru bar bgyi'o// gos dri ma rab tu gda' ba gos gsar ba mdzes pa bgos nas/
378b3(rgyud): rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// bdag gi stan rab tu dma' ba gding bar bgyi ste// stan de la mchis nas rgyal po'i rgyags pas dregs par mi bgyi'o// der rgyal srid dbang phyug la chags par mi bgyi'o//
378b4(rgyud): rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal dang / dregs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i sems kyis/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de la'ang ston par 'du shes
378b5(rgyud): bskyed par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po des de'i tshe de'i dus na btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la sdug pa dang phan par blta bar bgyi'o// btsun mo
378b6(rgyud): dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams la tshig snyan par smra bar bgyi'o// btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la'ang tshig snyan par smra bar bgyi'o// chos mnyan pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs
378b7(rgyud): sbyor du stsal bar bgyi'o// dga' ba bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa ma mchis pas bdag tshim par gyi'o// dga' ba dang bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bde bar bgyi'o// dbang po bde bar bgyi'o// bdag nyid don
379a1(rgyud): chen po thob par bsam par bgyi'o// bdag dga' ba chen pos dga' bar bgyi'o// rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas chos smra ba bsu bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
379a2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag de'i dus na mi'i rgyal po des gos thams cad dkar po gsar pa mdzes pa bgo bar bya'o// spud pa dang rgyan sna tshogs
379a3(rgyud): kyis bdag legs par brgyar par bya'o// gdugs dkar mo'ang gzung bar bya'o// rgyal po'i mthu cher po bzhi dang / rgyal po'i bkod pa chen po bkra shis tha dad pa sna tshogs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de nas byung la/
379a4(rgyud): chos sbab bsu ba'i phyir der 'gro bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi'i rgyal pos der gos pa ji snyed bor ba de snyed kyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi 'khor ba phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur/ de snyed kyi 'khar los
379a5(rgyud): sbyar ba'i rgyal rigs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thob par 'gyur/ der gom pa ji snyed bor ba de snyed du/ tshe 'di la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba khrag
379a6(rgyud): khrig brgya stong phrag du mar gnas yangs shing rgya che ba lha'i gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa dag thob par 'gyur/ mi rnams kyis rgyal rigs lha'i rgya che ba brgya stong phrag du ma thob par 'gyur/ skye
379a7(rgyud): ba thams cad du dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ yun ring du 'tshe bar 'gyur/ spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/ grags pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dz+ra/
379b1(rgyud): bzhin tu rgya bar 'gyur/ bsngags par 'os par 'gyur/ lha dang / mi dang ga lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur/ lha dang mi rnams kyi bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba thob par 'gyur
379b2(rgyud): stobs che bar 'gyur/ tshan po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan zhing gzugs bzang bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang / blta na sdug pa dang / kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba
379b3(rgyud): thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po dag
379b4(rgyud): yon tan 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong nas mi'i rgyal po nges dpag tshad tsam du chos smra bar bya/ dpag tshad brgya dang dpag tshad stong du'ang bsu bar bya/ chos smra ba de la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o//
379b5(rgyud): 'di snyam du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa deng bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'jug par 'gyur ro// deng de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa/
379b6(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir bshos gsol bar 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
379b7(rgyud): shAkya thub pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa mnyan par bya'o// deng bdag gis chos mnyan pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bya'o// deng bdag/
380a1(rgyud): gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
380a2(rgyud): ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yangs shing rgya che ba byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug
380a3(rgyud): bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chang par byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par
380a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis brgya byin nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba
380a5(rgyud): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar 'khor ba las yongs su thar par byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag
380a6(rgyud): gis bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa bla na med pa yangs shing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la bsrung ba chen po byas/
380a7(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med par byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis yul 'di tham
380b1(rgyud): sang kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro// yongs su bstangs pa dang / gnong pa med pa dang / ngagra med pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba dang / nang 'go ba med pa dang / 'khrug pa
380b2(rgyud): med par 'gyur ro snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// rgyal po chen po dag dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa dag
380b3(rgyud): la mi'i rgyal po de dam pa'i chos la gus pa 'di lta bus bsti snang byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod pa byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / lha'i tshogs de
380b4(rgyud): ngag dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma dag la shas kyi dam pa byin na/ mi'i rgyal po de bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa dang / tshe 'di'i lus kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug
380b5(rgyud): chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa des rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la rgyal po'i gzi brjid chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzi brjid
380b6(rgyud): kyis kyang brgyan par 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / dgra thams cad chos dang mthun pas shin tu tshar gcod par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po
380b7(rgyud): bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ de chos la gus pa de lta bus gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan pa la/ dge
381a1(rgyud): srong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la'ang bsti stang bgyid / bla mar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid/ mchod par bgyid
381a2(rgyud): cing / rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi slad du rgyal po'i pho brang de shin tu dag par phyag bdar bgyid/ spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par 'debs la/ bdag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan cig thun
381a3(rgyud): mong du chos mnyan pa de mnyan cing / bdag dang lha thams cad kyi slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shas cung zad cig sbyin par bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong chos smra ba de chos kyi stan la mchis ma thag
381a4(rgyud): tu mi'i rgyal po des bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i don gyi slad du/ spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de la mchod pa'i slad du
381a5(rgyud): bdug pas bdugs ma thag tu spos sna tshogs rnams las/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la rgyal po chen po bzhi bdag cag rang rang gi/
381a6(rgyud): khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdus pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri rgya chen po'ang mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar
381a7(rgyud): 'gyur zhing / snang ba des bdag gi khang pa rnams kyang snang bar bgyis par 'gyur/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag skad cig yud tsam de la/ mi mjed kyi bdag/
381b1(rgyud): masangs pa dang / lharnams kyi dbang po brgya byin da / lha mo chen mo dbyangs ca pa dang / lha mo chen mo brtan ma dang / gzod sbyin gyi sde dpor chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpo chen po nyi
381b2(rgyud): rtsa bcur dang / lha'i bu dbang drug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gdod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang / 'phrog ma bu lta brgya'i 'khor dang ldan pa dang / klu'i rgyal
381b3(rgyud): po chen po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang / de dag gi rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la byung ste/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos
381b4(rgyud): dri sna tshogs rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ khang pa rnams kyi nang du gser du snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des gnas thams cad snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
381b5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi rang rang gi khang pa rnams kyi steng gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'bri
381b6(rgyud): shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par ma zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po dag mi'i rgyal po des gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir spos sna tshogs de dag
381b7(rgyud): gis bdugs ma thag tu/ lag na spos snod gcig thogs pa de la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
382a1(rgyud): rten gyi khams 'di thams cad na/ gangan zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po'i rab bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal
382a2(rgyud): po khor yug dang khor yug chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya
382a3(rgyud): nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min du nye bar song ba'i bar gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag
382a4(rgyud): brgya po thams cad na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams rang rang gi khang pa dag gi steng gi bar snang la/
382a5(rgyud): spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri rgya chen po'ang mnam par 'gyur/ lha'i khang pa rnams su gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/
382a6(rgyud): zhing snang ba des kyang lha'i khang pa rnams snang bar byas par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha'i khang pa thams cad kyi steng gi bar snang
382a7(rgyud): spos dang bdug pa'i 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas pa de bzhin du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir mi'i rgyal po des spos sna tshogs de dag gis bdug
382b1(rgyud): ma thab tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing ngag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang /
382b2(rgyud): cig lung tsam de la kun tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams du ma ga d+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
382b3(rgyud): stong phrag du ma la/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la
382b4(rgyud): spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs rgya che zhing rgya che ba mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta ba'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba ngas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang+gA'i klung
382b5(rgyud): gi bye ma snyed dag snang bar byas par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag cho 'phrul de lta bu de dag byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag chos smra ba
382b6(rgyud): de dag la dgongs par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// skyes bu dam pa khyod gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i tshul 'di lta bur zab mor snang ba 'di lta bu'i yon tan
382b7(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa 'di lta bu 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'dod pa khyed yang legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin par 'gyur ro// su tha na gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
383a1(rgyud): po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa'i sems can de dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / 'chang pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub
383a2(rgyud): par byed pa dang / 'khor la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub
383a3(rgyud): sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// / bam po
383a4(rgyud): gsum pa// / de nas phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
383a5(rgyud): phrag du ma rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bzhugs pa dag gis de'i tshe de'i dus na tshig gcig dang / ngag gcig dang / sgra skad gcig gis dge slong chos smra ba chos kyi stan la 'dug pa de la 'di
383a6(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/ shing gi rgyal po'i drung du
383a7(rgyud): 'dug nas/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub spyod pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyis brlabs
383b1(rgyud): dka' ba spyod dbye ba khrag khrig ba stong phrag du ma ngag thom par 'gyur/ skyes bu ngas pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po legs par rgyan par byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod stong gsum gyi stong cer thor
383b2(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod shing gi rgyal po'i drung na 'dug ste/ bdud kyi sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa gzugs rab tu 'jigs 'jigs par 'jug pa/
383b3(rgyud): mi sdug pa ston pa/ gzugs mi sdug pa sna tshogs dag las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpe med
383b4(rgyud): pa/ rab tu zhi ba/ rdul dang bral ba zab mo mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod rdo rje'i gdan snying po brtan pa la 'dug ste chos kyi 'khor los sgyur ba thams cad kyis mngon
383b5(rgyud): par bstod pa/ mchog tu zab pa/ bla na med pa yang dag pa bcu gnyis rab tu skor bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rnga chen po bla na med pa rdung bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi dung bla na
383b6(rgyud): med pa 'bud par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po sgreng bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi sgron ma bla na med pa 'bar bar byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi char bla na
383b7(rgyud): med pa 'bebs par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod nyon mongs pa'i sgra stong phrag du ma las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma shin tu 'jigs su rung ba
384a1(rgyud): 'jigs pa chen po'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las yongs su thar par byed par
384a2(rgyud): 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis/
384a3(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i yon tan tshe 'di dang ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong ba/ sangs rgyas
384a4(rgyud): stong phrag brgya la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa yongs su 'dzin pa mthong nas snying brtse ba'i slad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi
384a5(rgyud): dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma rang rang gi khang pa na mchis pa dag spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag gi gdugs kyis bskul ma thag tu lus mi gda'
384a6(rgyud): babar bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de khang pa brtsegs pa phyag dar ma mchis pa legs par phyag bdar bgyis pa/ spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par btab pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par
384a7(rgyud): brgyan pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang ga la ba der chos nyan pa'i slad du mchi bar bgyi'o// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo dbyangs can dang / lha mo chen mo dpal dang /
384b1(rgyud): sa'i lha mo brtan pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpor chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpom chen po lag na/
384b2(rgyud): rdo rje dang / gdod sbyin gyi sde dpor chen po nor bu bzang dang / 'phrog ma du lnga bad+ma'i 'khor can dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / lnga bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du/
384b3(rgyud): ma dag lus mi ganga' bar bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i pho brang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyad pa de ga la ba dang / chos smra ba de'i chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa/ me
384b4(rgyud): bkram pa'i sa la bshams par gyur pa ga la ba der chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchis par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod//
384b5(rgyud): sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma de dag thams cad mthun par bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po dge ba'i grogs bgyid pa/ dge ba thob par bgyid pa/ bla na med pa chos kyi sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa de la chos kyi bdud
384b6(rgyud): rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par gyur ma thag tu mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur/
384b7(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i pho brang de dang / grong khyer de dang / yul de'ang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su
385a1(rgyud): 'gyur bar bgyi'o// chang pa spang bar bgyi'o// yul de'ang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyi'o// btsun pa
385a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i yul du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di byung la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po de dge slong ngam
385a3(rgyud): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa dag la bsti stang mi bgyid/ bla mar mi bgyid/ rim gror mi bgyid/ mchod par mi
385a4(rgyud): bgyid na/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la chos nyan pa 'di dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par mi bgyid/ rim gror mi bgyid/ lha'i lus
385a5(rgyud): 'di dag gzi'ang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid/ bdag cag gi brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / stobs kyang mi skyed/ bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa'ang rnam pa
385a6(rgyud): 'phel bar mi bgyid do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag gis yul de yal bar dor bar bgyi'o//
385a7(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis yul de yal bar bor na/ yul na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang yul de yal bar 'dor bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha rnams kyis/
385b1(rgyud): yul de yal bar bor na/ yul deng yul rnam par 'khrug pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang 'thab pa skye ba
385b2(rgyud): rang / mtshang 'dra ba skye ba dang / rtsod pa skye bar 'gyur/ dngogs pa dang 'gyed par 'gyur ba dang / gza' dang nang rnam pa sna tshogs yul du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyogs tha dad pa nas skar mnga' ltung bar
385b3(rgyud): 'gyur/ gza' dang rgyu skar rnams kyang phan tshun mi mthun par gda' bar 'gyur/ dgung zla 'char ba de'ang nyi ma lta bur gda' bar 'gyur/ zla ba'i gza' dang nyi ma'i gza' 'byung bar 'gyur/ nyi ma dang za ba
385b4(rgyud): nam mkha' la gnas pa'ang rtag par rgyun du sgra gcan gyi gnod pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dus dus su nam mkha' la 'ja'i kha dog lta bur 'khyil bar 'gyur/ sa'ang g.yo bar 'gyur/ sa la gnas pa'i khron pa'ang
385b5(rgyud): sgra 'byin par grags par 'gyur/ yul du rlung drag po ldang bar 'gyur/ char drag po 'bab par 'gyur/ yul du mu ge'i dgon pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur/ yul
385b6(rgyud): de phung bar 'gyur/ sems can de dag kyang nyon mongs pa mang bar 'gyur/ yul de nyams mi dga' bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang /
385b7(rgyud): gnod sbyin bcu stong phrag dum dang / yul na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor na/ yul der 'di lta bu'i gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa sna tshogs stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcur
386a1(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ de dag nyid la kun tu srung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i bde ba sna tshogs yun ring por myong
386a2(rgyud): 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bde ba thams cad bstabs pa'i sems kyis rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ pha rol gyi
386a3(rgyud): dmag tshogs thams cad 'pham par bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ yul thams cad yun ring du yongs su skyong 'tshal bar 'gyur/ chos kyi rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rang gi yul yang 'jigs
386a4(rgyud): pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa
386a5(rgyud): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la'ang bsti stang bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gror
386a6(rgyud): bgyid/ mchod par bgyid/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyang / chos mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par bgyi//
386a7(rgyud): bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gis gzi brjid chen po rnam par 'phel bar gyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
386b1(rgyud): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par gyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang pos 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag dang
386b2(rgyud): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis sems can dag gi don gyi slang du 'jig rten pa
386b3(rgyud): dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed pa bstan pa dag las ches mchog/ ches khyad par 'phags pa/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni
386b4(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya stong de dag dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong thams cad
386b5(rgyud): bas ches chog/ ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rgya cher yang dag par bshad pa lags so// ji ltar na 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas
386b6(rgyud): pa'i mi rnams kyi rgyal pos rgyal po nyid bgyi ba dang / ji ltar sems can bde bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar rang gi yul kun tu bsrungs par 'gyur ba dang / yongs su bskyangs par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yul
386b7(rgyud): thams cad na gnod pa dang dgra ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar pha rol gyi dmag tshogs pham ste phyir phyogs par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yul de dag na nang 'gro ba ma mchis shing 'khrug pa ma mchis
387a1(rgyud): par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yul thams cad chos kyis 'khrug pa ma mchis shing mi brdzi bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar mi'i rgyal po de dag gis rang rang gi yul rnams su chos kyi/
387a2(rgyud): sgron ma chen po 'bar bar bgyis shing snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar lha'i khang khyim thams cad lha dag dang lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi
387a3(rgyud): dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang / 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad tshim pa dang / rim gro bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag gi lha'i
387a4(rgyud): lus 'di dag gzi chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag gi lus la brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu chen po skyed par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang
387a5(rgyud): dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad lo legs shing nyams dga' la skye bo dang mis gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling thams
387a6(rgyud): cad na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba dang / dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar sems can bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba rgya che zhing rgya
387a7(rgyud): che ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang lhan cig gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
387b1(rgyud): rgya bar gyur pa de dag thams cad de lta na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag pas ches
387b2(rgyud): 'phags pa'i thugs rje chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'i byin rnabus dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig stong gi lha'i shes pa bas ches 'phags pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa bla na med pa dang
387b3(rgyud): drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma thams cad pas ches 'phags pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs/
387b4(rgyud): ba'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad do// mi'i rgyal po'i dgongs
387b5(rgyud): kha dang / rgyal po'i bstan bcos dang / rgyal po'i bgyi ba gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na mchis pa dang / gang dag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bcom/
387b6(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nye bar bstan/ yongs su brjod/ yang dag par rab tu bshad
387b7(rgyud): do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu de dang rkyen des mi'i rgyal po nges gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gus par mnyan par bgyi/ gus par rim gror bgyi/ gus par
388a1(rgyud): mchod par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu
388a2(rgyud): bcas pas gdon mi za bar mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyad pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag kun tu bsrung ba'i phyir spro ba cher gyis shig/ rgyal po chen
388a3(rgyud): po dag dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'dzin du chug cig dang / de dag lha dang / mi dang / lha ma
388a4(rgyud): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po khyed
388a5(rgyud): bzhis ci nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma bsrung ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / nad med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa dang / sems bde/
388a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur bar dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag
388a7(rgyud): kun tu bsrung bar bya/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bya'o// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po
388b1(rgyud): yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/ bra gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/
388b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ de'i tshe mngon sum du tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba zla
388b3(rgyud): ba dri ma med pa'i sku// rgyal ba nyi ma 'od zer stong gi 'od// rgyal ba pad+ma dri ma med pa'i spyan// rgyal ba me tog pad rtsa rdul med tshems// rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu ste// rin po che ni du ma'i
388b4(rgyud): 'byung gnas gyur// rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes chu yis gang // ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong gis kun tu gang // rgyal ba'i zhabs ni 'khor lor bris pa ste// khor yug mu khyud de bzhin rtsib ma stong // phyag dang
388b5(rgyud): zhabs ni dra bas spras pa ste// zhabs kyi dra ba dang pa'i rgyal po bzhin// gser gyi ri bo lta bur rab tu gda'// rgyal ba dri med gser gyi ri dbang po// yon tan thams cad ri rab 'dra ba ste// sangs rgyas ri dbang
388b6(rgyud): rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba nye ba 'dra// nam mkha' dang yang mtshungs shing 'dra ba ste// sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bu chags med pa// rgyal ba dri ma med la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom
388b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la tshigs su bcid de bka' stsal pa/ stobs bcu dag gi gser 'ong dam pa yi// mang sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po rab mchog 'di// 'jig rten skyong ba khyed cag rnams
389a1(rgyud): kyis ni// brtson 'grus rab tu brtan pas bskyang bar bya// 'di ltar mdo sde'i dkon mchog zab mo 'di// sems can kun la bde ba sbyin byed pa// sems can rnams la phan dang
389a2(rgyud): bde ba'i phyir// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yun ring gnas par 'gyur// 'di ltar stong gsum gyi ni stong chen gyi// 'jig rten dag na ngan song sdug bsngal dang // sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi
389a3(rgyud): ni/ sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa'o// gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling ni 'di na yang // 'dzam bu'i gling gnas rgyal po thams cad kyis// rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas ni// chos rnams kyis ni
389a4(rgyud): yul dag bskyang bar bgyis// gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di bde ba dang // shin tu lo legs nyams kyang dgar 'gyur zhing // 'dzam bu'i gling ni thams cad dag na yang // sems can thams cad bde
389a5(rgyud): bar 'gyur bar gyis// 'di na mi yi dbang po gang rnams ni// yul la dga' dang bdag bde dga' ba dang // rgyal srid rnam par 'byor la dga' ba des// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni mnyan par bya// pha rol
389a6(rgyud): dgra ni yang dag zad byed pa// pha rol dgra tshogs zlog pa dge byed pa// mchog tu 'jig pas 'phongs pa sel byed pa// mchog tu dge byed mdo sde'i dbang po 'di// ji ltar rin chen shing ljon rab mdzes pa//
389a7(rgyud): yon tan kun 'byung khyim na yod pa ltar// rgyal po yon tan 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang // mdo sde'i dbang po mchog 'di de ltar blta// ji ltar chu grang skom pa sel byed pa// tshabs nyam thag tshe ni rnyed pa
389b1(rgyud): sam sa yon tan dag gis sgom pa'i rgyal po la// mdo sde'i dbang po mchog 'di de bzhin no// mdo sde'i rin chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// rim chen stong ni lag mthil yod pa ltar// mi yi
389b2(rgyud): dbang po tshogs la gser 'od mchog mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no// 'di ni lha yi tshogs kyis mngon mchod pa// mdo sde'i dbang po lha dbang phyug byas pa// 'jig rten skyong ba rdzu
389b3(rgyud): 'phrul chen po pa kha bzhi po dag gis kun tu bsrungs pa yin// phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang // mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni rtag tu dgongs// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni bshad pa na/
389b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyis legs zhes brjod pa byin// gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag brgya rnams kyis// phyogs bcu dag tu yul yang srung bar byed// rab tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu sems kyis// mdo sde'i
389b5(rgyud): dbang po 'di ni mnyan par byed// 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas par gyur pa yi// lha yi tshogs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa// lha tshogs de dag kun kyang rab dga' bas// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni nyan par byed//
389b6(rgyud): chos rnams mnyan par bya ba 'di yis ni// gzi brjid dang ni stobs dang brtson 'grus 'thob// gzi brjid chen po yis ni lha yi lus// shin tu rgyas shing rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur// de nas rgyal po chen po//
389b7(rgyud): bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das las tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag thos pa dang ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur/ dga' bar gyur te/ de dag chos kyi shugs kyis yud tsam zhig ngus nas mchi
390a1(rgyud): ma phyis te/ de dag lus 'phar yan lag 'dar zhing dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la lha'i meto//
390a2(rgyud): man da ra ba dag gis gtor/ mngon par gtor to// gtor mngon par gtor nas kyang stan las langs te/ gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan
390a3(rgyud): 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi/ rgyal po chen po re re'ang gnod sbyin
390a4(rgyud): lnga brgya lnga brgya dang chos smra ba de bsrung po dang yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du/ rtag tu dge slong chos smra ba'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po chen
390a5(rgyud): po bzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bdun pa'o// / de nas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyis gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom
390a6(rgyud): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dbyangs can bdag gis kyang / dge slong chos smra ba de'i
390a7(rgyud): tshig brgyan pa'i slad du/ spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi/ gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi/ nges pa'i tshig gi brjod pa kun tu gzhag par bgyi/ dge slong chos smra ba de la ye shes kyi snang ba chen po bgyi'o// gsas
390b1(rgyud): 'ongs bya 'i dbang po sa ga m+b+ha yi ga gang yang rung ba dag cig yongs su nyams par gyur tam bsgyang na bdag gis dge slong ma smra ba de'i nges pa'i sgra dang
390b2(rgyud): dang / yi ge de dge thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o// de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgya stong ngag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can ngag gi dor gyi srang du/ gser 'ong dam pa
390b3(rgyud): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na ring du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can du ma dag gis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos nas/ shes rab rdo
390b4(rgyud): ba bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / tshe 'di la tshe phun sun tshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang / srog la phan gdags pa dang / bsod
390b5(rgyud): nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / thabs sna tshogs rab tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / bzo'i bgyi ba sna tshogs phun sum
390b6(rgyud): tshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang / bskyud pa ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du/ de la gzungs kyang sprul bar bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de dang / sems can chos nyan pa de dag gi don gyi slad du sngags dang sman dang /
390b7(rgyud): ldan pa'i khrus kyi las brjod par gyi ste/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / skye ba dang / 'chi ba'i gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa dang / 'khrug srong dang / khrag khrug dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / log 'dren gyi gnod pa
391a1(rgyud): thams cad dang / byang dang ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ gang gis mkhas pa dag khrus bgyid du sprul ba'i sman dang sngags ni 'di dag ste/ shu dag 'gi'u wang 'bru sug/
391a2(rgyud): dag/ sha myang sha mi shi rig/ dbang po'i lag dang skal ba che// dzA ma shing tsa a karu// shaM ri be sta swa rtsi dang // gu gul ras shal la ki/ rdo rjeg lo ma rgya spos dang // can ngan dang ni ldong ros dang // 'dzi
391a3(rgyud): wang bcas dang ru rta dang // gur kum gla sgang yungs kar dang // spyi mo sug smel na la da// na ga ge sar u shi ra// 'di dag cha ni mnyam bgyis nas// skar ma rgyal la btags par bgyi// phye ma la ni sngags tshig
391a4(rgyud): 'di// lan brgya mngon par gdab par bgyi// tad+ya thA/ su kri te/ ka ma la nI la/ dza na ka ra te/ aM ka ra Te/ in+ta dza li shaM ka ra dre/ pA sha de/ a brta ka si ke na ku/ ku Ta ku/ ka bi la ma ti/ shri la ma ti/ san d+hi
391a5(rgyud): d+hu d+hu ma pa ti/ ni tri shi ri/ sa t+ya s+thi ti swAhA/ lci bas dkyil 'khor bgyis nas ni// me tog sil ma bkram par bgyi// gser gyi sdong dang dngul sdod du// dang ba'i khu ba gzhag par bgyi// skyes bu go cha bgos pa ni/
391a6(rgyud): bzhi zhig der yang gzhag par bgyi// rab tu brgyan pa'i bu mo bzhi// bum pa thogs pa gzhag par bgyi// rtag tu gu gul bdugs par bgyi// sil snyan sna lnga bgyid du stsal// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa ngan bgyi/
391a7(rgyud): lha mo de ni legs par brgyan// bar bar dag tu me long gzhag/ mnga' dang mdung rtse sna sprang gzhag/ de nas mtshams kyang gcad par bgyid// de yi 'og tu dgos pa brtsam// sngags kyi las ni 'di dag gis//
391b1(rgyud): mye rnam daH/ An// 9/ kho la nan/ bcwod ldan las kyi rnam logs su rdzas rgyam nas/ sa 'di gnas /
391b2(rgyud): dbyis na/ khrus kyi zhi bar sbyor ro// tad+ya b+h+yo/ sa ka De bi ga T+Ta/ bi ga ta ba ti swA hA/ phyogs pa'i dag na gang gnas pa'i// rgyu skar dag ni che srung shig ga bcas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang // phung po'i
391b3(rgyud): kyi 'jigs 'byung dang // 'byung ba'i khams rnams 'khrug bgyid pa// 'jigs pa me bzang zhi gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ sha me/ thi sha me swAhA/ sa ga Te bi ga Te swAhA/ sA ga ra sa~M bud+d+ha ya swA hA/ swan+na mA tA ya swA hA
391b4(rgyud): nI la kar+N+Na ya swAhA/ a pa ra dza ta bi d+yA ya swA hA/ hi ma baM d+ha saM bud+d+ha ya swA hA/ in mi la bAk+ShA ya swA hA/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ brah+ma ma ga Ne na maHsa ra sA t+yo de byai sad+d+hin+tu man+t+ra pA dA/ ta ra tu bi tsi taM brah+ma nu ma n+ya tu swA hA/
391b5(rgyud): dge slong chos smra ba de bsrung ba dang / chos mnyan pa de dag dang / yi ger 'dri ba de dag gi don gyi slad du/ khrus kyi las 'dis bdag nyid der mchi bar bgyi'o// lha'i tshogs thams cad dang lhan cig tu grong
391b6(rgyud): ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang der nang thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// ji skar dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de
391b7(rgyud): dag gi srog la phan gdags par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba las byung bathob par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / myur du bla na med
392a1(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngor bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar/ gza' dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa dang / btsas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang / rmi lam/
392a2(rgyud): ngan pa dang / log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang / byang dang ro langs thams cad zhi bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha mo dbyangs can la/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can khyod skye bo mang
392a3(rgyud): po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ khyod kyis sngags dang sman dang ldan pa'i tshig 'di 'dra ba bshad pa ni legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no// lha mo dbyangs can gyis/ bcom/
392a4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di rgyas lha mo dbyangs can de bkug go/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can mchog 'os dka' thub
392a5(rgyud): che// 'jig rten kun tu rnam grangs mchog byin yon tan che// rtser gnas mdzes ma dar ba rtswa yi gos bskus pa// dar b+ha rtsa yi gos gyon rkang pa gcig gis gnas// lha rnams thams cad lhags nas/
392a6(rgyud): 'di skad tshig smras te// sems can rnams la dge ba'i tshig shong lce khrol cig/ s+yang tha dan/ mu re tsi ra/ a ba dze/ a ba dza ba ti/ hi gu le/ ma~M gu le/ paM ga la/ maM gu she/ mA ri tsI sa ma ti/ da
392a7(rgyud): sha ma te/ a thi ma gri ta ra / tsa ta ra/ tsa ba ti/ tsi tsi ri shi rI mi ri/ mA ri ts+yai / pra Na pri ye/ loka d+he k+She lo ka sheSh+Na lo ka pri ye/ sid d+ha pra te/ b+hI ma mu khi shu/ tsi tsi ri/ a pra ti ha te/ a pra ti/ ShaH
392b1(rgyud): t+t+ra ShaT n+ti/ mahAn na n+ti/ mang deg drA ti kri hA/ rnams rang / bdag gi blo thogs pa med par gyur tshe// bdun bcos dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i rgyu dang / sde sdong dang / sran dgas la sogs pa
392b2(rgyud): la/ bdag gi rig sngags dngos grub tu gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ ma hA pra b+hA bA hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ bcom ldan 'das ma lnga po dbyangs can gyi mthus bdag rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig / ka ra Te ke sU re/
392b3(rgyud): ke yu ra ma ti/ haM li mi li/ hi la~M mi l-i/ hi li hi li/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang / dbang po'i bden pa dang / chu lha'i bden pas lha mo chen mo dgug par/
392b4(rgyud): bya'o// gang dag 'jig rten na bden pa smra ba de dag gi bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gis lha mo chen mo dgug par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ hi li mi li/ hi li mi li/ bdag rnam par rgyu bar gyur cig
392b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag la gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ de nas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di n+yas/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs
392b6(rgyud): can la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// 'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad nga la nyan par gyis// lha dang dri za lha dbang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// bud med dam pa lha mo mchog gi/
392b7(rgyud): rab gang yin// lha mo dam pa mchog tu mdzes pa'i zhal la bstod// yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs bsags pas yan lag brgyan// dbyangs can zhes bya spyan ni yangs shing bsod nams 'bar ba dang
393a1(rgyud): dri med ye shes yon tan sna tshogs rnam par brgyan// rin chen sna tshogs tha dad lta bu blta ba'i phyir// mchog rab dag gi yon tan khyad par de bstod do// dam pa mchog gi dngos grug/
393a2(rgyud): byed pa dang // yang dag sngags dang yon tan byed pa dang // dri med mchog dang pad+ma 'bar ba dang // mig mchog dang ni mig gi dam pa dang // dge ba'i gnas dang dge ba mthong ba dang // yon tan bsam du med
393a3(rgyud): par brgyan pa dang // zla ba 'dra dang dri ma med 'od dang // ye shes 'byung gnas dran pa dam pa dang // seng ge mchog dang mi la zhon pa dang // lag pa brgyad rnams kyis ni brgyan pa dang // zla ba nya ba lta bur snang
393a4(rgyud): ba dang // yid du 'ong ba'i ngag dang dbyangs snyan dang // shes rab zab mo dang ni ldan pa dang // dgos mchog sgrub byed sems can dam pa dang // lha dang lha min dbang pos mchod pa dang // lha dang lha min tsho gas
393a5(rgyud): kun gnas brjod dang // 'byung po'i tshogs kyis gnas rtag mchod pa'i phyir// swA hA/ bdag cag lha mo 'di la phyag bya'o// bdag la yon tan khyad par kun stsol cig/ dgongs pa kun tu bdag la
393a6(rgyud): dngos grub stsol// dgra rnams khrod na bdag la rtag tu srungs// yi ge rdzogs shing tshig rgyas 'di dag ni// nang par langs nas gtsang mar rab brjod par// bsam pa dang ni nor 'bru thams cad rnyed// dngos
393a7(rgyud): grub dag pa rgya chen thob par 'gyur// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ dbyangs can gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste brgyang pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la
393b1(rgyud): lha mo chen mo dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dpal bdag gis kyang / ci ras chos smra ba'i dge slong de yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang /
393b2(rgyud): brel 'phongs ma mchis par thob par 'gyur ba dang / sems rngas par 'gyur ba dang / sems bde bar gdugs mtshan bas par 'gyur ba dang / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las/
393b3(rgyud): tshig dang yi ge rnam pa tha dad pa dag chub par 'gyur ba dang / rtag par rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par brjod par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas brgya stong dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba sman pa'i sems can de/
393b4(rgyud): ngag gi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas par 'gyur zhing / myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang gser 'od
393b5(rgyud): dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang / mu ge ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / lo legs par
393b6(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
393b7(rgyud): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu chad par 'gyur ba gang
394a1(rgyud): 'di gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos spyan dang / yo byad dang / 'tshogs chas gzhan dag gis kyang dge slong chos smra ba de spro bar bgyi'o// de bzhin/
394a2(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog yon tan rgya mtsho bai DUR+Ya dang gser gyi kha dog bzang po gser du snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de la/ lha mo chen mo
394a3(rgyud): dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ des da ltar phyogs gang dang gang du sems pa dang / phyogs gang dang gang du lta ba dang / phyogs gang dang gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs de dang der/ sems can bye ba
394a4(rgyud): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur/ zas dang / skom dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang /
394a5(rgyud): dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram dang / yo byad gzhan dag gis kyang mi 'phongs par 'gyur/ sems can de dag yo byad thams cad 'byor par 'gyur ro// lha mo chen mo
394a6(rgyud): dpal gyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod par bya/ spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa'ang dbul bar bya/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming nas lan gsum brjod cing / de la spos dang / bdug
394a7(rgyud): pa dang / me tog kyang byin la/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang byin na/ de'i 'bru'i phung po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sa la sa yi bcung dag rnam par 'phel// lha rnams rtag par
394b1(rgyud): rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'bras bu lo tog ldum sdong ljon lha rnams// lo tog shin tu sna tshogs rnams kyang bskyed// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i ming brjod pa'i sems can de dag la/
394b2(rgyud): lha mo chen mo dpal sems par 'gyur/ de dag la dpal chen por byed par 'gyur ro// lha mo chen mo dpal ni lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na skyed mos tshal dam pa bsod nams kyi me tog 'od ces
394b3(rgyud): bya ba na/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khang pa dam pa gser gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba na gnas te/ mi gang la la 'bru'i phung po spel bar 'dod pa des rang gi khyim phyag bdar legs par bya
394b4(rgyud): khrus legs par bya/ gos dkar po gtsang ma bgo bar bya'o// gos dri rab tu zhim pa bgo bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog yon
394b5(rgyud): tan rgya mtsho bai DUR+Ya dang gser gyi kha dog gser du snang ba'i dpal de la phyag 'tshal zhing / mtshan nas kyang lan gsum brjod/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyi lag nas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed
394b6(rgyud): me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos kyang 'bul/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang 'bul/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i ming yang lan gsum brjod/ bden pa'i tshig kyang brjod
394b7(rgyud): mo chen mo dpal la'ang mchod cing / me tog dang bdug pa'ang 'bul/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang 'bul na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i mthus/ de'i tshe lha mo chen mo ngas
395a1(rgyud): khyim de la sems par 'gyur/ de'i 'bru'i phung po chen po'ang 'phel bar 'gyur ro// lha mo chen mo dpal 'gugs par 'dod pa des/ rig pa'i gsang sngags 'di dag pa/
395a2(rgyud): bar bya'o// 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byams pa la sogs
395a3(rgyud): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/ rig pa 'di dag la sbyor bar bya ste/ rig sngags 'di bdag la 'byor par gyur cig/ s+yad+ya the dan/ pra ti pA ra Na ba/
395a4(rgyud): re/ sa man+ta daR+Sha na/ ma hA mi hA ra ga ti/ sa man+ta bi da na ga te ma hA/ kAr+yaM pra ti/ pra ma Ne/ satwa ar+tha sa maM tA nu pra pU re/ A sA na/ d+harma tA ma hI b+ho gi nI/ ma hA mi t+yau pa sa hi te/ hi te Shi sang gri
395a5(rgyud): hI te/ sarba man+t+ra nu pA lA ni/ 'di dag ni spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i chos nyid kyis gsang sngags kyi tshig gcig tu de kho na yang dag par grub par sbyin pa mi slu ba'i don gyi tshig ste/ sems can bar ma/
395a6(rgyud): la sbyor ba rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dag gis lo bdun du 'don cing 'dzin pa dag yan lag brgyad pa'i bsnyen par gnas pa la bsnyen te/ bdag dang sems can thams cad thams cad
395a7(rgyud): mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ snga dro dang phyi dro sangs rgyas thams cad la me tog dang spos rnams kyis mchod na/ des bdag gis bsam pa 'di 'byor par gyur cig/ myur du
395b1(rgyud): 'byor bar gyur cig / gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas kyang rung ste/ khyim de shin tu gtsang mar byas la/ lci bas dkyil 'khor byas te/ spos dang bdug pa'ang 'bul bar bya'o// stan gca
395b2(rgyud): ma'ang gding bar bya'o// sa la me tog sil ma bkram nas bsdad par bya'o// de nas skad cig de nyid la dpal 'ongs nas der gnas par 'gyur ro// de'i phyin chad khyim mam/ grong ngam/ grong khyer
395b3(rgyud): 'am/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas su nam yang brel cing 'phongs pa med par byed do// 'gron bu dang / gser dang / rin po che dang / nor dang / 'bru dang yo byad
395b4(rgyud): thams cad 'byor pa dang bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag byed pa de dag thas cad las/ lha mo chen mo dpal la shas kyi mchog sbyin par bya ste/ des na de
395b5(rgyud): srid 'tsho ba'i bar du de na gnas por 'gyur/ 'phongs par mi 'gyur/ de dag gi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las
395b6(rgyud): dpal gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste dgu pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
395b7(rgyud): pa dri ma med pa 'bar ba rin chen gser gyi 'od zer snang ba'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu gser gyi rgyal mtshan gser du snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
396a1(rgyud): gshegs pa gser du sdang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma brgya'i 'od zer snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser/
396a2(rgyud): dang rin chen 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyi tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma chen mo la phyag
396a3(rgyud): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od dam pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
396a4(rgyud): gser gyi snying po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngu zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags zhes bya ba dang / shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba dang /
396a5(rgyud): lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog ces bya ba dang / nub phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med ces bya ba dang / byang phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra zhes bya ba ste/ su gser 'od dam pa/
396a6(rgyud): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang / byang chub sems pa'i ming 'di dag 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ khong du chud par byed na/ de rtag tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// de nas/
396a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la/ sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/
396b1(rgyud): grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i sa phyogs sam/ ri'i sman ljongs sam/ pho brang 'khor gang du gnas par 'gyur ba'i grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i phyog/
396b2(rgyud): sam/ ri'i spar ljongs sam/ pho brang 'khor der/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya che
396b3(rgyud): yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur ba dang / sa phyogs gang dang gang na dge slong chos smra ba de'i chos kyi khri gshom par 'gyur ba dang / gang dang gang du chos smra ba stan la mchis nas gser 'ong dam pa mdo
396b4(rgyud): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ba der/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag sa phyogs de dang de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o// lus mi gda' bar chos
396b5(rgyud): khri'i 'og logs su mchis te/ yan lag gi dam pa mgos dge slong chos smra ba de'i rkang mthil nas brten par bgyi'o// bdag kyang chos mnyan pa dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par bgyi/ yang
396b6(rgyud): dag par rim gro bgyi/ yang dag par mchod pa bgyi'o// bdag tshim par gyur/ rim gro bgyi ba bgyis par gyur/ rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ sa'i phung po dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad po 'di nas sa'i
396b7(rgyud): gni rdo rje la thug pa'i bar du sa'i bcud kyis rnam par 'phel bar bgyi/ yang dag par rim gro bgyi/ yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// steng du'ang rgya mtsho'i sa la thug pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor 'di/ sa'i bcung
397a1(rgyud): kyi snum gyis brlan par bgyi'o// sa chen po 'di rab tu mdangs dang ldan par bgyi'o// de nas 'dzam bu gling 'dir rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal sna tshog/
397a2(rgyud): rnams mdangs dang rab tu ldan par 'khrungs par 'gyur/ kun dga'i ra ba dang / nags tshal dang / shing ljon pa thams cad dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog rnam pa sna tshogs thaH/
397a3(rgyud): cad kyang rab tu mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ dri dang rab tu ldan pa dang / snum dang rab tu ldan pa dang / ro zhim por 'gyur/ blta na rab tu sdug pa dang / rab tu che bar 'gyur ro// sems can de dag kyang
397a4(rgyud): btung ba dang bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs de dag 'tshal nas/ tshe dang / stobs dang / kha dog dang / dbang po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gzi brjid dang / stobs dang ka kha dog dang / gzugs dang
397a5(rgyud): ldan par gyur nas kyang / sa la mchis pa'i dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa brgya stong du ma dag bgyid par 'gyur/ brtson par 'gyur/ 'bad par 'gyur/ stobs su bgyid pa'i las rnams bgyid par/
397a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu des 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad zhi ba dang / lo legs pa dang / rgyas pa dang / nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ mi'i skye bo mang pos gang bar 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sem/
397a7(rgyud): can bde bar 'gyur/ dga' ba rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur// sems can de dag gzi brjid dang / stobs dang / kha dog dang / gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
397b1(rgyud): po 'di'i slang du dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa de dag chos kyi stan la mchis pa'i gan du mami bar 'gyur/ mchis nas kyang sems rab tu /
397b2(rgyud): ngas sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad par bgyi ba'i srad du/ chos smra ba de la gsol/
397b3(rgyud): ba 'debs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rab tu bshad na/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag g.yog dang bcas te/ rab tu stob
397b4(rgyud): dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bdag cag gi lus la stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / mthu chen po skyed par 'gyur/ bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa'ang 'byung bar
397b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par 'gyur/ gzi brjid dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / shugs chen po thob par
397b6(rgyud): 'gyur na/ sa chen po dpag tshad stong phrag bdun pa'i 'dzam bu'i gling 'di sa'i bcud chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ sa chen po mdangs dang rab tu ldan par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa la/
397b7(rgyud): brten pa'i sems can 'di dag thams cad kyang 'phel zhing rgyas la yangs par 'gyur ro// chen por yang 'gyur ro// sa la gnas pa'i sems can de dag chen por gyur nas kyang / longs spyod dang yongs
398a1(rgyud): su spyod pa sna tshogs la spyod par 'gyur/ bde ba'ang myong bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bca' ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / gos dang / mal cha dang
398a2(rgyud): gnas dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / skyed mos tshal dang / chu bo dang / rdzing dang / chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / mtsho dang / lteng ka dang / 'di lta bu'i yo byad bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs la gnas pa
398a3(rgyud): sa las byung ba/ sa la brten pa 'di dag la spyod par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu des sems can de dag thams cad kyis bdag la byas pa gzo bar bgyi'o// gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od ngam/
398a4(rgyud): pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di bsti stang du bgyis te mnyan par bgyi/ bkur stir bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ rim gror bgyi/ mchod par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe sems can de dag chos smra
398a5(rgyud): ba de'i gan du mchis pa'i slad du rigs tha dad pa dang / khyim tha dad pa dag nas byung ste mchis nas/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par gyur la/ thos nas kyang rang gi ris dang / khyim/
398a6(rgyud): dang / grong dang / grong rdal tha dad pa dag tu zhugs nas/ rang rang gi khyim na gnas pa dag phan tshun du 'di skad ces bdag cag gis de ring chos mnyan pa zab mo thos so// de ring bdag cag gis bsod nams kyi
398a7(rgyud): phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bzung ngo // bdag cag gis chos mnyan pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dag mnyes par byas so// deng bdag cag gis chos mnyan pa 'dis/
398b1(rgyud): sems cad dmyal ba las yongs su thar to// dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul las yongs su thar to// deng bdag cag chos mnyan pa 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na
398b2(rgyud): tshe rabs brgya stong phrag du mar lha dang mir skye ba yongs su bzung bar 'gyur zhes gtam zer bar 'gyur/ khyim tha dad pa na gnas par gyur pa de dag sems can gzhan dag la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
398b3(rgyud): rgyal po 'di las tha na dpe gcig brjod dam/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na le'u gcig gam/ sngon byung ba gcig gam/ tha na byang chub sems dpa'i ming gcig gam/
398b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gcig gam/ tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam/ tshig gcig gis sems can gzhan dag la thos par bgyid dam/ tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
398b5(rgyud): rgyal po 'di'i mtshan gzhan dag la rab tu ston tam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang na sems can rnam pa tha dad pa de dag sa phyogs rnam pa tha dad pa de dag tu mdo sde'i gtan tshigs rnam pa sna tshog
398b6(rgyud): 'di lta bu 'di dag gcig la gcig brjod dam/ thos par bgyid dam/ gtam rgyang rjod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs de dag thams cad shin tu mdangs dang ldan pa dang sdum par 'gyur ro// sa phyog
398b7(rgyud): de dang de dag tu sems can de dag tu sems can de dag thams cad kyi phyir/ sa'i bcung rnam pa sna tshogs dang / yo byad thams cad rgyas par skye bar 'gyur/ rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ shin tu rgyas par gyur/
399a1(rgyud): sems can de dag thams cad kyang bde bar 'gyur ro// nor che ba dang / longs spyod che ba dang / sbyin pa la mos par 'gyur/ dkon mchog gsum la mngon par dad par 'gyur ro//
399a2(rgyud): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sa'i lha mo sems can gang la la dag gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di
399a3(rgyud): las tha ma tshig gcig nyan na/ de dag mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas shi 'phos nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i rigs kyi nang du lha'i rigs gang yang rung ba zhig tu skye bar 'gyur ro// sa'i lha mo sems can
399a4(rgyud): gang la la ngag gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ gnas de dag legs par rgyan par byed dam/ tha na gdugs gcig gom/ ba dan gcig gam/ ras bcos bu
399a5(rgyud): gcig gis g.yogs na/ sa'i lha mo rtag tu brgyan pa'i gnas de dag 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris bdun po dag tu/ lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang rgyan thams cad kyis legs par brgyan pa dag
399a6(rgyud): tu gnas par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe sems can de dag mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas shi 'phos te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang de dag tu skye ba de'i tshe/ sa'i lha mo rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang
399a7(rgyud): re rer yang lan bdun bdun du skye bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang myong bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces
399b1(rgyud): gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nges na sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag dge slong chos smra ba chos kyi spyan la mchis pa de'i chos kyi stan gyi 'og logs su sa phyogs de dang de dag tu gnas par bgyi'o//
399b2(rgyud): ci nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'bum dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du yun rig
399b3(rgyud): du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
399b4(rgyud): stong phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa myong bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
399b5(rgyud): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu chad par 'gyur bar lus mi
399b6(rgyud): gda' bar bgyis te/ dge slong chos smra ba de'i rkang pa la yan lag gi dam pa mgos brten par bgyi'o// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu
399b7(rgyud): pa'o// / de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang dag shes/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tu stan las langs te/ gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/
400a1(rgyud): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun/
400a2(rgyud): pabacom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam
400a3(rgyud): ri'i sman ljongs sam/ pho brang 'khor gang du 'byung bar 'gyur ba der/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad po
400a4(rgyud): de dag dang lhan cig tu grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'i sman ljongs sam/ pho brang 'khor der mchi bar bgyi'o// lus mi gda' bar bgyis te
400a5(rgyud): dge slong chos smra ba de bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// skyes pa
400a6(rgyud): 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo chos nyan pa de dag thams cad dang / gang su dag gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig nyar pa
400a7(rgyud): dang / tha na tshig gcig dang / tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las byang chub sems dpa'i ming gcig gam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gcig thos par gyur te bzung ba dang //
400b1(rgyud): tha na gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i ming thos par gyur te/ bzung ba de dag thams cad kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang
400b2(rgyud): yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// rigs de dag dang / khyim de dag dang / grong de dag dang / grong khyer de dag dang / grong rdal de dag dang / dgon pa de
400b3(rgyud): ngag dang / pho brang 'khor de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs
400b4(rgyud): su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang gis bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes zhes ming du chags par gyur ce na/ 'di ni btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis
400b5(rgyud): mngon sum mo// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos thams cad 'tshal to// chos thams cad yongs su 'tshal to// chos thams cad khong du chud do// chos thams cad ji snyed pa dang
400b6(rgyud): chos thams cad ji lta ba dang / gnas pa gang lags pa dang / chos thams cad gang dag lags pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rigs gang lags pa dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos tham/
400b7(rgyud): cad bdag la mngon sum mo// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bdag gis ye shes snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo// ye shes kyis ngag gsal ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo// ye shrI/
401a1(rgyud): kyi rgyu ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo// ye shes kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab bo// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bdag gis ye shes kyi yul 'jug pa bsam
401a2(rgyud): gyis mi khyab bo// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag chos thams cad yang dag par 'tshal ba dang / yang dag par yongs su brtag pa dang / yang dag par yongs su 'tshal ba dang / yang dag/
401a3(rgyud): par rnam par bltas pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa'i rgyu des na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes zhes ming du chags so// btsun pa bcom
401a4(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag gis dge slong chos smra ba de'i tshig brgyan par bgyi ba'i slad du spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// ci nas chos smra ba de'i lus mi ngal bar 'gyur ba dang / lus kyi dbang po bde
401a5(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba dang / rab tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gi slad du sangs rgyas brgya stong dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
401a6(rgyud): po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang / ye
