438a5(rgyud): skyabs su mchi// mi rnams la ni phan pa'i phyir// srung ba dus su nye bar gnas// sangs rgyas snga mas bshad pa yi// stong chen rab 'joms mdo sde 'di// kho ra khor yug ri mtha'i bar// mtshams gcod pa yi//
438a6(rgyud): dam pa lags// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// chos kyi rgyal po thub chen la// thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yud tsam zhig cang
438a7(rgyud): mi gsung bar dgongs nas/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po dag gang khyed kyi 'khor nga'i 'khor la 'tshe bar sems pa de ni tshul ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi
438b1(rgyud): 'jig rten 'dir sangs rgyas byung ba dang / chos legs par gsungs pa dang / dge 'dun legs par grub pa de la sa bon 'di btab na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /
438b2(rgyud): dgra bcom pa rnams dang / nyan thos rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ de la 'jig rten de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas lha'i ris sum cu rtsa gnyis las lha'i ris gang yang rung ba dag tu
438b3(rgyud): skye bar 'gyur/ rgyal po chen po dag kyang dmag rnam bzhi dang ldan pa dang / gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor chen por chos kyi
438b4(rgyud): rgyal po rgyal srid byed par 'gyur te/ de dag la'ang bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ tshan po che'i stobs kyi shugs bdog pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa/
438b5(rgyud): rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bas na 'jig rten 'dir rnam pa 'di lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur bas khyed cag snying las chung ngur gnas pas gnas par gyis shig/ de nas
438b6(rgyud): rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu star las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
438b7(rgyud): de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la grong dang / skyed mos tshal dang / gzhal med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / bsil khang dang
439a1(rgyud): pu shu dang / sgo khang dang / rtababs dang / skar khung dang / dar gyi lnga ldi bzang zhing mdzes pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / dril bu dang / rnga yab dang / mu tig gi
439a2(rgyud): dra bas yongs su bskor ba dang / pog por nas bdug pas bdug pa dag dang / me tog gis gtor ba'i khyim dang / gnas khang dang / khang pa chen po dag mchis te/ der bdag cag bud med brgya phrag stong
439a3(rgyud): gis yongs su bskor cing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga chang bar spyod pa dang ldan par gyur nas gnas te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rab tu nyon mongs pa bag ma mchis par gnas pas gnas pa na
439a4(rgyud): 'khor zas dang skom 'tshol du phyogs bcu kun tu 'byer zhing skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / btsas ma thag pa dag dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags rnams
439a5(rgyud): kyi mdangs 'phrog/ 'tshe bar bgyid/ bgegs bgyid/ 'gum par bgyid/ gsod par bgyid/ srog dang bral bar bgyid de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag cag gis 'khor bzhi'i mdun du
439a6(rgyud): rang rang gi 'khor gyi tshul gyi mtshan ma bstan par bgyi'o// gang gi 'khor gyi gdon byung ba der rgyal po chen po de'i gzugs mchod rten dang bcas pa chen po bgyis te/ nad pas rgyal po chen po de'i ming
439a7(rgyud): nas dbyung zhing dri sna tshogs kyis rang gi lag nas bdugs par bgyi'o// dog sa la me tog sil ma bkram ste/ zhugs mar bus la mchod rten de la mchod par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
439b1(rgyud): bdag gi 'khor gnod sbyin gyi gdon gyis btab pa'i tshul gyi mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te/ phyi phyir rgod cing 'jigs par 'gyur/ smra bar bgyid cing khro bar 'gyur// de ni gnyid kyang ldog par
439b2(rgyud): 'gyur// yang na shin tu na par 'gyur// rtag tu gyen du lta bar 'gyur// skar ma dag la snyegs par bgyid// nub mo shin tu dga' bar 'gyur// rtag tu 'angar zhing sgra 'byin te// de la sngags kyi tshig mchis
439b3(rgyud): kyis// 'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson// s+yAng the dan/ sid+d+he/ su sid+d+he/ satwe/ a re a ra Ne/ ba le/ ma hA ba le/ dzam+b+he/ dza Ti le/ a kha ne/ ma kha ne/ kha kha ne/ kha rang de/ kha rang+ge/ ha ra
439b4(rgyud): bing+ga le/ ti ming+gi le/ ti ming+gi li ni maM ga le swA hA/ bdag gi sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i ming dang / stobs dang / dbang phyug dang / byin gyis sems
439b5(rgyud): can thams cad kyang bde legs su gyur cig swA hA/ de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom/
439b6(rgyud): ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'khor dri
439b7(rgyud): za'i gdon gyis btab pa'i tshul gyi mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te/ glu len cing ni bro rdung ste// rgyan rnams la yang dga' bar bgyid// brkam pa ma mchis mang par sba// rgod par bgyid cing khro bar
440a1(rgyud): 'gyur// skom par 'gyur la mig dmar te// rtag tu rims kyis 'debs par 'gyur// mig kyang 'byed par mi bgyid de// rgyab kyis phyogs shing zhal bar bgyid// des
440a2(rgyud): sngags kyi tshig mchis kyis// 'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson// s+yAng thengs/ a She/ ma khe/ bi na le/ banad+he ba ra Ne/ tsa bA le/ ba le/ ba 'ar/ ba khi na/ a Shi ne/ mkhi ne/ ba ha le / \u0f7f ke
440a3(rgyud): b+ha gan+da le/ bshe/ ba sha brti ni swA hA/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gi ming dang / stobs dang / dbang phyug dang / byin gyis sems can thams cad gdon thams cad dpa gnod pa thams cad las
440a4(rgyud): thar par gyur cig swA hA/ de nas rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs
440a5(rgyud): su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'khor yi dgas grul bum gyis zin pa'i tshul gyi
440a6(rgyud): mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te/ shin tu sgom pas 'debs par 'gyur// g.yeng bas btab cing lta bar 'gyur// bzhin yang dmar por gda' bar 'gyur// bskums nas sa la nyal bar 'gyur/
440a7(rgyud): kha dog ngan cing lus kyang skem// skra dang sen mo ring ba ste// dri ma can la dri mi bda'// brdzun dang bkyil ba smra bar bgyid// de la sngags kyi tshig mchis kyis// 'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson
440b1(rgyud): s+yad ya the dan/ kha kha kha me/ kha la ne/ kha ra le/ kha la me/ kha lo me/ kha ra li khe/ ka ra khe/ kha Ti ne/ kha ra li/ ka ra khi/ ka sha ne/ ka ra Te/ kA le/ kA mi ni/ bi d+ha li/ bi d+hI ye/ bi d+he ye
440b2(rgyud): ye sha ne/ sha ma ba te/ sha mi/ sha ma ni swA hA/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po'i ming dang / stobs dang / dbang phyug dang / byin gyis sems can thams cad kyi gdon dang / 'jigs pa thams
440b3(rgyud): cad dang / nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar gyur cig swA hA/ de nas rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
440b4(rgyud): te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi
440b5(rgyud): 'khor klu dang 'dab bzangs kyi gdon gyis btab pa'i tshul gyi mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te/ skyigs bus 'debs shing dbugs kyang 'byin// de bzhin dbugs kyang grang bar 'gyur// rdul zhing
440b6(rgyud): dngu ba kha~M chu 'byung // phyi phyir gnyid kyang log par 'gyur// kha dog ldan zhing dpa' ba ste// de bzhin 'dar zhing rgyug par 'gyur// sen mo dag kyang ston par bgyid// dog sar mchis shing ngu bar bgyid/
440b7(rgyud): de la sngags kyi tshis mtshos gyis// 'jig rten mgon po bdas la gsom// srung ya the dan/ grag sa/ tham m-i thag sa/ kra kra she/ kra kragase/ kra tha me/ kra shU se/ brake ke/ grag 'am
441a1(rgyud): ge a ga le/ na ga le/ sa ma ga le/ ka hu me/ hu me/ a Shu ke/ ka la ma ke/ i re mi re/ d+hi re/ a ru ga ba ti swA hA/ rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gi ming dang / stobs
441a2(rgyud): dang / dbang phyug dang / byin gyis bdag dang sems can thams cad bde legs su gyur cig swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'khor thams cad kyi mdun du seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa/ ngan
441a3(rgyud): stobs bcu dang ldan zhing mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs shing 'jigs pa med pa ste/ 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra khyu mchog lta bu rgya chen po yang dag par bsgrags so// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor/
441a4(rgyud): ro// sde dang mthu dang bzhon bcas pa'i// bdud kyang gcig gis rab tu btul// sems can thams cad srung ba'i phyir// rig sngags thams cad ngal nyon// srung sa the dan/ a sang ge/ khaR+sha ba t+ta/
441a5(rgyud): ba la ba te/ ba la nir+g+ho She/ shu re shu ra d+ha re/ badz+re ga me/ badz+ra d+ha re/ swam+b+he dzam+b+he/ dri ra Da sA re/ bi ra dze/ bi g+ha se/ ba rA gra prAp+te/ a ra Ne/ d+harma yuk+te/ de shi bi g+huSh+pe swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
441a6(rgyud): mtshan dang / stobs dang / dbang phyug dang / byin gyis bdag dang sems can thams cad bde legs su gyur cig swA hA/ phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba dag/ sangs rgyas kyi ri gsung thos nas// 'jim
441a7(rgyud): rang smas dang dang sa gyur te// thal mi sbyar nas 'khong bar gyur/ 'byung po'i tshogs ni lpags pa rnams/ dngas 'khrubs rong rong por byung sa/ phyogs 'du rab tu 'byer byed cing // sla bo ma lang
441b1(rgyud): spobs par byed// rgyal po chen pos de shes nas// gsang ba gsum ni yang dag smras// kye ma rig sngags rig sngags che// stong chen rab tu 'joms byed pa// sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa de//
441b2(rgyud): thos nas 'byung po skrag gyur te// dper na rab tu 'bar me dang // til mar ngar btags ral gri bzhin// go'u ta mas ni rab bshad pa'i// rig sngags spu gri'i so dang 'dra// drang srong tshig ni legs
441b3(rgyud): bshad pa// de la gang zhig ma dang na// de yi bu yi thu bo ni// tshangs pa'i zhags pas med par 'gyur// me ni rab tu 'bar byas la// bla dang 'og dang phyogs bzhir yang // sbyin sreg gi ni chus gtor
441b4(rgyud): te// nas dang nyungs kar blangs nas su// mar gyi snying po dang sbyar nas// me yi nang du blugs par bya// legs par gsungs pa 'di thos nas// gal te myur du mi gtong na// thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur/
441b5(rgyud): ba ni// mar dang nyungs kar mer blugs bzhin// gnod sbyin chad pas bsdigs nas su// de dag bde ba mi rnyed de// de yi rtsib logs g.yas par ni// 'bras chen nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// gnod/
441b6(rgyud): sbyin nad kyis btab pa na/ sha bkra'i nad kyis btab por 'gyur// lung lo can gyi pho brang du// gzhar yang 'gror bar mi 'gyur ro// lus ngan grogs dang ldan pa yi// khyim yang mthong bar mi 'gyur/
441b7(rgyud): te/ 'byung po mang po tshogs pan// stan yang thob par mi 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dag gi dkyil 'khor du/ zas skom dang yang 'bral bar 'gyur// stong chen rab 'joms mdo sde la/ gnod sbyin
442a1(rgyud): gang drag mi phyogs pa// de la rdo rje 'chang khros te// spyi bo dag ni 'gems par 'gyur// spu gri'i so ni rtsub mo yis// de yi lce ni gcod par 'gyur// mtshon cha shin
442a2(rgyud): rnon po yis// de yi sna dang rna ba gcod// 'khor lo spu gri'i so 'dra bas// klod pa rab tu gshag par byed// tho ba lcags kyis dkris pa yis// de yi snying yang 'joms par byed// rnag
442a3(rgyud): dang khrag ni dron mo dag/ de yi kha nas 'dzag par 'gyur// rig sngags zhags pa'i chad pa yis// rtag tu 'khor bar 'gro ba na// 'khor bar gnod sbyin dkyil 'khor du// de nyid du ni 'khor bar
442a4(rgyud): 'gyur// rgyal po chen po dpal ldan pa// phyogs bzhi dag tu song gyur nas// chos kyi go cha bgos gyur te// bzang po'i khri la 'dug pa ni// shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung // lho phyogs na ni
442a5(rgyud): 'phags skyes po// nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang // byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po// dpal dang gzi brjid 'bar ba yin// rgyal po dag ni phyin pa dang // de tshe ston pa thams cad mkhyen// bar snang
442a6(rgyud): gnas la rab tu 'phags// tshangs pas sprul pa'i gzhal med khang // der ni rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs// de nas tshangs pa tshangs chen rnams// thal mo sbyar 'khod phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan gser
442a7(rgyud): gyi ri bo 'dra// gser gyi mchod sdong dang yang mtshungs// me tog pad+ma bzhin du rgyas// sA la'i rgyal po bzhin du rgyas// nyi ma dang 'dra zla nya la// skar ma rnams kyis yongs bskor bzhin// thub skra
442b1(rgyud): gser gyi kha dog la// mtshan rnams kyis ni yongs su brgyan// 'jig rten mes po tshangs pa yis// 'jig rten sgron ma bstod byas te// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni// 'jig rten skyong la
442b2(rgyud): 'di skad smras// 'jig rten skyong gi 'khor rnams kyis// rjes su bstan pa ma thob ste// gang phyir 'di las sangs rgyas dang // rang sangs rgyas dag 'byung 'gyur zhing // 'di las nyan thos rnams
442b3(rgyud): kyang skye// lha rnams dag kyang skye bar 'gyur// rig byed yan lag drug mthar phyir// bram ze rnams kyang skye bar 'gyur// drang srong skal ba chen po dang // dge slong bram ze 'di las skye// khyed cag
442b4(rgyud): snying las chung byed pa// mi yi spyi dgu gnod par 'gyur// tshangs pa yi ni tshig thos nas// 'jig rten skyong gis tshig smras pa// tshangs pa chen po de bzhin no// thub pa chen po de bzhin no// bdag
442b5(rgyud): gis ri rab bskul byas shing // sa yang rab tu bzlog byas la// rgya mtsho la ni thug pa rnams// rnam par sbyang ba nyid du bya// zhags pa dam po ma nyams pas// nyi ma zla ba rlung rnams dang /
442b6(rgyud): skar ma dag ni thams cad kyang // bdag gis su ni bcing bar bya// gang dag rab tu sdang byed cing // 'jig rten la ni phan mi byed// de dag la ni thams cad du// phyogs kyang snang bar mi bya'o// 'jig
442b7(rgyud): chen lha dang bcas pa de// 'byung po rnams kyis phyir spong ngo de// 'byung po mi yi skye dgu la// gnod par byed cing 'tshe bar byed// gang dag sngags dang sman rnams dang // rigs sngags las ni 'da' byed
443a1(rgyud): pa// de la sngags kyi dam pa ni// pha rol gnon pa ston par byed// rig sngags las ni 'da' ba'i 'khor// kun tu chad pas bsdig byas te// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar
443a2(rgyud): ni// yang dag par yang brjod par bgyi// gang gis 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor du// 'di bshad pa ni mi nyan pa// de dag chad pa bshad par bya// tshangs pas sprul pa'i mdo sde'o// sangs rgyas zhabs
443a3(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal te// phan tshun du ni bltas byas na// bai DUR+Ya dang gser dang dngul// mu tig rnams dang shel dag dang // spug dang rdo yi snying po dang // rin chen bdun gyis brgyan pa yis// rtsib stong kha
443a4(rgyud): dog gser 'dra ba'i// shing rta rnam pa bzhi byas pa// bzo rnams kun dang ldan pa ste// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' la 'gro// rgyal po dag ni der bzhugs nas// 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor nyid du dong //
443a5(rgyud): sa ni gser gyi phye ma dang // me tog dag gis bkang byas nas// mgul par ltung dang skud pa dang // zhags pa dag kyang gdags byos la// phyogs kyi sa ni ji snyed pa'i// 'byung po thams
443a6(rgyud): cad khrid shog ces// gnod sbyin gyi ni sde dpon kun// phyogs bzhi rag tu dgye bar byas// stong chen rab tu 'joms pa yi// mdo sde yi ni dam pa 'di // tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bar du byung //
443a7(rgyud): wa rnams kun gyis rnam par bsams// stong chen po yi lus kyis su// gnod sbyin dang ni srin po btul// lus ngan po yi tshig thos nas// gnod sbyin gyi ni sde dpon dag/ phyogs bzhi
443b1(rgyud): ngag tu song nas su// gsang ba po la drag tu bsgo// thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad// dri za las byung gdon gyi rnams// shar phyogs chan 'khod pa dag/ mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun// bcing ba/
443b2(rgyud): lnga yis bsdams pa yi// 'byung po mang po pal nyon// thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad// grul bum las byung gdon gyi rigs// lho phyogs cha 'dir 'khod pa dag/ mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun
443b3(rgyud): bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa yi// 'byung po mang po pa la nyon// thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad// klu las gdon du gyur pa rnams// nub phyogs cha 'dir 'khod pa dag/ mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag
443b4(rgyud): kun// bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa yi// 'byung po mang po nga la nyon// thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad// gnod sbyin las ni gdon gyur pa// byang phyogs cha 'dir 'khod pa dag/ mdo sde'i zhags pas
443b5(rgyud): de dag kun// bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa yi// 'byung po mang po nga la nyon// lus ngan po yi bu thu bo// kun tu rgyal ba mi la zhon// de yi drung na 'khod pa yi// gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu dag/ bcing
443b6(rgyud): ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas// mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs// de nyid kyi ni bu gnyis pa// skyed pa pa~M zhes rnam grags pa// de yi drung na 'khod pa yi// gnod sbyir bye ba drug cu dag/ bcing ba rnam/
443b7(rgyud): pa lngas bsdams nas// mdo sde'i chags pas kun tu drangs// de nyid kyi ni bu gsum pa// de yi ming ni gdon po che// de yi drung na 'khod pa yi// gnod sbyin bya ba drug cu rnams// bcing ba rnam pa lngas
444a1(rgyud): bsdams nas// mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs// de nyid kyi ni bu bzhi pa// de yi ming ni bum pa'i lho// de yi drung na 'khod pa yi// gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu rnams// bcing /
444a2(rgyud): ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas// mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs// dbang phyug chen po lha chen po// lag bzhi pa la stobs po che// de yi drung na 'khod pa yi// gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu rnams// bcing
444a3(rgyud): ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas// mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs// 'byung po 'joms pa'i ri la ni// 'byung po thams cad lhags nas su// rig sngags thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// rig sngags
444a4(rgyud): 'di ni kun tu bsams// chang pa mi bzang drag po ste// gang phyir sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs// go'u ta ma la gus par ni// thams cad de la skyabs su song // g.yo med par ni rjes zhugs shig/ thams
444a5(rgyud): cad med par gyur ta re// de nas thang cig tsam gyis ni// 'byung po mang po thams cad lpags// ri rnams dang ni g.yang sa dang // rgya mtsho dang ni mtsho rnams dang // klung dang 'bab chu lu ma dang // dpa' grong
444a6(rgyud): dag na gang 'khor dang // skyed mos tshal dang gzhal med khang // kun dga' dang ni nags rnams dang // mchod rten gnas dang grong gi gnas// ljon shing drung na gang gnas dang // grong khyer sgo dang grong dang /
444a7(rgyud): ni/ grong rdal dang ni ljongs rnams dang // rgyal po'i pho brang sgo rnams dang // gzhal med khang na gang gnas dang // dkyil 'khor dag dang dur khrod dang // de bzhin lha khang rnams dang ni// mtshams dpan/
444b1(rgyud): gam gnas rnams dang // khang stong dang ni grams dang // gnod sbyin gang rnams bla 'og dang // phyogs bzhi dang ni mtshams nas// gnod sbyin bye ba stong rnams ni// rig sngags zhags pas bkug pa rnam
444b2(rgyud): rdza rnga dag ni brdungs nas su// la las rnga zlum dag ni brdungs// pi wang gling bu 'khar ba'i rnga// stobs chen rnams ni sgra'i 'byin te// rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sna tshogs dang // gru dang gar rnams byas nas su/
444b3(rgyud): dbang po zla ba chu lha dang // b+ha ra dwa dza skye dgu'i bdag/ ma ldan pa dang kun tu lta// mngon shes gangs can rdzogs pa dang // tsan dan dang ni 'dod mchog dang // mgul pa mdzes dang mgul nges dang //
444b4(rgyud): skye dgu'i bla mar gyur pa dang // lha las byung ba'i ma ldan dang // dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni// mi rgyal rgyal ba khyu mchog dang // de bzhin phung bu lnga zhes bya// g.yer ma dang ni nye zer dang // nya lcibs dang ni
444b5(rgyud): ral gri bu// kun gyi bshes dang grags 'dzin dang // 'brog gnas dang ni yid bzang dang // khab sna dang ni r-i sul kha// lnga 'dzin dang ni khab bzang dag/ sde dang dpung dang bzhon par bcas// lha dang klu
444b6(rgyud): dang dri za dang // gnod sbyin srin po lha ma yin// nyin gsum pa yi smyo byed dang // de bzhin bzhi pa'i rims ngag dang // 'jig rten 'tshe ba gang yin pa// gnod sbyin srin po ma rungs rnams// phyogs ba ni/
444b7(rgyud): nas ni bkug nas su// bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa rnams// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga ru// thal sbyar 'khod nas 'di skad spras// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog
445a1(rgyud): khyod la// thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gi ni mdun rgyug pa// 'byung po gnod sbyin lus po che// lag pa bzhi pa ma rungs pa/
445a2(rgyud): rkang mangs dang ni rkang gcig pa// rkang bzhi pa dang rkang gnyis dang // rkang pa sgreng la spyi'u tshugs dang // lus mang mgo bo gcig pa dang // lus gcig pa la mgo bzhi dang // mig mangs po la/
445a3(rgyud): lus phyed dang // mig gcig lho ni bcu gnyis dang // bong bu rnga mo glang chen mgo/ lag po sgreng la mgo btung dang // mtshom cha'i so dang mtshon cha'i lag/ mtshon cha'i rkang pa srin po rnams// zangs kyi
445a4(rgyud): sgra dang zangs kyi so// zangs kyi mig dang zangs kyi lag/ zangs kyi tho ba'i rkang pa dang // zangs kyi sna dang zangs kyi kha// rkang lag kun tu 'bar ba dang // mi yi lus su gnas pa rnams// skyur zhar lba pa/
445a5(rgyud): gsum yod pa// mig mi sdug la kha glal ba// chu srin stag gi gzugs dang ni// gzugs mi sdug dang kha ral po// mchu 'phyangs po dang so yon po// rab tu gtum po khro gnyer can// gsus po che dang
445a6(rgyud): bum rna po// rna 'phyang ba dang rna ba med// lag ring dang ni rna ba ring // sna yi rtse dang lag rtse ring // lus skem lus ni ring ba dang // skra rings rab tu brgyan pa dang // rkang pa med pa phra ba dang // dri nga ba dang bum
445a7(rgyud): lto bo// yan lag chu srin 'dra ba dang // gtun shing tho ba 'dra ba'i lto// gnam lto bo la rna bo che// gyen du brdzes skra rab tu dmar// mgo bo che la gzhu mgrin po// skem po sgur po bum lto bo// ri rab rtse mo bsgral
445b1(rgyud): nas su// ma mngag gi ni char pa 'bebs// ljon shing ri dang rdo ba dang // sprin gyi tshogs kyi mdog 'dra ba// dung dang rnga chen rdza rnga dang // grul bum rnga bram rnams kyi sku// 'jigs pa'i sgra ni rab tu 'byin/
445b2(rgyud): ming po che la bong bu'i sgra// nag po ser po sngon po dang // dmar ser me ltar dmar sar dang // khab 'dra'i spu dang ral gri'i sgra// dmar po khrag gis bslus pa rnams// mo ro dag ni khyer nas su// za bzhin du ni
445b3(rgyud): rnam par rgyug/ so rnom lag pa dmar po dang // mchu ni khrag gis bskus pa dang // lus phyed dag ni zos pa dang // mkhal ma snying dang nang khrol gyis// snyim pa shin tu bkang ba dang / byis pa dag ni
445b4(rgyud): za bzhin du// mer mer po dang srog chags kyi// rkang lag rnams kyi stobs kyang 'phrog/ keng rus kyi ni lus kyis su// skye bo mang po skrag par byed// khrag gis rab tu bkang ba yi// mi yi pags pa thogs
445b5(rgyud): nas su// mi bzad dug gis kun bslus te// phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyug/ grong khyer rnams kyi sgo dag dang // khyim nas khyim du rnam par 'thor// rlung dang bang kan mkhris pa rnams// phyogs bzhi
445b6(rgyud): rag tu 'khrug par byed// de ltar de ni rgyal po yi// gdon dang 'jigs pa chen po rnams// lhags pa de dag thams cad kyang // rig sngags zhags pas rab tu bsdams// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la
445b7(rgyud): phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// grong khyer grong dang yul 'khor dang // pho brang 'khor na rgyu ba ni// gnod sbyir ma rungs mdangs
446a1(rgyud): 'phrog pa// snying rje med cing khrag 'thung ba// lus cher 'jigs pa chen po che// stobs po che la sgra yang che// mgrin bcu po la mig stong po// gdon chen mig ni dmar po
446a2(rgyud): rnams// 'khor ni mang po rnams btang ste// lag na mtshon thogs rab tu 'jigs// sbrul gyi zhags pa thogs pa dang // lag bzhi lag na sgron ma thogs// lag na mtshon dang dbyig pa thogs// rdorje
446a3(rgyud): mdung rtse lag par thogs// rab tu drag po'i dmag brgal nas// phyogs kun du ni skrag par byed// sdang ba'i gnas na 'khod pa yi// gsang ba po ni dang kun kyang // mi yi 'jig rten 'di dag tu// skyes pa/
446a4(rgyud): bud med gzhan yang 'dzin// sha khrag dron mor bcas pa la// rnam par 'khrug cing 'dod pa'i gzugs// seng ge dang ni stag dang ta// ma he ba lang bong bu dza// glang po che yi gzugs 'dra dang // dom pa
446a5(rgyud): gzig dang spyang ki dang // khyi dang wa dang ra dag dang // byi la byi ba spre'u'i gzugs// bas dang phag dang sre mong dang // nya dang rus sbal dag gi gzugs// kha cig dag ni sram gyi gzugs// khwa dang 'ug pa
446a6(rgyud): khu byug dang // bya rgod khra dang nya ming bcas// rma bya ngang pa thi bya dang // khrung khrung dang ni bya rnams dang // kha cig bya gag gzugs rnams su// gnod sbyin rnams ni mi yis mthong // 'dab bzang bya yi
446a7(rgyud): tshul gyis kyang // skye bo mang po skrag par byed// kha cig mi yi mgo can la// lus ni bya gag bong bu 'dra// kha cig mtshon gyis rab tu 'tshe// lus dang bral ba dag tu snang // rnam par 'khrugs shing 'dod la/
446b1(rgyud): mos// d+hA 'i 'phreng bas kun tu dkris// rtse gsum mdung gis rab 'debs shing // srog rgyags rnams la gnod par byed// mi bzang gdug pa'i dbugs 'byin cing // ste dbu 'di dag skrag par
446b2(rgyud): byed// srog chags rgyud ni ji snyed par// sa tshogs kyi ni gzugs su snang // kha cig dag ni ri yang thogs// la la ral gri 'khor lo thogs// grangs ni brgya phrag stong rnams te// dbyug pas bsdigs
446b3(rgyud): shing kha drag po// mig phyug pa la bzhin mi sdug/ srin po so ni rdo ba dang // sna dang rna ba bcad pa dang // lce chang gdong ni gnyer ma can// rkang lag dag ni gtubs pa dang // mgo bo bcad pa'i srin/
446b4(rgyud): po rnams// skabs ni rab tu 'tshol bar byed// sdig pa can rnams mdangs kyang 'phrog/ mi dag gi ni lus rnams la// rab tu phra ba'i gdon du snang // spu yi bar dang gnang rnams dang // de bzhin
446b5(rgyud): rma yi kha rnams su// lhags pa de dag thams cad kyang // rig sngags zhags pas rab tu drangs// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar nas
446b6(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ri yi rgyal po ri rab dang // de bzhin kho ra khor yug dang // bya rgod phung po gshol mnga' 'dzin// spos dang ldan dang gangs kyi ri// sna tshogs
446b7(rgyud): brtsegs dang pAr+Na pa// na la da yi ri gnyis dang // dpal rgya la me rtse mo ni// gang dag shin tu mthor 'phags dang // ri bi de dag kun la yang // lha dang drang srong gang gnas pa// de dag thams cad
447a1(rgyud): mi dga' zhing // 'jigs pa'i yid kyis mya ngan byed/ bye ba stong gi lha dag dang // bye ba phrag brgya'i lha rnams dang // lha yi bu mo skal chen dag/ thal lo rab tu sbyor ba byed khrugs
447a2(rgyud): bzangs ris dang sgra gcan dang // sim par byed pa'ang der phyin to// lha min bye ba phrag stong dang // lha min bye ba phrag brgya dang // de dag bu mo 'phrul ldan pa// mang po kun kyang thal mo sbyor// rab tu gnas
447a3(rgyud): dang rgya mtsho dang // klu yi rgyal po bzi can dang // klu yi rgyal po ma dros dang // dga' bo nye dga' gnyis ngag dang // rdo rje blo gros pag shu dang // gang+gA dga' bo sin+d+hu mtsho// bya yi rgyal po 'dab bzang
447a4(rgyud): rgya mtsho chen po 'khrug byed dang // stong phrag bye ba'i klu yi rnams// bye ba phrag brgya'i klu dag dang // de dag bu mo skal chen rnams// thal mo rab tu sbyor bar byed// nyi ma zla ba gnyis ka yang // skar ma'i 'khor
447a5(rgyud): gyis yongs su bskor// gser gyi me tog yan lag na// ma ga d+ha na 'jigs byed pa// gso ba'i mtha' na mi thong can// ko sa lan rab tu dkar// bzang po'i yul na kha spu can// gyad kyi yul na grags pa
447a6(rgyud): 'jim/ lnga 'dzin pa na skrag byed pa// rta skye ba na mig dmar gnas// srung byed pa na ser skya ste// sems pa na ni mig ser po// be'u la pan bum pa'i lho// dga' ba'i yul na ring por skyes// ba lang 'dzin na/
447a7(rgyud): rab tu 'joms// dung yul na ni nyi ma'i grogs// ljongs chen rnams kyi gnod sbyir ni// brjod pa bcu drug de dag dang // lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin che// chos skyong rab tu dkar ba dang // ser skya rab mdzes khyab
447b1(rgyud): 'gru dang / bum lho gsus pa zlum po dang / chu srin bden pa 'chang ba dang / la rgyal rgyal ba khyu mchog dang / gnod sbyin chen po dbang phyug che// 'ag pa pa'i can stobs po che/ 'de dpa' rab tu 'dul ba ni/
447b2(rgyud): mthu bo ra la stobs po me// gshin rjeg shin rje bo nya dang // bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa dang // gnod sbyin bye ba'i g.yog 'chang ba// gnod sbyir de ming 'phrog po yin// bA rA tI ni ster bcas dang /
447b3(rgyud): ri yi bu mo gnod sbyin ma// gzi brjing chen mo 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'phrog ma zhes kyang grags pa dang // gdol pa mo ni gtum mo yang // bu rnams lnga brgyas bskor ba dang // mi rdung nag mo kas ni/
447b4(rgyud): pad+ma dang ni pad+ma can// me tog so dang sa ga dang // srin mo bong bu'i rna can dang // tsan dan dang ni khyab 'jug len// seng ge ser skya dmar ser po// glang po klu yi so can dang // ri shes drag po'i mche ba
447b5(rgyud): can / srin mo so bzang yod pa dang // tshangs pa len dang khyab 'jug len// gnod sbyin ha la ha la dang // gnod sbyin rnam pa'i mchu can dag/ mdung dang mda' gzhu kun thogs shing // mi rta ba lang
447b6(rgyud): ri dwags rnams// za zhing 'tshe ba de dag ni// phyogs rnams kun tu rgyug cing 'dong // sa 'di rab tu g.yo bar byed// nags tshal rnams kyang rab tu skems// ri rnams kun nas g.yo bar byed// skye dgu
447b7(rgyud): 'di dag 'tshe byed cing // phan tshun nas ni 'du ba dag/ rig sngags kyis ni drangs nas lpags// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar nas/
448a1(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga ru// de dag lhags par gyur pa dang // de nas rgyal po rnam thos bus// 'jig rten mthoH/
448a2(rgyud): la 'di skad gsol// bdag gi phyogs cha byang phyogs su// rgyal po'i gnas su sprul pa ni// lcang lor ldan pa yid du mchis// de bas bdag ni lcang lo'i bdag/ rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo
448a3(rgyud): can/ lha rnams kun gyis bsams par gyur// phyir shin tu mthon po can// rin chen kun gyis brgyan pa lags// 'phang du dpag tshad bcu drug ste// gser gyi rgyu las bgyis pa lags//
448a4(rgyud): phyogs bzhi ldog ni re re la'ang // gnod sbyin rdo rje 'chang ba dag/ kun nas rab tu gnas par gyur// lag na mtshon cha legs par sprul// rgyal po'i pho brang de yi sgo// sgo bzhi btong bar bgyis pa ni/
448a5(rgyud): gcig ni gser las bgyis pa'i sgo// gnyis pa dngul las bgyis pa ste// gsum pa shel gyi sgo mo lags// bzhi pa gser gyis rnam par spras// grong khyer de yi nang dag na// skyed mos tshal gyi me tog
448a6(rgyud): rgyas// de yi nang na gzhal med khang // rin chen bdun rgyu sna tshogs mchis// rin chen sna tshogs ljon shing can// bya bran sna tshogs skad kyang 'byin// me tog sna tshogs legs par bkram// sna tshogs/
448a7(rgyud): rgyas kyis byugs pa lags// gnod sbyin mo na 'jo ba dang // gru dang rol mos rab tu brgyas / dpal gyi dam pa nyams su myong // der ni 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor dam// gang dag 'khor zhing mchis pa
448b1(rgyud): dgag rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa ste// chos 'tshal ba dang chos spyod pa// srog chags rnams la 'tshe mi bgyid// zas dang skom gyis mi brel te// skye dgu mi bzang gzham dag ni// chos min 'dod
448b2(rgyud): cing chos min spyod// srog chags rnams la rnam par 'tshe// longs spyod chen po 'tshol bgyid cing // phyogs bzhi kun tu rnam par lha// grong khyer sgo yi gam yo dang // bza' shing ra ba nags tshal na/
448b3(rgyud): gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po'i tshogs// bye ba stong phrag brgya mchis pa// de dag thams cad mdo sde yis// zhags pas drangs te dgug par bgyi// rgyal po'i pho brang dbus na ni// chos kyi rgyal po'i
448b4(rgyud): gnas gyur pa// bsil ba'i rdzing bus bskor ba ste// tsan dan nags kyis 'khor ba lags// kun nas dpag tshad drug cu ste// khang pa brtsegs ma sprul pa dag/ gcig ni gser las bgyis pa ste/
448b5(rgyud): gnyis ni dngul las bgyis pa lags// gsum pa bai DUR+Ya las bgyis// bzhi pa gtsang dang shel gyi rgyu// lnga pa mu tig dmar po ste// drug pa rdo yi snying po lags// bdun pa spug las bgyis pa
448b6(rgyud): ste/ brgyad pa rin chen bdun las bgyis// bud med stong phrag brgya dag kyang // de dag re re kun na gnas// lhab lhub sna tshogs mchog dag dang // cha byad sna tshogs mang pos brgyan// glu dang rol mo
448b7(rgyud): sna tshogs dang // bzo yi gnas la mkhas pa mchis// de lnga'i rab tu dga' ba yis// bde zhing tshim pa'i yid gyur cing // de na bdag ni rgun skyems dang // 'dod pa dag gis rab myos pas/
449a1(rgyud): bdag gis 'khor rnams 'phyan bgyid cing // phyogs bcu dag tu 'jigs pa skyed// bud med dag dang skyes pa dang // de bzhin khye'u dang bu mo dang // mngal na gnas pa'ang
449a2(rgyud): 'jigs par bgyid// dud 'gro'i skye gnas gtogs la'ang 'tshe// skar ma ngag dang nyi zla dang // gtum pa'i gza' rnams gnod par bgyid// lo tog sa bon 'bras bu dang // me tog sman dang zas
449a3(rgyud): skom dang / mi rnams kyi ni dpal 'phrog cing // mthon po rnams kyang dma' bar bgyid// 'jig rten dag na nongs pa rnams// dmag dang 'thab mo shar gnyer dang // tshig gam zhig gam gsang rtse
449a4(rgyud): ga/ de kun 'byung po'i rnam par gyur// sbed cing stong par bgyid pa dang // zlog par bgyid cing rgod par bgyid// 'jigs par bgyid cing lta bar bgyid// dgrar 'gyur ba yang ston par bgyid// sdig
449a5(rgyud): pa'i rmi lam mthong bar bgyid// nyal ba dag la gnod par bgyid// sgo nas se gol sgra phyung zhing // mi snyan brjod de za bar bgyid// mdza bo gnyen bshes gzugs dag tu// gda' zhing bka' mchid/
449a6(rgyud): smra bar bgyid// bu mo sdug gu'i gzugs dag tu// 'dod la spyod par dga' bar bgyid// nyi ma skar ma'i gzugs dang ni// zla ba'i gzugs su gda' bar bgyid// rlung dang skar mda' lce gzugs su/
449a7(rgyud): la gnod par de dag gangal// skar mnga'i tshogs dang 'dra ba dag/ 'jigs par bgyid cing wa dang khyir// rnam par sprul nas lhor shing dang // mchod rtem dag gi gnas na gda'// skyes pa gzhon nu'i gzugs/
449b1(rgyud): mdzes pas// 'bar zhing shing rta'i sgra yang 'byin// gnas rnams dag ni shul dag tu// rnam pa sna tshogs rjes kyang ston// grong khyer dag dang khyim rnams kyi// sgo yang gnod sbyin de dag 'byed// srog/
449b2(rgyud): dang lus kyang grangs bgyid cing // lam ngan kun tu skrag par bgyid// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dag dang // rnam pa sna tshogs sgra rnams dang // rnam pa sna tshogs nad kyi rnams// lus la na ba gnas
449b3(rgyud): bar ston// nang rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid kyang // phyin ci log tu ston par bgyid// ji snyed 'jig rten rang bzhin dag/ thams cad log par de dag ston// rig sngags zhags pas drangs pas na// de dag
449b4(rgyud): kun kyang 'dir mchis so// de nas rgyal po rnam thos bu// langs te thal mo rab sbyar nas// zhabs la 'khor lo'i mtshan mnga' ba// gser gyi mchod sdong 'bar ba bzhin// 'jig rten snang bar
449b5(rgyud): mdzad pa po// thub pa chen po me dang 'dra// gnod sbyin gsang sngags mi bzang can// stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi dag/ byang gi phyogs cha'i phyogs na gnas// byang phyogs dag na gnod par bgyid//
449b6(rgyud): 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni// de dag chad paM bdag gis bshad// sAd ya the dan/ khan+te/ khan+daN+De/ bi tsak+Sha Ne tsakr-i/ rA dzA ne/ tsan+d+he tsa pa le/ b+hI ma parba te/ kha ra gre/ ku TaM la ka ra phre
449b7(rgyud): e kak+Shi/ barba pa ti/ sI raM ga pa ti/ tsit+ta kAn ti swA hA/ bdag dang sems can thams cad byang phyogs su dge bar gyur cig swAhA/ tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang // 'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug ma
450a1(rgyud): gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang // 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa yang // bdag gi me tog spos ngag dang // sbyin sreg 'di ni blang bar gyis// de dag gi ni brtson 'grus dang /

450a6(rgyud): the dan/ d+hA ra Ni d+hA ra Ni/ pra d+hAn sa ni/ b+hany+dza ni/ pra b+hany+dza nau/ bi d+ha ma ni/ ki ma pu ru she/ sha ka le/ sA ra the/ sA ra ba ti/ shu ra d+ha rau/ shU la d+hA ri Ni/ shud+d+ha tsa ra Ne/ g+ho Sha ba te/ shA rAH/
450a7(rgyud): shAn+ti/ bdag dang sems can thams cad shar phyogs su dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang // 'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug che// gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang // 'jos/

451a1(rgyud): bar gyis// de dag gi ni brtson 'grus dang // gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang // nang rnams thams cad bcom par gyur// bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs
