451a6(rgyud): a tsa le/ bdag dang sems can thams cad nub phyogs su dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang // 'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug ce// gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang / jom
451a7(rgyud): ma bu dang bcas pa yang // bdag gi me tog spos dag dang // sbyin sreg 'di ni blang bar gyis// de dag gi ni brtson 'grus dang // gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang // nad rnams thams cad bcom
451b1(rgyud): par gyur// bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang / nye bar 'tshe ba dang / gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu
451b2(rgyud): mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas tshangs pa tshangs chen yang // thal mo sbyar ba byas nas langs// tshangs pas bkrus pa dag pa po// rig
451b3(rgyud): byed kun gyi pha rol phyin// skye bo dga' mdzad sman pa'i rje// 'jig rten thams cad gso mdzad pa// gnod sbyin srin po gang gi rnams// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams gnas pa dang // sa yi 'og
451b4(rgyud): dang bar dang steng // nam mkha' dag la gnas pa'i gdon// 'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar ni// de dag chad pa bdag gis bshad// s+yad ya the dan/ brah+ma bah+ma g+ho She/ brah+ma sA re/ badz+re badz+ra/ g+ho Sha
451b5(rgyud): badz+ra d+ha re/ s+thi re sA re/ a tsa le/ a ra Ne/ I Sha Ne/ a ra Ni de ra Ni/ shu re bA rA gra/ prA b+he sA ra ba te/ bdag dang sems can thams cad phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad du dge bar gyur/
451b6(rgyud): cig swA hA/ tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang // 'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug che// gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang // 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa yang // bdag gi me tog spos dag dang // sbyin sreg
451b7(rgyud): 'di ni blang bar gyis// de dag gi ni brtson 'grus dang // gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang // nang rnams thams cad bcom par gyur// bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang
452a1(rgyud): bar 'tshe ba dang / gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar te phyag
452a2(rgyud): 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rlus las skyes dang mkhris skyes nad // bad kan skyes dang 'dus las skyes// nad rnams thams cad nges par bcom// bdag dang sems can tham
452a3(rgyud): cad kyang 'jigs pa dang / nye bar 'tshe ba dang / gnod pa thams cad las rgyal bar gyur cig swAhA// stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba bam po gnyis
452a4(rgyud): pa ste tha ma'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyal srid gcig gi phyir 'jig rten du byung ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas
452a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / grong dang / khyim nas/ sems can gcig gi bar gyi don gyi phyir 'jig rten du byung ba ma yin gyi/ 'jig rten/
452a6(rgyud): lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i don du sangs rgyas bcom ldan
452a7(rgyud): 'das rnams 'jig rten du byung ste/ de ni dper na sman pa mkhas pa'i mchog tu phyin pa/ gso ba la brtson pa/ sman pas shes par bya ba shin tu bslabs pa rgyal po gcig gi don du byung ba ma yin/
452b1(rgyud): yul gcig gi dong du blang ba ma yin pa nas/ sems can gcig gi don gyi bar du byung ba ma yin pa dang 'dra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyogs gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa'i byos/
452b2(rgyud): du ngag tu mi rnams dang / mi ma yin pa de dag kyang rnam par 'tshe bar mi bya bar sems kyis/ nga yang yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba der song ba dang / yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po'i skye rdor
452b3(rgyud): tshogs phal po che'i don yang byas par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'ang byas par 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs te/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs
452b4(rgyud): brlabs nas lhung bzed bsnams te/ dge slong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang thabs cig tu bya rgod phung po'i ri las shong du gshegs pa dang / de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas lha'i gdugs lnga brgya tsam
452b5(rgyud): blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas rol nas phul lo// phul nas bcom ldan 'das nyid la rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang lha'i gdugs lnga/
452b6(rgyud): brgya tsam blangs te bcom ldan 'das la g.yon rol nas phul lo// phul nas bcom ldan 'das nyid la rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to// rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang re re zhing lha'i gdugs lnga brgya/
452b7(rgyud): tsam blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la snam logs nas phul nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to// lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod spyir gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa
453a1(rgyud): brgyad dang / gnod sbyin mthu bo che sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang bcas pas kyang so so nas lha'i gdugs dag blangs te/ nyan thos rnams la phul nas
453a2(rgyud): rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to// de lta bu'i grags pa dang / bkur sti dang / brnyes par bya ba brnyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bya rgod phung po'i
453a3(rgyud): ri las shod du babs te/ yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba der gshegs pa dang / yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das shin tu mdzes pa/ dad par 'os pa/ dbang po zhi ba/ thugs
453a4(rgyud): zhi ba/ dbang po dul ba/ thugs dul ba/ dul ba dang zhi gnas kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa/ dbang po dben zhing khugs pa/ glang po che ltar shin tu dul ba/ mtsho ltar dngas shing rnyog pa med
453a5(rgyud): la rnam par gsal ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus shin tu brgyan pa/ shing sA la'i rgyal po ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/
453a6(rgyud): rnam par spras pa/ nyi ma ltar 'od zer gyi dra ba kun tu 'gyed pa/ mtshan mo mun pa'i nang na ri bo'i spol me'i phung po chen po rab tu 'bar ba dang 'dra zhing / bcom ldan 'das gser gyi ri bo chen po dam pa lha
453a7(rgyud): lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger rgyang ring po nas gnas der gshegs pa mthong ngo // mthong ma thag tu yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams bcom ldan 'das la sems dad par gyur nas/ sems dad par gyur pa de
453b1(rgyud): dgra bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por lam gang nas gshegs pa'i lam de 'phyag cing chag chag 'debs/ byi dor byed/ me tog 'thor/ dar gyi lnga ldi dang / dril bu dang / gdugs dang /
453b2(rgyud): rgyal mtshan dang kha dan sna tshogs kyis brgyan te/ bdug spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
453b3(rgyud): 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gi mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i ri mo can/ me tog pad+ma'i snying po ltar 'jam pa/ sngon legs par spyad pa'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa/ gzhon sha
453b4(rgyud): chags shing 'jam pa/ nyi ma'i 'od zer bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/ 'od zer brgya phrag mang po kun tu 'phro ba/ dri ma med pa'i phyag gis li tsa byi de dag gi mgo la byugs te bslang nas rjes su bstan pa mdzad
453b5(rgyud): do/ nga ni khyed rnams nyid la rjes su brtse bas nye bar bslang nas/ bla na med pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyir dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir 'dir 'ongs kyis
453b6(rgyud): ma 'jigs shig/ ma 'jigs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po'i nang du gshegs nas/ nam gyi gung thun la sgo skyes kyi gzhi zhabs kyis mnan nas phyogs bzhir gzigs te/
453b7(rgyud): phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas na bza' bla gos bsigs te bka' stsal pa/ phyi ma'i dus na dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gang su'ang rung ba dag de bzhin gshes
454a1(rgyud): pa'i sku gdung ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la mchod pa byed pa de dag dang / stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las thar par byed pa'i chos
454a2(rgyud): kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing ston pa dang / kun
454a3(rgyud): chub par byed pa de dag la sems kyi nang dang / 'jigs pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / nang 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'ching ba dang / kha mchu dang / gshegs dang / tha na pra ma
454a4(rgyud): sdig pa mi dge ba'i sdug bsngal ba'i las kyis mi tshugs shing / 'tshe bar byed pa thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ mi mjed kyi bdag po
454a5(rgyud): tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las thar par bgyid pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ de bzhin
454a6(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya de gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mi mjed
454a7(rgyud): kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa de'i phyir khyod kyis shin tu legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// btsun pa de bzhin du bgyi
454b1(rgyud): zhes gsol nas/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi lhar mnyan pa dang / de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ung ya the dan/ a tsa le/ ma tsa le/ sA ra ma/
454b2(rgyud): tsa le/ pra kri ti/ bar+Ne/ pra kri ti/ niN+Do Sha/ sa maN+Da mu khe/ s+thi re/ swA ba re/ bi b+huN+Da shak+She/ pra ba la ne/ pA rang+ga me/ sA ra ba Ne/ sA rang+ga ba te/ ba le ma hA ba le/ ma hA ni d+ha se swAhA/ de la 'di ska ces bya/
454b3(rgyud): lus su gtogs pa dran pa dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / ting nge 'dzin gsum dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / bsam/
454b4(rgyud): gtan bzhi dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / rjes su dran pa drug dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / mthar
454b5(rgyud): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / rnam par grol ba'i skye mched bcu gcig dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis dang / rnam
454b6(rgyud): pa bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dang / dbugs dbyung ba dang rngub pa rjes su dran pa rnam pa bcu drug dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis te/
454b7(rgyud): tshangs pa de ni stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las thar par byed pa'i mdo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
455a1(rgyud): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya ste/ sangs rgyas sgrub pa'o// chos sgrub pa'o// dge 'dun sgrub pa'o// tshangs pa sgrub pa'o// dbang po sgrub pa'o//
455a2(rgyud): 'jig rten skyong ba sgrub pa'i// dbang phyug sgrub pa'o// bden pa sgrub pa'o// lam sgrub pa'o// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sgrub pa'o// zla ba sgrub pa'o// nyi ma sgrub pa'o// gza' sgrub pa'o// /
455a3(rgyud): skar sgrub pa'o// s+yAd ya tha dan/ sA le kaM si ni/ bi d+ha ra Ni/ bai ra gra sA re/ a maR+Sha Ne/ a mo g+ha ba ti/ se ba ne kA li/ naM kA li/ kA shAM ba r-i/ b+ha ra Ne/ ka ra ka/ sha khe/ sa man+ta prAp+ta/
455a4(rgyud): ra drA p+ta/ stam+b+ha prAp+te/ badz+ra d+ha re swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'jig rten 'di 'am gang dag 'das pa dang // mtho ris dag na rin chen
455a5(rgyud): mchog yod pa// de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi lhar gyur pa// mi yi mchog dang 'dir ni mtshungs pa med// de bas 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ zad pa chags
455a6(rgyud): bral bdud rtsi 'dus ma byas// shes pas shAkya thub des rab tu phye// bdud rtsi zhi bas 'dus byas ma yin pa// chos de dang ni mtshungs pa gang yang med// de bas 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden
455a7(rgyud): pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ mchog tu gang 'dod tshul bzhin rab bstan pa// ston pa'i rnal 'byor bla med rtag sgrub pa// rdo rje lta bu'i mi gnyis lam mthong ba// ting 'dzin de dang mnyam pa yod ma yin//
455b1(rgyud): de bas 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ gang zag chen po rab bsngags shing // gang zag zung bzhir brjod pa de dag ni// drang srong chen po gang zag mtshungs
455b2(rgyud): med pa// bde bar gshegs pas sbyin pa'i gnas zhes gsungs// de la sbyin na 'bras bu cher 'gyur te// zhing rab gshin la sa bon btab pa bzhin// 'di ni dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/
455b3(rgyud): bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ gang dag brtan pa'i yid kyis rab brtson zhing // go'u ta ma'i bstan la rab 'jug pa// de dag thob nas bdud rtsi 'jug thob ste// mun pa bsal nas mya
455b4(rgyud): ngan 'das thob pa// de bas dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ lta ba 'di la sbyar ma thag tu ni// 'jig tshogs lha dang tshul khrims brtul zhugs dang //
455b5(rgyud): the tsom dang ni nyon mongs gsum po dag/ cig car spangs te 'phags pa'i bden mthong ba// des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ lus sam ngag
455b6(rgyud): gam 'on te yid kyis kyang // sdig pa rnam gsum nam yang mi byed cing // blo bur byas na'ang 'chab par mi byed la// de ltar de dag lta bas 'dzin mi byed// de bas dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs//
455b7(rgyud): bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ ji ltar dbang po'i sdong po sar btsugs pa// phyogs bzhi'i rlung rnams kyis ni mi g.yo ltar// 'phags pa'i lam gyi dam pa mthong ba yi// gang zag 'phags pa'i
456a1(rgyud): dge 'dun de bzhin no// des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ shes rab zab mos shin tu bstan pa yi// 'phags pa'i bden pa
456a2(rgyud): su dag rnam sgom zhing // lus kyang sbyin par yid la byas pa ni// de dag 'jigs pa brgyad dang phrad mi 'gyur// de bas dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ ji ltar
456a3(rgyud): me ni rlung gis rab gtor ba// lag tu blangs te grang du med pa nyid// de ltar kun tu sbyor ba rab btang ba// sangs rgyas sras rnams bstan du med par 'gro// des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bdes
456a4(rgyud): de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba// de dag thams cad 'dir ni bder gyur cig/ ston mchog lha dang mis ni mchod 'os pa// sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal dang 'dir dge bar shog/
456a5(rgyud): sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba// de dag thams cad 'dir ni bder gyur cig/ zhi ba chags bral lha mis mchod 'os pa// chos la phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dge bar shog/ sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro/
456a6(rgyud): ba// de dag thams cad 'dir mi bder gyur cig/ tshogs kyi dam pa lha mis mchod 'os pa// dge 'dun phyag 'tshal reng 'dir dge bar shog/ sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba// de dag thams cad 'dir ni
456a7(rgyud): der gyur cig/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lpags gyur te// sa 'am 'on te bar snang 'khod pa dag/ skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog/ nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod par shog/ 'di na rgyal ba dgra rgyal
456b1(rgyud): bden gang gis// shin tu bden pa gsung zhing brdzun med pa// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ de kun 'jigs pa che las thar gyur cig swA hA/ s+yad ya the dan/ d+hi re bi d+hi re/ ba la nid+ho She/ ba la sA
456b2(rgyud): re/ sA ra ba te/ sU ti/ pra b+hU ta/ prAp+tA/ A ra d+he/ A ra b+ho She/ sA ra ba te/ a ts+tsha te/ ba la d+hA re/ shU ra prAp+te/ sA rang+ga me/ su 'ur+ya ba maM/ su 'ur+ya nid+d+ho She swA hA/ tshangs pa stong chen po rab tu
456b3(rgyud): 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las rab tu thar par byed pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sad rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis
456b4(rgyud): kyiphyag rgya'o// sangs rgyas kyi gnas so// chos kyi gnas so// dge 'dun gyi gnas so// tshangs pa'i gnas so// dbang po'i gnas so// 'jig rten skyong ba'i gnas so// dbang phyug gi gnas so// drang srong
456b5(rgyud): chen po'i gnas so// 'byung po'i gnas so// mig gi gnas so// rgyu'i gnas so// phyogs kyi gnas so// bstan po'i gnas so// sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o// nyan thos
456b6(rgyud): dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis reg pa'o// tshangs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'o// dbang pos rab tu bsngags pa'o// 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis mchod pa'o// dbang phyug gis phyag byas pa'o//
456b7(rgyud): thams cad kyis kun tu mchod pa'o// rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams kyis bsngags pa'o// mkhas pa rnams mngon par dga' bar gyur pa'o// drang srong rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pa'o// tshangs pa rnams
457a1(rgyud): kyis rab tu brgyan pa'o// lha rnams kyis mngon par bskyod pa'o// khrus byed pa rnams kyis bsangs pa'o// rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gyis dga' bar byas pa'o// sa/
457a2(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul lo// rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi skyed mos rgyal lo// drang srong rnams kyi gnas so// nyan thos rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'o// rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams kyi
457a3(rgyud): gnas so// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi 'byung gnas so// nyon mongs pa rnams 'joms pa'o// bag la nyal gyi zug rngu rnams 'byin pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam ku du ston pa'o// thar
457a4(rgyud): pa'i sgo rnams 'byed pa'o// 'jig tshogs la lta ba rnams 'jig par byed pa'o// nga rgyal gyi ri rab tu snyil bar byed pa'o// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho skems pa'o// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor lhung ba'i sems
457a5(rgyud): can thams cad sgrol ba'o// bdud kyi zhags pa gcod pa'o// bdud kyi 'khor skrag par byed pa'o// bdud kyi mchil pa 'dor ba'o// nyon mongs pa'i g.yul las sgrol ba'o// mya ngan las 'das
457a6(rgyud): pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par byed pa'o// 'khor ba'i khyim nas 'byung bar byed pa'o// smad mthe dan/ khan+te/ khan g+hoSh+Tha/ u sho d+ha ne/ sA ra thi/ pra b+he de/ bi pra la pra b+he/ sang kaR+Sha Ni/ bi kaR+Sha Ni/
457a7(rgyud): baM shwa gra ba ti/ shud+d+ha sA d+ha Ne/ ba ru Na ba te/ bA sa be/ bi bu'u Sha Ni/ bi Shang ga me/ pa shu pa ti/ puSh+pa gar+b+he/ sr-i s+yA sU swA hA/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang / nye bar 'tsha
457b1(rgyud): ba dang / ngal ba thams cad las bde legs su gyur cika swAhA/ stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las thar par byed pa'i mdo sde 'di ni/ de bzhin
457b2(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya ste/ 'dis ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten phyag
457b3(rgyud): rgyas btab ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer bla na med par zhugs so// de'i don gyi phyir ston par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas
457b4(rgyud): dang / nyan thos rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / pha ma dang / sbyin gnas dang / bla ma lta bu rnams la bsnyen
457b5(rgyud): bkur to// tshangs par spyod pa spyad do// tshul khrims bsrungs so// sbyin pa byin no// snying rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bskangs so// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsgrubs so// byang chub thob
457b6(rgyud): par bsgrubs so// thams cad mkhyen pa thob bo// bdud pham par byas so// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis skad
457b7(rgyud): gcig dang / blo gros gcig dang / dbyangs gcig gis/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa/ kye ma'o rig sngags rig sngags che// stong chen rab tu 'joms byed pa// sangs rgyas
458a1(rgyud): phyag rgya de yis ni// phyogs bzhi'i sems can thams cad srung // phyag rgya gang gis btab gyur na// 'byung po thams cad skrag bgyid pa// stong chen rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo//
458a2(rgyud): phyag rgya bdag cag sprul par bgyi// mi gang rab tu sdang ba dang // bstan pa 'di la ma dad pa// de dag tshangs pas sprul pa yi// rig sngags chad pas gcad par bgyi// brgya byin gyis ni spyi bos/
458a3(rgyud): blangs// 'jig rten skyong bas rgyas btab bo// s+yAd ya the dan/ ka leng+ge/ b+hA ra de/ dzA da gre/ dzA ma Ne/ sAM ha ma de/ sA rA gra prAp+te/ haM sa gA mi ni/ mA li ni/ hu le/ mi hu li bi hu li/ bi hu li/
458a4(rgyud): pi hu la me/ ha ha ma ha ha ma ha ha ma ha ha ma/ su'u da ni/ ba rA gra ba ti/ hasti ni/ ne tsa ra ma ti/ tsaN+DA li/ tsa ra me/ tsa ro tsa re swA hA/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba rig sngags kyi rgyal mo/
458a5(rgyud): 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ phyogs bzhi'i gnod sbyin dang / srin
458a6(rgyud): po 'byung po sha la za ba rnams kyis sgra skad drag po byung ba/ kye ma'o sdug bsngal/ kye ma'o brlag/ bdag cag 'byung po'i tshogs ni phung ngo // bdag cag 'byung po'i tshogs ni rab tu phung ngo // 'byung
458a7(rgyud): po'i tshogs ni rab tu phung / bdag cag rtag tu dbang gis khrid// srog chags 'byung po thams cad ni// de ring dgrar bcas dbang med do// de dag sa la 'khod nas ni// zhum zhing rnam par zhum gyur nas//
458b1(rgyud): 'gre zhing ldog par rab tu byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa gzhi rdo rjer mngon par sprul pa dang / de dag kyang phyogs bzhir byer ro// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis phyogs bzhir me lce'i phung po
458b2(rgyud): chen po bzhi mngon par sprul pa dang / de dag nam mkha' la kun tu rgyug go// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas nam mkha' lcags su mngon par sprul pa dang / de dag shing ta la bdun tsam
458b3(rgyud): nas nam mkha' la kun tu rgyug go// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis ral gri dang / mnga' dang / mdung thung dang / mdung dang / mnga' bo che dang / shing ljon pa dang / ri'i char mngon par phab bo// den
458b4(rgyud): tshe gnod sbyin lnga stong mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su kun nas 'dus pa rnams rig sngags kyi dmod pas bcom ste/ rims nad kyis btab nas myos te rmya zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
458b5(rgyud): la gtugs te gsol pa/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang thugs brtse ba can lags kyis/ dge sbyong go'u ta mas bdag cag bskyab tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
458b6(rgyud): gsang ba po de dag la byams pas khyab par mdzad nas bslab pa 'dzin du btsud do// bdag cag phyag rgya spong gyur na// ma gsod pa yi 'gro gang dang // pha gsod pa yi 'gro gang dang // dgra bcom pa yang gsod
458b7(rgyud): gang dang // dge 'dun dbyen bgyid 'gro gang dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas la sdang sems kyis// sku mtshal phyung ba bgyis pa yis// 'gro ba gang lags der mchi'o// ardza ka yi dog pa ltar// mgo ni tshal ba
459a1(rgyud): bdun 'gas shing // gnod sbyin nad kyis btab pa dang // bdag lus sha bkra 'byung bar shog/ gang 'di rgyal bas gsungs pa'i mdo// stong chen rab tu 'joms pa yi// rig sngag
459a2(rgyud): rgyal las 'gal bgyis na// bdag cag 'dod bzhin mi 'gyur ro// de'i tshe grong khyer chen po yangs pa can na yams kyi nang dang / 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa thams
459a3(rgyud): cad rgyun chad par gyur to// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyang rang rang gi spyod yul las 'das so// yangs pa can gyi li tsA byi rnams kyang nang rang gnod pa thams
459a4(rgyud): cad las grol te bde ba thams cad yang dag par 'phel nas/ sangs rgyas la mi phyed pa'i dad pa dang ldan par gyur/ chos la mi phyed pa'i dad pa dang ldan par gyur/ dge 'dun la mi
459a5(rgyud): phyed pa'i dad pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ rtag tu dkon mchog gsum mchod pa la mngon par dga' ba'i dga' ston chen pos gnas so// ngang pa dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug/
459a6(rgyud): dang / rma bya dang / ngur pa dang / kuN+Da la dang / shang shang te'u dang / bya'i tshogs rnams kyang sgra snyan pa 'byin no// mi 'am ci rnams ni lha'i bu mo bzhin du lus la gnod pa med do// rin po
459a7(rgyud): che'i cha byad rnams kyang ma dkrol bar 'khrol lo// rnga bo che dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / rnga bran dang / pi wang dang / gling bu rnams kyang ji ltar gnas su bkod pa bzhin du sgra byung ngo // bal po se'u dang /
459b1(rgyud): bil ba dang / skyu ru ra dang / n+ya gro d+ha dang / byang chub kyi shing dang / spre'u gnas dang / p+lag sha dang / u dum ba ra dang / sa la ta dang / ta ma la'i dang / ti la ka dang / tsam pa ka'i shing ljon pa rnams kyang
459b2(rgyud): dri rab tu 'byin to// lha brgya stong dag gis kyang a la la zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ste/ bar snang las me tog gi char mngon par phab bo// mi ma yin pa'i dri dag kyang 'jig rten du byung ngo // de nas rgyal po chen po
459b3(rgyud): bzhis thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gis bslab pa'i gzhi yongs su bzung ste gos ngur smrig dgos nas/ stong chen po rab tu
459b4(rgyud): 'joms pa'i mdo sde'i rgyal po gdon thams cad las thar par byed pa sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blangs shing bzung ste/ bklags shing bshad la/ kun chub par bgyis shing yi ger bris
459b5(rgyud): nas mdud pa bor te 'chang na/ de la yams kyi nang dang / 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nang 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / khrag khrug dang / 'thab mo dang / bcing ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa nas/ phra ma'i bar
459b6(rgyud): gyikyisdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur lags so// rnam par 'tshe ba thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur lags so// yul 'khor mtshams gcad par 'tshal ba/ khrus bgyis pa/ zas dkar gsum
459b7(rgyud): 'al ba/ mas da pa rnam lnga sangs pa/ po'i 'thab pa'i ga'i thams cad yongs su rung ba/ rnams ca sems cad la sems rnams pa/ tu rgyan pa/ gos dang rgyan dang ldan pa sa grong dang / grong kya
460a1(rgyud): grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / sum mdo dang / khyim rnams nyal nyil gyi phung po ma mchis par bgyis te/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi dbus kyi ngogs rnams su me tog sil ma bkram
460a2(rgyud): la/ spos sna tshogs kyis rab tu bdugs par bgyi'o// phyogs bzhir bu mo shin tu khrus bgyis pa/ brgyan pa lag na mtshon thogs pa bzhi dang / dril bu bzhi dang / rin po che'i snod dri'i chu dang / me tog dang / 'bras
460a3(rgyud): bus yongs su gang ba bzhi bzhag par bgyi'o// snga dro'i dus kyi tshe gdugs shar ba dang rig sngags bklag par bgyi ste/ mdo sde bzlas shing bklag par bgyi'o// yi ger bris te mchod rten chen po dang / shing ljon pa
460a4(rgyud): chen po dang / rgyal mtshan chen po'i rtse mo la bstod de btags la/ me tog sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dag gis dgung zla phyed kyi bar du mchod par bgyi'o// gdugs re zhing rig sngags lan re re bklag par bgyi'o//
460a5(rgyud): de ltar na yul 'khor yongs su thar bar 'gyur lags so// de ltar grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor dang / gnas dang / gtsug lag khang dang / lha'i khyim dang/
460a6(rgyud): zhing dang / las khang dang / shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu dang / ne'u sing dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / gnag lhas dang / phyugs lhas rnams nyal nyil ma mchis par bgyis te/ seng ldeng dang rgya shug gi zhugs bltam/
460a7(rgyud): lal/ dog sa la me tog sil ma bkram ste/ sgo khang g.yas g.yon nas dri sna tshogs kyis bdugs la/ sa bon thams cad mar gyis bskus te phyogs bzhir gtor bar bgyi'o// zhugs la yang gtor bar bgyi'o/
460b1(rgyud): chab sgor tshon skud sna tshogs bre bar bgyi'o// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa dag ni bton la slar yang gzud par bgyi'o// rig sngags kyang bklag par bgyi'o// yi ger bris sam mdud pa mdud de mthon
460b2(rgyud): po'i khar btags la mchod par bgyi'o// nang pa'i mdun du sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs sam/ sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel lam/ tshangs pa'i gzugs sam/ brgya byin gyi gzugs sam/ rgyal po chen po
460b3(rgyud): bzhi'i gzugs khri'u 'am za ma tog gi steng du bzhag ste/ phyag rgya bzhi bgyis la gzhag par bgyi'o// me tog sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs kyis tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang
460b4(rgyud): rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon dang / gnod sbyin stobs po che dang / 'phrog ma bu la sogs pa'i ming gis dkon mchog gsum la mchod par bgyi'o// de rnam
460b5(rgyud): kyi stobs dang / dbang phyug dang / byin gyis bdag dge bar gyur cig/ bdag la srung ba gyis shig/ nad thams cad dang gdon thams cad las thar par gyur cig/ nang pa'i zas dang / skom dang / sman
460b6(rgyud): rnams kyang rig sngags 'dis btab ste stsal bar bgyi'o// rdzogs sangs rnam par sangs rgyas tshe// 'jig rten skyong bas phyogs bzhi nas// snod bzhi dag ni blangs nas su// bde bar gshegs la phul ba/
460b7(rgyud): dang // mthu yis gcig tu sprul mdzad pa// lha yi sdong mchog de dang ni// bdud rtsi 'dra ba'i sman gyi rnams// ston po'i phyag na bsdams gyur pa// bden pa'i tshig ni de dag gis// sman rnams bdud rtsir gyur
461a1(rgyud): par shog/ de bzhir lha mo 'phrog ma yis// lha rdzas dge ba a ru ra// blangs nas ston la rab phul ga/ bdud rtsi 'dra ba'i sman gyi rnams// bden pa'i tshig ni de dag gis/
461a2(rgyud): nang ba rnams kyi nang sel cing // nyes pa thams cad 'phrog byed pa// sman rnams bdud rtsir gyur par shog/ sangs rgyas rnam gzigs gzi brjid dang // gtsug tor can gyi stobs rnams dang // thams cad
461a3(rgyud): skyob kyi bden tshig dang // log dang sel gyi ting 'dzin dang // gser zhes bya ba'i ye shes dang // 'od srungs kyi ni rdzu 'phrul dang // shAkya seng ge'i mthu rnams kyis// sman rnams bdud rtsir gyur par shog/
461a4(rgyud): nad pa shar phyogs kha bstan pa// sman rnams nye bar stsal bar bgyi// de yi tshe na rig sngags 'di// lag mthil bzhag ste bklag par bgyi// s+yAd ya the dan/ kha Te kha Ta/ bi kha Te/ tsa le/ bi tsa le
461a5(rgyud): bi tsa le/ bi ma le/ bi la~M be/ ba la ba te/ tsan+d+he/ tsa ra Ne/ a mr-i ta na d+ho She swA hA/ rlung las gyur dang mkhris las gyur// bad kun las gyur 'dus las gyur// nang rnams thams cad rab bcom ste/
461a6(rgyud): babadag la rtag tu dge bar shog byang snyems dang ro langs dang ldan pa'i las rnams la skyes pa 'am/ bud med gdugs zhag gcig sbyang bar bgyis pa/ rab tu khrus bgyis pa/ shin tu brgyan pa des
461a7(rgyud): dogs la me tog sil ma bkram ste/ spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs la/ seng ldeng dang rgya shug rigs gnyis kyi zhugs bus te/ sa bor thams cad phyogs bzhir gtor bar bgyi'o// zugs kyi nang
461b1(rgyud): sa la ma mas kyang dang matog pams par cho srung sa tshogs la brgyas teras bri'am mdung rje gsus bu la/ ma yA mnga' la gdags par bgro'o/ sa
461b2(rgyud): ba tu rdzogs smra drum pa man po'i rang du thugs la/ gang byang sems kyis phog pa'i spang ba de bcings te bus pa'i chab kyis bkru bar bgyi'o// srung ba yang ral bris bzung de grags kyi
461b3(rgyud): rang du dor ro// stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di'ang brjod par bgyi'o// gang dag sangs rgyas 'ang sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos dang // tshangs dbang dang ni 'jig rten skyong /
461b4(rgyud): gnod sbyin sde dpon dbang phyug dang // de bzhin gnod sbyin stobs chen dang // 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa dang // de dag mthu dang gzi brjid kyis// ro langs las rnams chang gyur cig/ rdo rjes rin chen/
461b5(rgyud): phug pa dang // me yis bud shing sreg pa dang // rlung gis sprin ni 'thor ba dang // nyi mas nags tshal skems byed pa// bden pa'i tshig ni de dag gis// byang stems las rnams tshig par shog/ spos
461b6(rgyud): dang me tog sna tshogs kyis// sdig pa thams cad nges par sel// tad+ya thA/ hu me hu me/ ke kha li/ kha ra li/ dzu hA ni/ dza ba le/ ga ra ge/ ha ri Ni/ shA ba ri/ shAn+ti/ pra shAn+ti swA hA/ d+hU ba ni
461b7(rgyud): sAhA/ tha d+hU ba ni sAhA/ gam d+harbe sAhA/ pa lang ga ni swAhA/ sarba kA khor da kA ta be tA Da tshe d+ha nI sA hA/ lha thams cad kyi gsang sngags 'di dag gis bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi byang stem
462a1(rgyud): dang / ro langs dang / sman dang / sngags dang drug dang / dug sbyar ma rnams bcad do// ba shig go// pham par byas so// pha rol pam par byas so// sAd+ha/ lnga ba nga
462a2(rgyud): gu ba dang / spyo ba dang / 'bras dang / 'brum bu dang / kom po dang dug 'thungs pa las thar par 'tshal ba shin tu khrus bgyis pa/ shin tu brgyan pa stan bzang po'i steng du mchis te rig
462a3(rgyud): sngags 'di brjod par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid dang // rang rgyal dag gi gzi brjid dang // dgra bcom dag gi mthu dag dang // gsang sngags 'dzin pa thams cad dang // shA ri'i bu yi shes
462a4(rgyud): rab dang // mo'u 'gal bu yi rdzu 'phrul dang // ma 'gags pa yi mig dang ni// 'od srungs sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang // ko'u di n+ya'i sngar thob dang // kun dga' bo yi thos pa dang // tshangs pa yi ni byams
462a5(rgyud): pa dang // brgya byin gyi ni dbang rnams dang // 'jig rten skyong ba'i yul rnams dang // dbang phyug chen po'i stobs dag dang // sde dpon rnams kyi mthu dag dang // 'phrog ma'i gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul dang //
462a6(rgyud): de dag rnams kyi mthu dang gzis// bdag gi dug ni drug med shog/ dug meng drug rnams 'jil byed pa// gsang sngags gzhi rnams de lags so// s+yAng ya the dan/ ha ri ke shi ka ni ki li/ re hi ra/ a
462a7(rgyud): ma re/ aN+Da re/ paN+Da re/ ka Ta ke/ ke yu'u re/ ha se ha se ha se/ kha saM kha se kha se/ ma ru ga ha ne swA hA/ mu mukra sAhA/ hi le swA hA/ mi li swA hA/ 'bras dang rma dpa shu ba dang // g.yan pa dang ni
462b1(rgyud): 'jam bu dang / rnyog pa dang ni gsa' ba ni bdun pa lags te rab tu bcom/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/ bcom ldan spangs rgyas drug myi mngal
462b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas gzi sras dug bcom mo// 'dod chags ge sdang gti drug rnams// de dag 'jig rten dug gsum sa// bcom ldan chos ni dug mi mang gachos kyi gzi yis drug btsam mo// 'dod
462b3(rgyud): chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste// bcom ldan dge 'dun dug mi mnga'// dge 'dun gzi yis dug bcom mo// sa ni dug gi ma yin te// sa ni dug gi pha
462b4(rgyud): yang yin// bden pa'i bden tshig de dag gis// bdag gi dug ni dug med shog/ dug ni sa yi nang du song // gang ba'i snod du dug song zhig swA hA/ de nas khrag khrug dang / 'thab pa dang
462b5(rgyud): rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dgra rnams las rgyal bar 'tshal bas/ thog mar mchod rten chen po la mchod par bgyi'o// stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i rig
462b6(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di yang brjod par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyis ni bdud pham mdzad// chos ma yin ni chos kyis so// dge 'dun gyis ni mu stegs pam// dbang pos lha min pham par gyur/
462b7(rgyud): lha min rnams kyis zla ba pam// nam mkha' lding gis rgya mtsho'o// me yis shing rnams pham par gyur// chus ni me yang pham par gyur// rlung gis sprin rnams rab tu pham// rdo rje yis ni rin cher drug
463a1(rgyud): lnga rnams bden par rab tu gsungs// sa yang bden par gnas pa lags// sangs rgyas dang ni chos kyang bden// bden pa rgyal gyur rdzun ma lags// s+yAd ya the dan a
463a2(rgyud): mAM te/ a pra puSh+Te/ ba hu pha le/ ni bA ra Ni/ sarba ar+tha sa d+ha Ne/ a ba rA dzi te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra Ni/ gu h+ya ba te/ go ta me/ gub+ta ma te/ dzam+b+ha ni sA hA/ pra dzab+ta ni swA hA/ ba la pra b+hany+dza ni sAhA/ dza ye sAhA/
463a3(rgyud): bi dza ye swA hA/ dza ya bi dza ye swA hA/ phyir rgol ba ni kun las rgyal// sdig pa thams cad rab tu pham swA hA/ de nas ston pa kun mkhyen gyis// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs// mi 'khrugs pa/
463a4(rgyud): dang snang mdzad spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // rin chen 'od 'phro ri rab mu khyud 'od dpag med// rdo rje rnams kyi mtshan rnams rtag tu bzung na ni// 'jigs par 'gyur ba ma yin gnod par mi 'gyur//
463a5(rgyud): rol grang gis mthu stobs chen po brgyad po 'di dag gi/ mtshan rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir ni rab brjod cing // kun tu bskyab pa byas na de yi lus la ni// me dang dug dang mtshon gyis tshugs
463a6(rgyud): par mi 'gyur ro// gal te de la gnod pa byed pa nye bar gnas// gshed mas mtshon rnams kyis ni gdab par gzas pa las// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po rjes su dran na ni// mtshon cha de dag dum
463a7(rgyud): du dum dur 'chag cing 'brul// gal te mtshon cha rnams ni thogs par gyur na yang // lag pa chag nas sa la rab tu ltung bar 'gyur// de yi lus la cung zad 'bab par mi 'gyur te// sngan chang las byas/
463b1(rgyud): gang yin pa ni ma gtogs so// lha rnams kyis mthun par tshigs su bcang pa 'di dag gsol to// sangs rgyas spyong yul mtha' yas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bden par rab stor thub pa ljod lnga/
463b2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// deng ni bden pa rnams la gnas nas mchi bar bgyi// bdag dang sems can rnams ni thams cad kyi// las rnams thams cad 'bras bur bcas byar cig/ de nas tshangs pa tshangs chen gyis
463b3(rgyud): langs te thal mo sbyar btud nas// stong chen rab tu 'joms byed pa// legs par gsungs pa'i rig sngags 'di// byis pa rnams la phan bgyid pa// rig sngags bdag gis brjod par bgyi// gang gis dang /
463b4(rgyud): bor 'dzam gling du// rig sngags rab tu ston mdzad pa// chos kyi rgyal por snang mdzad pa// sangs rgyas dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// khyad par 'phags pa'i chos rnams dang // tshogs kyi dam pa dge 'dun
463b5(rgyud): dang // sangs rgyas zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas// tshangs pas 'di skad tshig gsol to// gang dag sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas kyi ni nyan thos dang // drang srong dang ni 'jig rten skyong /
463b6(rgyud): rnams ji snyed mchis pa dag/ de kun mi yi 'jig rten ni// 'di las skyes pa sha stag go// thub chen mngal na 'tshal ba yi// gnod sbyin srin po 'di na mchis// rgyal po rnams kyis mthong mi nus/
463b7(rgyud): bstan par yang ni mi nus so// gang la bu ni mi 'chags dang // gang gi mngal na mi gnas dang // skyes pa bud med 'du ba na// dbang po rnams ni myos par bgyid// mer mer po dang nur nur po/ khu yis
464a1(rgyud): bor ma rung babyed/ gang yang mngal ni thur du gyur/ sham mi 'byung gnod bgyid pa/ de rnams kyi ni ming brjod kyis/ 'jig rten mgon po bdag la gsor// 'jam pa po dang /
464a2(rgyud): ri dgas rgyal// skem byed parjed byed khu tshur cam / ma mo dang ni d+ha mi ka~M/ 'dod pa can dang nam gru dang // srul po dang ni ma dga' byed// bya dang gnya' ba'i lag can dang // bzhin rgyan dang ni mig 'byung
464a3(rgyud): ba/ de dag thams cad sa la rgyu// gdon rnams bco lnga de dag ni// byis pa rnams la 'jigs par bgyid// ji ltar byis pa 'dzin pa yi// mtshan ma gzugs kyang brjod par bgyi// 'jam pa pos ni zin/
464a4(rgyud): gyur na// mig ni rab tu 'gyur bar bgyid// ri dgas rgyal gyis zin gyur na// skyugs pa mi bzang skyug par 'gyur// skem byed kyis ni zin gyur na// skem byed pas ni byis pa 'phrul// brjed byed kyis ni
464a5(rgyud): zin gyur na// 'gre zhing de ltar sgra yang 'byin// dbu ba dang ni kha chu 'dzag/ khu tshur can gyis rab zin na// khu tshur 'chang zhing byed par bgyid// ma mo yis ni zin gyur na// rgod cing de bzhin sgra yang 'byin//
464a6(rgyud): dzA mi kas ni rab zin na// nu zho nu bar mngon mi dga'// 'dod pa can gyis rab zin na// mal na gnyid log ngu bar 'gyur// nam grus rab tu zin gyur na// lce la sogs ni 'cha' bar bgyid// srul pos
464a7(rgyud): rab tu zin gyur na// ku co 'don cing sgra yang 'byin// ma dga' byed pas zin gyur na// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs su 'gyur// bya yis rab tu zin gyur na// mnam pa'i dri ni 'byung bar 'gyur// gnya'
464b1(rgyud): lag car gyis zir gyur na// mgul ba rab tu 'gag par 'gyur// bzhin rgyar gyis ni zir gyur na// rims kyis btab cing 'khru bar 'gyur// mig 'phyang bas ri zir gyur ra// skyigs bu dang na
464b2(rgyud): ma pa 'byung // byis pa ji ltar skrag bgyid pa// de yi gzugs ni brjod par bgyid// 'jam pa po ni ba lang gzugs// ri dgas rgyal po ri dgras 'dra// sem byed pa ni gzhon nu'i gzugs
464b3(rgyud): brjed byed pa ni wa 'dra'o// khu tshur can ni bya rog gzugs// ma mo de ni ra yi gzugs// dzA mi ka ni rta yi gzugs// 'dod pa can ni rdo rje'i gzugs// nam gru khyi yi gzugs kyis te//
464b4(rgyud): srul po phag gi gzugs kyis so// ma dga' byed pa byi la'i gzugs// bya ni 'dab chags gzugs kyis so// gnya' lag can ni bya gag gzugs// bzhin rgyar 'ug pa'i gzugs su ste// mig 'phyang
464b5(rgyud): ba ni pa wang gzugs// 'di dag byis pa skrag par bgyi// 'dri dag bu 'phrog ma rungs pa// byis pa rnams la 'jigs bgyid pa// mdo sde'i zhags pas drangs nas ni// 'di dag shin tu dgug par bgyid
464b6(rgyud): gnod sbyin sde dpon chen po ni// dri za tsan+da dan zhes bgyi bas// yi ge phyag rgya de sAl de// song la gdon ni drag po pa// bco lnga de dag khug cig ces/ kho ny+dzar yang ni gtang bar bgyid/ de dag rnams ni skad
464b7(rgyud): cig gos// bcing ba lnga yis bcing bzhin dkug/ de nas 'jig rten mgor po la/ tshangs chen thal sbyar 'di skad gsol// srog chags sa bor 'jig bgyid pa// 'byung po 'di dag rnams lpags te/ mngon/
465a1(rgyud): po si ni s+yA sA ru// 'di dag chad pa bshad par bgyid// khung med gang dag bu mi 'tshal// gang zhig btsas pa 'dzir 'tshal bas// chos brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la/ bslab bzung /
465a2(rgyud): dam chos skyabs mchis la// mchod rten legs par mchod par bgyi// khrus bgyis shin tu brgyan nas ni/ sa gzhir yungs kar gtor nas su// me tog spos kyis brgyan par bgyi// sna lnga'i tshon gyi spus
465a3(rgyud): bas ni// khor yug tu ni bskor bar bgyi// nas phyeng bar du mchis nas ni// spyi bor yungs kar bzhag nas su// tshangs pas rab tu byas pa ste// tshangs pas sprul ces brjod par bgyi// lo grangs bcu gnyis
465a4(rgyud): bar du mi// gzhon nu rnams la phan bgyid pa// tshangs pas sprul pa'i mdo sde yis// rig sngags 'di las gang 'da' ba/ ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin// mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas// s+yAd ya the dam/ aM
465a5(rgyud): ge baM ge b+haM ge b+ha ba ne/ i nan+di khi nan di/ mU la di/ gi ri gai ba ri/ ga ru Ni/ sha ru Ni/ gi ri gai ba ro/ lo tsa ne/ ro Sha Ne/ ro tsa ne/ la sa ni/ a la b+he/ aM ga ne/ a la pe ta la phe ta la pe/ pra kaR+Sha Ni/
465a6(rgyud): swAhA/ mngal na bde bar gnas gyur cig/ dbang po yang dag 'phel bar shog/ mngal na 'dug pa bder gyur cig/ btsas pa 'jig par ma gyur cig/ mngal na bde bar gnas gyur cig/ dus bzhin du ni 'byung
465a7(rgyud): pabar shog/ tshon srung sna tshogs rnams dang ni// yungs kar 'bru ni ma grugs pa// de dag srung bar gsungs pa ste// byis pa ring du 'tsho bar shog/ de nas ston pa kun mkhyer gyis// rig pa'i sngags ni 'di dag gsu
465b1(rgyud): mngal sa jug pa srung bar gos/ byis pa rnams ni bder gyur cig pasmang la b+he dang/ rnga rdzang rje ma hA nga d+hi khod+ha a num te/ pa yi ni/ datu pa le shi shi sa rab te sa ga le/ duras de/ kAr thA /
465b2(rgyud): teng gyur ba te/ theg b+hag thug b+ha ga nin par mi swA hA/ de nas gdon ni bco lnga po chab tu khrag la 'thung rnams kyis/ 'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad gsol khrong
465b3(rgyud): ngam khyer mam grong khyer ram// gang na legs par gsungs pa yi// mdo sde 'di ni bzhugs pa der// byis pa rnams ni 'chi mi 'gyur// thub chen khyod ni ji bzhin du// rjes su mthun par 'jug par bgyi/
465b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ grub par gyur cig/ rig sngags kyis sgrol bar gyur cig/ tshangs
465b5(rgyud): pas bsam par gyur cig swA hA/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcog
465b6(rgyud): ldan 'das nyan thos gang la la stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ ston tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par bgyid pa des mang du thos pa la brtson par bgyi'o// mchod rten
465b7(rgyud): mchod pa la brtson par bgyi'o// ches brgyad dang / bcu pa'i dang / bco lnga'i dus su mchor rter la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis nas rig sngags bklag par bgyi'o// ches brgyad kyi tshe'i rgyal po cher po bzhim
466a1(rgyud): skyes bu dag rgyal po cher po rnams kyi mdun ma de la sems par bgyid/ ming nas kyang 'don par bgyid do// tshes bcu bzhi'i tshe ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag nyid mdun na sems par/
466a2(rgyud): bgyid/ ming nas kyang 'don par bgyid do// tshes bco lnga'i tshe ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag nyid mdun na sems par bgyid cing ming nas kyang gdon par bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos gang sto
466a3(rgyud): chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di len pa dang / 'chang ba dang / ston pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa de ni srog chags 'byung po thams cad la snying brtse zhing phan 'dogs par bgyid
466a4(rgyud): lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang de la gos dang zas dang ma la cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis mi bral bar bgyi'o//
466a5(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyis kyang bsti stang bgyid par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang blon po dag gis kyang bla mar bgyi ba dang / rim gror bgyi ba dang / mchod par bgyid par 'gyur ro// gzhan mu stegs can dang /
466a6(rgyud): dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / spyod pa can dang / kun tu rgyu dang / mdza' ba dang / mi mdza' ba dag gi nang du mchis kyang mchod par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dang pa des gtsang mar bgyis/
466a7(rgyud): te/ lus gtsang ba dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / mal tshe dang / stan dang / yo byad khyad par can gtsang mar bgyi/ yul ngan pa rnyed par mi bgyi/ yul ngan pa'i mdza' bo dang bsten par mi dgyi/ yul ngar bar/
466b1(rgyud): gangs pa la bsngags par mi bgyi'o// gang 'byung po'i gdon gyis zin pa'i mdun du stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di dran par gyur na/ de la rgyal po chen po bzhi po nyid srung ba dang / sbyong ba dang /
466b2(rgyud): sbeng bar bgying par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar na stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di mthu che ste/ gang gis rang gi khyim du mtshan gcig gam nyin gcig kyang rung / yang dag
466b3(rgyud): par bsams na/ de la lo gcig gi bar du mi ma lags pas glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis phyag bgyi ba'i 'os su 'gyur ba lags so// gang stong chen po rab tu 'joms/
466b4(rgyud): ba'i mdo sde 'di 'chang ba de 'tshal na/ rgyal po chen po bzhi yang bzhin ston par 'gyur na/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / phal pa gzhan lta spos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can rnams
466b5(rgyud): la sman pa'i slad du 'jig rten la gang su dag rig sngags bgyid pa de dag pas/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag rab mchog/ gtso bo khyad par du 'phags pa/ dam pa zab pa/ rgya che ba/ tshad ma mchis pa
466b6(rgyud): 'jug par dka' ba thun mong ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ 'di ni chos kyi phyag rgya lags so// de nas dbang po mig stong po// lha yi rgyal po bde sogs bdag/ thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas// 'jig rten
466b7(rgyud): mgon la 'di skad gsol// 'jig rten kun la phan bgyid pa// rig sngags 'od ni legs par gsungs// gsang sngags sman dang ldan pa yi// rig sngags bdag gis brjod par bgyi// shir sha me tog a
467a1(rgyud): ba man dang // kata ka yi 'bras bu a ka rba// ro drug dang ni sa btsod rnams dang bsra ka ri dang rdul man thi/ kha'i ba la sa ra bi dang // sa ma ka dang bus rgya smos dang2/
467a2(rgyud): dang sa btaka ru d+ha dang // snga mo lo la ka dz+nyA bar dang / bri yang ku dang 'dug sug sprin bcung dang // sungs kar dag dang khrod ngos rnams dang ni// shings bu dag gur kus shing kun dang khakhos dag dang
467a3(rgyud): ldan pa'i brda kade dag sbyar te reng bur bgyis pa ni// gdon rnams kun las grol bar bgyid pa ste// 'byung po dag ni kun gyi 'gyur ba la// mig la de yis bsdus pa bgyid na ni// nges ra 'byung po'i rdo
467a4(rgyud): dang kha gnam khrugs mnga' yis zin las thar// ljon shing che dang de bzhin du// mchod rten che la bskus bgyis na// gang gis gnas de mthong ba de// 'byung po la ni 'jigs ma mchis// der ni 'byung po mi
467a5(rgyud): gnas te// gnod byed gzhan yang ma lags so// rnga chen dung dang rdza rnga dang // rnga bran dag la'ang bskus na ni// de dag sgra ni gar grags par// 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor skrag par 'gyur// grong du rgyu ba'i bya rnams kyi/
467a6(rgyud): 'dab ma dag la bskus na ni// yul dang phyogs ni gzhan dag tu// bya de gang du mchis pa der// 'byung po rnams ni mi gnas te// gnod byed gzhan yang ma lags so// chu mig mtsho dang lteng ka 'am// gang
467a7(rgyud): rang gang du dor yang rung // der ni dpag tshad khor yug tu// bde ba dang ni lci bar 'gyur// pha rol dmag tshogs nang mchis te// mtshon cha dag ni 'bab pa na// gnas rnams kun tu byugs bgyis na// bde brag tu ni
467b1(rgyud): thar bar 'gyur/ lba ba dang ri gakang rang dang / me pal dang ni 'bras byung dang / gdug pas zim dang dug 'thungs pas/ 'thungs sam byugs mthar bar 'gyur/ lus la de yis blags na mi khyad/
467b2(rgyud): snyoms thams cad gcod par bgyid// rtsod pa rnams las thar par 'gyur// rgyal po'i gyong las thar par 'gyur// ma grub pa yang grub par 'gyur// dbul po las ni phyug por 'gyur// bu ma mchis
467b3(rgyud): pa bu rnyer 'gyur// nor ma mchis pa nor rnyed 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang gnas bar du yang // 'dis ni gsang sngags grub par bgyid// dud 'gro'i skye gnas gyur pa dang // ljon shing rnams kyi 'bras
467b4(rgyud): bu dang // rig sngags 'chang ba thob la yang // 'di ni zhi ba'i las dge byed// 'di la gsang sngags tshig mchis te// dper na dbang po'i tshig bzhin no// s+yad ya the dan/ a kra me/ bi kra me b+hu ta/
467b5(rgyud): g+ho She b+hU taM ga ma da ha ni/ d+ha d+ha re/ d+ha ra d+ha re/ da d+hi ni/ ni khu me/ kha kha me/ kha kha kha kha/ sA raM ga me/ tsan+de/ tsa pa le/ ha li me/ ha le/ hA ri Ne swA hA/ bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa dang
467b6(rgyud): sems can thams cad phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad du dge legs su gyur cig swA hA/ sdig pa thams cad zhi bar gyur cig swA hA/ de nas tshangs pa dbang po dang // 'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug/
467b7(rgyud): tshig gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang // 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa yang // thal mo dag ni rab sbyar nas// sgra skad gcig tu 'di skad gsol// nyi ma stong lhar gsal ba po// zla ba nya ltar 'od gsal ba/

468a5(rgyud): zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ sngon cig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ de ltar lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur ro// dge/
468a6(rgyud): slong dag nga'i dge slong gang la la zhig gis stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'dis shing skal po la srud pas bcings na/ de la lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams skye bar 'gyur na/
468a7(rgyud): rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus la lha spos kyang si dgos te/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa 'i ma gtogs so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong de dag/

468b6(rgyud): ba'i phyir chongs shig/ des bsod snyoms len pa'i tshe zas la mi mthun pa med pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// zas rnam pa lnga dang 'dres pa'i bsod snyoms la yang zas rnam pa lnga dang la 'dres
468b7(rgyud): mo snyam pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya/ 'dus byas thams cad la mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / mi rtag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal ba la bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag med pa/
469a1(rgyud): la dge ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// zas rnam pa lnga po dag ga la yod/ zas rnam pa lnga po su'i yin/ su zhig zas rnam pa lnga po za/ sems can med do// sems can ga la yod/

469a7(rgyud): dang // gtsug tor can dang kun skyob dang // log par dad pa sel ba la// stobs chen lha gang dang pa dang // gse dang dpal lda 'od srungs dang // shAkya yi ni seng ga la// rab dang lha yi dbang po dang /
469b1(rgyud): dbang sum bu'i dbang phyug dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag dang / nor bu bzang rang dbang phyug me/ srin mo nag mo chen mo dang / de bzhir gdol ma gtum mo dag/ me tog dang mi bdug pa dang / gdag

469b7(rgyud): sel dang // gser thub 'od srungs shAkya thub pa go'u tam// bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba la skyabs su mchi bar bgyi// mi mchog bdun po de dag gi ni sku rnams la// me tog dag dang spos rnams kyis ni
470a1(rgyud): mthong bar bgyi// smras ngag ming gsus rab tu rang ba'i sems kyis ni/ nga dag rnams la skyangs su che bar mchi bar bgyi / sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul tshe dang ldan pa de dag pa/
470a2(rgyud): lha gang mngon par rab tu dang ba yod pa so// lha de mgu zhing yang ni rab tu dga' gyur nas// rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis bdag la srung du gsol// bdag dang sems can thams cad dge legs
470a3(rgyud): gyur cig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa stong chen po rab tu/
470a4(rgyud): 'joms pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// slar yang rgyang pa la gtugs nas dag par byas so// rgya gar skad du/
470a5(rgyud): ma hA mA yA rI bing+ga rA dzI/ bod skad du/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs
470a6(rgyud): rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// mgon po yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gro ba rnams la rab mchog rgya cher brtse ba grangs bdun po// khros shing ma rungs klu yi dbang po zad par 'byin byed dug
470a7(rgyud): rnams gnon pa rab tu grol ba'i sku// gang gi mthu las sna tshogs nang la sogs pa dgra yi so sor 'jigs pa ma lus 'joms byed pa// rma bya chen mo rgyun du yon tan tshogs rnams 'byin byed de la bdag/
470b1(rgyud): rinus pas phyag 'tshal lo / lha mo shi ba gsos byed ma/ gdug pa'i sems can zlog byed ma// rig sngags rgyal mo rma bya ni/ bdag nyid tshol bdag phyag 'tshal/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo / cos/
470b2(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas po bdun po dag la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag
470b3(rgyud): 'tshal lo// byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyun du
470b4(rgyud): zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten na yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen/
470b5(rgyud): mo 'di la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag la rig sngags 'di grub par gyur cig/ 'byung po'i tshogs gang su dag sa la rgyu ba rnams dang / nam mkha' la rgyu ba rnams dang / chu la rgyu ba rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams
470b6(rgyud): dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / yi dgas rnam
470b7(rgyud): dang / sha ba rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / grul bum rnams dang / srul po rnams dang / lus srul po rnams dang / skem byed rnams dang / smyo byed rnams dang / grib gnon rnams dang / brjed byed rnams
471a1(rgyud): dang / gnon po rnams bdag la nyon cigs 'byung po'i tshogs gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su mngal za ba rnams dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang / bas su zhag za ba nas/
471a2(rgyud): dang / zas su gshaza ba rnams dang / zas su tshil za ba rnams dang / zas su rkang za ba rnams rang gzas su bcas pa za ba rnams dang / srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su gtor ma za ba rnams dang / zas
471a3(rgyud): su 'phreng ba za ba rnams dang / zas su dri za ba rnams dang zas su bdug pa za ba rnams dang / zas su me tog za ba rnams dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba rnams dang / zas su lo tog za ba rnams dang / zas su sbyin
471a4(rgyud): sreg za ba rnams dang / zas su rnag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su phyis za ba rnams dang / zas su gci 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su lhag ma za ba rnams dang / zas su mchil ma za ba rnams dang / zas su
471a5(rgyud): ngar snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su skabs za ba rnams dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / zas su skyugs pa za ba rnams dang / zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang / sdig pa'i sems dpa
471a6(rgyud): ldan pa rnams dang / spang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drug shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / gzhar gyi srog 'phrog pa rnams bdag la nyon cig dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo ma byachen mo 'di
471a7(rgyud): brjod par bya'o// spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / gtor ma'ang sbyin no// bangag la sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / spang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul gyi sems da
471b1(rgyud): snyan pa rnams dang / gzhan gyi srog 'jog pa rnams dang / bas su mdang za ba'i gdon thams cad ni rings shig/ zhi ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / das
471b2(rgyud): ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams ni bdag la nyon cig/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dang pa rnams bdag la nyon cig 'di lta ste/ nag mo bzhin sbyar ma/ khrul dul ma dung can pa
471b3(rgyud): me tog ka ma la lta bu'i mig can/ 'phrog ma/ skra mdog ljang ku ma/ dpal ldan ma/ spre'u ltar dmar ser ma/ 'phyang ma/ rab tu 'phyang ma/ dus kyi zhags pa can ma bum lho ma/ gshin rje'i pho nya mo
471b4(rgyud): gshin rje'i sring mo/ 'byung po za ba mo/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / gtor ma 'di dbul gyis bzhes shig/ 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams cad las bdag dang sems can thams cad la
471b5(rgyud): bsrung du gsol/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ bdag la rig sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'dangs /
471b6(rgyud): mnyam yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe mnyan yod na rgyal bu
471b7(rgyud): rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong sa ri zhes bya ba gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho la bab pa/ rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pa/ chos
472a1(rgyud): 'dul ba 'dir 'ongs nas/ ring po ma lon pa zhig gnas pa de dge 'dun gyi sro gang bya ba'i phyir shing bshags pa dang / shing rul pa'i ser ga zhig nas sbrul nag po che
472a2(rgyud): zhig byung nas rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong la zin pa dang / lus snying nas sa la 'gyel te smra bar sprug cing mig kyang gyur nas nyal ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong sa'i rad kyis btab ce/
472a3(rgyud): sdug bsngal zhing nang tshabs che nas sa la 'gyel te lbu bar skrag cing mig kyang gyur nas nyal zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/
472a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom
472a5(rgyud): ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi chal mgon med zas spyir gyi kun dga' ra ba 'di na dge slong sa ri zhes bgyi ba gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho la bab pa/ rab tu byung nas ring po ma lags pa/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas
472a6(rgyud): ring po ma lags pa/ chos 'dul ba 'dir mchis nas ring por ma lags pa zhig gnas pa de dge 'dun gyi sro gang bgyi ba'i slad du shing bshags pa dang / shing rul pa'i ser gzhig nas sbrul rag po chen po zhig byung /
472a7(rgyud): nas rkang pa g.yas pa'i the bong la zin pa dang / lus spring nas dog sa la 'gyel te lbu bar sdug cing rig kyang gyur ras nyal zhing mchis ra/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis ji ltar nan tan du bgyi/ de skad ces
472b1(rgyud): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' zo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ klu dga' bor bzhin gshegs pa'i bkas khyod song la/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis lha'i da /
472b2(rgyud): gdu ga dang / mam med kyi gdon dang / drang gA'i gdon dang / rnamamakha' lding gi gang dang / dri ba'i gdon dang / mi 'am che'i gdod dang / so 'gyu cher pa'i gang dang / gnang byed kyi gdo dang / ma
472b3(rgyud): gdon dang / yi rags kyi gdor dang / sha za'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / grul dum gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang / lus srul po'i gdon dang / skem byed kyi gdon dang / smyo byed kyi gdon dang / grib gnor gyi gdo

473b6(rgyud): be lA yA/ bA ri be lA yA/ lhas kun tu char pob cig/ i li ki si swAhA/ nga ni yul 'khor srung la byams// sa srung bu la'ang nga byams te// nga ni mig mi bzang la byams// go'u ta ma ni nag po dang /
473b7(rgyud): nga ni klu rgyal nor bu dang // nga ni nor rgyas bu la'ang byams// dbyug pa rkang gi klu dag dang // gang ba bzang la'angang rtag tu// klu gang dga' bo nye dga' bo// kha rog ldan zhing grags dang ldan// rdzu 'phrul lngar
474a1(rgyud): ning lnga min dang // lha mi gsul yang myong bar byed// mchos kyu dang chu lha dang // 'jam pa len pa la yang byams// jog po dang ni mtha' yas dang // de bzhin nor gyi sgo dang mi

474a6(rgyud): grags pa dang // krugang sa la chu dag dang // de bzhin chu la gnas rnams dang // gang dag par snang sgrub dang // gang dag lhun por gnas pa dang // mgo gcig pa dang mgo gnyis pa// de dag la ni brtag byangs
474a7(rgyud): rkang pa med la dbyams te/ rkang gnyis pa la'ang byams so// rkang ba'i pa la'ang byams so// rkang mangs la yang dbyams so// dang meng nga la gnong mi byed/ rkang gnyis pa la gnod mi byed/
474b1(rgyud): rang bani nga la gdong mi byed / gang mangs ngal 'ong ma byed// gang dag tshul gnas pa yi// blarnams kun la dbyams so// gang sus la gnas pa yi/ 'byung po kum la dbyangs so// sengs
474b2(rgyud): can gang dag gnas par bcas// sems can kun la nga byams so// sems can kun dang srog chags kur// 'byung po dag ni thams cad kyang // thams cad bde ba 'ba' zhig shog/ thams cad nang

474b6(rgyud): cad dang / nang 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / rims thams cad dang / nang thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / dug thams cad las srung ba gyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya
474b7(rgyud): mthong bar shog cig/ kun dga' bo sngon byung ba ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i lho phyogs kyi ngos la rma bya'i rgyal po gser du sdang ba zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de nang par rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis
475a1(rgyud): bde legs su 'gyur ba byas te nyin mo dge par gnas/ nub kar bde legs su 'gyur bar byas te mtshan mo dag par gas so// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo//
475a2(rgyud): dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das ma rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ hu hU/ hu h+ya/ hu hu/ nA ga le le le/ dr-i ba le le le/ nA ga le le le/ su la hu ya/ bai ma'i
475a3(rgyud): thA su thu su/ ku lu gu lu/ hu tse d+hi ni/ tsai ti ni/ a kA lA/ e lA ma lA/ I la~M ma lA/ ti lo ma la/ I li mi ti/ ti li mi ti/ e li ti li me ta/ dri be/ su du be/ to su to su/ go la be lA/ tsa ba lA ra bi ma la
475a4(rgyud): en+di ri/ b+hin+da r-i/ rin+ti ri/ na mo bud+d+hA nan/ tsi li ki saM/ go do hi ka/ na mo ar+ha tAn/ hA la dA la/ lhas phyogs bcu kun tu char phob cig/ sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// swA hA/ des dus gzhan
475a5(rgyud): zhig na rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis srung ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba ma byas par/ 'dod pa rnams la zhen cing chags te rgyags pas myos nas rab tu rmongs shing brgyal ba dang 'dra bar gyur
475a6(rgyud): nas rab tu zher te/ nags kyi rma bya gzhon nu mang po dang lhan cig tu kun dga' ra ba nas kun dga' ra bar/ skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal du/ ri'i ngos nas ri'i ngos su rgyu zhing song song ba las/

476a1(rgyud): mA na se/ ad b+hu te/ ad t+ya b+hu te/ mraSh+Te/ bi muH/ mo tsani/ mo& ni/ a ts+tsha te/ a ra r+Ne/ bi ra dze khi ma le/ oMmr-i te/ a ma re/ a ma ra Ni/ bram/ bram sA re khAH
476a2(rgyud): pA r+Na ma nor the/ mr-i ta sany+dzi ba ni/ shrI b+ha dre/ tsan+ne/ tsan+d+ha/ pra b+he/ sUr+ye/ sUr+ya kAn+te/ bI da b+ha ye/ su bar+Ne/ brah+ma g+ho She/ brah+ma dzuSh+Te/ sarba tra a pra ti ha te bdag la srungs shig srungs shig swA hA
476a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// dge slong sa raM dang / bdag dang / sems can thams cad dge bar mdzad du gsol/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ tad+ya \u0f7f/
476a4(rgyud): tsi gu tsi g+hu tsi/ mu tsi swAhA/ kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na rma bya'i rgyal mo gser du snang ba zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems nade ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kur dga' tsha
476a5(rgyud): nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rma bya'i rgyal mo gser du snang ba zhes bya bar gyur to// kur dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i snying po 'di'ang da bzlas par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ I li ming tri/ ti li mi
476a6(rgyud): twe/ ti li mi li/ mid ti ti laM/ mi li mi li/ ti lo ti li/ mi li mit+taM/ bi li ma li/ bit+ti bi li/ mi li mi li/ ti li mi li/ su tu bA tu bA/ su ba tsa/ tsi r-i ki si ya/ d+hin na me De/ na mo bud+d+ha rAH
476a7(rgyud): tsi li ki si/ prAn+ta m+b+ha le/ i ti hA re/ lo hita mU le/ tu ba su hu~M dA/ kurbi/ kun r+thi/ ku ku nar+thi/ ti la kum+ba nan+di/ srung lo can gyi lhas zla ba dgu 'am/ zla ba bcur kur nas mang po cig/ i mi ma me
476b1(rgyud): ka la~M mi la kai li la li/ ke tu mA le/ dru drag su do me De li me/ sar+b+ba ban+ye/ bu sa bste/ bu sar bu sa ra/ d+han ban+de ra e akA la ra sa li me/ kha rim g+hoSh+Te/ rA khI le/ oM swA sa du le tshul
476b2(rgyud): sra tu be/ ar+d+he/ naH/ pra nan+te/ oM Na nan+te/ tA Na mA le/ lhas kun nas chu sar pa'i char pob c-ig/ nA rA ya Ni/ pA rA ya Ne/ ha ri ta li/ kun+d+ha li/ I li mi sti/ ki li mi ste/ ki li ki li mi s+t+waM/
476b3(rgyud): A li me/ 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag grub par gyur cig swA hA/ kun dga' bo 'di ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i snying po yin no// kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya/
476b4(rgyud): chen mo 'di grong na 'dug pa na'ang yid la bya'o// dgon pa na 'dug gam/ lam na 'dug gam/ lam gol ba na 'dug gam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na 'dug gam/ chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug gam/ me'i/
476b5(rgyud): rang na 'dug gam/ chu'i nang na 'dug gam/ dgra'i nang na 'dug gam/ phyir rgol ba dang dgra bo'i nang na 'dug gam/ 'khor gyi nang na 'dug gam/ rtsod pa'i nang na 'dug gam/ sbrul gyis zin tam/ dug
476b6(rgyud): 'thungs sam/ 'jigs pa thams cad 'dus pa na'ang yid la bya'o// rims kyis btab pas kyang yid la bya'o// rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa
476b7(rgyud): las gyur pa dang / nang bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi las nang gang yang rung bas btab par gyur pa dang / 'phongs par gyur pa na'ang shin tu yid la bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo gsad pa'i rigs pa ni chang
477a1(rgyud): pas thar par 'gyur ro// chad pas gtsang ba'i rigs pa ni gzhu btsog gis so// gzhu bcog pa'i rigs pa ni spobs so// spro ba'i rigs pa ni dam bcas pas so// ngas bcas
477a2(rgyud): ba'i rigs pa ri spu zing zhes bya bas so// spu zing zhes bya ba'i rigs pa ni de bzhin du thar par 'gyur te/ de'i nang thams cad kyang ldog par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi
477a3(rgyud): tshig 'di'ang yid la bya'o// tad+ya thA/ tsi li/ hi li mi li/ kau li mi li/ ke tu mU le/ bu sa bar+Ne/ bu sa ra Ni/ bu sa ra Ni/ ke baT+Te/ ke bar+d+ha ka/ mU laM/ I ti/ shwa bA re tu be tu be pri yaM ka re/ a badz+re
477a4(rgyud): pa ri ban+de/ lhas kun tu chu sar pa'i char phob cig na mo b+ha ga ba te/ IT+TiD+ha ye/ in+d+ra go mi si kA ya/ A sha ne/ pA sha ne/ pA pa ni ku le/ ka pi la mang te/ I li mit+te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
477a5(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya/
477a6(rgyud): chen mo 'dis dge slong sa ri dang / bdag dang / sems can thams cad la srung bar gyis shig/ sba ba dang / zhi ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bsrung ba dang / zhing
477a7(rgyud): dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / drug gzhil ba dang / dug gsang pa dang / mtshams gcang ba dang / sa bcing ba gyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig po/

477b2(rgyud): dang legs su 'gyur ba dang / chang pa spang ba dang / mtshan cha spang ba dang / drug gzhil bu dang / dug gsang ba dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing ba byas pa la rnam par 'tshe ba'i phyir 'ong ba lta 'am
477b3(rgyud): mo'am/ lha'i bu bo 'am/ lha'i bu mo 'am/ lha rgan po 'am/ lha rgan mo 'am Da lha'i 'khor po 'am/ lha'i 'khor mo 'am/ klu 'am/ klu mo 'am/ klu'i bu pheM 'am klu'i bu mo 'am/ klu rgang po 'am/ kru nan

479a1(rgyud): khra bo 'am/ gnon po'i bu mo 'am/ gnon po rgan po 'am/ gnon po rgan po 'am gnon po'i 'khor po 'am/ gnon pa'i 'khor mo 'am/ 'ga' yang 'ong bar ngas lnga dang brtsa/

480a4(rgyud): ti li/ me la/ ti ha du ha/ ti li mA/ tri mA/ d+hu mA/ d+hi mA/ d+hu su kum+b+ha/ su tuM bA/ tuM bA/ sa ma tu bA/ A De nA De/ ti la/ kuny+dza nA De/ I li ki si/ nga sems can thams cad la byams

480a6(rgyud): lhas kun nas chu sar pa'i char phob cig/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ in+d+ra go mi/ si kA ya/ in+diT+TA ya/ go do hi kA ya/ b+h+r-i gA ri kA ya/ a le ta le/ kun+ta le/ an+ne/ nen+te/ bu nan+te/ A sa ne/ pA sha na/
480a7(rgyud): pA pa ni ku le pra ti ku le/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba rnam gzigs mya ngan 'tshang la gnas// rgyal ba gtsug tor pad+ma dkar po'i drung // thams cad
480b1(rgyud): skyob pa sa la'i drung na gnas// bram ze 'khor ba 'jig ni shing Sha'i drung // sangs rgyas gser thub u dum+ba ra'i drung // 'od srungs n+ya gro d+ha yi drung na gnas// shAkya thub mchog khyad par gnas drung ngu/

481a1(rgyud): bde legs shog / phyir 'od dag kyang bde legs shog/ mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs// nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing // khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog/ de dag sdig par

481b5(rgyud): Ni/ s+tha ma Ni/ mo ha ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ dzam+b+ha ni/ swa yaM b+hu be swA hA/ kun dga' bo shar phyogs na ni dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung zhes bya ba dri za thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor dri za 'bum phrag brgya stong du la yod/
481b6(rgyud): pa/ dri za rnams la dbang byang du 'jug pa gnas te/ gang shar phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa de yang bu dang bcas/ tsha bo dang bcas/ spun dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas/ sde dpon dang bcas
481b7(rgyud): mngag pa dang bcas/ po nye dang bcas/ g.yos dang bcas/ 'kho dang bcas pas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen po 'dis dge slongs ri dang / khangag dang / sems can thams cad la spang ba gyis shig am
482a1(rgyud): dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / drug

499b6(rgyud): las kyi 'dzegs pa dang / sa g.yo ba'i 'jigs pa las thar pa/ sa 'dzin pa/ rin po che'i gzhal med khang chen po na gnas pa/ tshe ring ba/ bskal par gnas pa/ dbang che bar grags pa/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/

501a1(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam grol phyag 'tshal grol la phyag 'tshal lo// bram ze gang dag sdig pa'i chos rnams bsal bar gyur pa de dag la'ang phyag 'tshal lo// de/

501a3(rgyud): par gzigs kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// tad+ya thA/ a kha Da/ ka ra De/ ma de/ me da bar+d+ha re/ a pa re/ sha ba re/ tu re tu re/ tsu re tsu re/ sha ba re/ par+Na sha ba re/ hu tsi hu tsi/ ku tsi ku tsi/ ru tsi mu tsi/

505b1(rgyud): dang / ri'i rgyal po sde bzang dang / ri'i rgyal po tshangs pa'i chu dang / ri'i rgyal po rig byed srung dang / ri'i rgyal po ba yang rnga dang / re'i rgyal po sna tshogs 'phreng ba dang / ri'i rgyal po mi 'jigs sna tshogs
505b2(rgyud): dang / ri'i rgyal po ral gri dang / ri'i rgyal po gdung ba dang / ri'i rgyal po mig bsku dang / ri'i rgyal po muny+dza dang / ri'i rgyal po ri dgas can dang / ri'i rgyal po 'joms byed dang / ri'i rgyal po ti se dang / ri'i rgyal
505b3(rgyud): po mi mjed dang / ri'i rgyal po nye kar dang / 'i'i rgyal po can dan 'phreng dang / ri'i rgyal po stobs 'dzir dang / ri'i rgyal po dbang chen dang / ri'i rgyal po dus 'bris byed dang / ri'i rgyal po skem ri dang / ri'i
505b4(rgyud): rgyal po nyer gnas can dang shA ri'i rgyal po ba lang srung dang ka ri'i rgyal po bya rog sgra can dang / ri'i rgyal po ko ka'i sgra dang / ri'i rgyal po bstan pa 'dzin dang / sa'i dkyil 'khor 'di na ri'i rgyal po 'di dag
505b5(rgyud): dang / gzhan dag kyang yod pa de la lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams
505b6(rgyud): ngadang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / yi rags rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / khrul bum rnams dang / srul po rnams dang / lus srul po rnams dang / skam byed rnams
505b7(rgyud): ras su byeng rnams dang / this gang rnams dang / pargya byed rnams rang gnon pa rnams dang / 'os sngags 'chang grub pa rnams dang / rgyal po 'khor rang babs pa gang dag d+har du gnas pa de dag gis kyang/
506a1(rgyud): rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis dge slong sa ri dang / bdag dang / sems can thams cad la srung ba gyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ skyon brgya mthong bar shog
506a2(rgyud): cig/ sdig pa thams cad sol cig/ dge ba rnams snang bar gyur cig/ mi dge ba sol cig/ don rnams la snang bar gyis shig/ gnod pa rnams so la cig/ dge slong sa re dang / bdag dang / sems
506a3(rgyud): can thams cad kyang / mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs// nyi ma'i gung gi bde legs dang // nyin mtshan kun gyi bde legs dag/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag la stso la// swA hA/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis rgyu skar
506a4(rgyud): gang dag nam mkha' la rgyu zhing snang bar byed pa rnams kyi ming zung zhig/ 'di lta ste/ smin drug dang ni snar ma dang // mgo dang lag dang nab so dang // rgyal ni bkra shis phun sum tshogs// de bzhin sgeg ste bdun pa
506a5(rgyud): yi// de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni shar phyogs kyi sgo na gnas pa dag ste/ gang dag shar phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dag go// de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis dge slong sa ri
506a6(rgyud): dang / bdag dang / sems can thams cad la srung ba gyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ mchu ni mi mdzad 'joms pa dang // de bzhin gre dang po gnyis dang // me bzhi nag pa sa ri
506a7(rgyud): dang khas ka ste ni bdur pa yin// de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni lho phyogs kyi sgo na gnas pa dag ste/ gang dag lho phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dag go// de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
506b1(rgyud): cher mo 'dis dge slongs dang khadag dang / sems ca thams cad la srung ba gyis shig lo rgya 'tsho bar gyur cig lto ba rgya mthong bar shog cig / l+h+wa ma rnams ga'i brjid chen mo dang // de bzhi smon dang rgyu
506b2(rgyud): rlung ni// chu snong dang ni chu spang dang // de ltar gyi bzhi gro bzhin no// de sar rgyam bdur po 'di dag 'i rub phyogs kyi sgor gdas pa dag ste/ gang dag nub phyogs srung zhing yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dag go// de dag gis
506b3(rgyud): rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen po 'dis dge slongs ri dang / bdag dang / sems can thams cad la srung ba byis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ ron gru dang ni mor gre dang // de bzhi
506b4(rgyud): khrums stong khrums spang dang // nam gru dang ni tha skar dang // bra nye de ni bdun pa yin// de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni byang phyogs kyi sgo na gnas pa dag ste/ gang dag byang phyogs spang zhing yongs su skyong bar byed/
506b5(rgyud): bdag go// de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis dge slong sa ri dang / bdag dang / sems can thams cad la srung ba gyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig / ston brgya mthong bar shog cig kun

511a4(rgyud): gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin no// ga shed byed dang / sbyar ba'i las dang / byad dang / g.yeng byed dang / ro langs dang /

511b7(rgyud): dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyis de'i snang ba ma rungs par 'gyur ro// sems ma rungs par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams bsdus par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen
512a1(rgyud): kho bzhi po dag gis kyang kur zhes bya ba la thag gi bar gyi mamon ma rnams kyis de la sdug bsngal chen po byed par 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byen yang sum su rtsa gsum pas/
512a2(rgyud): tshogs kyis bskor te/ rdo rjes de'i mgo 'gems par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i gzi brjid kyis kyang de'i 'byor pa thal bar rlog par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo su zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dzi
512a3(rgyud): bsrung ba byas sam/ skur pa btags na de gsang ba'i rigs pa ni chang pas bral bar 'gyur ro// chang pas gcad pa'i rigs pa ni gzhu btsog pas so// gzhu btsog pa'i rigs pa ni spro bas so// spro ba'i rigs
512a4(rgyud): pa ni dam bca' bas so// dam bca' ba'i rigs pa ni spu zing zhes bya bas so// spu zing zhes bya ba'i rigs pa ni de bzhin du thar par 'gyur ro// de la rgyal po'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa

512a7(rgyud): yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so// kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni ha cang char che ba 'am/ char dkon pa'i tshe bklag par bya'o//
512b1(rgyud): des ni klu thams cad spro bar 'gyur te/ chur chen po ni gcod par byed/ char dkon pa'i tshe rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsam pa ji srid par nar 'bebs par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi
512b2(rgyud): rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di dran pas kyang 'jigs pa dang dgra thams cad zhi bar 'gyur na/ sus dum bur ma gyur cing rdzogs par 'chang ba 'am/ bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ kun/
512b3(rgyud): dga' bo khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di zung zhig/ 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir rig sngags kyi
512b4(rgyud): rgyal mo rna bya chen mo dgra thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa 'di kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig / tad+ya thA/ ya ba hi/ d+hU ba ti kha ra ki ku luT tu lu me swA hA/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/

512b6(rgyud): pa/ chos kyi bden pas drug bcom mo// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// de dag 'jig rten drug gsum ste// bcom ldan dge 'dun drug med pa// dge 'dun bden pas drug bcom mo// sangs rgyas

513b1(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i srad du ma 'tshal / bcom ldan 'das kyis yang bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ltar rgya mtsho chen po bzhi ni skam yang srid/ sa gzhi ni nam mkha' la 'ang/
513b2(rgyud): kyang srid/ zla ba dang nyi ma ni sa la srung yang srid/ krung ni rgyun las ldog kyang srid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ni gzhan du 'gyur mi srid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo//

514a3(rgyud): bsten ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyang mo rma bya'i yang snying zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rma bya chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la bya/

516b7(rgyud): med/ grangs med/ dpag tu med pa dag dang / lha'i bu nyi ma dang / lha'i bu zla ba dang / lha'i bu zla ba bzang po dang / nub ka'i lha dang / nang par gyi lha dang / dus kyi lha thams cad dang / sa'i lha dang thabs cig tu bzhug
517a1(rgyud): te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de chos kyi 'khor lo na shin tu brkor/ sangs rgyas kyi mchang pa ni shin tu yongs su mthar phyin/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni shin tu yongs su/
517a2(rgyud): rdzogs/ thams cad mkhyen pa ni shin tu yongs su bzung / byang chub chen po'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa dpas ni brnyes/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i sku ni rab tu 'bar/ yan lag
517a3(rgyud): dang nying lag thams cad ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par spras/ dbu'i gtsug ni sems can thams cad kyis bltar mi mthong / bdud kyi las thams cad la ni mkhas/ sems can thams cad kyi sem
517a4(rgyud): dang spyod pa ni shes/ spyan rnam pa lnga ni mnga'/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ni ldan/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ni ldan/ bdud dang phas kyi rgol
517a5(rgyud): ba'i tshogs thams cad ni bcom/ grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pas ni 'phags/ khyu mchog dang seng ge'i sgra ni sgrogs/ ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun tu bsal/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'dus
517a6(rgyud): phrag grangs med dpag tu med par sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu
517a7(rgyud): phyin pa dang / bya dka' ba'i spyod pa las ni phyir ma log sku ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyar te/ rab tu mdzes shing rdo rje'i rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po'i sang/
517b1(rgyud): ka'i khri chen po rdo rje rin po che dang / mu tig dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i drab du ma sgra 'byung ba/ rtsa ba'i drung na rdorje rin po che'i stegs bu du ma shin tu brtam par gnas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i mu srir du ma'i kha ras byung ba'i
517b2(rgyud): mu tig dmar po'i 'phreng ba bres pa'i pang bshams pa/ rin po che du ma'i pad+ma'i snying po la chags pa'i rin po che ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / a nangad rnyil dang / an nga rnyil chen po dang / dun las kyi 'od zer chen
517b3(rgyud): po 'tsher bas snang bar byas te kun nas mdzes pa/ gdugs rtsa ba dang bcas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i shar bu du mas rnam par brgyan pa/ bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas rnam par brgyan pa/ bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
