517b4(rgyud): phrag du mas kun ras bskyabs pa/ dpag bsam gyi shing du mas brgyan par mdzes par byas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i khri ri rab tsam la bzhugs te/ gser gyi ri bo'i rgyal po ltar dpal ni rab tu 'bar/ sa phyogs ni nyi/
517b5(rgyud): ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par brgyan/ zla ba nya ba ltar 'jig rten thams cad la sdug pa ni snang / dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni shin tu rgyas shing
517b6(rgyud): chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang ngo // ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba yang dag par rab tu
517b7(rgyud): ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas/ 'od zer gyi dra ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba bkye ste/ 'od zer gyi dra ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
518a1(rgyud): ten gyi khams 'di snang bas khyab par byas par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag seng ge'i khri bkod pa dru ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal/
518a2(rgyud): med khang na nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang/
518a3(rgyud): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang thabs cig tu chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba des khyab par gyur to//
518a4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor phal po che la bka' stsal pa/ sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir// nyes par byas dang gnod pa kun// rab 'joms so sor 'brang ba yi// gzungs 'di rab tu bshad par bya/
518a5(rgyud): 'di ni thos pa tsam gyis kyang // sdig pa kun ni zang par 'gyur// sems can kun la bde ba sbyin// nang de cog las grol bar byed// sems can kun la snying brtse bas// lus can ngan 'gror 'gro ba dang // deng /
518a6(rgyud): thams cad bskyab pa'i phyir// 'jig rten dag gi mgon pos gsungs// 'di yis bsrung bar byas na ni// lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'jug/ de bzhin lcang lo can dang ni// srin po'i gnas kyi sar yang 'gro// 'byung po/
518a7(rgyud): klu ba ga pa rnams// mi bzang 'jigs pa'i g.yul 'byed par// 'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang // dgra bo cog gis mi tshugs so// ming tsam bzung ste brjod byas kyang // skam byed pa rnyed byed smyo byed/
518b1(rgyud): dang mkha' 'gro ma dang sha za dang // gdon rnams rab tu rlag par 'gyur/ so sor 'brang ba'i gzi brjid kyis// ga'i chen mdangs rnams za ba dang // mi yi skye dgu rnams 'tsheg/ de dag thams cad rengs
518b2(rgyud): byed 'gyur// khyad stems mi bzang gang yin dang // pha rol dmag tshogs phung bar byed// sngags kyi las kyis gnod mi 'gyur// rtsa ba'i las las rnam por grol// dug dang dug sbyar mes mi tshugs/
518b3(rgyud): mtshon dang chus kyang tshugs mi 'gyur// lce 'bab glog gis mi tshugs te// dus kyi rlung gis gnod mi 'gyur// rig pa'i rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis// dgra kun rab tu 'joms par 'gyur// nye bar 'tshe ba zlog par
518b4(rgyud): byed// nad rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de yi don rnams thams cad 'grub// rtag tu rgyal ba thob par 'gyur// gang gis rtag tu mgul pa 'am// lag par rig pa btags na ni// de yi dgos pa yod ro cog/
518b5(rgyud): 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang // sangs rgyas rnams dang rang 'dren dang // de bzhin klu yi rgyal po dang // lha dbang rnams ni rtag tu srung // so sor 'brang ba'i gzungs 'dzin
518b6(rgyud): la khanyan thos sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rig pa'i lha mo rdzu 'phrul che// rtag tu srung ba byed par 'gyur// lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang // de bzhin rgyal po bzhi rnams kyang // de la nyin dang mtshan rnams su//
518b7(rgyud): srung bar byed de the tsom meng / brgya byi lha dang bcas pa dang // tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen dang // dga' ba'i dbang po nag po che/ sprin drug bu dang tshogs kyi dbang // ma mo'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang /
519a1(rgyud): de bzhin bdud ris gzhan rnams dang // drang srong gzi brjid che rnams dang // rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha rnams dang // de kun sa sor 'brang ba yi// gzungs 'dzin de la srung bar byed//
519a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas bdag nyid che rnams dang // rig pa'i lha mo stobs chen dang // bdag gi ma dang khro gnyer dang // lha mo sgrol ma lcags kyu dang // rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang dkar// de bzhin dkar mo chen mo dang // nag
519a3(rgyud): mo che dang pho nya dang // de bzhin rdo rje pho nya gzhan// zhags pa bzang dang rdo rje zhags// lag na rdo rje stobs po che// rig pa lha mo rdo rje 'phreng // bdud rtsi thabs sbyor byed pa dang // gzhan gyis mi thub lha mo che//
519a4(rgyud): rna ba nag mo stobs chen mo// dpal yon ldan pa skal chen dang // rna cha gdu ba kor pad+ma 'dra// me tog so can nor bu gtsug/ sgra mdog mdzes dang khab pa mo// lha mo gzung rjid chen mo dang // dpal yon ldan pa blos
519a5(rgyud): 'phreng can// srin mo ral pa gcig pa dang // sangs rgyas bsrungs zhes bya ba dang // skal ba chen po mthong can// lang ga'i bdag po dpal yon can// gzhan yang lha mo mang po rnams// sems can rjes su 'dzin
519a6(rgyud): byed dag/ rig pa gang gi lag na gnas// de la srung ba byed par 'gyur// 'phrog ma dang ni lngas rtsen dang // dung can dang ni so brtsegs ma// dpal gyi lha mo dbyangs can yang // de yi rjes 'gro rtag tu srung // so
519a7(rgyud): sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di// bud med gang zhig rtag 'chang ma// de yis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rtag tu mngal na bu po chags// mngal rnams na yang bde bar skyes// sbrum ma dag kyang bde bar 'gyur// nang dang
519b1(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad kyang // 'jigs par 'gyur te the tsom med/ bsod nams ldan zhing stobs dang ldan/ nor dang 'bru yang rtag tu 'phel// tshig kyang gzungs du 'os pa dang // mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba yim/
519b2(rgyud): zung mang dang ni skyes pa'ang rung // gtsang ma gang zhig 'chang bsrel na// de ni sems can thams cad dag/ thar pa bya phyir brtson par 'gyur// rtag tu bde bar 'gyur ba yin// nang ngo cog kyang rnam par spangs// slas/
519b3(rgyud): kyang skye ba mang bcas pa'i// rgyal po'ang de yi dbang du 'gyur// phun sum tshogs pa rtag tu 'bar// bsod nams phung po rnam par 'phel// de yi bsam pa thams cad 'grub// dkyil 'khor kun tu zhugs pa yin//
519b4(rgyud): rgyal ba rnams kyi bka' bzhin du// de ni kun tu dam tshig shes// rmi lam ngan pa rmi mi 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa'i mchog/ sdig pa rnams dang de bzhin du// dgra yang rab tu phung bar byed// gza' kun
519b5(rgyud): rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir// ye shes dbang phyug chen po gsungs// 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed// de phyir rtag tu bcang bar bya// 'byung po'i tshogs rnams pa la nyon// da ni rab tu 'di brjod do// sangs rgyas la phyag/
519b6(rgyud): 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang /
519b7(rgyud): dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM bi pu la gar+b+he/ bi pu la bi ma le/ bi ma la gar+b+he/ bi ma le/ dza ya gar+b+he/ badz+ra dz+wa lA gar+b+he/ ga ti ga ha ni/ ga ga ni bi sho d+ha ni/ sarba pA pa bi sho d+ha ni/ oM gu na ba ti/ ga ga na/
520a1(rgyud): bi tsA ri ni/ ga ga ri Ni/ ga ga ri Ni/ gi ri gI ri/ ki ri Ni gi ri Ni/ ga ma ri/ ga ma ri/ ga ha ga ha/ garka ri/ garga ri/ ga ga rI/ ga ga ri/ graM b+hA ri/ gaM b+ha ri/ gA b+hi ga b+hi/ ga hi ga hi/ ga ma/
520a2(rgyud): nI/ ga ma ni/ gA re ga re/ gu ru gu ru/ gu b+ha gu b+hA/ gu ha gu ha/ gu ru Ni tsa le/ gu ha Ni/ gu ha Ni/ gu ruN/ gu ru Ne/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsa le tsa le/ mu tsi li/ dza ye bi dza ya/ sarba b+ha ya bi ga te/ garba saM rak+Sha Ni/
520a3(rgyud): si ri si ri/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ gi ri gi ri/ g+ha rig+hi ri/ bcom ldan 'das ma sems can 'dren ma/ kun nas 'dren ma/ dgra thams cad 'joms par mtshang ma/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang
520a4(rgyud): gnod pa thams cad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang / nang thams cad las bsrung du gsol bsrung du gsol/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bi ga da/ a ba ra Ne/ bi sho d+ha ni/ bi bi d+ha/
520a5(rgyud): ba ra Na/ bi nA sha ni/ mU ri m+b+ha ri/ mu tsi nu tsI/ mu li mu li/ tsi li tsi li/ ki li ki la~M/ mi li mi l-i/ ka ma le/ bi mA le/ dzA ye bi dzA ye/ dzA yA ba te/ dza ya ba ti/ bi dza ya ba ti/ bi she Sha ba ti/ tsa
520a6(rgyud): ldan 'das ma rin po che'i cod pan dang 'phreng ba mnga' ba/ cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i lha mo chen mo sdig pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/ bdag la thams
520a7(rgyud): cad du kun nas bsrung du gsol bsrung du gsol/ hu ru hu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mgon ma mchis par skyob pa ma mchis pa/ gnas ma mchis pa/ skyabs ma mchis pa/ dpung gnyem ma mchis pa
520b1(rgyud): bdag la bsrung du gsol bsrung du gsol/ bdag sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par mdzad du gsol/ saN+Da tsat+t+wa/ tsaN+De tsar+N+Na d+hatsadz+nyA nA~M/ tsad+d+hi ni/ be ga ba ti/ sarba drar+dz+dza ni/ khA ra Ni/ khi tsa la/
520b2(rgyud): bA dzin/ d+ha rba rba/ mA rba rba ru/ rba rba tsu ru/ tu ru d+hi ru/ A rmAHpA la naM/ sra bar b+hU ma tha ne/ sarba ba kan/ dwA dzoti/ tsi ra tsi re/ ts+tshi ra d+ha rI/ sa mahA a ma te/ rba dza dzaH/
520b3(rgyud): g+haM sa rba d+hi/ su rbaHbi shrad+d+he/ sarba pa wa gr-id+d+he/ sarba pA pa thi sho d+hane/ d+ha ru d+ha ru/ d+ha rat+taM/ d+ha re/ d+ha rad+ha ra/ su mu su su~M/ mu su mu su/ mu rma sa le/ dz+wa la ya/ swa pra su mu su su ma su rba mu
520b4(rgyud): la/ tsa le tsa le/ dpal gyi sku mnga' ba/ bdag la gnod par sems pa las bsgrub tu gsol/ bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ dza ya sarba duSh+TA na/ dA ra ya A shA~M grI ba ku d+ha re dza/
520b5(rgyud): ka ma le/ k+Shi nik+Shi ni/ ba ra da/ ang+ku she/ oM pad+ma bi shud+d+he/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ shud+d+he shud+d+he/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ mang+ga la bi shud+d+ho/ pa bi tra mu khi/ khar+thi ni/ khan+te ni/ kha ra kha ra/ dz+wa la ti/ shi kha re/ sa
520b6(rgyud): man+ta/ a ba lo ki ta pra b+he/ su pra b+ha bi shud+d+he/ sa man+ta/ pra sa ri ta/ a ba b+hA Shi ta/ shud+d+ha dz+wa la/ dz+wa la sarba de ba ga na/ sa mA ka ra Sha Ni/ s+yad t+ya pra te/ oM hr-i traM ta ra ta ra/ glang po che'i lha stangs kyis gzigs
520b7(rgyud): ma bdag la mi'i gdong ba las bsgral du gsol/ ladul chu hu lu hu lu susu bu tu/ tu ru tu ru/ kau Na ki mi klo sa cu 'a 'i sernam sa shAcwa tre/ be ga le khaM ga lesasu tsu su tsu/ tsum tsas su su
521a1(rgyud): muHsu bI tsa re/ ta ra ta ra/ bcom ldan 'das ma glang po che'i lha stangs kyis gzigs ma/ thams cad du kun nas phyogs thams cad bcing ba dang / rdo rje'i ra ba dang / rdo rje'i zhags
521a2(rgyud): pa'i bcing bas bdag mi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las bsgral du gsol/ badz+ra dz+wA lA bi shud+d+he/ b+hu ri b+hu ri/ b+ha ga ba ti/ gar+b+ha baM saM shau d+ha ni/ kuk+Shi sam+b+ha ra Ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ tsa la tsa la dz+wa li ni/ lha'i chus
521a3(rgyud): kun tu char dbab tu gsol/ a mri ta baR+Sha Ni de ba ta/ a ba tA ra Ni/ bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab bdud rtsi mchog gi sku dang ldan pa bdag la dbang bskur du gsol/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod/
521a4(rgyud): pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par sbyor ba/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / klu thams cad 'joms pa/ gnod pas 'jigs skrag
521a5(rgyud): pa bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / nang 'gro ba thams cad dang / nang thams cad las thams cad du rtag par bsrung du gsol bsrung du gsol/ ba la ba la/ ba la ba ti/ dza ya dzas
521a6(rgyud): bi dza ya bi dza ya/ thams cad du dus kun tu bdag rgyal bar mdzad du gsol/ bdag la rig pa chen mo 'di 'grub par mdzad du gsol/ dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub tu gsol/ gsang sngags rnams bsgrub tu
521a7(rgyud): gsol/ bgegs rnams gzhom du gsol/ dza ya dza ya/ sid+d+he sid+d+hi/ si d+h+ya si d+h+ya/ bu d+ha bu d+h+ya/ pU ra ya/ pU ra ya/ pU ra Ni/ pU ra Ni/ bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ rig pa thams cad
521b1(rgyud): las byung ba'i sku can/ rgyal ba lhag par rgyal ba can/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rnam par dag pa bcom ldan 'das ma bzhugs su gsol/ bzhugs su gsol/ dam tshig bskyang du
521b2(rgyud): gsol/ 'jigs pa mi bzad pa chen po brgyad las bdag la gzigs su gsol/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ bdag 'jigs pa chen po las bskyab tu
521b3(rgyud): gsol/ sa ra sa ra/ prA sa ra/ pra sa ra/ sarba oM pa ra Na/ bi sho d+ha ni/ sa man+ta/ A kA ra/ maN+Da la bi shud+d+he/ bi ga te/ ba ga te/ bi ga ta ma le/ sarba ma la bi sho d+ha ni/ sarba mang+ga la bi shud+d+he/ sarba mang+ga la
521b4(rgyud): bi sho d+ha ni/ k+Shi Ni/ k+Shi Ni/ sar+b+ba pA pa bi shud+d+he/ mA la bi ga te/ dza ya ba ti/ te dzo ba ti/ badz+ra ba ti/ 'jig rten gsum du byin gyis brlabs pa la swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis spyi bo nas dbang bskur
521b5(rgyud): la swA hA/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba la swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dag pa la swA hA/ lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba la swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs
521b6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis snying pos byin gyis brlabs pa'i snying po la swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig grub pa la swA hA/ dbang po dang dbang po dang ldan pa dbang pos rnam par bltas pa la
521b7(rgyud): swAhA/ tshangs pa dang tshangs pa la gnas pa la swA hA/ khyab 'jug gis phyag byas pa la swA hA/ dbang phyug chen pos phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa la swA hA/ rdo rje 'dzin lag na rdo rje'i stobs dang brtson 'grus kyis
522a1(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa la swA hA/ yul 'khor srung la swA hA/ 'phags skyes po la swAhA/ mig mi bzang la swA hA/ rnam thos kyi bu la swA hA/ rgyal po chen po bzhis phyag byas pa la swA hA
522a2(rgyud): gshin rje la swA hA/ gshin rjes mchod cing phyag byas pa la swA hA/ chu lha la swA hA/ rlung lba l-i swA hA/ rlung lha chen po la swA hA/ me wA la swAhA/ rlung la swA hA/ klus rnam par bltas pa la swA hA/ lha'i tshogs
522a3(rgyud): rnams la swAhA/ klu'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ gnod sbyin gyi tshogs rnams la swA hA/ srin po'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ dri za'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ lha ma yin gyi tshogs rnams la swA hA/ nam mkha' ldi/
522a4(rgyud): gi tshogs rnams la swA hA/ mi 'am ci'i tshogs rnams la swAhA/ lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ mi'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ mi ma yin pa'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ gdon rnams la swA hA/ 'byung po tha
522a5(rgyud): cad la swA hA/ yi dgas thams cad la swA hA/ sha za thams cad la swA hA/ brjed byed thams cad la swA hA/ gnon po la swA hA/ grul bum thams cad la swA hA/ srul po thams cad la swAhA/ lus srul po thams cad la/
522a6(rgyud): swA hA/ gdug pa dang rab tu gdug pa thams cad la swA hA/ oM d+hu ru d+hu ru swA hA/ oM tu ru tu ru swA hA/ oM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ oM mu ru mu ru swA hA/ ha na ha na sarba sha trUM swA hA/ da ha da ha sarba duSh+TA na swA hA/
522a7(rgyud): pa tsa pa tsa sarba pra tur+thi ka pra t+ya mi tAn sA hA/ gang dag bdag la mi phan par 'dod pa de dag thams cad kyi lus dz+wA la ya/ dz+wa la ya sarba duSh+Ta tsit+ta nAM swA hA/ 'bar ba la swA hA/ rab tu 'bar ba la swA hA/ sgron ma 'bar ba
522b1(rgyud): la swA hA/ rdo rje 'bar ba la swA hA/ me lce 'bar ba la swA hA/ kun tu 'bar ba la swA hA/ nor bu bzang po la swA hA/ gang ba bzang po la swA hA/ nag po la swA hA/ nag po chen po la swA hA/ ma mo'i tshogs la swA hA/ gnod sbyin
522b2(rgyud): mo rnams la swAhA/ srin mo rnams la swA hA/ yi dgas dang / sha za dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams la swAhA/ nam mkha'i ma mo rnams la swAhA/ rgya mtshor 'gro ba mo rnams la swA hA/ rgya mtshon gnas pa rnabs la
522b3(rgyud): swA hA/ mtshan mo rgyu ba rnams la swA hA/ nyin mo rgyu ba rnams la swA hA/ dus gsum du rgyu ba rnams la swA hA/ dus su rgyu ba rnams la swA hA/ dus ma yin par rgyu ba rnams la swA hA/ zas su mngal za ba rnams la swA hA/
522b4(rgyud): mdangs 'phrog pa rnams la swA hA/ mngal 'dzin pa rnams la swA hA/ hu lu hu lu swA hA/ oM swA hA/ swaHswA hA/ b+hUHswA hA/ b+hu baHswA hA/ b+hUr+N+Na baHswAhA/ tsi Ti tsi Ti swa hA/ bi Ti bi Ti swA hA/ d+ha ra Ni swA hA/ d+hA ra
522b5(rgyud): Ni swA hA/ ag+ni swA hA/ te dzo bA yu swA hA/ tsi li tsi li swA hA/ si li si li swA hA/ mi li mi li swA hA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha swA hA/ sid+h+ya sid+d+ha swA hA/ maN+Da la ban+de swA hA/ sI mA ban+d+he swA hA/ dA ra Ni ban+d+he swA hA/ sarba sha trAM b+hany+dza ya
522b6(rgyud): bAlpA ya swA hA/ dza~M b+ha ya/ dza~M b+ha ya swAhA/ staM b+ha ya/ sta~M b+ha ya swA hA/ tshin+da tshon+da swA hA/ b+hin+da b+hin+de swA hA/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza swA hA/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha swAhA/ mo ha ya mi ha ya swA hA/ ma Ni bi shud+d+he swA hA/ sAR+tha/ sUr+ya bi shud+d+he swAhA
522b7(rgyud): tsan+d+re tsan+ne pa ri pAr+Na tsan+d+he swAhA/ sho d+ha ri swA hA/ bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ gra he b+h+yaHswA hA/ rak+Sha tre b+h+yaHswAhA/ shi be b+h+yaHsAhA/ shAn+ti b+h+yaHswAhA/ puSh+Ti b+h+yeHswAhA/ swa s+yA ya ne b+h+yaHswA hA/ shi baM ka ri swA hA/ shaM ka ri swA hA
523a1(rgyud): shAn+ti ka ri swA hA/ duSh+Ti ka ri swAhA kha la bar+d+ha ni swA hA/ ba la bar+d+ha na ka ri swAhA/ thI ka ri swA hA/ shrI bar+d+ha ni swA hA/ shrI dz+wa li ni swAhA/ mu tsi sAhA/ na mu tsi swA hA/ ma ru tsi swA hA/ be ga ba ti swAn
523a2(rgyud): oMHbcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mchog dri ma dang bral ba/ bdag gi sdig pa thams cad zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ bdag bde legs su gyur cig/ oM mu ni mu ni/ bi mu ni mu ni/
523a3(rgyud): ri tsa ri tsa la ne/ b+ha ga ba ti/ b+ha ya bi ga te/ b+ha ya ha ra Ni/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bud+d+hi li bud+d+hi li/ sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya dzuSh+Te swA hA/ oM mu ri mu ni mu ni ba re/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
523a4(rgyud): rig pa'i dbang bskur ba/ rdo rje'i go cha chen po'i phyag rgyas btab pa thams cad kyis bdag la dbang bskur du gsol// sarba ta thA ga te hr-i da ya/ a d+hiSh+Thi te badz+re swA hA/ des na yang dus slar yang bram ze chen po
523a5(rgyud): de'i 'khor dang bcas pa 'dus pa der 'dug par gyur pa de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po la bos par gyur to// bram ze chen po rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen po/ kun nas me lce'i 'phreng
523a6(rgyud): brnam par dag pas rgyas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu phyag rgya dang / snying po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos thos ma thag tu sdig pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur
523a7(rgyud): ro/ bram ze chen po rig pa 'di gang gi snying la gnas par gyur pa de'i lus rdo rjer rig par bya'o// de'i lus la mes mi tshugs so// ci mngon zhe na/ gang gi tshe grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas na/ gzhon nu
523b1(rgyud): sgra gcan zin bzang po mngal du zhugs pa de'i tshe shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma bdag nyid me'i nang du mchongs pa dang / rer pad+ma dag byung ste/ de'i tshe gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po ma'i mngal ma gnas bzhin du
523b2(rgyud): rig pa 'di yid la byas so// rig pa 'di rjes su dran pa tsam gyis me de skad cig de nyid la bsil bar gyur to// de nas shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma'i lus la mes ma reg go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rig pa 'di ni
523b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// bram ze chen po rgyu de na mes mi 'tshig go// dug gis kyang srog dang dpral bar mi nus so// de ci lta zhe na/ bram ze chen po gang gi tshe grong khyer chen
523b4(rgyud): po bde bar pha rol tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba na/ tshong dpon mdzod stobs can gyi bu rig pa smra bar gyur to// de'i rig pa'i stobs des klu'i rgyal po 'jog po bkug go// bkug nas kyang bag med pa'i dbang gis bcing/
523b5(rgyud): pas des khros nas de la bzung ba dang / de tshor ba mi bzad pa myong nas ji ltar yang bdag ni srog dang bral lo snyam du shes so// de nas smra ba can mang po bos kyang 'ga' tsam gyis kyang dug las gso bar ma nus
523b6(rgyud): so/ de nas grong khyer chen po bde bar pha rol tu 'gro ba na dge bsnyen ma dri ma med par dag pa zhes bya ba snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhig gnas pa des rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di kha ton du shes so// de de'i
523b7(rgyud): gnas su song ste phyin pa dang / rig pa chen mo 'di brjod do// des de la lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis de dug med par byas shing de dran pa rnyed par byas te/ sdug bsngal chen po de las yongs su thar par byas
524a1(rgyud): nasaHrig pa chen mo'i snying po 'di cho ga ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin du tshong dpon gyi bu de'i snying la gnas par byas so// bram ze chen po gzhan yang ji ltar yongs su shes she na/
524a2(rgyud): rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba'i grangs su chud pa zhig grong khyer chen po wA rA NA si na sngon yongs su rgyu ba'i tshe/ de'i shar phyogs kyi mtshams kyi stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nges dpung gi
524a3(rgyud): tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te/ grong khyer chen po wA rA NA si kun nas bskor nas gzhom par bshams so// de nas rgyal po chen po tshangs pas byin de la/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha pha rol
524a4(rgyud): gyi dmag tshogs kyis grong khyer 'phrog la thug na/ thabs gang gis pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de gzhom par bgyi bka' stsal du gsol zhes byas pa dang / rgyal pos khyed 'tsher 'grib chung ngur gyis shig
524a5(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo zhes bya ba yod do// ngas des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di pham par bya'o// thal ba bzhin du bya'o zhes bsgo ba dang / blon po rnams kyis mgo btud de/ rgyal po chen
524a6(rgyud): po sngon bdag gis nam yang ma thos pa 'di ci zhig lags zhes smras pa dang / rgyal pos ngas nges mngon sum du bya'o zhes bsgo'o// de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin spos chu sna tshogs kyis mgo bkrus te/ gos
524a7(rgyud): gtsang ma bgos nas rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ma chen mo 'di cho ga bzhin du bris te/ mgo'i gtsug gi skra'i nang du bzhag nas rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di nyid kyis go cha byas te g.yul gyi nang du zhugs pa dang /
524b1(rgyud): gcig pus dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa thams cad pham par byas te/ ji srid skyabs su dong ba de srid du 'dis tshar bcad nas stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de gcig pu btang ngo // bram ze chen po de
524b2(rgyud): ltar na rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa/ mthu cher po 'di mngon sum du gyur pa yin te/ mngon sum du gyur to snyam du gzung bar bya'o// de
524b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mtshungs pa nyid du blta bar bya'o// phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na sems can tshe thung ba rnams dang / bsod nams chung ba rnams dang / longs spyod chung ba rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang
524b4(rgyud): bde bar 'gyur bar blta'o// bram ze chen po gang la la zhig gis rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di cho ga bzhin du bris te lag pa 'am mgul du btags na/ de de bzhin gshegs pa thams
524b5(rgyud): cad kyis byir gyis brlabs par rig par bya'o// de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur rig par bya'o// de rdo rje'i lus yin par rig par bya'o// de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ring bsrel gyi snying po can yin/
524b6(rgyud): par rig par bya'o// de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyar yin par rig par bya'o// de rdo rje chen po'i lus su rig par bya'o// de 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i lus dang ldan par rig par bya'o// de mi shigs pa'i go
524b7(rgyud): can du rig par bya'o// de dgra thams cad rab tu 'joms par rig par bya'o// de sleb pa dang sdig pa thams cad 'joms par rig par bya'o// de sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba rnams sbyong bar rig par bya'o// de ci'i
525a1(rgyud): phyir zhe na/ sngon yongs su shes pa yin te/ bram ze chen po phyogs gzhan zhig na dge slong ma dang pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la bslabs pa 'dral ba/ ma byin par len pa kha zan
525a2(rgyud): ba dang 'dra ba'i sgo 'phrog pa/ dge 'dun gyi dang / phyogs bzhi dang / tshogs kyi rdzas su gyur pa de thams cad gang zag gir byin gyis brlabs te za ba zhig/ dus gzhan zhig na nang tshabs chen pos btab pa dang
525a3(rgyud): sdug bsngal chen po'i tshor ba myong ngo // nyon mongs te skyabs med dpung gnyen med nas ku co'i sgra chen po 'byin to// bram ze chen po de nas phyogs de na dge bsnyen zhig gnas pa des sgra de thos so// thos nas
525a4(rgyud): kyang dge slong de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di bris te dge slong de'i mgul du btags so// rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo dge slong de'i mgul
525a5(rgyud): du btags ma thag tu tshor ba thams cad ni rab tu zhi/ nang thams cad las ni yongs su thar te sos par gyur nas/ de'i mtshan mo zad pa dang dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag ste 'chi ba'i dus byas so// lus de bor ba dang
525a6(rgyud): sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes so// de'i ro de'ang dge slong dag gis skad bu zhig la bzhag go// rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen po de'ang de'i mgul du btags pa bzhin du gnas so// dge slong
525a7(rgyud): de mnar med pa der skyes ma thag tu sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad rab tu zhi nas/ sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag thams cad bde ba thams cad kyis
525b1(rgyud): tshim par gyur to// mtshams med pa'i me'i phung po chen po gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su zhi bar gyur to// de nas gshin rje'i mi de dag thams cad ngo mtshar skyes nas/ chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la/
525b2(rgyud): nges pa'i tshig 'di dag rgyas par brjod do// sems can las las skyes pa yi// sdug bsngal mi bzang rab tu zhi// shin tu ngo mtshar 'di ni lha// sems dmyal nyam pa rnams na gda'// sems can lus la rtag kan
525b3(rgyud): pa'i kha me ma mur de rab tu zhi// sog le rnams kyis gshag ma mchis// spu gri'i sos kyang gcod mi bgyid// lcags sdong shal ma ri yang chag/ lcags zangs thams cad rab tu zhi// ral gri'i lo ma can nags
525b4(rgyud): nal las skyes lo ma gnod mi 'gyur// chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje khyod// mi rnams la ni chos kyis ston// rgyu 'di mi chung bdag cag la// khyod kyis brjod par mdzad pa'i rigs// de nas chos kyi bdag nyid
525b5(rgyud): can// chos nges chos kyi rgyal po des// snying rje'i bsam pa nyams rnams kyi// 'di 'dra'i tshig de thos gyur nas// myur du 'di ni ci yin spos// 'di ni ci 'dra yang spros shig/ de nas mi bzang gshin rje'i mi/
525b6(rgyud): gnod pa'i rgyun can de dag gis// chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la// 'di skad kyi ni tshig smras so// mnar med rab tu nyam nga bar// sems can chen po 'di skyes lha// gang gi ming ni mnar med pa// des na de ni nyam
525b7(rgyud): ngar brjod// gang gi sems can bde bgyis pa// rnam pa sna tshogs las la gzigs// 'di ni kun tu bde gyur na// slar yang lha yi gnas su mchi// chos kyi rgyal po gshin rjes kyang // mthong nas ngo mtshar smras pa/
526a1(rgyud): ni// 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba ste// 'di ni tshe rabs snga lus tshe// ji ltar sku gdung brgya mang pos// ston pa'i mchod rten mdzes pa ltar// so sor 'brang ba mgul btags pas// de
526a2(rgyud): yi lus ni de bzhin mdzes// de nas sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma de dag gis/ chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la 'di skad ces smras so// lha ji ltar na 'di so sor 'brang ba zhes bgyi/ chos kyi rgyal pos
526a3(rgyud): smras pa/ gang gis tshig rnams so sor dran// de ni ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur// so sor 'brang ba sgom pa yi// shes rab can de bde 'gror 'gro// sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma khyed// rab tu rgyas dang ldan par do
526a4(rgyud): der ni skad bu mthon po la// lha rnams kyis ni bskor ba ltos// de mthong sems can thams cad la// byams pa'i sems su 'gyur bar gyis// de nas gshin rje'i mi de dag de nyid kyi nub mo rgyas pa dang ldan
526a5(rgyud): par dong ngo // de tshe der ni de dag gis// rgyal po'i pho brang nye ba na// skad bu de yi khor yug na// 'bar ba gcig gis gang bar mthong // re ro zhig gi mgul ba na// so sor 'brang ba btags pa'ang mthong / lba dang klu
526a6(rgyud): dang dri ba dang // gnod sbyin srin po mi 'am sa// kur nus 'khor bar bskor nas ni// bla meng pa'i mchod pa byed// de la gnod sbyir de dag gis// so sor 'brang ba'i skad zhes btags// de nas gnod sbyin de dag gis
526a7(rgyud): chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i nges pa de rtogs te/ slar log nas lha khyod kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin no zhes pa nas rgyas par brjod do// de skad ces smras ma thag tu tshig de smras pa'i tha ma la sems can chen po de
526b1(rgyud): sems can dmyal ba'i lus dbor nas/ sum su ma gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so// srungs btsum so sor 'brang ba'i lha'i bu zhes bya'o// za ze cher po des na sngon dang yongs su shes so// de'i phyir so
526b2(rgyud): sor 'brang ba cher mo 'di gdon mi za bar gzung bar bya'o// yi ger bri bar bya/ bklag par bya'o// cho ga bzhin du rtag tu lus la btags nas bcang bar bya ste/ de rtag tu sdug bsngal zhing nyam thag pa thams cad las
526b3(rgyud): yongs su thar par 'gyur/ ngar 'gro'i 'jigs skrag pa thams cad las rgal bar 'gyur ro// ji srid du mi khom pa brgyad rnams las yongs su thar ro// glog gis 'gyel bar byed mi nus so// grog gis ji ltar mi
526b4(rgyud): rus she na/ bram ze chen po sngon yongs su shes te/ grong khyer chen po'i mchog shing kun d+hi ba na/ tshong dpon chen po dri med dung zhes bya ba dang / nor mang ba/ gser shin tu 'byor pa/ mdzod dang bang ba kun tu gang
526b5(rgyud): zhing phus sum tshogs pa zhig gnas te/ ded dpon zhes bya bar grags so// de nas deng dpom chen po des gru bo che de rnyed nas rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang / nya ming rnams kyis de'i gru de bzung nas rab par
526b6(rgyud): gzhig par 'dod pa'i klu rnams kyang 'khrugs te 'brug sgra chen po sgrog go// grog dang skar mnga' yang gtong ngo // rdo rje'i lde 'bebs par yang bshams so// de nas tshong pa de dag sdug bsngal chen pos sems nor
526b7(rgyud): to// klu 'khrugs pa chen po de dang / glog dang / skar mnga' dang / rdo rje'i lce 'bebs pa dang / nya ming de dag gis kyang gru bo che de bzung bar mthong nas ku co'i sgra chen po bton te/ de dag gis lha khyad par can napa
527a1(rgyud): la gsol ba btab kyang 'ga' tsam yang de dag gi dpung gnyen du ma gyur to// de nas de dag tshong dpon sems rab tu brtan pa'i gan du song nas/ de dag gis snying rje rje skad du tshig 'di/
527a2(rgyud): skad smras so// sems can chen po khyod kyis bdag cag bskyab cing 'jigs pa chen po las thar par mdzad du gsol/ de nas ded dpon chen po sems rab tu brtan pa blo gros chen po des/ tshong pa 'jug/
527a3(rgyud): par gyur pa rnams la tshig 'di skad ces smras so// ma 'jigs ma 'jigs tshong pa rnams// khyed cag brtan par dengs shig dang // khyed rnams sdug bsngal chen po yi// rgya mtsho che las ngas bsgral lo//
527a4(rgyud): de nas yid ni brtan gyur nas// tshong pa rnams kyis tshig 'di smras// sems can chen po 'di ci lags// bgegs bral myur du bka' stsol cig/ blo gros cher po khyod kyi mthus// bdag cag ji srid 'gro/
527a5(rgyud): ba'i tshe// ye shes che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs// slang na khyod kyis ci zhig bgyi// de nas 'gron mang bdag po yis// de dag la ni tshig 'di rjod// nga la so sor 'brang ba yi// rig pa chen por grags pa yod
527a6(rgyud): gnod byed thams cad sel bar byed// stobs chen pha rol gnon byed pa// des ni rab tu sdug bsngal ba'i// 'jigs pa che las ngas bsgral lo// de nas dedang dpom chen pos de'i tshe rig pa'i rgyal mo sa
527a7(rgyud): sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags pa dang / rig pa'i rgyal mo cher mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags ma thag tu nya ming de dag thams cad kyis
527b1(rgyud): gru bo ched me lde gcig tu gyur pa mthong ngo // de nas klu de dag byams pa'i yid kyis de dag gi drung du lpags nas mchod pa bya bar bshams so// nya meng de dag kyang rig pa'i rgyal so so sor 'brang ba chen/
527b2(rgyud): mo 'di nyid kyi mthus tshig nas byer te zhi bar gyur to// 'gron po phal po che de dag kyang klu chen po de dag gis rin po che'i gling chen por phyin par byas so// de ltar na ye shes dang ldan pa rig pa chen mos
527b3(rgyud): sor 'brang ba chen mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ bram ze chen po rgyu des na 'di rig pa chen mo zhes grags so// 'di ni nges par rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/
527b4(rgyud): bcang bar bya'o// rlung dang / grang ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang / glog dang / lce 'bab pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed de/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa las yongs
527b5(rgyud): su thar bar byed de/ sbrang bu mnu rings dang / sha sbrang dang / byi ba dang / srog chags kyi rigs gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs lo tog ma rungs par byed pa thams cad mthu med cing rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro//
527b6(rgyud): ri dgas dang / byA dang / gcan gzan gnod par sems pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo ma dang / nags tshal dang / sman dang / lo tog la sogs pa thams cad
527b7(rgyud): 'phel bar 'gyur te/ rab tu bro zhing zhim pa dang 'jam par 'gyur ro// legs par yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// ha cang char che ba dang char dkon pa'i nyes pa rnams yongs su mi 'byung ngo // char dus su 'bang
528a1(rgyud): cing dus ma yin par mi 'bab par 'gyur ro// yul de'i klu chen po gang yin pa de dag kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par 'bebs so// yul gang na rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'bras
528a2(rgyud): ba chen mo zhes bya ba 'di spyod pa'i yul der sems can de dag gis shes par bya ste/ spos sna tshogs dang / bdug pa sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis mchod cing bsti sdang du byas la/ tshon sna tshogs
528a3(rgyud): kyis dkris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas glu dbyangs dang rol mos sil snyan byas te/ bskor ba byas nas lha rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pas sems can chen po de dag gi
528a4(rgyud): bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// cho ga ji lta ji lta ba bzhin du bris na de lta de lta bur 'grub ste/ bu pho 'dod na'ang khye'ur 'grub// mngal na 'dzin pa dam par
528a5(rgyud): 'gyur// mngal na bde bar skye ba dang // mngal nas bde bar btsas par 'gyur// mngal nas dus bzhin skye ba dang // dus bzhin rab tu btsas par 'gyur// cis mngon zhe na/ bram ze chen po snga ma bzhin du
528a6(rgyud): de nyon cig/ yul ma ga d+hA 'di nyid na rgyal po lag brkyang zhes bya ba de bu med par gyur to// ci'i phyir lag brkyang zhes bya zhe na/ rgyal po de btsas ma thag tu lag pa brkyang nas ma'i nu zho la bzung ste/ nu zho /
528a7(rgyud): ngoms su 'thungs so// nu ma de gnyis la reg ma thag tu gser gyi kha dog tu gyur te/ dus kun tu ru zho 'phel bar gyur to// rgya res na rgyal po lag brkyang zhes bya bar btags par gyur to// gzhan yang gang gi tshe rgyal/
528b1(rgyud): ro re'i gan du skye bo slong mo pa 'ongs pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po de lag pa g.yas pa bar snang la brkyang ba dang / rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' de rgyu des sangs rgyas la mngon par ngang pa'i lha rnams kyis lha'i ring po che yang
528b2(rgyud): ngar du 'phags pa gser dang / nor bu rnams kyis lag pa gang bar byed do// rgyal po res kyang skye bo sdong mo pa lpags pa rnams la rab tu byin na// bsams pa tsam gyis slong mong thams cad la 'dod pa bzhin du bde ba
528b3(rgyud): phun sum tshogs pa thams cad byin to// bu pho 'dod pa'i phyir lha rnams la mchod pa dang bsti stang cher byas kyang bu po ma rnyed nas/ des sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi mchod rten rnams kyi mdun du bsti stang bya bar
528b4(rgyud): brtsams te/ mchod pa dang bsti stang chen po byas so// sbyin pa'ang byin to// bsnyen gnas la'ang nye bar gnas so// bsod nams chen po byas so// sbyin pa chen po de dag kyang mi zad par byin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
528b5(rgyud): bram ze chen po sngon byung ba yul ma ga d+hA 'di nyid na/ gyad yul zhes bya ba'i grong khyer gu sha'i tshong dus chen po'i mchog na/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen mang gi bstan pa la zhugs pa tshong dpon chos kyi blo gros
528b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba chos sems pa'i sems can chen po zhig gnas pa de sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar bzhag nas/ rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ba 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to// de nas mi
528b7(rgyud): dbul po zhig gis chos de thos nas tshong dpon chen po de la tshig 'di skad ces bdag jo bo'i khab tu gra bgyi'o// chos kyang nyan to// gang gi tshe bdag gis cung zad rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag chos la mchod pa bgyid
529a1(rgyud): do zhes spras nas/ de'i khyim na las byed cing chos kyang nyan to// dus gzhan zhig na de la tshong dpon des dI nar gcig byin pa dang / des sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir/
529a2(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ rin po che snyim pas so sor 'brang ba chen mo la phul nas/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu chen po 'dis bdag rang sems can thams cad
529a3(rgyud): kyi dbul ba'i sdug bsngal kun gcod par gyur cig ces smon lam de skad kyang btab bo// rgyu des na sbyin pa de yongs su mi zad par gyur to// de ltar bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba rnam pa mang po rnam pa du ma byas/
529a4(rgyud): te/ lha rnams kyang mchod pa nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du mchod pa dang / de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis mi ltas su bstan te 'di skad du/ kye rgyal po chen po so sor 'brang ba chen mo//
529a5(rgyud): zhes bya ba kun nas me lce'i 'phreng ba rnam par dag pas rgyas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu phyag rgya dang / snying po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs chen mo rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo cho ga las ji skad du 'byung ba bzhin du tshe
529a6(rgyud): ga bzhin bris la btsun mo dam pa spyang ba byas la/ cho ga bzhin du lus la btags na khyod bu pho yod par 'gyur ro zhes bsgo'o// de nas rgyal po de sang nge mtshan mo de zad nas/ rtsis dang / yi ge'i 'bru dang / rgyu
529a7(rgyud): skar dang / gza' rnam par 'byed pa'i rigs kyi bram ze rnams bsogs nas cho ga las 'byung ba bzhin du rgyu skar gyi rgyal po rgyal gyi nyin par btsun mo dam pa lus shin tu legs par bkrus te spyang ba byas nas
529b1(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di'ang cho ga bzhin du bris te/ btsun mo dam pa'i mgul du btags so// sangs rgyas kyi mchod rtem rnams la mchod pa chen po byas so// rin po che khyad par can du ma'ang sems/
529b2(rgyud): can rnams la sbyin pa byin no// de nas zla ba dgu lon pa dang / bu po gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// bram ze chen po de ltar shes nas
529b3(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa/ 'dod pa thams cad du 'gro ba/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa so sor 'brang ba chen mo dkon mchog ces grags so// 'di ni rtag tu brgya byin gyi gtsug
529b4(rgyud): gi nor bu yin no// gang gi tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha ma yin rnams dang g.yul chen po 'gyed par 'dod pa de'i tshe/ 'di nyid kyis go cha byas nas spyi gtsug tu btags te/ lha ma yin thams cad pham par byas
529b5(rgyud): pha rol pham par byas nas dge ba dang / bde bas bde bar lha'i grong khyer du 'jug ste/ lha ma yin thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa yin no// bram ze chen po de ltar na sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ rig pa'i rgyal mo
529b6(rgyud): chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di 'chang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la bdud thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// 'di gang gis lus la btags sam/ mgul du btags pa de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin/
529b7(rgyud): gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par srung bar 'gyur ro// lha dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag thams cad
530a1(rgyud): kyis kyang rtag par rgyun du phyag bya zhing mchod pa dang rim gro byed par 'gyur ro// lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen pos brjed cing mchod
530a2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi dpung rab tu 'joms pas kyang de la sems can chen po zhes gsung ngo // nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de la yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams
530a3(rgyud): cad dang / nad 'gro ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// sems can chen po de mya ngan thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de la lha thams cad kyang rtag par rgyun du srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed par 'gyur ro//
530a4(rgyud): des gzhar gyis mi thub pa'i gsang sngags chen po'i snying po 'di dag bris te/ rtag par rgyun du lus sam mgul du gdags shing bcang bar bya'o// rtag par rgyun du yid la bya'o// kha ton du bya'o// bsam pa thag pa/
530a5(rgyud): nas bsgom par bya'o// sdug bsngal ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad rnam par 'joms par 'gyur ro// bde ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur/
530a6(rgyud): ro/ 'di ni gsang sngags kyi gzhi las thams cad byed pa dge ba rnams grub pa'o// tad+ya thA/ oM a mr-i ta ba re/ ba ra ba ra/ pra ba ra bi shud+d+he hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ oM a mr-i ta bi lo ki ni gar+b+ha saM rak+Sha Ni/ A kaR+Sha
530a7(rgyud): Ni hUM hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po'o// oM bi ma le/ bi pu le/ dza ya ba re/ a mr-i te/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ oM b+ha ra b+ha ra sa~M b+ha ra sa~M b+ha ra/ in+d+ra ya ba ya bi sho d+ha ni/ hUM hUM phaT phaT ru ru tsa la
530b1(rgyud): sA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o// oM ma Ni d+ha ri/ badz+re Ni ma hA pra ti sa re hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ rab tu gsang ba'i snying po'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ma lus pa thams cad thabs cig/
530b2(rgyud): tu 'dus nas sgra dbyangs gcig tu gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gsungs so// gsang sngags 'di dag ni rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo'i snying po dang go cha'o// de bzhin
530b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgyas btab pa'o// 'di thos par yang rab tu dka' na yi ger bri ba dang / tshig tu 'don pa dang / klog pa dang / 'chang ba dang / gzhan la'ang ston pa lta ci smos te/ de ni sangs
530b4(rgyud): rgyas la bya ba byas par rig par bya'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags so// rjes su yi rang ngo // lung bstan to// so sor 'brang ma chen mo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'di mchog
530b5(rgyud): tu dkon pa'o// so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di'i ming thos par yang shin tu dka' ste/ gzungs chen po 'di ni sdig pa thams cad byang bar byed pa/ stobs chen po pha rol gnon pa/ gzi brjid che ba/ 'od che ba
530b6(rgyud): yon tan brjod par che ba/ mthu che ba/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa/ bag chags thams cad kyi mtshams sbyor ba 'joms par byed dang / bdud kyi zhags pa thams cad
530b7(rgyud): gcod par byed pa/ pha rol gyi sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / dug dang / byang dang / g.yengs byed kyi sbyor ba dang / gnod par bya ba dang / drag shul du spyod pa dang / gnod pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams rnam
531a1(rgyud): par 'joms par byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa'i tshogs thams cad la mchod pa dam pa byed par mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams la yongs su
531a2(rgyud): skyong bar byed pa/ theg pa chen po 'di 'dzin pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / tshig tu 'don pa dang / kha tor byed pa dang / nyan pa dang / 'chang bar mngon par brtson pa rnams la yongs su skyong ba'o// bram ze
531a3(rgyud): chen po so sor 'brang ba chen mo rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste/ gang du yang thogs pa med do// ston pa dgra las rgyal ba nga ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad du yang/
531a4(rgyud): mchod pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro// ci mngon zhe na/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa 'di ni sngon yongs su shes te/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
531a5(rgyud): padagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya cher rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal nor bu dang / gser dang / rin po che 'bar ba'i 'od zer snang ba mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang po mngon par rdzogs par sangs
531a6(rgyud): rgyas nas/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der gshegs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bzhed pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das de la bdud g.yogs dang bcas
531a7(rgyud): pa/ bdud bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor ba/ gzugs sna tshogs mi sdug pa/ 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa/ sgra mi snyan pa/ bdud kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par 'phrul par byin gyis rlob pa
531b1(rgyud): mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs pa mngon par sprul nas lhags te/ phyogs bzhi nas bskor nas par chad bya bar brtsams pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das rgya cher rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal nor bu dang
531b2(rgyud): gser dang / rin po che 'bar ba'i 'od zer snang ba mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po lung tsam zhig cang mi gsung bar zhugs nas/ rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di yid kyis lan bdu brjod do//
531b3(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen po 'di brjod ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la bdud sdig can de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i bu ga re re nas skyes bu go cha gyon pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
531b4(rgyud): stong du ma ral gri dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa dang / tho ba dang / rtse gsum pa 'bar ba lag ra thogs pa sha stag tshig 'di skad du/ gang dag bcom ldan 'das la gnod par byed pa/ bdud gnod sems can rnams
531b5(rgyud): zung zhig zung zhig mchings shig chings shig/ gnod par sems pa thams cad rab tu choms shig/ gnod sems can dang / gza' dang / bgegs dang / log 'drer thams cad kyi srog phye mar gyis shig
531b6(rgyud): ces 'dzer cing 'thon pa mthong ngo // de nas bdud gnod sems can de dag thams cad byams pa'i ral gris mngon par btul nas/ la las ni bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bzung ba nas/ la las ni bla na med pa yang
531b7(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i bar du'o// de la mthu che ba gzhan dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i bu ga nas 'thon pa'i skyes bu chen po de dag mthong nas/ grong khyer de nyid du spa gong bar
532a1(rgyud): gyur/ rdzu 'phral yongs su nyams/ spobs pa dang / stobs dang / rtsal med par gyur cing / mda' gzhu dag kyang chag nas byer ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bgegs dang /
532a2(rgyud): log 'dren dang / bdud sdig can thams cad rab tu bcom nas/ sangs rgyas gzhan dag ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor to// brgal to// pha rol tu rab tu gshegs so// bram ze chen
532a3(rgyud): po de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo stobs kyi drag shul che ba/ rdzu 'phrul che ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dran pa tsam gyis sems can bsam pa yongs su dag pa rnams dang
532a4(rgyud): gzhan gnod sems can rnams kyang sdug bsngal ba dang / 'jigs skrag pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar byed do// bram ze chen po de lta bas na rtag par rjes su dran pa'i yid la byed pas yid la bya'o//
532a5(rgyud): yi ger bris te rtag tu lus sam mgul du gdags shing bcang bar bya'o// ci mngon zhe na/ snga ma bzhin du nyon cig/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi yul na grong khyer chen po 'phags rgyal du mi zhig la nyes
532a6(rgyud): pa byung nas/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis gshed ma'i mi rnams la khyed kyis mi 'di sod cig ces bsgo'o// de nas gshed ma'i mi de dag gis rgyal pos bsgo ba bzhin du mi de khrid de ri sul zhig tu phyin nas
532a7(rgyud): ral gri gugs nas phyung ste bsad par bshams pa dang / de'i tshe mi nges rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di yid la dran no// yi ger bris nas lag pa g.yas pa la btags shing 'dug go/
532b1(rgyud): sems can ched po de'i rig pa 'di'i mthus/ ral gri me lce gcig tu gyur nas rdul gtor ba bzhin du dum bu dum bur gyur to// de nas gshed pa'i mi de dag gis nges pa 'di rgyal po la zhib tu bskrang ngo //
532b2(rgyud): de nas rgyal po de rab tu 'khrugs nas/ kye mi 'dri dag sa phyogs shig na gnod sbyin gyi phug yod de/ de na gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag mang po ga rkyer zla ba gnas kyis/ der khring de 'or cig ces bsgo'o// de nas
532b3(rgyud): mi de gshengad ma'i mi de dag gis gnod sbyin gyi dug der bor ro// gnod sbyin gyi phug der bor ma thag tu de nas gnod sbyin de dag thams cad yid dga' ste/ mi sha za'o snyam nas rab tu brgyugs pa dang / de dag gis
532b4(rgyud): so sor 'brang ma rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di'i mthus mi de la me lce gcig tu gyur pa'i 'od 'phro bar rab tu 'bar bar mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang thams cad dngangs nas rang rang gi lus tshig par yang mthong ngo //
532b5(rgyud): de nas gnod sbyir de dag ngo mtshar skyes nas mi de khrid de sgo'i phyi rol du bzhag nas bskor ba bya bar brtsams pa nas/ gshed ma'i mi de dag gis rgyal po la zhib tu bsnang ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no// de nas rgyal po
532b6(rgyud): de cher 'khrugs te dngangs nas gal te de ltar na khyed cag deng la mi 'di bcings te chur bor cig ces bsgo ba dang / gshed mas mi de khrid de chur bor ro// mi de chur bor ma thag tu mai de ji ltar thang la 'dug pa bzhir du
532b7(rgyud): chu chu klung gi med par gyur to// chings ma de dag kyang dum bu dum bur chad // rgyal pos de skad thos pa dang / de nas rgyal po ngo mtshar du gyur nas mig tshugs su bltas te/ kyai ma'o mi 'di ngo mtshar to// 'di la rgya
533a1(rgyud): ci zhig yod snyam du rnam par rtog par gyur to zhes smras so// de nas rgyal po des mi de bkug ste/ kye mi khyod ci zhig shes zhes de skad smras so// mi nges smras pa rgyal po chen po rig pa'i/
533a2(rgyud): rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'chang ba las gzhan ni bdag la ci'ang ma 'tshal te/ lha de ni de'i mthu lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ ngo mtshar che'o// rig pa chen mo dge bar gsungs// 'chi bdag nan
533a3(rgyud): t+yang rmongs byed pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// sems can thams cad rab tu sgrol// nang dang sdug bsngal thar par byed// rig po chen mo gzi brjid che// dus min 'chi las rab tu sgrol// nang chen rnams
533a4(rgyud): ni zlog byed pa// mgon po thugs rje can gyis gsungs// de nas rgyal po rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo la mchod nas mngon par bstod do// mi de'ang bron thabs
533a5(rgyud): byin te/ rang gi gnyen gyi mdun du grong khyer gyi gtso bor dbang bskur to// bram ze chen po de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'dis thams cad du'ang mchod pa chen po rnyed do// sems can gnod
533a6(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyis kyang 'gal bar mi bya'o// de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di sngon yongs su shes te/ gang du'ang thogs pa med do// de lta bas na gdon mi za bar rtag tu lus la gdags shing
533a7(rgyud): bcang bar bya'o// bram ze chen po skar ma bzang po la cho ga legs par byas te/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di bri bar bya'o// de nas bram ze chen po de yid rab tu dga' nas/ bcom ldan 'das la yan lag lngas phyas
533b1(rgyud): 'tshal te nus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di'i cho ga ji ltar bgyis te bri bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po khyed nyon cig/
533b2(rgyud): sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir// ngas ni khyod la bshad par bya// gang gis sems can bde byed cing // nyam nga ba yi las las 'grol// nad rnams las kyang thar bya dang // bud med snum mar 'gyur ba dang //
533b3(rgyud): sems can rnams kyi dbul ba yi// rma rnams gso bar bya phyir ro// bsnyen gnas dag la gnas gyur nas// rgyu skar rgyal du shes pa la// sangs rgyas mchod la brtson byas te// byang chub phyir ni sems kyang bskyed/ snying
533b4(rgyud): rjes kun tu brlan sems dang // byangs pa dang yang ldan gyur nas// rtag tu sems can thams cad la// phan pa bskyed pa brtson par bya// tsan dar dang ni gur kum dang // gla rtsir bsres pa'i chus bkrus te// bdug pa/
533b5(rgyud): rnams kyis bdugs pa yi// gos gtsang rnams ni bgo bar bya// sa dang lci ba bsres pa yi// de yi 'og tu dkyil 'khor bya// bum pa gang ba bzhi gzhag ste// lnga pa dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag/ de la rin
533b6(rgyud): thang chen po yi// me tog bdug pa spos rnams gsol// tsan dan smi ka de bzhin du// a ka ru dang du ru ka / sha kha ra dang lnga sbyar ba'i// bdug pa cho ga bzhin du dbul// cho ga ji bzhir dus bzhir bya// lo to//
533b7(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs rnams// me tog 'bras bu sa bon dang // spos rnams kun gyis legs par brgyan// mar dang sbrang rtsi 'o ma dang // nas thug 'o thug la sogs pas// gtor ma'i dum pa dgang bar bya// mtshar ma
534a1(rgyud): shin tu bkra shis pa// phyogs bzhi rnams su gzhag par bya// lnga pa dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag/ spos kyis bkang ba'i phur bu rnams// grwa bzhi dag tu gzhag par bya// dkyil/
534a2(rgyud): 'khor gyi ni 'gram logs su// seng ldeng ngu bu bzhi btsugs la// tshor srung kha dog sA lnga yis// 'khor bar dam du dkri bar bya// gal te bdag 'grub 'dod ma ni// bram ze de ltar byas nas pre// kha zas
534a3(rgyud): dkar po zos nas su// phan par 'dod pas bri bar bya// dar ram ras sam gro ga 'am// ci yang rung ba gzhar la bri// bud med dag la bu 'dod na// gi wang gis ni legs par bri// dbus su khye'u zhig bris nas mi/
534a4(rgyud): rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de bzhin rin chen gang ba'i snod// lag pa g.yon na thogs par bya// pad+ma rab tu rgyas gyur cing // brgyan pa la ni de 'dug bya// nor bu do shal gser dag dang // rin chen sna tshogs
534a5(rgyud): rnams kyis brgyan// gdul bar shin tu dka' ba dris// grwa bzhi dag tu ri bo bri// gal te bde bar 'tsho 'dod na// rab tu bsgrims te de ltar bri// bye brag tu ni skyes pa rnams// gur kum gyis ni bri bar bya// de yi dgos
534a6(rgyud): pa 'dod pa rnams// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// pad+ma gnyis sam yang na gsum// bzhi 'am yang na lnga bris te// pad+ma la ni phyag rgya'i mtshan// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs su bri// de bzhin du ni pad+ma rnams/
534a7(rgyud): ze bas kun tu 'khor bar bri// pad+ma 'dab ma rab rgyas la// sdong bu dar gyis bcings pa bri// pad+ma la ni rtse gsum pa// zur brgyad la ni ngar dbyangs bri// de bzhin pad+ma dgra star bcas// 'dab ma brgyad dang ldan pa' bris//
534b1(rgyud): brlar byas pa'i ral gri bri// bang+gA don dkar por byas// badra'i steng du drung yang sde/ thams cad du yang dras par bya kun tu cho ga'i mang ma rnams/ mkhas pa dag gis bri bar bya/ gang la gdod ba'i sems 'byung /
534b2(rgyud): ga byis pa'i gzugs rnams ma bri'o// sna tshogs rgyas gyis brgyan pa yi// lnga yi gzugs ni bri bar bya/ dge slong byir ni rdo rje 'chang // gnod sbyin bsdigs par brtson par bri// rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyang /
534b3(rgyud): ngos bzhi rnams su bri bar bya// bram ze'i phyir ni dbang ldan no// rgyal rigs la ni dbang phyug che// dmangs rigs phyir ni rtag zhi ba// khyab 'jug legs par bri bar bya// rje'u rigs phyir ni rnam thos bu// lha yi dbab
534b4(rgyud): phyag dbang po bris// khye'u'i phyir ni skye dgu'i bdag/ blo gros chen po bri bar bya// sngo bsangs mdog ni gang yin pa// de yi ched du khros pa bri// dkar mo'i phyir ni grags ldan pa// phun sum tshogs pa'i gzugs
534b5(rgyud): su bri// sbom mo'i phyir ni nor bu bzang // rab tu bsgrims te bri bar bya// skal mo'i phyir ni gang ba bzang // rang byung nga yis bstan par bri// sbrum ma'i phyir ni nag po che// tshangs lha rnams kyang bri bar bya// gzhan
534b6(rgyud): yang ji ltar cho ga las// gong du bshad pa bzhin du bri// las kyi cho ga mthong nas ni// rab tu bsgrims te de bzhin bri// rtag tu mgul du btags na ni// de ni bde bar 'gyur ba yin// rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i pad+ma la/
534b7(rgyud): yid bzhin nor bu 'bar ba bris// pad+ma'i snying por zhags pa dang // de bzhin 'khor lo'ang bri bar bya// pad+ma'i steng du rdo rje dang // pad+ma'i snying por tho ba bri// cho ga las ni 'byung ba bzhin// pad+ma'i steng du mdung thung bri/
535a1(rgyud): cho ga las ni brjod pa bzhin// nor bu thams cad rtse mo 'bar// 'od zer 'phro bas rgyas pa dang // dar gyis bcings pa bri bar bya// klu mgo gdengs ka dgu yod la// nor bu rab tu 'a
535a2(rgyud): ba dang // de dag kun gyi snying khar yang // rdo rje gnas par bsgrims te bri// rgyal po rnams phyir stobs can dang // ded dpon mkhas pas rtag tu bri// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi// rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyang
535a3(rgyud): bri ga zla ba nyi ma rgyu skar bcas// sgra gcan mjug ring gza' brgyang bri// cho ga bzhin du nges bris la// blo gros ldan pa'i mis bsrel na// za ma dang ni ma ning yang // bu po rnyed par 'gyur ba yin// 'dis ni thams
535a4(rgyud): cad 'grub par byed// shis shing sdig pa zhi bar byed/ rang byung gi ni bka' bzhin du// gnas kyi dam pa thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di na'ang mchog tu bde// 'jig rten pha rol shin tu bde// sum cu rtsa gsum
535a5(rgyud): gnas la sogs// lha gnas de yi gnas su 'gyur// 'dzam gling bzang zhing nyams dga' bar// khyad par can rigs grags pa dang // rgyal rigs khyad par 'phags pa dang // bram ze khyad par 'phags rnams
535a6(rgyud): su bdag nyid chen po de skyes te// rtag tu rig dang bde bar 'gyur// so sor 'brang ma 'chang ba'i mis// bsod nams thob pa gang yin pa// sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyis// bsod nams phung po brjod mi
535a7(rgyud): nusus// sems can dmyal ba'i sgo rnams bcad // mtho ris sgo rnams rab tu phyed// bde ba phun sum tshogs pa dang // blo gros chen por 'gyur ba yin// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpas kyang // rtag tu dbugs ni 'byin/
535b1(rgyud): par 'gyur// lus kyi bde ba phun sum tshogs// stobs kyang che bar 'gyur ba yin// rgyal bas ji skad gsungs pa ltar// 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ba yin// mi dang lha rnams dbugs 'byin te// gnod par/
535b2(rgyud): sems pa skrag par byed// gang phyir rig pa legs bshad pa// de ni ring po mi thogs so// de ni mtshan gyis mi tshugs te// dug dang mes kyang tshugs mi 'gyur// dus min 'chi ba'i sdig pa yang // de las
535b3(rgyud): thag ni ring du 'gro// rnam pa kun tu nyan pa 'am// mthong ba dang ni reg pa'ang rung // 'byung po gdon dang rtsod pa dang // chu dang me yis 'jigs pa dang // gcan gzan sbrul dang seng ge dang // klu dang nang
535b4(rgyud): ni mi bzad rnams// gang la rig pa legs bshad pa// de la de dag kun mi 'byung // de dag sems can kun mchog 'gyur// bdud rnams kun gyis thams cad du// mchod par 'gyur ba'i 'os yin te/
535b5(rgyud): yang dag bshad kyis mnyan par byos// rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo'i cho ga dang po rdzogs so// / de nas sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir
535b6(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang bsrung ba'i tshul gyi cho ga ba shad par bya'o// srung ba'i cho ga gang zhig gis/ dngos grub cher po 'grub 'gyur ba/ gang dang gang du srung byas nas/ dor yod 'gyur te the tsom med ka 'jigs
535b7(rgyud): ming riras kyis mi ba ba ste/ gatha' rnams thams cad thog par byed chu ga darangs kyang 'thu par 'gyur 'alas kyis bu rgyang kyang bcod yar 'othos pa dang rlom nyes dang gang ma tshogs kyar kyis byas
536a1(rgyud): pa dang // gnod par bltas dang bri nyes dang // byang dang gang yang mi bzang dang // bye ma sngags kyis btab pa dang // dug 'thungs pa dang sbyar ba'i dug/ gang zhig srung ba
536a2(rgyud): 'chang de la// de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// gang zhig rig las 'gal byed pa// yan lag rnams la rnam par smin// so sor 'brang ba'i dmod bsdigs na// pha rol 'khor ni mi bzang dang /
536a3(rgyud): 'jigs pa chen po dgra yi rnams// de dag thams cad rab tu 'bros// sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' nges pas srung // nyan thos dka' thub chen po dang // rang sangs rgyas kyis
536a4(rgyud): srung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang rnam pa mang po yi// lha klu rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams// 'di la rtag tu brtson byed pa// de la srung ba byed par 'gyur/ rig pa yi ni rgyal mo 'di// thos pa tsam gyis mi mchog rnams// kun
536a5(rgyud): tu 'jigs pa med 'gyur zhes// thub pa yi ni de skad gsungs// rmi lam ngan dang ngan byas dang // gang yang nad 'go mi bzad dang // nad kyis btab dang nang cheran gyis// gang dag zir cing khrag skags dang // gzhan yang
536a6(rgyud): rnam pa mang po'i nang 'a 'bras dang shu ba skom po dang // gang yang gnod pa mi bzang bas// mi yi skye dgu zin pa dang // mi rnams ma rungs bya ba'i phyir// mchog tu mi bzang gdod byed rnams// srung ba stobs chen ga la
536a7(rgyud): parade dag thams cad mi 'byung ngo // 'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni// bcings pa dag kyang grol bar 'gyur// so sor 'brang ba bris pas kyang // gal te dus kyi 'gas pa yis// bzung nas gshim rje'i gnas
536b1(rgyud): khring ba// de yi tshe ni rnam par 'phel// gang zhig tshe ni zad gyur tam// zhag bdun na ni 'chi 'gyur ba// yi ge bris pa'i bar tsar gyis// 'tsho bar 'gyur te the tsom med// cho ga bzhin du bsrung ba byas// yang na
536b2(rgyud): thos pa tsam gyis kyang // kun tu dge ba thob par 'gyur// 'dod pa bzhin du bde bar 'tsho// gang dag sum cu rtsa gsum lha// stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang // bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya dang // brgya byin ma dur ras
536b3(rgyud): 'gro ba kun// sems can de la srung ba'i phyir// phyi bzhin 'brang zhing gnas par byed// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dang // lag na rdo rje stobs chen yang // rig pa'i rigs ni brgya dag dang // lhan cig rtag tu srung bar
536b4(rgyud): byed// zla ba yid bzang nyi ma dang // tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// nor bu bzang dang gshin rje dang // stobs kyi lha ni stobs chen dang // gang ba bzang po dpal chen dang // 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa
536b5(rgyud): dang // lnga 'dzir pa dang lngas rtsen dang // smin drug bu dang tshogs dbang dang // lha mo chen mo dpal can dang // nam thos bu dang dbyangs can dang // dung can dang ni me tog so// de bzhin ral ba gcig pa dang // gdod
536b6(rgyud): spyir chen mo dpal yon can/ rtag tu spang ba byed par 'gyur/ za ma rnams kyi bu yang skyed/ mngal na gnas pa bde bar byed/ de ni ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar/ 'di ni srung ba chen por 'gyur/ 'jigs med 'thab/
536b7(rgyud): mo'i g.yul 'byed par// dpa' bo rnams la rtag rgyal sbyin/ chos la nges pa'i lha rnams la/ 'das ni garang ba sbyin par byed/ sdig pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ gus par byas te bris na ni// de bzhin gshegs
537a1(rgyud): rang de bzhin du// byang chub sems dpa' sa bur 'gyur// de yi rmugs pa rnam par 'phel/ bsod nams dang mi tshi yang 'phel// nor rnams dnga'i 'bru dag kyang // 'byor par 'gyur te//
537a2(rgyud): tsom med// bde bar gnyid kyis log pa dang // bde bar rab tu sad par 'gyur// 'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang // dgra rkun gyis kyang mi brdzi'o// g.yul 'gyed pa yi tshe na yang // rig pa bsgrub
537a3(rgyud): par byas na ni// srung ba bla na med pa 'dis// rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur bar byed// bde bar rig pa sgrub byed cing // de la bgegs ni 'byung mi 'gyur// de yis bsams pa thams cad 'grub// dkyil 'khor kun
537a4(rgyud): tu zhugs pa yin// skye ba dag ni thams cad du// de ni myur du dam tshig shes// rgyal ba'i yon tan 'dzin pa'i phyir// de ni yid brtan 'os yin no// bkra shis thams cad rab tu rdzogs// bsams pa thams cad grub
537a5(rgyud): papar byed// 'di ni bris pa tsam gyis kyang // bde ba thams cad 'byor par 'gyur// bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byas nas// mtho ris su ni 'gro bar 'gyur// 'thab pa dang ni rtsod pa dang // 'gyed pa mchog tu mi bzang par/
537a6(rgyud): 'jigs pa kun las sgrol 'gyur te// rgyal bas ji skad gsungs bzhin no// skye ba rnams su skye ba na// rtag tu skye dran the tsom med// rgyal po bcur mo 'khor bcas pa// 'di yi dbang du 'gyur ba yid// 'jig rten/
537a7(rgyud): dge bar grags pa yim/ rtag tu byur mang 'gyur ba yin// de ni kun la sdug par 'gyur/ wA ring mi mi gang yang rung // nyid dang mtshan rnams dag par yang // de la spang ba byed par 'gyur la/ yang dag rdzogs pa'i sa
537b1(rgyud): rgyas gsungs// sngags cig 'di dag 'dir 'grub bo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcos pa/
537b2(rgyud): yang dag par rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa ga kya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'phel bya'i phyir/
537b3(rgyud): de la gus pas phyag 'tshal nas// sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir/ nga ni nga yis brjod par bya// rig pa gzi brjid chen mo 'di// stobs chen pha rol gnod pa ste// rdo rje gdan la thug pa yi// 'di ni gsungs
537b4(rgyud): ma thag tu yang // bdud dang bdud kyi rigs rnams dang // gza' dang log par 'dren pa dang // bgegs rnams ji snyed gang yod pa// thams cad de yi mod la 'byer// tad+ya thA/ oM gi r-i gi ri gi ri Ni/
537b5(rgyud): gi ri Ni/ gi ri ba ti/ gu Na ba te/ A kA sha ba te/ A kA sha bi shud+d+he/ sarba pA pa bi ga te/ A kA she/ ga ga na ta le/ A kA sha bi tsA ri Ni/ dzA li ta shi ka re/ ma ni mog ti/ kha tsi ta/ mau li d+ha ri/ su ke she
537b6(rgyud): su be she/ su dak+She/ su ne tre/ su bar+Ne/ su bar+Na gau re a tI te/ a nA ga te/ pra t+yAd ban+de/ na maHsar+b+be ShaM rud+d+hA nan/ dz+wa li ta/ te dza sAM/ bud+d+he su bud+d+he/ b+ha ga wa ti/ su rak+Sha Ni/ su k+She me/ su pra b+he su da me
537b7(rgyud): su dat+te/ ba re ba ra de/ b+ha ga ba ti/ b+ha dra ba ti/ b+ha dre su b+ha dre/ bi ma le dza ya b+had dre/ pra tsan+te/ tsat+te/ tsaN+Di/ tsaSh+Ti/ badz+ra tsaN+De/ ma ha tsaSh+Te/ g+h+r-i ri/ gaM d+ha ri / gau ri/ tsaN+Da li/ mA taM gi brtsa saM khuk+kasi
538a1(rgyud): su ma ti/ sha ba ri/ shA ba ri shaM ka ri/ dra mi Di/ drA mi Di/ ro drI Ni/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ ha na ha na/ sarba sha tAM da ha ha ha/ sarba duSh+TaM/ pre ta pi shA tsa ka DA ki NI nAM/ ma nu Sh+yA a ma
538a2(rgyud): ru Sh+Tha NaN tsa/ pa tsa pa tsa/ hri da yan/ gdon ma rungs pa rnams kyi srog gzhom du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das ma bdag gi sdig pa thams cad gzhig tu gsol/ gzhig tu gsol thams cad du 'jigs
538a3(rgyud): pa dang gnod pa thams cad las bdug la srung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol/ ma rungs pa thams cad bcing du gsol/ sar+b+ba kim+b+hi Sha nA sha ni/ mAr+ha t+tA/ mri t+ya dat+ta ri bA ra Ni/ ma ni nI/ mahA ma ni ni
538a4(rgyud): tsa le bi tsa le/ tsi Ti tsi Ti/ bi Ti bi Ti/ nau Ti ni Ti/ ni tu te/ k+Sho ri Ni/ bI ri Ni/ pra ba ra sa ma re/ tsat+tA le/ mA taM gi/ rud+b+ha si/ sa ra si/ barba si/ su ma ti/ puk+ka si/ sha ba raM
538a5(rgyud): sha dA ri/ shaM ka ri/ drA mi Di/ drA mi Di/ da ha ni ba tsa ni pA tsa ni/ mardza ni/ sa ra le/ sa ra le/ sa r-i laM b+he/ hi na ma dz+yo kr-iSh+Ta bi dA ri Ni/ bi d+hA ri Ni/ ma hi le/ ma hA ma hi le ni ba
538a6(rgyud): De DA nI ga Da/ b+hAny+dze/ mat+te/ mat+te/ mat+ti ni/ dAd+he/ tsakre/ tsakra bA ki ni ra dzA le dzA le/ dzA la ya/ dzA la ya dzA li ni/ dzA li naM/ sha ba ri shA ba ri/ sarba bya d+hi ha ra Ni/ tsA Di tsU Di/ su Di nI
538a7(rgyud): tsU Di ni/ mahA tsU Di ne/ ni mi ni mi ni min d+ha ri/ tri lo ka da ha ni/ tri lo ka dza na ni/ trai lo kA/ lo ka ka ri/ N+yai d+ha tu bya ba lo ki ne/ badz+ra pa ra shu bA ga/ mung+ga ra/ khang+ka tsakra/ shang khats+tshaH
538b1(rgyud): shU la/ tsin+ta ma nI/ ma hA bi d+ya d+ha ri Ni/ bdag thams cad du gnas thams cad na gnas pa nA ma rungs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang / nang thams
538b2(rgyud): tsang dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol ba badz+re badz+ra ba ti/ badz+ra pA Ni/ d+ha re/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ ki li ki li/ tsi li tsi li/ si li si li kha' bar khar re/
538b3(rgyud): sar+b+ba tra dza ya/ laSh+Te swAhA/ sarba pA pa bi da ra Ni swA hA/ sarba bya d+hi ha ri Ni swA hA/ sam+b+ha ra Ni swA hA/ sarba sha tru b+ha ya ha ra Ni swA hA/ sA stir+N+Na ba tu rAM swA hA/ shAn+ti ka ri swA hA/ puSh+Ti ka ri swA hA/ ba la badz+ra ni swAhA
538b4(rgyud): dza ya tu/ dza ye dza ya ba ti/ ka ma le bi ma le swA hA/ oM bi pu le swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta mUr+Ne swA hA/ oM b+hU ri ma hA shAn+ti swA hA/ oM b+h+yaHswA hA/ oM b+hA baHswA hA/ oM swaHswA hA/ oM b+hA ra b+hu baHswaHswA hA
538b5(rgyud): oM b+hU ri badz+ra ba ti sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya saM pU ra NaM/ A yuHsan+na ra Ni/ ba la ba la/ ba la bi ti/ dza ya bi d+ye/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ oM mi Ni d+ha ri Ni badz+ri ma hA pra ti sa re hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ bram ze cher
538b6(rgyud): ngo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi'i gzungs 'dis yongs su bsrung ba byas shing yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba
538b7(rgyud): dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / dbyug pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug sun dbyung ba dang / dug gzhom pa byas na/ de tshe yongs su zad pa las kyang rnam par 'phel te
539a1(rgyud): ring du ba bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// dran pa phun su ma tshogs par 'gyur ro// bskrad pa cas dang rdo rjes byangs pa tsam gyis dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / nad chen po las yongs su
539a2(rgyud): thar par 'gyur ro// de'i nang thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// rgyun rings su na ba la'ang byangs pa tsam gyis rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin du kha ton du bton na shes rab chen por 'gyur/
539a3(rgyud): ro// gzi brjid dang / stobs dang brtson 'grus dang / spongs pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// de'i sdig pa dang las kyi sgrib pa gdon mi za bar myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad kyang ma lus
539a4(rgyud): par yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa thams cad kyang de'i lus la gzi brjid dang stobs dang / brtsor/
539a5(rgyud): 'bras ston par 'gyur ro// dga' ba chen po mang bar 'gyur ro// bram ze chen po tha na rig pa chen mo'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dung 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba ri dgas dang / bya'i rna lam du thos/
539a6(rgyud): na'ang de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur na/ so sor 'brang ba chen mo'i gzungs 'di la dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/
539a7(rgyud): dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i bu 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po 'am/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ de las gzhan pa 'ga'
539b1(rgyud): zhig gis lan cig thos te/ thos nas kyang ngang pa chen po dang gus pa dang / lhag pa'i bsal pas yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ yid drag pos skom
539b2(rgyud): mam gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta ci smos te/ bram ze chen po de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnam pa brkyang rnam pa thams cad du 'byung du ma dogs shig/ de'i lus la
539b3(rgyud): nang chen po rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de'i lus la mes mi tshugasadug gis ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ dug sbyar mas ma yin/ byad kyis ma yin/ g.yengs byed kyis ma yin/ sngags kyi
539b4(rgyud): las kyis ma yin/ phye ma'i sbyor bas ma yin/ yan lag na bar mi 'gyur/ rims kyis btab par mi 'gyur/ klad pa na ba dang gnyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyid bzhi pa
539b5(rgyud): dang / nyin bdun pa'i rims rnams de'i lus la 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// dran bzhin du bde bar gnyid kyis log cing dran bzhin du bde bar sad par 'gyur ro// yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'ang
539b6(rgyud): thob par 'gyur ro// lan gcig gis chos dang ldan pa'i dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur ro// de gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba de dang der skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyang byams par
539b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// phyag bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'gro bathings po kun dang / yi dgas su skye ba rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil
540a1(rgyud): 'khor sems can thams cad la snang bar byed pa de bzhin du 'od zer gyis snang ba byed par 'gyur ro// ji ltar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi'i mthus sems can thams cad kyi lus
540a2(rgyud): sim par byed pa de bzhin du chos kyi bdud rtsis sems can thams cad kyi rgyud sim par byed par 'gyur ro// rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo'i mthus de la gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung ngo ngo/
540a3(rgyud): dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / skem byed dang / smyo byed dang / brjer byed dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / gdon ma rungs pa thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren la sogs pa thams cad kyis gtso bar
540a4(rgyud): mi nus so// de dag 'ongs na'ang rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di dran par bya'o// 'on kyang 'di lta ste/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di nyid kyi mthus ma rungs pa de dag
540a5(rgyud): thams cad rig pa 'dzin pa'i dbang du 'gyur te/ bsgo ba bzhin du ngag nyan par 'gyur ro// de la dgra'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo // dgra'i tshogs thams cad dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i blon po chen po dang /
540a6(rgyud): bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyang 'gal bar byed par mi 'gyur ro// tha na gsang par 'os pa zhig la gsheng la mi rnams kyis mtshos gdang par gzas ra yang mtshan rnams rdul bzhir du dum bu dum bur
540a7(rgyud): 'chag par 'gyur ro// de nyid kyi dus na de la chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro// de'i dran pa'i stobs kyang cher 'gyur ro/ 'dzin srin po 'joms pa'i mchog// gcang zhing sdig pa 'ag par bye dpal
540b1(rgyud): dubya ring blo yang rnyed / yor pa thams cad sa par bye la/ 'don pabs gis thams cad byed dgrags ma yi rnam par 'jig khrilas bzang po sgo bar byed / rmilam dang pa rnang par 'jig ga pa
540b2(rgyud): blo rlobs car mo 'di/ skyes pa dung rang srung ba'i mchog 'brog dgon dang ni mya ngam las/ rtag tu de yi song 'thar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bka' bzhis du/ 'dod pa dag ni kun kyang rnyed kalam las
540b3(rgyud): lamagol zhugs na yang // rig pa 'di ni rjes dran na// myur du lam dang bza' ba dang // btung ba mchog kyang rnyed par 'gyur// lus rang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// mi dge mang po gang yang rung // tshe rabs snga mar ci/
540b4(rgyud): byas pa// de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur// dran pa dang ni 'chang ba dang // 'dzir dang yi ger 'dri ba dang // tshig tu 'don tam klog pa dang // bzlas brjod byed dam gzhan ston na// de ni ring por mi thogs par
540b5(rgyud): chos kun rtogs par khong du chud// de ltar chos kyi ro rnyed na// sdig pa rnams ni zad par 'gyur// yid kyis ci dang ci 'dod pa// dgos pa thams cad 'grub par byed// 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang // rgyal po
540b6(rgyud): dang ni me dang cu / brog dang de bzhin gur 'joms las/ 'dri ni de las skyob par 'gyur/ rig pa 'bum du bzlas na 'i/ g.yul 'byung ba dang rtsod pa dang / gang yang gcan gsam ma rungs pa/ nga dag thams
540b7(rgyud): cad 'bros par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yi// dngos grub mchog gi rig pa 'di// brjod na sgying lug mi 'gyur bar// byang chub tshogs rnams rdzogs par byed// bdag dang gzhan gyi don sgrub
541a1(rgyud): phyi// gnas kyi rna pa thams cad du// rig pa 'di la sbyor du ni// 'dod pa'i las rnams gang yin pa// ma mi dgos par rig 'di las/ 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med//
541a2(rgyud): na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo ye tiSh+Than+ti da sha su dIk+Shu oM ma ni badz+re hr-i da ya badz+re mA ra sau n+ya bi dA ri Ni ha na ha na sarba sha truM rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM badz+re badz+re badz+ra gar+b+he trA sa ya trA sa ya sarba mA ra b+ha ban ta ni hUM hUM phaT pa
541a3(rgyud): sam+b+ha ra sap+ta ra swA hA/ bud+d+ha mi tI sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra kawa a d+hiSh+Thi te sarba kar+m+ma a ba ra Na a t+ya pa na ya swA hA/ nang pa rnams ni gso bya ba// da ni rab tu bshad par bya// sa dang lci ba bsres pa yis
541a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham par bya// tshon gyi phye ma sna lnga yis// dkyil 'khor sdug gur bri bar bya// mkhas pa rnams kyis cho ga bzhin// bum pa gang ba bzhi yang gzhag/ de la me tog sil mas gtor/
541a5(rgyud): bdug pa mchog gis bdugs par bya// sems can chen po gdul ba'i phyir// gtor ma yi ni las kyang bya// snga ma bzhin du me tog spos// cho ga bzhin du 'di la mchod// dar gyis bcings pa'i mnga' ban/
541a6(rgyud): yang / dkyil 'khor grwa bzhir gzug par bya// de yi 'og tu nad pa yang // dri zhim spos kyis lus bskus te// gtsang ma'i gos rnams bskon nas ni// dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag par bya// de ni shar phyogs
541a7(rgyud): kha bstan te// rig pa 'di ni brjod par bya// la bdun bzlas brjod byas nas su// mkhas pas de la bsrung bar bya// de nas nang pa'i don gyi phyir// lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// rig pa 'di ni brjod byas nas/
541b1(rgyud): das ni nang bur 'i bar 'drar// deras gtor ra'i bum pa la// mar bdu legs par sngags kyis gang ba// denas bshos kyang sngags ga ba ste/ gtor ma ma tog chog bzhin// de ltar lho phyogs ngos su ni lan
541b2(rgyud): bad kho bar gtor bar bya/ nub phyongs su yang bdun nyid de/ khyung phyogs su yang de bzhin mo// 'og rang steng du'ang lan bdun te/ bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ba yis khras ze ngas pa de sa bur/ byas na sdug
541b3(rgyud): bsngal kun las grol// skyob pa shAkya seng ga yis// srung ba 'di ni yang dag pa shad // 'di ma gtogs par khams gsum na// srung ba'i rig sngags gzham med do// de ni mi 'chi mi rgas so// nad kyis mi btab
541b4(rgyud): mi sdug min// sdug pa dang ni 'bral mi 'gyur// rig sngags 'di ni bdag gi lus// shin tu bsgoms pa byas na ni// de la 'chi bdag tshogs kyis mchod// chos kyi rgyal po dam pa gshin rje yang // gus dang /
541b5(rgyud): bcas pas de la mchod par 'gyur// skad cig nga yis sems dmyal 'di byos la// lha yi grong khyer song zhes smra bar 'gyur// de nas gzhal med khang pa rnam mang pos// rdzu 'phrul chen po lha gnas bzang
541b6(rgyud): por 'gro// de ltar der ni lha mi gnod sbyin dang // srin po rnams kyis de la rtag mchod 'gyur// lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang // bde sogs bdag po dbang po dang // 'phrog ma dang ni lngas rtsen dang // 'jig rten
541b7(rgyud): skyong ba rdzu 'phrul che// zla ba nyi ma rgyu skar bcas// mchog tu mi bzang gza' rnams dang // gang yang klu chen thams cad dang // lha dang de bzhin drang srong dang // lha min mkha' lding dri za dang // mi 'am ci dang
542a1(rgyud): khro 'phye ma srung phyir rtag tu 'brang bar byed/ gang gis rig pa stobs cher mo// rdzu 'phral chen mo bris nas ni// shes rab can gyi lag la gdags/ mchod pa chen po thob par 'gyur/
542a2(rgyud): rtag tu phun sum tshogs par 'ong// 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba cher mo'i bsrung ba'i cho ga'i brtag pa rtogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin mi tra ngab
542a3(rgyud): ra shrI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes sdes zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// slar yang yul dbus kyi rgyang pe gnyis dang bskur nas sngags rnams dag par
542a4(rgyud): khu ston lo tsA chen pos bcos pa la phyi mo// rgya gar skad du/ mahA shi ta ba ni ka sU tra/ bod skad du/ bsil ba'i tshal cher mo'i mdo// dkon/
542a5(rgyud): mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten mkhas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// gang gis thog mar rig sngags rnams// 'dzam bu'i gling du gsungs pa yi// sangs rgyas dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// da ltar byung /
542a6(rgyud): dang 'das pa dang // ma byon sangs rgyas gang lags pa// thams cad la yang bdag phyag 'tshal// de dag kun la skyabs su mchi// 'khor lo bskor ba bla med pa// mar me mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi rgyal/
542a7(rgyud): po 'od mdzad pa// thams cad gnon la phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad mkhyen pa grags ldan pa// pad+ma'i bla la phyag 'tshal lo// spyar dang ldan pa skyob mdzad pa// rab 'thor gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo//
542b1(rgyud): deng dpon bla ra med pa pa'o// grags pa'i bla ma phyag 'tshal lo// nyi ma lta bur 'od mdzad pa// bde mdzad de la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi me long ston pa po// don gzigs la yang phyag 'tshal lo// dul bzhi/
542b2(rgyud): tshul khrims 'jigs med pa// rgyal zhes bya la phyag 'tshal lo// mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis ldam// skar rgyal la yang phyag 'tshal lo// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal ldan pa// rnam par gzigs
542b3(rgyud): lal phyag 'tshal lo// 'od can gzi brjid ldan pa po// gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo// legs par mchod pa grags ldan pa// thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal lo// bdud dpung rab tu 'joms pa
542b4(rgyud): bo/ log dang se la la phyag 'tshal lo// bram ze dpal dang ldan pa po// gser thub de la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can kun la thugs brtse ba// 'od srungs de la phyag 'tshal lo// shAkya seng ge 'od
542b5(rgyud): mdzad pa/ gser mdog can la phyag 'tshal lo// ser sna med pa thugs rje can// byams pa la yang phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal te// de dag la ni bdag skyabs mchi// ga
542b6(rgyud): ngag gis ni chos bstan pa// sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo// gang la sangs rgyas gus mdzad pa'i// chos la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo// gang la phul mngon che ba'i// dge 'dun la ya
542b7(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// nyan thos shes rab mchog gyur pa// shA ri'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog gyur pa// mo'u 'gal bu la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi gtam la 'jigs med pa/
543a1(rgyud): ka t+ya'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo// nyan thos sbyangs pa'i mchog gyur pa// 'od srungs la yang phyag 'tshal lo// skyob pa yi ni dbang gyur pa// ko'u di n+ya la phyag 'tshal/
543a2(rgyud): mang du thos pa rig sngags 'chang // kun dga' bo la phyag 'tshal lo// lus ngan dang ni yul 'khor srung // mig mi bzang dang 'phags skyes po// phyogs bzhi kho ra khor yug gi/ rgyal chen
543a3(rgyud): rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi ni sde dpon mchog/ nyi shu brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo// pha ma mkhan po slob dpon dang // lha rnams la yang phyag 'tshal lo// de dag la ni phyag 'tshal nas
543a4(rgyud): rig sngags 'di ni grub gyur cig/ gang gi don du bya ba yi// don de bdag la grub gyur cig/ sdang bar sems shing gnod byed pa'i// mi ma yin rnams gung du deng // gnod par 'dod dang glags lha
543a5(rgyud): rnams// ston pa'i bstan pa mnyan par gyis// byams par sems shing phan 'dod pa'i// mi ma yin pa gang yin rnams// thams cad 'dus shing mthun gyur nas// 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis tshig/
543a6(rgyud): ston pas rjes su yi rang ba// dga' ba'i sems kyis bdeg la nyon// bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i srung ba chen po ste/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la yongs su khyab pa'o//
543a7(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / klu dang / nam mkha' lding dang / gsang ba pa dang / 'byung po dang / grul bum dang / yi dgas dang / srul po dang / sha za dang / lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang
